# --- HUNK 1: Lines 1-33 ---
     1| var webpackConfig = require('../config/webpack.karma.js');
     2| module.exports = function (config) {
     3|   config.set({
     4|     frameworks: ['mocha', 'webpack', 'detectBrowsers', ],
     5|     colors: true,
     6|     logLevel: config.LOG_INFO,
     7|     files: [
     8|       '../node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.js',
     9|       { pattern: '../src/js/**/*.js' },
    10|       { pattern: '../test/**/*.spec.js' }
    11|     ],
    12|     detectBrowsers: {
    13|       enabled: true,
    14|       usePhantomJS: false,
    15|       preferHeadless: true,
    16|       postDetection: function(availableBrowsers) {
    17|         return (config.browsers.length === 0) ? availableBrowsers.slice(0, 1) : [];
    18|       }
    19|     },
    20|     preprocessors: {
    21|       '../src/js/**/*.js': ['webpack', ],
    22|       '../test/**/*.spec.js': ['webpack', ],
    23|     },
    24|     webpack: webpackConfig,
    25|     reporters: ['dots'],
    26|     coverageReporter: {
    27|       type: 'lcov',
    28|       dir: '../coverage/',
    29|       includeAllSources: true
    30|     },
    31|     browserNoActivityTimeout: 60000,
    32|   });
    33| };

# FILE: config/common.js
# Total hunks: 1
# ====================================================================
# --- HUNK 1: Lines 1-36 ---
     1| const { readdirSync, readFileSync } = require('fs');
     2| const glob = require('glob');
     3| const path = require('path');
     4| const defaultStyle = 'bs3';
     5| module.exports = {
     6|   defaultStyle,
     7|   styles: 
     8|     readdirSync('./src/styles', { withFileTypes: true })
     9|       .filter(dirent => dirent.isDirectory() && dirent.name != 'summernote')
    10|       .map(dirent => { 
    11|         const id = dirent.name;
    12|         const target = id === defaultStyle ? 'summernote' : `summernote-${id}`;
    13|         let name;
    14|         try {
    15|           let info = JSON.parse(readFileSync(`./src/styles/${id}/summernote-${id}.json`));
    16|           name = info.name ?? id;
    17|         } catch {
    18|           name = id;
    19|         }
    20|         return { id, name, target };
    21|       }),
    22|   languages:
    23|     glob.sync('./src/lang/*.js')
    24|       .map(name => path.basename(name, '.js')),
    25|   examples:
    26|     glob.sync('./examples/*.html')
    27|       .filter(f => f.charAt(0) != '_') // except files start with underscore
    28|       .map(filepath => { 
    29|         let title;
    30|         let name = path.parse(filepath).name;
    31|         try {
    32|           let html = readFileSync(filepath).toString();
    33|           title = html.match(/<title[^>]*>([^<]+)<\/title>/)[1];
    34|         } catch {
    35|           title = name;
    36|         }

    13| (function webpackUniversalModuleDefinition(root, factory) {
    14| 	if(typeof exports === 'object' && typeof module === 'object')
    15| 		module.exports = factory();
    16| 	else if(typeof define === 'function' && define.amd)

     1| /*!
     2|  *

tag)指定",formatH1:"H1指定",formatH2:"H2指定",formatH3:"H3指定",formatH4:"H4指定",formatH5:"H5指定",formatH6:"H6指定",insertHorizontalRule:"&lt;hr /&gt;を挿入","linkDialog.show":"リンク挿入"},history:{undo:"元に戻す",redo:"やり直す"},specialChar:{specialChar:"SPECIAL CHARACTERS",select:"Select Special characters"}}}),{};var e}));

     1| /*!
     2|  *

     7|  * Copyright 2013- Alan Hong and contributors

     9|  *
    10|  * Date: 2021-10-14T21:15Z

    12|  */
    13| (function webpackUniversalModuleDefinition(root, factory) {

     1| (function(factory) {
     2|   if (typeof define === 'function' && define.amd) {
     3|     define(['jquery'], factory);
     4|   } else if (typeof module === 'object' && module.exports) {
     5|     module.exports = factory(require('jquery'));
     6|   } else {
     7|     factory(window.jQuery);
     8|   }
     9| }(function($) {
    10|   var ui = $.summernote.ui;
    11|   var dom = $.summernote.dom;
    12|   var DataBasicPlugin = function(context) {
    13|     var self = this;
    14|     var options = context.options;
    15|     var lang = options.langInfo;
    16|     self.icon = '<i class="fa fa-object-group"></i>';
    17|     context.memo('button.databasic', function() {
    18|       return ui.button({
    19|         contents: self.icon,
    20|         tooltip: lang.databasic.insert,
    21|         click: context.createInvokeHandler('databasic.showDialog'),
    22|       }).render();
    23|     });
    24|     context.memo('button.databasicDialog', function() {
    25|       return ui.button({
    26|         contents: self.icon,
    27|         tooltip: lang.databasic.edit,
    28|         click: context.createInvokeHandler('databasic.showDialog'),
    29|       }).render();
    30|     });
    31|     context.memo('button.databasicSize100', function() {
    32|       return ui.button({
    33|         contents: '<span class="note-fontsize-10">100%</span>',
    34|         tooltip: lang.image.resizeFull,
    35|         click: context.createInvokeHandler('editor.resize', '1'),
    36|       }).render();
    37|     });
    38|     context.memo('button.databasicSize50', function() {
    39|       return ui.button({
    40|         contents: '<span class="note-fontsize-10">50%</span>',
    41|         tooltip: lang.image.resizeHalf,
    42|         click: context.createInvokeHandler('editor.resize', '0.5'),
    43|       }).render();
    44|     });
    45|     context.memo('button.databasicSize25', function() {
    46|       return ui.button({
    47|         contents: '<span class="note-fontsize-10">25%</span>',
    48|         tooltip: lang.image.resizeQuarter,
    49|         click: context.createInvokeHandler('editor.resize', '0.25'),
    50|       }).render();
    51|     });
    52|     self.events = {
    53|       'summernote.init': function(we, e) {
    54|         $('data.ext-databasic', e.editable).each(function() { self.setContent($(this)); });
    55|       },
    56|       'summernote.keyup summernote.mouseup summernote.change summernote.scroll': function() {
    57|         self.update();
    58|       },
    59|       'summernote.dialog.shown': function() {
    60|         self.hidePopover();
    61|       },
    62|     };
    63|     self.initialize = function() {
    64|       var $container = options.dialogsInBody ? $(document.body) : context.layoutInfo.editor;
    65|       var body = '<div class="form-group row-fluid">' +
    66|           '<label>' + lang.databasic.testLabel + '</label>' +
    67|           '<input class="ext-databasic-test form-control" type="text" />' +
    68|           '</div>';
    69|       var footer = '<button href="#" class="btn btn-primary ext-databasic-save">' + lang.databasic.insert + '</button>';
    70|       self.$dialog = ui.dialog({
    71|         title: lang.databasic.name,
    72|         fade: options.dialogsFade,
    73|         body: body,
    74|         footer: footer,
    75|       }).render().appendTo($container);
    76|       self.$popover = ui.popover({
    77|         className: 'ext-databasic-popover',
    78|       }).render().appendTo('body');
    79|       var $content = self.$popover.find('.popover-content');
    80|       context.invoke('buttons.build', $content, options.popover.databasic);
    81|     };
    82|     self.destroy = function() {
    83|       self.$popover.remove();
    84|       self.$popover = null;
    85|       self.$dialog.remove();
    86|       self.$dialog = null;
    87|     };
    88|     self.update = function() {
    89|       if (!context.invoke('editor.hasFocus')) {
    90|         self.hidePopover();
    91|         return;
    92|       }
    93|       var rng = context.invoke('editor.createRange');
    94|       var visible = false;
    95|       if (rng.isOnData()) {
    96|         var $data = $(rng.sc).closest('data.ext-databasic');
    97|         if ($data.length) {
    98|           var pos = dom.posFromPlaceholder($data[0]);
    99|           self.$popover.css({
   100|             display: 'block',
   101|             left: pos.left,
   102|             top: pos.top,
   103|           });
   104|           context.invoke('editor.saveTarget', $data[0]);
   105|           visible = true;
   106|         }
   107|       }
   108|       if (!visible) {
   109|         self.hidePopover();
   110|       }
   111|     };
   112|     self.hidePopover = function() {
   113|       self.$popover.hide();
   114|     };
   115|     self.getInfo = function() {
   116|       var rng = context.invoke('editor.createRange');
   117|       if (rng.isOnData()) {
   118|         var $data = $(rng.sc).closest('data.ext-databasic');
   119|         if ($data.length) {
   120|           return {
   121|             node: $data,
   122|             test: $data.attr('data-test'),
   123|           };
   124|         }
   125|       }
   126|       return {};
   127|     };
   128|     self.setContent = function($node) {
   129|       $node.html('<p contenteditable="false">' + self.icon + ' ' + lang.databasic.name + ': ' +
   130|         $node.attr('data-test') + '</p>');
   131|     };
   132|     self.updateNode = function(info) {
   133|       self.setContent(info.node
   134|         .attr('data-test', info.test));
   135|     };
   136|     self.createNode = function(info) {
   137|       var $node = $('<data class="ext-databasic"></data>');
   138|       if ($node) {
   139|         info.node = $node;
   140|         context.invoke('editor.insertNode', $node[0]);
   141|       }
   142|       return $node;
   143|     };
   144|     self.showDialog = function() {
   145|       var info = self.getInfo();
   146|       var newNode = !info.node;
   147|       context.invoke('editor.saveRange');
   148|       self
   149|         .openDialog(info)
   150|         .then(function(dialogInfo) {
   151|           ui.hideDialog(self.$dialog);
   152|           context.invoke('editor.restoreRange');
   153|           if (newNode) {
   154|             self.createNode(info);
   155|           }
   156|           $.extend(info, dialogInfo);
   157|           self.updateNode(info);
   158|         })
   159|         .fail(function() {
   160|           context.invoke('editor.restoreRange');
   161|         });
   162|     };
   163|     self.openDialog = function(info) {
   164|       return $.Deferred(function(deferred) {
   165|         var $inpTest = self.$dialog.find('.ext-databasic-test');
   166|         var $saveBtn = self.$dialog.find('.ext-databasic-save');
   167|         var onKeyup = function(event) {
   168|           if (event.keyCode === 13) {
   169|             $saveBtn.trigger('click');
   170|           }
   171|         };
   172|         ui.onDialogShown(self.$dialog, function() {
   173|           context.triggerEvent('dialog.shown');
   174|           $inpTest.val(info.test).on('input', function() {
   175|             ui.toggleBtn($saveBtn, $inpTest.val());
   176|           }).trigger('focus').on('keyup', onKeyup);
   177|           $saveBtn
   178|             .text(info.node ? lang.databasic.edit : lang.databasic.insert)
   179|             .click(function(event) {
   180|               event.preventDefault();
   181|               deferred.resolve({ test: $inpTest.val() });
   182|             });
   183|           ui.toggleBtn($saveBtn, $inpTest.val());
   184|         });
   185|         ui.onDialogHidden(self.$dialog, function() {
   186|           $inpTest.off('input keyup');
   187|           $saveBtn.off('click');
   188|           if (deferred.state() === 'pending') {
   189|             deferred.reject();
   190|           }
   191|         });
   192|         ui.showDialog(self.$dialog);
   193|       });
   194|     };
   195|   };
   196|   $.extend(true, $.summernote, {
   197|     plugins: {
   198|       databasic: DataBasicPlugin,
   199|     },
   200|     options: {
   201|       popover: {
   202|         databasic: [
   203|           ['databasic', ['databasicDialog', 'databasicSize100', 'databasicSize50', 'databasicSize25']],
   204|         ],
   205|       },
   206|     },
   207|     lang: {
   208|       'en-US': {
   209|         databasic: {
   210|           name: 'Basic Data Container',
   211|           insert: 'insert basic data container',
   212|           edit: 'edit basic data container',
   213|           testLabel: 'test input',
   214|         },
   215|       },
   216|     },
   217|   });
   218| }));

     1| (function(factory) {
     2|   if (typeof define === 'function' && define.amd) {
     3|     define(['jquery'], factory);
     4|   } else if (typeof module === 'object' && module.exports) {
     5|     module.exports = factory(require('jquery'));

     8|   }
     9| }(function($) {
    10|   $.extend($.summernote.plugins, {
    11|     /**
    12|      * @param {Object} context - context object has status of editor.
    13|      */
    14|     'hello': function(context) {
    15|       var self = this;
    16|       var ui = $.summernote.ui;
    17|       context.memo('button.hello', function() {
    18|         var button = ui.button({
    19|           contents: '<i class="fa fa-child"/> Hello',
    20|           tooltip: 'hello',
    21|           click: function() {
    22|             self.$panel.show();
    23|             self.$panel.hide(500);
    24|             context.invoke('editor.insertText', 'hello');
    25|           },
    26|         });
    27|         var $hello = button.render();
    28|         return $hello;
    29|       });
    30|       this.events = {
    31|         'summernote.init': function(we, e) {
    32|           console.log('summernote initialized', we, e);
    33|         },
    34|         'summernote.keyup': function(we, e) {
    35|           console.log('summernote keyup', we, e);
    36|         },
    37|       };
    38|       this.initialize = function() {
    39|         this.$panel = $('<div class="hello-panel"/>').css({
    40|           position: 'absolute',
    41|           width: 100,
    42|           height: 100,
    43|           left: '50%',
    44|           top: '50%',
    45|           background: 'red',
    46|         }).hide();
    47|         this.$panel.appendTo('body');
    48|       };
    49|       this.destroy = function() {
    50|         this.$panel.remove();
    51|         this.$panel = null;
    52|       };
    53|     },
    54|   });
    55| }));


# ====================================================================
# FILE: dist/plugin/specialchars/summernote-ext-specialchars.js
# Total hunks: 1
# ====================================================================
# --- HUNK 1: Lines 1-261 ---
     1| (function(factory) {
     2|   if (typeof define === 'function' && define.amd) {
     3|     define(['jquery'], factory);
     4|   } else if (typeof module === 'object' && module.exports) {
     5|     module.exports = factory(require('jquery'));
     6|   } else {
     7|     factory(window.jQuery);
     8|   }
     9| }(function($) {
    10|   $.extend($.summernote.plugins, {
    11|     'specialchars': function(context) {
    12|       var self = this;
    13|       var ui = $.summernote.ui;
    14|       var $editor = context.layoutInfo.editor;
    15|       var options = context.options;
    16|       var lang = options.langInfo;
    17|       var KEY = {
    18|         UP: 38,
    19|         DOWN: 40,
    20|         LEFT: 37,
    21|         RIGHT: 39,
    22|         ENTER: 13,
    23|       };
    24|       var COLUMN_LENGTH = 12;
    25|       var COLUMN_WIDTH = 35;
    26|       var currentColumn = 0;
    27|       var currentRow = 0;
    28|       var totalColumn = 0;
    29|       var totalRow = 0;
    30|       var specialCharDataSet = [
    31|         '&quot;', '&amp;', '&lt;', '&gt;', '&iexcl;', '&cent;',
    32|         '&pound;', '&curren;', '&yen;', '&brvbar;', '&sect;',
    33|         '&uml;', '&copy;', '&ordf;', '&laquo;', '&not;',
    34|         '&reg;', '&macr;', '&deg;', '&plusmn;', '&sup2;',
    35|         '&sup3;', '&acute;', '&micro;', '&para;', '&middot;',
    36|         '&cedil;', '&sup1;', '&ordm;', '&raquo;', '&frac14;',
    37|         '&frac12;', '&frac34;', '&iquest;', '&times;', '&divide;',
    38|         '&fnof;', '&circ;', '&tilde;', '&ndash;', '&mdash;',
    39|         '&lsquo;', '&rsquo;', '&sbquo;', '&ldquo;', '&rdquo;',
    40|         '&bdquo;', '&dagger;', '&Dagger;', '&bull;', '&hellip;',
    41|         '&permil;', '&prime;', '&Prime;', '&lsaquo;', '&rsaquo;',
    42|         '&oline;', '&frasl;', '&euro;', '&image;', '&weierp;',
    43|         '&real;', '&trade;', '&alefsym;', '&larr;', '&uarr;',
    44|         '&rarr;', '&darr;', '&harr;', '&crarr;', '&lArr;',
    45|         '&uArr;', '&rArr;', '&dArr;', '&hArr;', '&forall;',
    46|         '&part;', '&exist;', '&empty;', '&nabla;', '&isin;',
    47|         '&notin;', '&ni;', '&prod;', '&sum;', '&minus;',
    48|         '&lowast;', '&radic;', '&prop;', '&infin;', '&ang;',
    49|         '&and;', '&or;', '&cap;', '&cup;', '&int;',
    50|         '&there4;', '&sim;', '&cong;', '&asymp;', '&ne;',
    51|         '&equiv;', '&le;', '&ge;', '&sub;', '&sup;',
    52|         '&nsub;', '&sube;', '&supe;', '&oplus;', '&otimes;',
    53|         '&perp;', '&sdot;', '&lceil;', '&rceil;', '&lfloor;',
    54|         '&rfloor;', '&loz;', '&spades;', '&clubs;', '&hearts;',
    55|         '&diams;',
    56|       ];
    57|       context.memo('button.specialchars', function() {
    58|         return ui.button({
    59|           contents: '<i class="fa fa-font fa-flip-vertical"></i>',
    60|           tooltip: lang.specialChar.specialChar,
    61|           click: function() {
    62|             self.show();
    63|           },
    64|         }).render();
    65|       });
    66|       /**
    67|        * Make Special Characters Table
    68|        *
    69|        * @member plugin.specialChar
    70|        * @private
    71|        * @return {jQuery}
    72|        */
    73|       this.makeSpecialCharSetTable = function() {
    74|         var $table = $('<table></table>');
    75|         $.each(specialCharDataSet, function(idx, text) {
    76|           var $td = $('<td></td>').addClass('note-specialchar-node');
    77|           var $tr = (idx % COLUMN_LENGTH === 0) ? $('<tr></tr>') : $table.find('tr').last();
    78|           var $button = ui.button({
    79|             callback: function($node) {
    80|               $node.html(text);
    81|               $node.attr('title', text);
    82|               $node.attr('data-value', encodeURIComponent(text));
    83|               $node.css({
    84|                 width: COLUMN_WIDTH,
    85|                 'margin-right': '2px',
    86|                 'margin-bottom': '2px',
    87|               });
    88|             },
    89|           }).render();
    90|           $td.append($button);
    91|           $tr.append($td);
    92|           if (idx % COLUMN_LENGTH === 0) {
    93|             $table.append($tr);
    94|           }
    95|         });
    96|         totalRow = $table.find('tr').length;
    97|         totalColumn = COLUMN_LENGTH;
    98|         return $table;
    99|       };
   100|       this.initialize = function() {
   101|         var $container = options.dialogsInBody ? $(document.body) : $editor;
   102|         var body = '<div class="form-group row-fluid">' + this.makeSpecialCharSetTable()[0].outerHTML + '</div>';
   103|         this.$dialog = ui.dialog({
   104|           title: lang.specialChar.select,
   105|           body: body,
   106|         }).render().appendTo($container);
   107|       };
   108|       this.show = function() {
   109|         var text = context.invoke('editor.getSelectedText');
   110|         context.invoke('editor.saveRange');
   111|         this.showSpecialCharDialog(text).then(function(selectChar) {
   112|           context.invoke('editor.restoreRange');
   113|           var $node = $('<span></span>').html(selectChar)[0];
   114|           if ($node) {
   115|             context.invoke('editor.insertNode', $node);
   116|           }
   117|         }).fail(function() {
   118|           context.invoke('editor.restoreRange');
   119|         });
   120|       };
   121|       /**
   122|        * show image dialog
   123|        *
   124|        * @param {jQuery} $dialog
   125|        * @return {Promise}
   126|        */
   127|       this.showSpecialCharDialog = function(text) {
   128|         return $.Deferred(function(deferred) {
   129|           var $specialCharDialog = self.$dialog;
   130|           var $specialCharNode = $specialCharDialog.find('.note-specialchar-node');
   131|           var $selectedNode = null;
   132|           var ARROW_KEYS = [KEY.UP, KEY.DOWN, KEY.LEFT, KEY.RIGHT];
   133|           var ENTER_KEY = KEY.ENTER;
   134|           function addActiveClass($target) {
   135|             if (!$target) {
   136|               return;
   137|             }
   138|             $target.find('button').addClass('active');
   139|             $selectedNode = $target;
   140|           }
   141|           function removeActiveClass($target) {
   142|             $target.find('button').removeClass('active');
   143|             $selectedNode = null;
   144|           }
   145|           function findNextNode(row, column) {
   146|             var findNode = null;
   147|             $.each($specialCharNode, function(idx, $node) {
   148|               var findRow = Math.ceil((idx + 1) / COLUMN_LENGTH);
   149|               var findColumn = ((idx + 1) % COLUMN_LENGTH === 0) ? COLUMN_LENGTH : (idx + 1) % COLUMN_LENGTH;
   150|               if (findRow === row && findColumn === column) {
   151|                 findNode = $node;
   152|                 return false;
   153|               }
   154|             });
   155|             return $(findNode);
   156|           }
   157|           function arrowKeyHandler(keyCode) {
   158|             var $nextNode;
   159|             var lastRowColumnLength = $specialCharNode.length % totalColumn;
   160|             if (KEY.LEFT === keyCode) {
   161|               if (currentColumn > 1) {
   162|                 currentColumn = currentColumn - 1;
   163|               } else if (currentRow === 1 && currentColumn === 1) {
   164|                 currentColumn = lastRowColumnLength;
   165|                 currentRow = totalRow;
   166|               } else {
   167|                 currentColumn = totalColumn;
   168|                 currentRow = currentRow - 1;
   169|               }
   170|             } else if (KEY.RIGHT === keyCode) {
   171|               if (currentRow === totalRow && lastRowColumnLength === currentColumn) {
   172|                 currentColumn = 1;
   173|                 currentRow = 1;
   174|               } else if (currentColumn < totalColumn) {
   175|                 currentColumn = currentColumn + 1;
   176|               } else {
   177|                 currentColumn = 1;
   178|                 currentRow = currentRow + 1;
   179|               }
   180|             } else if (KEY.UP === keyCode) {
   181|               if (currentRow === 1 && lastRowColumnLength < currentColumn) {
   182|                 currentRow = totalRow - 1;
   183|               } else {
   184|                 currentRow = currentRow - 1;
   185|               }
   186|             } else if (KEY.DOWN === keyCode) {
   187|               currentRow = currentRow + 1;
   188|             }
   189|             if (currentRow === totalRow && currentColumn > lastRowColumnLength) {
   190|               currentRow = 1;
   191|             } else if (currentRow > totalRow) {
   192|               currentRow = 1;
   193|             } else if (currentRow < 1) {
   194|               currentRow = totalRow;
   195|             }
   196|             $nextNode = findNextNode(currentRow, currentColumn);
   197|             if ($nextNode) {
   198|               removeActiveClass($selectedNode);
   199|               addActiveClass($nextNode);
   200|             }
   201|           }
   202|           function enterKeyHandler() {
   203|             if (!$selectedNode) {
   204|               return;
   205|             }
   206|             deferred.resolve(decodeURIComponent($selectedNode.find('button').attr('data-value')));
   207|             $specialCharDialog.modal('hide');
   208|           }
   209|           function keyDownEventHandler(event) {
   210|             event.preventDefault();
   211|             var keyCode = event.keyCode;
   212|             if (keyCode === undefined || keyCode === null) {
   213|               return;
   214|             }
   215|             if (ARROW_KEYS.indexOf(keyCode) > -1) {
   216|               if ($selectedNode === null) {
   217|                 addActiveClass($specialCharNode.eq(0));
   218|                 currentColumn = 1;
   219|                 currentRow = 1;
   220|                 return;
   221|               }
   222|               arrowKeyHandler(keyCode);
   223|             } else if (keyCode === ENTER_KEY) {
   224|               enterKeyHandler();
   225|             }
   226|             return false;
   227|           }
   228|           removeActiveClass($specialCharNode);
   229|           if (text) {
   230|             for (var i = 0; i < $specialCharNode.length; i++) {
   231|               var $checkNode = $($specialCharNode[i]);
   232|               if ($checkNode.text() === text) {
   233|                 addActiveClass($checkNode);
   234|                 currentRow = Math.ceil((i + 1) / COLUMN_LENGTH);
   235|                 currentColumn = (i + 1) % COLUMN_LENGTH;
   236|               }
   237|             }
   238|           }
   239|           ui.onDialogShown(self.$dialog, function() {
   240|             $(document).on('keydown', keyDownEventHandler);
   241|             self.$dialog.find('button').tooltip();
   242|             $specialCharNode.on('click', function(event) {
   243|               event.preventDefault();
   244|               deferred.resolve(decodeURIComponent($(event.currentTarget).find('button').attr('data-value')));
   245|               ui.hideDialog(self.$dialog);
   246|             });
   247|           });
   248|           ui.onDialogHidden(self.$dialog, function() {
   249|             $specialCharNode.off('click');
   250|             self.$dialog.find('button').tooltip();
   251|             $(document).off('keydown', keyDownEventHandler);
   252|             if (deferred.state() === 'pending') {
   253|               deferred.reject();
   254|             }
   255|           });
   256|           ui.showDialog(self.$dialog);
   257|         });
   258|       };
   259|     },
   260|   });
   261| }));

   267| var __webpack_exports__ = {};
   268| (() => {
   269| __webpack_require__.r(__webpack_exports__);
   270| var external_jQuery_ = __webpack_require__(1145);

   273| ;// CONCATENATED MODULE: ./src/js/core/env.js
   274| /**
   275|  * returns whether font is installed or not.
   276|  *
   277|  * @param {String} fontName
   278|  * @return {Boolean}
   279|  */
   280| var genericFontFamilies = ['sans-serif', 'serif', 'monospace', 'cursive', 'fantasy'];
   281| function validFontName(fontName) {
   282|   return external_jQuery_default().inArray(fontName.toLowerCase(), genericFontFamilies) === -1 ? "'".concat(fontName, "'") : fontName;
   283| }
   284| function isFontInstalled(fontName) {
   285|   var testFontName = fontName === 'Comic Sans MS' ? 'Courier New' : 'Comic Sans MS';
   286|   var testText = 'mmmmmmmmmmwwwww';
   287|   var testSize = '200px';
   288|   var canvas = document.createElement('canvas');
   289|   var context = canvas.getContext('2d');
   290|   context.font = testSize + " '" + testFontName + "'";
   291|   var originalWidth = context.measureText(testText).width;
   292|   context.font = testSize + ' ' + validFontName(fontName) + ', "' + testFontName + '"';
   293|   var width = context.measureText(testText).width;
   294|   return originalWidth !== width;
   295| }
   296| var userAgent = navigator.userAgent;
   297| var isMSIE = /MSIE|Trident/i.test(userAgent);
   298| var browserVersion;
   299| if (isMSIE) {
   300|   var matches = /MSIE (\d+[.]\d+)/.exec(userAgent);
   301|   if (matches) {
   302|     browserVersion = parseFloat(matches[1]);
   303|   }
   304|   matches = /Trident\/.*rv:([0-9]{1,}[.0-9]{0,})/.exec(userAgent);
   305|   if (matches) {
   306|     browserVersion = parseFloat(matches[1]);
   307|   }
   308| }
   309| var isEdge = /Edge\/\d+/.test(userAgent);
   310| var isSupportTouch = 'ontouchstart' in window || navigator.MaxTouchPoints > 0 || navigator.msMaxTouchPoints > 0; // [workaround] IE doesn't have input events for contentEditable
   311| var inputEventName = isMSIE ? 'DOMCharacterDataModified DOMSubtreeModified DOMNodeInserted' : 'input';
   312| /**
   313|  * @class core.env
   314|  *
   315|  * Object which check platform and agent
   316|  *
   317|  * @singleton
   318|  * @alternateClassName env
   319|  */
   320| /* harmony default export */ const env = ({
   321|   isMac: navigator.appVersion.indexOf('Mac') > -1,
   322|   isMSIE: isMSIE,
   323|   isEdge: isEdge,
   324|   isFF: !isEdge && /firefox/i.test(userAgent),
   325|   isPhantom: /PhantomJS/i.test(userAgent),
   326|   isWebkit: !isEdge && /webkit/i.test(userAgent),
   327|   isChrome: !isEdge && /chrome/i.test(userAgent),
   328|   isSafari: !isEdge && /safari/i.test(userAgent) && !/chrome/i.test(userAgent),
   329|   browserVersion: browserVersion,
   330|   isSupportTouch: isSupportTouch,
   331|   isFontInstalled: isFontInstalled,
   332|   isW3CRangeSupport: !!document.createRange,
   333|   inputEventName: inputEventName,
   334|   genericFontFamilies: genericFontFamilies,
   335|   validFontName: validFontName
   336| });
   337| ;// CONCATENATED MODULE: ./src/js/core/func.js
   338| /**
   339|  * @class core.func
   340|  *
   341|  * func utils (for high-order func's arg)
   342|  *
   343|  * @singleton
   344|  * @alternateClassName func
   345|  */
   346| function eq(itemA) {
   347|   return function (itemB) {
   348|     return itemA === itemB;
   349|   };
   350| }
   351| function eq2(itemA, itemB) {
   352|   return itemA === itemB;
   353| }
   354| function peq2(propName) {
   355|   return function (itemA, itemB) {
   356|     return itemA[propName] === itemB[propName];
   357|   };
   358| }
   359| function ok() {
   360|   return true;
   361| }
   362| function fail() {
   363|   return false;
   364| }
   365| function not(f) {
   366|   return function () {
   367|     return !f.apply(f, arguments);
   368|   };
   369| }
   370| function and(fA, fB) {
   371|   return function (item) {
   372|     return fA(item) && fB(item);
   373|   };
   374| }
   375| function func_self(a) {
   376|   return a;
   377| }
   378| function invoke(obj, method) {
   379|   return function () {
   380|     return obj[method].apply(obj, arguments);
   381|   };
   382| }
   383| var idCounter = 0;
   384| /**
   385|  * reset globally-unique id
   386|  *
   387|  */
   388| function resetUniqueId() {
   389|   idCounter = 0;
   390| }
   391| /**
   392|  * generate a globally-unique id
   393|  *
   394|  * @param {String} [prefix]
   395|  */
   396| function uniqueId(prefix) {
   397|   var id = ++idCounter + '';
   398|   return prefix ? prefix + id : id;
   399| }
   400| /**
   401|  * returns bnd (bounds) from rect
   402|  *
   403|  * - IE Compatibility Issue: http://goo.gl/sRLOAo
   404|  * - Scroll Issue: http://goo.gl/sNjUc
   405|  *
   406|  * @param {Rect} rect
   407|  * @return {Object} bounds
   408|  * @return {Number} bounds.top
   409|  * @return {Number} bounds.left
   410|  * @return {Number} bounds.width
   411|  * @return {Number} bounds.height
   412|  */
   413| function rect2bnd(rect) {
   414|   var $document = external_jQuery_default()(document);
   415|   return {
   416|     top: rect.top + $document.scrollTop(),
   417|     left: rect.left + $document.scrollLeft(),
   418|     width: rect.right - rect.left,
   419|     height: rect.bottom - rect.top
   420|   };
   421| }
   422| /**
   423|  * returns a copy of the object where the keys have become the values and the values the keys.
   424|  * @param {Object} obj
   425|  * @return {Object}
   426|  */
   427| function invertObject(obj) {
   428|   var inverted = {};
   429|   for (var key in obj) {
   430|     if (Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(obj, key)) {
   431|       inverted[obj[key]] = key;
   432|     }
   433|   }
   434|   return inverted;
   435| }
   436| /**
   437|  * @param {String} namespace
   438|  * @param {String} [prefix]
   439|  * @return {String}
   440|  */
   441| function namespaceToCamel(namespace, prefix) {
   442|   prefix = prefix || '';
   443|   return prefix + namespace.split('.').map(function (name) {
   444|     return name.substring(0, 1).toUpperCase() + name.substring(1);
   445|   }).join('');
   446| }
   447| /**
   448|  * Returns a function, that, as long as it continues to be invoked, will not
   449|  * be triggered. The function will be called after it stops being called for
   450|  * N milliseconds. If `immediate` is passed, trigger the function on the
   451|  * leading edge, instead of the trailing.
   452|  * @param {Function} func
   453|  * @param {Number} wait
   454|  * @param {Boolean} immediate
   455|  * @return {Function}
   456|  */
   457| function debounce(func, wait, immediate) {
   458|   var timeout;
   459|   return function () {
   460|     var context = this;
   461|     var args = arguments;
   462|     var later = function later() {
   463|       timeout = null;
   464|       if (!immediate) {
   465|         func.apply(context, args);
   466|       }
   467|     };
   468|     var callNow = immediate && !timeout;
   469|     clearTimeout(timeout);
   470|     timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
   471|     if (callNow) {
   472|       func.apply(context, args);
   473|     }
   474|   };
   475| }
   476| /**
   477|  *
   478|  * @param {String} url
   479|  * @return {Boolean}
   480|  */
   481| function isValidUrl(url) {
   482|   var expression = /[-a-zA-Z0-9@:%._\+~#=]{2,256}\.[a-z]{2,6}\b([-a-zA-Z0-9@:%_\+.~#?&//=]*)/gi;
   483|   return expression.test(url);
   484| }
   485| /* harmony default export */ const func = ({
   486|   eq: eq,
   487|   eq2: eq2,
   488|   peq2: peq2,
   489|   ok: ok,
   490|   fail: fail,
   491|   self: func_self,
   492|   not: not,
   493|   and: and,
   494|   invoke: invoke,
   495|   resetUniqueId: resetUniqueId,
   496|   uniqueId: uniqueId,
   497|   rect2bnd: rect2bnd,
   498|   invertObject: invertObject,
   499|   namespaceToCamel: namespaceToCamel,
   500|   debounce: debounce,
   501|   isValidUrl: isValidUrl
   502| });
   503| ;// CONCATENATED MODULE: ./src/js/core/lists.js
   504| /**
   505|  * returns the first item of an array.
   506|  *
   507|  * @param {Array} array
   508|  */
   509| function head(array) {
   510|   return array[0];
   511| }
   512| /**
   513|  * returns the last item of an array.
   514|  *
   515|  * @param {Array} array
   516|  */
   517| function last(array) {
   518|   return array[array.length - 1];
   519| }
   520| /**
   521|  * returns everything but the last entry of the array.
   522|  *
   523|  * @param {Array} array
   524|  */
   525| function initial(array) {
   526|   return array.slice(0, array.length - 1);
   527| }
   528| /**
   529|  * returns the rest of the items in an array.
   530|  *
   531|  * @param {Array} array
   532|  */
   533| function tail(array) {
   534|   return array.slice(1);
   535| }
   536| /**
   537|  * returns item of array
   538|  */
   539| function find(array, pred) {
   540|   for (var idx = 0, len = array.length; idx < len; idx++) {
   541|     var item = array[idx];
   542|     if (pred(item)) {
   543|       return item;
   544|     }
   545|   }
   546| }
   547| /**
   548|  * returns true if all of the values in the array pass the predicate truth test.
   549|  */
   550| function lists_all(array, pred) {
   551|   for (var idx = 0, len = array.length; idx < len; idx++) {
   552|     if (!pred(array[idx])) {
   553|       return false;
   554|     }
   555|   }
   556|   return true;
   557| }
   558| /**
   559|  * returns true if the value is present in the list.
   560|  */
   561| function contains(array, item) {
   562|   if (array && array.length && item) {
   563|     if (array.indexOf) {
   564|       return array.indexOf(item) !== -1;
   565|     } else if (array.contains) {
   566|       return array.contains(item);
   567|     }
   568|   }
   569|   return false;
   570| }
   571| /**
   572|  * get sum from a list
   573|  *
   574|  * @param {Array} array - array
   575|  * @param {Function} fn - iterator
   576|  */
   577| function sum(array, fn) {
   578|   fn = fn || func.self;
   579|   return array.reduce(function (memo, v) {
   580|     return memo + fn(v);
   581|   }, 0);
   582| }
   583| /**
   584|  * returns a copy of the collection with array type.
   585|  * @param {Collection} collection - collection eg) node.childNodes, ...
   586|  */
   587| function from(collection) {
   588|   var result = [];
   589|   var length = collection.length;
   590|   var idx = -1;
   591|   while (++idx < length) {
   592|     result[idx] = collection[idx];
   593|   }
   594|   return result;
   595| }
   596| /**
   597|  * returns whether list is empty or not
   598|  */
   599| function isEmpty(array) {
   600|   return !array || !array.length;
   601| }
   602| /**
   603|  * cluster elements by predicate function.
   604|  *
   605|  * @param {Array} array - array
   606|  * @param {Function} fn - predicate function for cluster rule
   607|  * @param {Array[]}
   608|  */
   609| function clusterBy(array, fn) {
   610|   if (!array.length) {
   611|     return [];
   612|   }
   613|   var aTail = tail(array);
   614|   return aTail.reduce(function (memo, v) {
   615|     var aLast = last(memo);
   616|     if (fn(last(aLast), v)) {
   617|       aLast[aLast.length] = v;
   618|     } else {
   619|       memo[memo.length] = [v];
   620|     }
   621|     return memo;
   622|   }, [[head(array)]]);
   623| }
   624| /**
   625|  * returns a copy of the array with all false values removed
   626|  *
   627|  * @param {Array} array - array
   628|  * @param {Function} fn - predicate function for cluster rule
   629|  */
   630| function compact(array) {
   631|   var aResult = [];
   632|   for (var idx = 0, len = array.length; idx < len; idx++) {
   633|     if (array[idx]) {
   634|       aResult.push(array[idx]);
   635|     }
   636|   }
   637|   return aResult;
   638| }
   639| /**
   640|  * produces a duplicate-free version of the array
   641|  *
   642|  * @param {Array} array
   643|  */
   644| function unique(array) {
   645|   var results = [];
   646|   for (var idx = 0, len = array.length; idx < len; idx++) {
   647|     if (!contains(results, array[idx])) {
   648|       results.push(array[idx]);
   649|     }
   650|   }
   651|   return results;
   652| }
   653| /**
   654|  * returns next item.
   655|  * @param {Array} array
   656|  */
   657| function next(array, item) {
   658|   if (array && array.length && item) {
   659|     var idx = array.indexOf(item);
   660|     return idx === -1 ? null : array[idx + 1];
   661|   }
   662|   return null;
   663| }
   664| /**
   665|  * returns prev item.
   666|  * @param {Array} array
   667|  */
   668| function prev(array, item) {
   669|   if (array && array.length && item) {
   670|     var idx = array.indexOf(item);
   671|     return idx === -1 ? null : array[idx - 1];
   672|   }
   673|   return null;
   674| }
   675| /**
   676|  * @class core.list
   677|  *
   678|  * list utils
   679|  *
   680|  * @singleton
   681|  * @alternateClassName list
   682|  */
   683| /* harmony default export */ const lists = ({
   684|   head: head,
   685|   last: last,
   686|   initial: initial,
   687|   tail: tail,
   688|   prev: prev,
   689|   next: next,
   690|   find: find,
   691|   contains: contains,
   692|   all: lists_all,
   693|   sum: sum,
   694|   from: from,
   695|   isEmpty: isEmpty,
   696|   clusterBy: clusterBy,
   697|   compact: compact,
   698|   unique: unique
   699| });
   700| ;// CONCATENATED MODULE: ./src/js/core/dom.js
   701| var NBSP_CHAR = String.fromCharCode(160);
   702| var ZERO_WIDTH_NBSP_CHAR = "\uFEFF";
   703| /**
   704|  * @method isEditable
   705|  *
   706|  * returns whether node is `note-editable` or not.
   707|  *
   708|  * @param {Node} node
   709|  * @return {Boolean}
   710|  */
   711| function isEditable(node) {
   712|   return node && external_jQuery_default()(node).hasClass('note-editable');
   713| }
   714| /**
   715|  * @method isControlSizing
   716|  *
   717|  * returns whether node is `note-control-sizing` or not.
   718|  *
   719|  * @param {Node} node
   720|  * @return {Boolean}
   721|  */
   722| function isControlSizing(node) {
   723|   return node && external_jQuery_default()(node).hasClass('note-control-sizing');
   724| }
   725| /**
   726|  * @method makePredByNodeName
   727|  *
   728|  * returns predicate which judge whether nodeName is same
   729|  *
   730|  * @param {String} nodeName
   731|  * @return {Function}
   732|  */
   733| function makePredByNodeName(nodeName) {
   734|   nodeName = nodeName.toUpperCase();
   735|   return function (node) {
   736|     return node && node.nodeName.toUpperCase() === nodeName;
   737|   };
   738| }
   739| /**
   740|  * @method isText
   741|  *
   742|  *
   743|  *
   744|  * @param {Node} node
   745|  * @return {Boolean} true if node's type is text(3)
   746|  */
   747| function isText(node) {
   748|   return node && node.nodeType === 3;
   749| }
   750| /**
   751|  * @method isElement
   752|  *
   753|  *
   754|  *
   755|  * @param {Node} node
   756|  * @return {Boolean} true if node's type is element(1)
   757|  */
   758| function isElement(node) {
   759|   return node && node.nodeType === 1;
   760| }
   761| /**
   762|  * ex) br, col, embed, hr, img, input, ...
   763|  * @see http://www.w3.org/html/wg/drafts/html/master/syntax.html#void-elements
   764|  */
   765| function isVoid(node) {
   766|   return node && /^BR|^IMG|^HR|^IFRAME|^BUTTON|^INPUT|^AUDIO|^VIDEO|^EMBED/.test(node.nodeName.toUpperCase());
   767| }
   768| function isPara(node) {
   769|   if (isEditable(node)) {
   770|     return false;
   771|   } // Chrome(v31.0), FF(v25.0.1) use DIV for paragraph
   772|   return node && /^DIV|^P|^LI|^H[1-7]/.test(node.nodeName.toUpperCase());
   773| }
   774| function isHeading(node) {
   775|   return node && /^H[1-7]/.test(node.nodeName.toUpperCase());
   776| }
   777| var isPre = makePredByNodeName('PRE');
   778| var isLi = makePredByNodeName('LI');
   779| function isPurePara(node) {
   780|   return isPara(node) && !isLi(node);
   781| }
   782| var isTable = makePredByNodeName('TABLE');
   783| var isData = makePredByNodeName('DATA');
   784| function isInline(node) {
   785|   return !isBodyContainer(node) && !isList(node) && !isHr(node) && !isPara(node) && !isTable(node) && !isBlockquote(node) && !isData(node);
   786| }
   787| function isList(node) {
   788|   return node && /^UL|^OL/.test(node.nodeName.toUpperCase());
   789| }
   790| var isHr = makePredByNodeName('HR');
   791| function isCell(node) {
   792|   return node && /^TD|^TH/.test(node.nodeName.toUpperCase());
   793| }
   794| var isBlockquote = makePredByNodeName('BLOCKQUOTE');
   795| function isBodyContainer(node) {
   796|   return isCell(node) || isBlockquote(node) || isEditable(node);
   797| }
   798| var isAnchor = makePredByNodeName('A');
   799| function isParaInline(node) {
   800|   return isInline(node) && !!ancestor(node, isPara);
   801| }
   802| function isBodyInline(node) {
   803|   return isInline(node) && !ancestor(node, isPara);
   804| }
   805| var isBody = makePredByNodeName('BODY');
   806| /**
   807|  * returns whether nodeB is closest sibling of nodeA
   808|  *
   809|  * @param {Node} nodeA
   810|  * @param {Node} nodeB
   811|  * @return {Boolean}
   812|  */
   813| function isClosestSibling(nodeA, nodeB) {
   814|   return nodeA.nextSibling === nodeB || nodeA.previousSibling === nodeB;
   815| }
   816| /**
   817|  * returns array of closest siblings with node
   818|  *
   819|  * @param {Node} node
   820|  * @param {function} [pred] - predicate function
   821|  * @return {Node[]}
   822|  */
   823| function withClosestSiblings(node, pred) {
   824|   pred = pred || func.ok;
   825|   var siblings = [];
   826|   if (node.previousSibling && pred(node.previousSibling)) {
   827|     siblings.push(node.previousSibling);
   828|   }
   829|   siblings.push(node);
   830|   if (node.nextSibling && pred(node.nextSibling)) {
   831|     siblings.push(node.nextSibling);
   832|   }
   833|   return siblings;
   834| }
   835| /**
   836|  * blank HTML for cursor position
   837|  * - [workaround] old IE only works with &nbsp;
   838|  * - [workaround] IE11 and other browser works with bogus br
   839|  */
   840| var blankHTML = env.isMSIE && env.browserVersion < 11 ? '&nbsp;' : '<br>';
   841| /**
   842|  * @method nodeLength
   843|  *
   844|  * returns #text's text size or element's childNodes size
   845|  *
   846|  * @param {Node} node
   847|  */
   848| function nodeLength(node) {
   849|   if (isText(node)) {
   850|     return node.nodeValue.length;
   851|   }
   852|   if (node) {
   853|     return node.childNodes.length;
   854|   }
   855|   return 0;
   856| }
   857| /**
   858|  * returns whether deepest child node is empty or not.
   859|  *
   860|  * @param {Node} node
   861|  * @return {Boolean}
   862|  */
   863| function deepestChildIsEmpty(node) {
   864|   do {
   865|     if (node.firstElementChild === null || node.firstElementChild.innerHTML === '') break;
   866|   } while (node = node.firstElementChild);
   867|   return dom_isEmpty(node);
   868| }
   869| /**
   870|  * returns whether node is empty or not.
   871|  *
   872|  * @param {Node} node
   873|  * @return {Boolean}
   874|  */
   875| function dom_isEmpty(node) {
   876|   var len = nodeLength(node);
   877|   if (len === 0) {
   878|     return true;
   879|   } else if (!isText(node) && len === 1 && node.innerHTML === blankHTML) {
   880|     return true;
   881|   } else if (lists.all(node.childNodes, isText) && node.innerHTML === '') {
   882|     return true;
   883|   }
   884|   return false;
   885| }
   886| /**
   887|  * padding blankHTML if node is empty (for cursor position)
   888|  */
   889| function paddingBlankHTML(node) {
   890|   if (!isVoid(node) && !nodeLength(node)) {
   891|     node.innerHTML = blankHTML;
   892|   }
   893| }
   894| /**
   895|  * find nearest ancestor predicate hit
   896|  *
   897|  * @param {Node} node
   898|  * @param {Function} pred - predicate function
   899|  */
   900| function ancestor(node, pred) {
   901|   while (node) {
   902|     if (pred(node)) {
   903|       return node;
   904|     }
   905|     if (isEditable(node)) {
   906|       break;
   907|     }
   908|     node = node.parentNode;
   909|   }
   910|   return null;
   911| }
   912| /**
   913|  * find nearest ancestor only single child blood line and predicate hit
   914|  *
   915|  * @param {Node} node
   916|  * @param {Function} pred - predicate function
   917|  */
   918| function singleChildAncestor(node, pred) {
   919|   node = node.parentNode;
   920|   while (node) {
   921|     if (nodeLength(node) !== 1) {
   922|       break;
   923|     }
   924|     if (pred(node)) {
   925|       return node;
   926|     }
   927|     if (isEditable(node)) {
   928|       break;
   929|     }
   930|     node = node.parentNode;
   931|   }
   932|   return null;
   933| }
   934| /**
   935|  * returns new array of ancestor nodes (until predicate hit).
   936|  *
   937|  * @param {Node} node
   938|  * @param {Function} [optional] pred - predicate function
   939|  */
   940| function listAncestor(node, pred) {
   941|   pred = pred || func.fail;
   942|   var ancestors = [];
   943|   ancestor(node, function (el) {
   944|     if (!isEditable(el)) {
   945|       ancestors.push(el);
   946|     }
   947|     return pred(el);
   948|   });
   949|   return ancestors;
   950| }
   951| /**
   952|  * find farthest ancestor predicate hit
   953|  */
   954| function lastAncestor(node, pred) {
   955|   var ancestors = listAncestor(node);
   956|   return lists.last(ancestors.filter(pred));
   957| }
   958| /**
   959|  * returns common ancestor node between two nodes.
   960|  *
   961|  * @param {Node} nodeA
   962|  * @param {Node} nodeB
   963|  */
   964| function commonAncestor(nodeA, nodeB) {
   965|   var ancestors = listAncestor(nodeA);
   966|   for (var n = nodeB; n; n = n.parentNode) {
   967|     if (ancestors.indexOf(n) > -1) return n;
   968|   }
   969|   return null; // difference document area
   970| }
   971| /**
   972|  * listing all previous siblings (until predicate hit).
   973|  *
   974|  * @param {Node} node
   975|  * @param {Function} [optional] pred - predicate function
   976|  */
   977| function listPrev(node, pred) {
   978|   pred = pred || func.fail;
   979|   var nodes = [];
   980|   while (node) {
   981|     if (pred(node)) {
   982|       break;
   983|     }
   984|     nodes.push(node);
   985|     node = node.previousSibling;
   986|   }
   987|   return nodes;
   988| }
   989| /**
   990|  * listing next siblings (until predicate hit).
   991|  *
   992|  * @param {Node} node
   993|  * @param {Function} [pred] - predicate function
   994|  */
   995| function listNext(node, pred) {
   996|   pred = pred || func.fail;
   997|   var nodes = [];
   998|   while (node) {
   999|     if (pred(node)) {
  1000|       break;
  1001|     }
  1002|     nodes.push(node);
  1003|     node = node.nextSibling;
  1004|   }
  1005|   return nodes;
  1006| }
  1007| /**
  1008|  * listing descendant nodes
  1009|  *
  1010|  * @param {Node} node
  1011|  * @param {Function} [pred] - predicate function
  1012|  */
  1013| function listDescendant(node, pred) {
  1014|   var descendants = [];
  1015|   pred = pred || func.ok; // start DFS(depth first search) with node
  1016|   (function fnWalk(current) {
  1017|     if (node !== current && pred(current)) {
  1018|       descendants.push(current);
  1019|     }
  1020|     for (var idx = 0, len = current.childNodes.length; idx < len; idx++) {
  1021|       fnWalk(current.childNodes[idx]);
  1022|     }
  1023|   })(node);
  1024|   return descendants;
  1025| }
  1026| /**
  1027|  * wrap node with new tag.
  1028|  *
  1029|  * @param {Node} node
  1030|  * @param {Node} tagName of wrapper
  1031|  * @return {Node} - wrapper
  1032|  */
  1033| function wrap(node, wrapperName) {
  1034|   var parent = node.parentNode;
  1035|   var wrapper = external_jQuery_default()('<' + wrapperName + '>')[0];
  1036|   parent.insertBefore(wrapper, node);
  1037|   wrapper.appendChild(node);
  1038|   return wrapper;
  1039| }
  1040| /**
  1041|  * insert node after preceding
  1042|  *
  1043|  * @param {Node} node
  1044|  * @param {Node} preceding - predicate function
  1045|  */
  1046| function insertAfter(node, preceding) {
  1047|   var next = preceding.nextSibling;
  1048|   var parent = preceding.parentNode;
  1049|   if (next) {
  1050|     parent.insertBefore(node, next);
  1051|   } else {
  1052|     parent.appendChild(node);
  1053|   }
  1054|   return node;
  1055| }
  1056| /**
  1057|  * append elements.
  1058|  *
  1059|  * @param {Node} node
  1060|  * @param {Collection} aChild
  1061|  */
  1062| function appendChildNodes(node, aChild) {
  1063|   external_jQuery_default().each(aChild, function (idx, child) {
  1064|     node.appendChild(child);
  1065|   });
  1066|   return node;
  1067| }
  1068| /**
  1069|  * returns whether boundaryPoint is left edge or not.
  1070|  *
  1071|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1072|  * @return {Boolean}
  1073|  */
  1074| function isLeftEdgePoint(point) {
  1075|   return point.offset === 0;
  1076| }
  1077| /**
  1078|  * returns whether boundaryPoint is right edge or not.
  1079|  *
  1080|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1081|  * @return {Boolean}
  1082|  */
  1083| function isRightEdgePoint(point) {
  1084|   return point.offset === nodeLength(point.node);
  1085| }
  1086| /**
  1087|  * returns whether boundaryPoint is edge or not.
  1088|  *
  1089|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1090|  * @return {Boolean}
  1091|  */
  1092| function isEdgePoint(point) {
  1093|   return isLeftEdgePoint(point) || isRightEdgePoint(point);
  1094| }
  1095| /**
  1096|  * returns whether node is left edge of ancestor or not.
  1097|  *
  1098|  * @param {Node} node
  1099|  * @param {Node} ancestor
  1100|  * @return {Boolean}
  1101|  */
  1102| function isLeftEdgeOf(node, ancestor) {
  1103|   while (node && node !== ancestor) {
  1104|     if (position(node) !== 0) {
  1105|       return false;
  1106|     }
  1107|     node = node.parentNode;
  1108|   }
  1109|   return true;
  1110| }
  1111| /**
  1112|  * returns whether node is right edge of ancestor or not.
  1113|  *
  1114|  * @param {Node} node
  1115|  * @param {Node} ancestor
  1116|  * @return {Boolean}
  1117|  */
  1118| function isRightEdgeOf(node, ancestor) {
  1119|   if (!ancestor) {
  1120|     return false;
  1121|   }
  1122|   while (node && node !== ancestor) {
  1123|     if (position(node) !== nodeLength(node.parentNode) - 1) {
  1124|       return false;
  1125|     }
  1126|     node = node.parentNode;
  1127|   }
  1128|   return true;
  1129| }
  1130| /**
  1131|  * returns whether point is left edge of ancestor or not.
  1132|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1133|  * @param {Node} ancestor
  1134|  * @return {Boolean}
  1135|  */
  1136| function isLeftEdgePointOf(point, ancestor) {
  1137|   return isLeftEdgePoint(point) && isLeftEdgeOf(point.node, ancestor);
  1138| }
  1139| /**
  1140|  * returns whether point is right edge of ancestor or not.
  1141|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1142|  * @param {Node} ancestor
  1143|  * @return {Boolean}
  1144|  */
  1145| function isRightEdgePointOf(point, ancestor) {
  1146|   return isRightEdgePoint(point) && isRightEdgeOf(point.node, ancestor);
  1147| }
  1148| /**
  1149|  * returns offset from parent.
  1150|  *
  1151|  * @param {Node} node
  1152|  */
  1153| function position(node) {
  1154|   var offset = 0;
  1155|   while (node = node.previousSibling) {
  1156|     offset += 1;
  1157|   }
  1158|   return offset;
  1159| }
  1160| function hasChildren(node) {
  1161|   return !!(node && node.childNodes && node.childNodes.length);
  1162| }
  1163| /**
  1164|  * returns previous boundaryPoint
  1165|  *
  1166|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1167|  * @param {Boolean} isSkipInnerOffset
  1168|  * @return {BoundaryPoint}
  1169|  */
  1170| function prevPoint(point, isSkipInnerOffset) {
  1171|   var node;
  1172|   var offset;
  1173|   if (point.offset === 0) {
  1174|     if (isEditable(point.node)) {
  1175|       return null;
  1176|     }
  1177|     node = point.node.parentNode;
  1178|     offset = position(point.node);
  1179|   } else if (hasChildren(point.node)) {
  1180|     node = point.node.childNodes[point.offset - 1];
  1181|     offset = nodeLength(node);
  1182|   } else {
  1183|     node = point.node;
  1184|     offset = isSkipInnerOffset ? 0 : point.offset - 1;
  1185|   }
  1186|   return {
  1187|     node: node,
  1188|     offset: offset
  1189|   };
  1190| }
  1191| /**
  1192|  * returns next boundaryPoint
  1193|  *
  1194|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1195|  * @param {Boolean} isSkipInnerOffset
  1196|  * @return {BoundaryPoint}
  1197|  */
  1198| function nextPoint(point, isSkipInnerOffset) {
  1199|   var node, offset;
  1200|   if (nodeLength(point.node) === point.offset) {
  1201|     if (isEditable(point.node)) {
  1202|       return null;
  1203|     }
  1204|     var nextTextNode = getNextTextNode(point.node);
  1205|     if (nextTextNode) {
  1206|       node = nextTextNode;
  1207|       offset = 0;
  1208|     } else {
  1209|       node = point.node.parentNode;
  1210|       offset = position(point.node) + 1;
  1211|     }
  1212|   } else if (hasChildren(point.node)) {
  1213|     node = point.node.childNodes[point.offset];
  1214|     offset = 0;
  1215|   } else {
  1216|     node = point.node;
  1217|     offset = isSkipInnerOffset ? nodeLength(point.node) : point.offset + 1;
  1218|   }
  1219|   return {
  1220|     node: node,
  1221|     offset: offset
  1222|   };
  1223| }
  1224| /**
  1225|  * returns next boundaryPoint with empty node
  1226|  *
  1227|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1228|  * @param {Boolean} isSkipInnerOffset
  1229|  * @return {BoundaryPoint}
  1230|  */
  1231| function nextPointWithEmptyNode(point, isSkipInnerOffset) {
  1232|   var node,
  1233|       offset = 0; // if node is empty string node, return current node's sibling.
  1234|   if (dom_isEmpty(point.node)) {
  1235|     if (point.node === null) {
  1236|       return null;
  1237|     }
  1238|     node = point.node.nextSibling;
  1239|     offset = 0;
  1240|     return {
  1241|       node: node,
  1242|       offset: offset
  1243|     };
  1244|   }
  1245|   if (nodeLength(point.node) === point.offset) {
  1246|     if (isEditable(point.node)) {
  1247|       return null;
  1248|     }
  1249|     node = point.node.parentNode;
  1250|     offset = position(point.node) + 1; // if next node is editable ,  return current node's sibling node.
  1251|     if (isEditable(node)) {
  1252|       node = point.node.nextSibling;
  1253|       offset = 0;
  1254|     }
  1255|   } else if (hasChildren(point.node)) {
  1256|     node = point.node.childNodes[point.offset];
  1257|     offset = 0;
  1258|     if (dom_isEmpty(node)) {
  1259|       if (!dom_isEmpty(point.node.nextSibling)) {
  1260|         return {
  1261|           node: point.node.nextSibling,
  1262|           offset: offset
  1263|         };
  1264|       }
  1265|       return null;
  1266|     }
  1267|   } else {
  1268|     node = point.node;
  1269|     offset = isSkipInnerOffset ? nodeLength(point.node) : point.offset + 1;
  1270|     if (dom_isEmpty(node)) {
  1271|       return null;
  1272|     }
  1273|   }
  1274|   return {
  1275|     node: node,
  1276|     offset: offset
  1277|   };
  1278| }
  1279| /*
  1280| * returns the next Text node index or 0 if not found.
  1281| */
  1282| function getNextTextNode(actual) {
  1283|   if (!actual.nextSibling) return undefined;
  1284|   if (actual.parent !== actual.nextSibling.parent) return undefined;
  1285|   if (isText(actual.nextSibling)) return actual.nextSibling;else return getNextTextNode(actual.nextSibling);
  1286| }
  1287| /**
  1288|  * returns whether pointA and pointB is same or not.
  1289|  *
  1290|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} pointA
  1291|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} pointB
  1292|  * @return {Boolean}
  1293|  */
  1294| function isSamePoint(pointA, pointB) {
  1295|   return pointA.node === pointB.node && pointA.offset === pointB.offset;
  1296| }
  1297| /**
  1298|  * returns whether point is visible (can set cursor) or not.
  1299|  *
  1300|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1301|  * @return {Boolean}
  1302|  */
  1303| function isVisiblePoint(point) {
  1304|   if (isText(point.node) || !hasChildren(point.node) || dom_isEmpty(point.node)) {
  1305|     return true;
  1306|   }
  1307|   var leftNode = point.node.childNodes[point.offset - 1];
  1308|   var rightNode = point.node.childNodes[point.offset];
  1309|   if ((!leftNode || isVoid(leftNode)) && (!rightNode || isVoid(rightNode)) || isTable(rightNode)) {
  1310|     return true;
  1311|   }
  1312|   return false;
  1313| }
  1314| /**
  1315|  * @method prevPointUtil
  1316|  *
  1317|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1318|  * @param {Function} pred
  1319|  * @return {BoundaryPoint}
  1320|  */
  1321| function prevPointUntil(point, pred) {
  1322|   while (point) {
  1323|     if (pred(point)) {
  1324|       return point;
  1325|     }
  1326|     point = prevPoint(point);
  1327|   }
  1328|   return null;
  1329| }
  1330| /**
  1331|  * @method nextPointUntil
  1332|  *
  1333|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1334|  * @param {Function} pred
  1335|  * @return {BoundaryPoint}
  1336|  */
  1337| function nextPointUntil(point, pred) {
  1338|   while (point) {
  1339|     if (pred(point)) {
  1340|       return point;
  1341|     }
  1342|     point = nextPoint(point);
  1343|   }
  1344|   return null;
  1345| }
  1346| /**
  1347|  * returns whether point has character or not.
  1348|  *
  1349|  * @param {Point} point
  1350|  * @return {Boolean}
  1351|  */
  1352| function isCharPoint(point) {
  1353|   if (!isText(point.node)) {
  1354|     return false;
  1355|   }
  1356|   var ch = point.node.nodeValue.charAt(point.offset - 1);
  1357|   return ch && ch !== ' ' && ch !== NBSP_CHAR;
  1358| }
  1359| /**
  1360|  * returns whether point has space or not.
  1361|  *
  1362|  * @param {Point} point
  1363|  * @return {Boolean}
  1364|  */
  1365| function isSpacePoint(point) {
  1366|   if (!isText(point.node)) {
  1367|     return false;
  1368|   }
  1369|   var ch = point.node.nodeValue.charAt(point.offset - 1);
  1370|   return ch === ' ' || ch === NBSP_CHAR;
  1371| }
  1372| /**
  1373|  * @method walkPoint
  1374|  *
  1375|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} startPoint
  1376|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} endPoint
  1377|  * @param {Function} handler
  1378|  * @param {Boolean} isSkipInnerOffset
  1379|  */
  1380| function walkPoint(startPoint, endPoint, handler, isSkipInnerOffset) {
  1381|   var point = startPoint;
  1382|   while (point) {
  1383|     handler(point);
  1384|     if (isSamePoint(point, endPoint)) {
  1385|       break;
  1386|     }
  1387|     var isSkipOffset = isSkipInnerOffset && startPoint.node !== point.node && endPoint.node !== point.node;
  1388|     point = nextPointWithEmptyNode(point, isSkipOffset);
  1389|   }
  1390| }
  1391| /**
  1392|  * @method makeOffsetPath
  1393|  *
  1394|  * return offsetPath(array of offset) from ancestor
  1395|  *
  1396|  * @param {Node} ancestor - ancestor node
  1397|  * @param {Node} node
  1398|  */
  1399| function makeOffsetPath(ancestor, node) {
  1400|   var ancestors = listAncestor(node, func.eq(ancestor));
  1401|   return ancestors.map(position).reverse();
  1402| }
  1403| /**
  1404|  * @method fromOffsetPath
  1405|  *
  1406|  * return element from offsetPath(array of offset)
  1407|  *
  1408|  * @param {Node} ancestor - ancestor node
  1409|  * @param {array} offsets - offsetPath
  1410|  */
  1411| function fromOffsetPath(ancestor, offsets) {
  1412|   var current = ancestor;
  1413|   for (var i = 0, len = offsets.length; i < len; i++) {
  1414|     if (current.childNodes.length <= offsets[i]) {
  1415|       current = current.childNodes[current.childNodes.length - 1];
  1416|     } else {
  1417|       current = current.childNodes[offsets[i]];
  1418|     }
  1419|   }
  1420|   return current;
  1421| }
  1422| /**
  1423|  * @method splitNode
  1424|  *
  1425|  * split element or #text
  1426|  *
  1427|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1428|  * @param {Object} [options]
  1429|  * @param {Boolean} [options.isSkipPaddingBlankHTML] - default: false
  1430|  * @param {Boolean} [options.isNotSplitEdgePoint] - default: false
  1431|  * @param {Boolean} [options.isDiscardEmptySplits] - default: false
  1432|  * @return {Node} right node of boundaryPoint
  1433|  */
  1434| function splitNode(point, options) {
  1435|   var isSkipPaddingBlankHTML = options && options.isSkipPaddingBlankHTML;
  1436|   var isNotSplitEdgePoint = options && options.isNotSplitEdgePoint;
  1437|   var isDiscardEmptySplits = options && options.isDiscardEmptySplits;
  1438|   if (isDiscardEmptySplits) {
  1439|     isSkipPaddingBlankHTML = true;
  1440|   } // edge case
  1441|   if (isEdgePoint(point) && (isText(point.node) || isNotSplitEdgePoint)) {
  1442|     if (isLeftEdgePoint(point)) {
  1443|       return point.node;
  1444|     } else if (isRightEdgePoint(point)) {
  1445|       return point.node.nextSibling;
  1446|     }
  1447|   } // split #text
  1448|   if (isText(point.node)) {
  1449|     return point.node.splitText(point.offset);
  1450|   } else {
  1451|     var childNode = point.node.childNodes[point.offset];
  1452|     var clone = insertAfter(point.node.cloneNode(false), point.node);
  1453|     appendChildNodes(clone, listNext(childNode));
  1454|     if (!isSkipPaddingBlankHTML) {
  1455|       paddingBlankHTML(point.node);
  1456|       paddingBlankHTML(clone);
  1457|     }
  1458|     if (isDiscardEmptySplits) {
  1459|       if (dom_isEmpty(point.node)) {
  1460|         remove(point.node);
  1461|       }
  1462|       if (dom_isEmpty(clone)) {
  1463|         remove(clone);
  1464|         return point.node.nextSibling;
  1465|       }
  1466|     }
  1467|     return clone;
  1468|   }
  1469| }
  1470| /**
  1471|  * @method splitTree
  1472|  *
  1473|  * split tree by point
  1474|  *
  1475|  * @param {Node} root - split root
  1476|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1477|  * @param {Object} [options]
  1478|  * @param {Boolean} [options.isSkipPaddingBlankHTML] - default: false
  1479|  * @param {Boolean} [options.isNotSplitEdgePoint] - default: false
  1480|  * @return {Node} right node of boundaryPoint
  1481|  */
  1482| function splitTree(root, point, options) {
  1483|   var ancestors = listAncestor(point.node, func.eq(root));
  1484|   if (!ancestors.length) {
  1485|     return null;
  1486|   } else if (ancestors.length === 1) {
  1487|     return splitNode(point, options);
  1488|   }
  1489|   return ancestors.reduce(function (node, parent) {
  1490|     if (node === point.node) {
  1491|       node = splitNode(point, options);
  1492|     }
  1493|     return splitNode({
  1494|       node: parent,
  1495|       offset: node ? position(node) : nodeLength(parent)
  1496|     }, options);
  1497|   });
  1498| }
  1499| /**
  1500|  * split point
  1501|  *
  1502|  * @param {Point} point
  1503|  * @param {Boolean} isInline
  1504|  * @return {Object}
  1505|  */
  1506| function splitPoint(point, isInline) {
  1507|   var pred = isInline ? isPara : isBodyContainer;
  1508|   var ancestors = listAncestor(point.node, pred);
  1509|   var topAncestor = lists.last(ancestors) || point.node;
  1510|   var splitRoot, container;
  1511|   if (pred(topAncestor)) {
  1512|     splitRoot = ancestors[ancestors.length - 2];
  1513|     container = topAncestor;
  1514|   } else {
  1515|     splitRoot = topAncestor;
  1516|     container = splitRoot.parentNode;
  1517|   } // if splitRoot is exists, split with splitTree
  1518|   var pivot = splitRoot && splitTree(splitRoot, point, {
  1519|     isSkipPaddingBlankHTML: isInline,
  1520|     isNotSplitEdgePoint: isInline
  1521|   }); // if container is point.node, find pivot with point.offset
  1522|   if (!pivot && container === point.node) {
  1523|     pivot = point.node.childNodes[point.offset];
  1524|   }
  1525|   return {
  1526|     rightNode: pivot,
  1527|     container: container
  1528|   };
  1529| }
  1530| function create(nodeName) {
  1531|   return document.createElement(nodeName);
  1532| }
  1533| function createText(text) {
  1534|   return document.createTextNode(text);
  1535| }
  1536| /**
  1537|  * @method remove
  1538|  *
  1539|  * remove node, (isRemoveChild: remove child or not)
  1540|  *
  1541|  * @param {Node} node
  1542|  * @param {Boolean} isRemoveChild
  1543|  */
  1544| function remove(node, isRemoveChild) {
  1545|   if (!node || !node.parentNode) {
  1546|     return;
  1547|   }
  1548|   if (node.removeNode) {
  1549|     return node.removeNode(isRemoveChild);
  1550|   }
  1551|   var parent = node.parentNode;
  1552|   if (!isRemoveChild) {
  1553|     var nodes = [];
  1554|     for (var i = 0, len = node.childNodes.length; i < len; i++) {
  1555|       nodes.push(node.childNodes[i]);
  1556|     }
  1557|     for (var _i = 0, _len = nodes.length; _i < _len; _i++) {
  1558|       parent.insertBefore(nodes[_i], node);
  1559|     }
  1560|   }
  1561|   parent.removeChild(node);
  1562| }
  1563| /**
  1564|  * @method removeWhile
  1565|  *
  1566|  * @param {Node} node
  1567|  * @param {Function} pred
  1568|  */
  1569| function removeWhile(node, pred) {
  1570|   while (node) {
  1571|     if (isEditable(node) || !pred(node)) {
  1572|       break;
  1573|     }
  1574|     var parent = node.parentNode;
  1575|     remove(node);
  1576|     node = parent;
  1577|   }
  1578| }
  1579| /**
  1580|  * @method replace
  1581|  *
  1582|  * replace node with provided nodeName
  1583|  *
  1584|  * @param {Node} node
  1585|  * @param {String} nodeName
  1586|  * @return {Node} - new node
  1587|  */
  1588| function replace(node, nodeName) {
  1589|   if (node.nodeName.toUpperCase() === nodeName.toUpperCase()) {
  1590|     return node;
  1591|   }
  1592|   var newNode = create(nodeName);
  1593|   if (node.style.cssText) {
  1594|     newNode.style.cssText = node.style.cssText;
  1595|   }
  1596|   appendChildNodes(newNode, lists.from(node.childNodes));
  1597|   insertAfter(newNode, node);
  1598|   remove(node);
  1599|   return newNode;
  1600| }
  1601| var isTextarea = makePredByNodeName('TEXTAREA');
  1602| /**
  1603|  * @param {jQuery} $node
  1604|  * @param {Boolean} [stripLinebreaks] - default: false
  1605|  */
  1606| function value($node, stripLinebreaks) {
  1607|   var val = isTextarea($node[0]) ? $node.val() : $node.html();
  1608|   if (stripLinebreaks) {
  1609|     return val.replace(/[\n\r]/g, '');
  1610|   }
  1611|   return val;
  1612| }
  1613| /**
  1614|  * @method html
  1615|  *
  1616|  * get the HTML contents of node
  1617|  *
  1618|  * @param {jQuery} $node
  1619|  * @param {Boolean} [isNewlineOnBlock]
  1620|  */
  1621| function html($node, isNewlineOnBlock) {
  1622|   var markup = value($node);
  1623|   if (isNewlineOnBlock) {
  1624|     var regexTag = /<(\/?)(\b(?!!)[^>\s]*)(.*?)(\s*\/?>)/g;
  1625|     markup = markup.replace(regexTag, function (match, endSlash, name) {
  1626|       name = name.toUpperCase();
  1627|       var isEndOfInlineContainer = /^DIV|^TD|^TH|^P|^LI|^H[1-7]/.test(name) && !!endSlash;
  1628|       var isBlockNode = /^BLOCKQUOTE|^TABLE|^TBODY|^TR|^HR|^UL|^OL/.test(name);
  1629|       return match + (isEndOfInlineContainer || isBlockNode ? '\n' : '');
  1630|     });
  1631|     markup = markup.trim();
  1632|   }
  1633|   return markup;
  1634| }
  1635| function posFromPlaceholder(placeholder) {
  1636|   var $placeholder = external_jQuery_default()(placeholder);
  1637|   var pos = $placeholder.offset();
  1638|   var height = $placeholder.outerHeight(true); // include margin
  1639|   return {
  1640|     left: pos.left,
  1641|     top: pos.top + height
  1642|   };
  1643| }
  1644| function attachEvents($node, events) {
  1645|   Object.keys(events).forEach(function (key) {
  1646|     $node.on(key, events[key]);
  1647|   });
  1648| }
  1649| function detachEvents($node, events) {
  1650|   Object.keys(events).forEach(function (key) {
  1651|     $node.off(key, events[key]);
  1652|   });
  1653| }
  1654| /**
  1655|  * @method isCustomStyleTag
  1656|  *

  1658|  * which implies that's a custom-made style tag node
  1659|  *
  1660|  * @param {Node} an HTML DOM node
  1661|  */
  1662| function isCustomStyleTag(node) {
  1663|   return node && !isText(node) && lists.contains(node.classList, 'note-styletag');
  1664| }

  1890|       if (callback) {
  1891|         callback.apply(this.$note[0], args);
  1892|       }
  1893|       this.$note.trigger('summernote.' + namespace, args);
  1894|     }
  1895|   }, {

  1897|     value: function initializeModule(key) {

  1901|         return;

  1908|       }

  1910|   }, {

  1948|       }

  1976|       var namespace = lists.head(arguments);
  1977|       var args = lists.tail(lists.from(arguments));
  1978|       var splits = namespace.split('.');
  1979|       var hasSeparator = splits.length > 1;

  1981|       var methodName = hasSeparator ? lists.last(splits) : lists.head(splits);
  1982|       var module = this.modules[moduleName || 'editor'];
  1983|       if (!moduleName && this[methodName]) {
  1984|         return this[methodName].apply(this, args);
  1985|       } else if (module && module[methodName] && module.shouldInitialize()) {
  1986|         return module[methodName].apply(module, args);
  1987|       }
  1988|     }
