  1992| ;// CONCATENATED MODULE: ./src/js/summernote.js
  1993| external_jQuery_default().fn.extend({
  1994|   /**
  1995|    * Summernote API
  1996|    *
  1997|    * @param {Object|String}
  1998|    * @return {this}
  1999|    */
  2000|   summernote: function summernote() {
  2001|     var type = external_jQuery_default().type(lists.head(arguments));
  2002|     var isExternalAPICalled = type === 'string';
  2003|     var hasInitOptions = type === 'object';
  2004|     var options = external_jQuery_default().extend({}, (external_jQuery_default()).summernote.options, hasInitOptions ? lists.head(arguments) : {}); // Update options
  2005|     options.langInfo = external_jQuery_default().extend(true, {}, (external_jQuery_default()).summernote.lang["en-US"], (external_jQuery_default()).summernote.lang[options.lang]);
  2006|     options.icons = external_jQuery_default().extend(true, {}, (external_jQuery_default()).summernote.options.icons, options.icons);
  2007|     options.tooltip = options.tooltip === 'auto' ? !env.isSupportTouch : options.tooltip;
  2008|     this.each(function (idx, note) {
  2009|       var $note = external_jQuery_default()(note);
  2010|       if (!$note.data('summernote')) {
  2011|         var context = new Context($note, options);
  2012|         $note.data('summernote', context);
  2013|         $note.data('summernote').triggerEvent('init', context.layoutInfo);
  2014|       }
  2015|     });
  2016|     var $note = this.first();
  2017|     if ($note.length) {
  2018|       var context = $note.data('summernote');
  2019|       if (isExternalAPICalled) {
  2020|         return context.invoke.apply(context, lists.from(arguments));
  2021|       } else if (options.focus) {
  2022|         context.invoke('editor.focus');
  2023|       }
  2024|     }
  2025|     return this;
  2026|   }
  2027| });
  2028| ;// CONCATENATED MODULE: ./src/js/core/range.js
  2029| function range_classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError("Cannot call a class as a function"); } }
  2030| function range_defineProperties(target, props) { for (var i = 0; i < props.length; i++) { var descriptor = props[i]; descriptor.enumerable = descriptor.enumerable || false; descriptor.configurable = true; if ("value" in descriptor) descriptor.writable = true; Object.defineProperty(target, descriptor.key, descriptor); } }
  2031| function range_createClass(Constructor, protoProps, staticProps) { if (protoProps) range_defineProperties(Constructor.prototype, protoProps); if (staticProps) range_defineProperties(Constructor, staticProps); return Constructor; }
  2032| /**
  2033|  * return boundaryPoint from TextRange, inspired by Andy Na's HuskyRange.js
  2034|  *
  2035|  * @param {TextRange} textRange
  2036|  * @param {Boolean} isStart
  2037|  * @return {BoundaryPoint}
  2038|  *
  2039|  * @see http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ie/ms535872(v=vs.85).aspx
  2040|  */
  2041| function textRangeToPoint(textRange, isStart) {
  2042|   var container = textRange.parentElement();
  2043|   var offset;
  2044|   var tester = document.body.createTextRange();
  2045|   var prevContainer;
  2046|   var childNodes = lists.from(container.childNodes);
  2047|   for (offset = 0; offset < childNodes.length; offset++) {
  2048|     if (dom.isText(childNodes[offset])) {
  2049|       continue;
  2050|     }
  2051|     tester.moveToElementText(childNodes[offset]);
  2052|     if (tester.compareEndPoints('StartToStart', textRange) >= 0) {
  2053|       break;
  2054|     }
  2055|     prevContainer = childNodes[offset];
  2056|   }
  2057|   if (offset !== 0 && dom.isText(childNodes[offset - 1])) {
  2058|     var textRangeStart = document.body.createTextRange();
  2059|     var curTextNode = null;
  2060|     textRangeStart.moveToElementText(prevContainer || container);
  2061|     textRangeStart.collapse(!prevContainer);
  2062|     curTextNode = prevContainer ? prevContainer.nextSibling : container.firstChild;
  2063|     var pointTester = textRange.duplicate();
  2064|     pointTester.setEndPoint('StartToStart', textRangeStart);
  2065|     var textCount = pointTester.text.replace(/[\r\n]/g, '').length;
  2066|     while (textCount > curTextNode.nodeValue.length && curTextNode.nextSibling) {
  2067|       textCount -= curTextNode.nodeValue.length;
  2068|       curTextNode = curTextNode.nextSibling;
  2069|     } // [workaround] enforce IE to re-reference curTextNode, hack
  2070|     var dummy = curTextNode.nodeValue; // eslint-disable-line
  2071|     if (isStart && curTextNode.nextSibling && dom.isText(curTextNode.nextSibling) && textCount === curTextNode.nodeValue.length) {
  2072|       textCount -= curTextNode.nodeValue.length;
  2073|       curTextNode = curTextNode.nextSibling;
  2074|     }
  2075|     container = curTextNode;
  2076|     offset = textCount;
  2077|   }
  2078|   return {
  2079|     cont: container,
  2080|     offset: offset
  2081|   };
  2082| }
  2083| /**
  2084|  * return TextRange from boundary point (inspired by google closure-library)
  2085|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  2086|  * @return {TextRange}
  2087|  */
  2088| function pointToTextRange(point) {
  2089|   var textRangeInfo = function textRangeInfo(container, offset) {
  2090|     var node, isCollapseToStart;
  2091|     if (dom.isText(container)) {
  2092|       var prevTextNodes = dom.listPrev(container, func.not(dom.isText));
  2093|       var prevContainer = lists.last(prevTextNodes).previousSibling;
  2094|       node = prevContainer || container.parentNode;
  2095|       offset += lists.sum(lists.tail(prevTextNodes), dom.nodeLength);
  2096|       isCollapseToStart = !prevContainer;
  2097|     } else {
  2098|       node = container.childNodes[offset] || container;
  2099|       if (dom.isText(node)) {
  2100|         return textRangeInfo(node, 0);
  2101|       }
  2102|       offset = 0;
  2103|       isCollapseToStart = false;
  2104|     }
  2105|     return {
  2106|       node: node,
  2107|       collapseToStart: isCollapseToStart,
  2108|       offset: offset
  2109|     };
  2110|   };
  2111|   var textRange = document.body.createTextRange();
  2112|   var info = textRangeInfo(point.node, point.offset);
  2113|   textRange.moveToElementText(info.node);
  2114|   textRange.collapse(info.collapseToStart);
  2115|   textRange.moveStart('character', info.offset);
  2116|   return textRange;
  2117| }
  2118| /**
  2119|    * Wrapped Range
  2120|    *
  2121|    * @constructor
  2122|    * @param {Node} sc - start container
  2123|    * @param {Number} so - start offset
  2124|    * @param {Node} ec - end container
  2125|    * @param {Number} eo - end offset
  2126|    */
  2127| var WrappedRange = /*#__PURE__*/function () {
  2128|   function WrappedRange(sc, so, ec, eo) {
  2129|     range_classCallCheck(this, WrappedRange);
  2130|     this.sc = sc;
  2131|     this.so = so;
  2132|     this.ec = ec;
  2133|     this.eo = eo; // isOnEditable: judge whether range is on editable or not
  2134|     this.isOnEditable = this.makeIsOn(dom.isEditable); // isOnList: judge whether range is on list node or not
  2135|     this.isOnList = this.makeIsOn(dom.isList); // isOnAnchor: judge whether range is on anchor node or not
  2136|     this.isOnAnchor = this.makeIsOn(dom.isAnchor); // isOnCell: judge whether range is on cell node or not
  2137|     this.isOnCell = this.makeIsOn(dom.isCell); // isOnData: judge whether range is on data node or not
  2138|     this.isOnData = this.makeIsOn(dom.isData);
  2139|   } // nativeRange: get nativeRange from sc, so, ec, eo
  2140|   range_createClass(WrappedRange, [{
  2141|     key: "nativeRange",
  2142|     value: function nativeRange() {
  2143|       if (env.isW3CRangeSupport) {
  2144|         var w3cRange = document.createRange();
  2145|         w3cRange.setStart(this.sc, this.so);
  2146|         w3cRange.setEnd(this.ec, this.eo);
  2147|         return w3cRange;
  2148|       } else {
  2149|         var textRange = pointToTextRange({
  2150|           node: this.sc,
  2151|           offset: this.so
  2152|         });
  2153|         textRange.setEndPoint('EndToEnd', pointToTextRange({
  2154|           node: this.ec,
  2155|           offset: this.eo
  2156|         }));
  2157|         return textRange;
  2158|       }
  2159|     }
  2160|   }, {
  2161|     key: "getPoints",
  2162|     value: function getPoints() {
  2163|       return {
  2164|         sc: this.sc,
  2165|         so: this.so,
  2166|         ec: this.ec,
  2167|         eo: this.eo
  2168|       };
  2169|     }
  2170|   }, {
  2171|     key: "getStartPoint",
  2172|     value: function getStartPoint() {
  2173|       return {
  2174|         node: this.sc,
  2175|         offset: this.so
  2176|       };
  2177|     }
  2178|   }, {
  2179|     key: "getEndPoint",
  2180|     value: function getEndPoint() {
  2181|       return {
  2182|         node: this.ec,
  2183|         offset: this.eo
  2184|       };
  2185|     }
  2186|     /**
  2187|      * select update visible range
  2188|      */
  2189|   }, {
  2190|     key: "select",
  2191|     value: function select() {
  2192|       var nativeRng = this.nativeRange();
  2193|       if (env.isW3CRangeSupport) {
  2194|         var selection = document.getSelection();
  2195|         if (selection.rangeCount > 0) {
  2196|           selection.removeAllRanges();
  2197|         }
  2198|         selection.addRange(nativeRng);
  2199|       } else {
  2200|         nativeRng.select();
  2201|       }
  2202|       return this;
  2203|     }
  2204|     /**
  2205|      * Moves the scrollbar to start container(sc) of current range
  2206|      *
  2207|      * @return {WrappedRange}
  2208|      */
  2209|   }, {
  2210|     key: "scrollIntoView",
  2211|     value: function scrollIntoView(container) {
  2212|       var height = external_jQuery_default()(container).height();
  2213|       if (container.scrollTop + height < this.sc.offsetTop) {
  2214|         container.scrollTop += Math.abs(container.scrollTop + height - this.sc.offsetTop);
  2215|       }
  2216|       return this;
  2217|     }
  2218|     /**
  2219|      * @return {WrappedRange}
  2220|      */
  2221|   }, {
  2222|     key: "normalize",
  2223|     value: function normalize() {
  2224|       /**
  2225|        * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  2226|        * @param {Boolean} isLeftToRight - true: prefer to choose right node
  2227|        *                                - false: prefer to choose left node
  2228|        * @return {BoundaryPoint}
  2229|        */
  2230|       var getVisiblePoint = function getVisiblePoint(point, isLeftToRight) {
  2231|         if (!point) {
  2232|           return point;
  2233|         } // Just use the given point [XXX:Adhoc]
  2234|         if (dom.isVisiblePoint(point)) {
  2235|           if (!dom.isEdgePoint(point) || dom.isRightEdgePoint(point) && !isLeftToRight || dom.isLeftEdgePoint(point) && isLeftToRight || dom.isRightEdgePoint(point) && isLeftToRight && dom.isVoid(point.node.nextSibling) || dom.isLeftEdgePoint(point) && !isLeftToRight && dom.isVoid(point.node.previousSibling) || dom.isBlock(point.node) && dom.isEmpty(point.node)) {
  2236|             return point;
  2237|           }
  2238|         } // point on block's edge
  2239|         var block = dom.ancestor(point.node, dom.isBlock);
  2240|         var hasRightNode = false;
  2241|         if (!hasRightNode) {
  2242|           var prevPoint = dom.prevPoint(point) || {
  2243|             node: null
  2244|           };
  2245|           hasRightNode = (dom.isLeftEdgePointOf(point, block) || dom.isVoid(prevPoint.node)) && !isLeftToRight;
  2246|         }
  2247|         var hasLeftNode = false;
  2248|         if (!hasLeftNode) {
  2249|           var _nextPoint = dom.nextPoint(point) || {
  2250|             node: null
  2251|           };
  2252|           hasLeftNode = (dom.isRightEdgePointOf(point, block) || dom.isVoid(_nextPoint.node)) && isLeftToRight;
  2253|         }
  2254|         if (hasRightNode || hasLeftNode) {
  2255|           if (dom.isVisiblePoint(point)) {
  2256|             return point;
  2257|           } // reverse direction
  2258|           isLeftToRight = !isLeftToRight;
  2259|         }
  2260|         var nextPoint = isLeftToRight ? dom.nextPointUntil(dom.nextPoint(point), dom.isVisiblePoint) : dom.prevPointUntil(dom.prevPoint(point), dom.isVisiblePoint);
  2261|         return nextPoint || point;
  2262|       };
  2263|       var endPoint = getVisiblePoint(this.getEndPoint(), false);
  2264|       var startPoint = this.isCollapsed() ? endPoint : getVisiblePoint(this.getStartPoint(), true);
  2265|       return new WrappedRange(startPoint.node, startPoint.offset, endPoint.node, endPoint.offset);
  2266|     }
  2267|     /**
  2268|      * returns matched nodes on range
  2269|      *
  2270|      * @param {Function} [pred] - predicate function
  2271|      * @param {Object} [options]
  2272|      * @param {Boolean} [options.includeAncestor]
  2273|      * @param {Boolean} [options.fullyContains]
  2274|      * @return {Node[]}
  2275|      */
  2276|   }, {
  2277|     key: "nodes",
  2278|     value: function nodes(pred, options) {
  2279|       pred = pred || func.ok;
  2280|       var includeAncestor = options && options.includeAncestor;
  2281|       var fullyContains = options && options.fullyContains; // TODO compare points and sort
  2282|       var startPoint = this.getStartPoint();
  2283|       var endPoint = this.getEndPoint();
  2284|       var nodes = [];
  2285|       var leftEdgeNodes = [];
  2286|       dom.walkPoint(startPoint, endPoint, function (point) {
  2287|         if (dom.isEditable(point.node)) {
  2288|           return;
  2289|         }
  2290|         var node;
  2291|         if (fullyContains) {
  2292|           if (dom.isLeftEdgePoint(point)) {
  2293|             leftEdgeNodes.push(point.node);
  2294|           }
  2295|           if (dom.isRightEdgePoint(point) && lists.contains(leftEdgeNodes, point.node)) {
  2296|             node = point.node;
  2297|           }
  2298|         } else if (includeAncestor) {
  2299|           node = dom.ancestor(point.node, pred);
  2300|         } else {
  2301|           node = point.node;
  2302|         }
  2303|         if (node && pred(node)) {
  2304|           nodes.push(node);
  2305|         }
  2306|       }, true);
  2307|       return lists.unique(nodes);
  2308|     }
  2309|     /**
  2310|      * returns commonAncestor of range
  2311|      * @return {Element} - commonAncestor
  2312|      */
  2313|   }, {
  2314|     key: "commonAncestor",
  2315|     value: function commonAncestor() {
  2316|       return dom.commonAncestor(this.sc, this.ec);
  2317|     }
  2318|     /**
  2319|      * returns expanded range by pred
  2320|      *
  2321|      * @param {Function} pred - predicate function
  2322|      * @return {WrappedRange}
  2323|      */
  2324|   }, {
  2325|     key: "expand",
  2326|     value: function expand(pred) {
  2327|       var startAncestor = dom.ancestor(this.sc, pred);
  2328|       var endAncestor = dom.ancestor(this.ec, pred);
  2329|       if (!startAncestor && !endAncestor) {
  2330|         return new WrappedRange(this.sc, this.so, this.ec, this.eo);
  2331|       }
  2332|       var boundaryPoints = this.getPoints();
  2333|       if (startAncestor) {
  2334|         boundaryPoints.sc = startAncestor;
  2335|         boundaryPoints.so = 0;
  2336|       }
  2337|       if (endAncestor) {
  2338|         boundaryPoints.ec = endAncestor;
  2339|         boundaryPoints.eo = dom.nodeLength(endAncestor);
  2340|       }
  2341|       return new WrappedRange(boundaryPoints.sc, boundaryPoints.so, boundaryPoints.ec, boundaryPoints.eo);
  2342|     }
  2343|     /**
  2344|      * @param {Boolean} isCollapseToStart
  2345|      * @return {WrappedRange}
  2346|      */
  2347|   }, {
  2348|     key: "collapse",
  2349|     value: function collapse(isCollapseToStart) {
  2350|       if (isCollapseToStart) {
  2351|         return new WrappedRange(this.sc, this.so, this.sc, this.so);
  2352|       } else {
  2353|         return new WrappedRange(this.ec, this.eo, this.ec, this.eo);
  2354|       }
  2355|     }
  2356|     /**
  2357|      * splitText on range
  2358|      */
  2359|   }, {
  2360|     key: "splitText",
  2361|     value: function splitText() {
  2362|       var isSameContainer = this.sc === this.ec;
  2363|       var boundaryPoints = this.getPoints();
  2364|       if (dom.isText(this.ec) && !dom.isEdgePoint(this.getEndPoint())) {
  2365|         this.ec.splitText(this.eo);
  2366|       }
  2367|       if (dom.isText(this.sc) && !dom.isEdgePoint(this.getStartPoint())) {
  2368|         boundaryPoints.sc = this.sc.splitText(this.so);
  2369|         boundaryPoints.so = 0;
  2370|         if (isSameContainer) {
  2371|           boundaryPoints.ec = boundaryPoints.sc;
  2372|           boundaryPoints.eo = this.eo - this.so;
  2373|         }
  2374|       }
  2375|       return new WrappedRange(boundaryPoints.sc, boundaryPoints.so, boundaryPoints.ec, boundaryPoints.eo);
  2376|     }
  2377|     /**
  2378|      * delete contents on range
  2379|      * @return {WrappedRange}
  2380|      */
  2381|   }, {
  2382|     key: "deleteContents",
  2383|     value: function deleteContents() {
  2384|       if (this.isCollapsed()) {
  2385|         return this;
  2386|       }
  2387|       var rng = this.splitText();
  2388|       var nodes = rng.nodes(null, {
  2389|         fullyContains: true
  2390|       }); // find new cursor point
  2391|       var point = dom.prevPointUntil(rng.getStartPoint(), function (point) {
  2392|         return !lists.contains(nodes, point.node);
  2393|       });
  2394|       var emptyParents = [];
  2395|       external_jQuery_default().each(nodes, function (idx, node) {
  2396|         var parent = node.parentNode;
  2397|         if (point.node !== parent && dom.nodeLength(parent) === 1) {
  2398|           emptyParents.push(parent);
  2399|         }
  2400|         dom.remove(node, false);
  2401|       }); // remove empty parents
  2402|       external_jQuery_default().each(emptyParents, function (idx, node) {
  2403|         dom.remove(node, false);
  2404|       });
  2405|       return new WrappedRange(point.node, point.offset, point.node, point.offset).normalize();
  2406|     }
  2407|     /**
  2408|      * makeIsOn: return isOn(pred) function
  2409|      */
  2410|   }, {
  2411|     key: "makeIsOn",
  2412|     value: function makeIsOn(pred) {
  2413|       return function () {
  2414|         var ancestor = dom.ancestor(this.sc, pred);
  2415|         return !!ancestor && ancestor === dom.ancestor(this.ec, pred);
  2416|       };
  2417|     }
  2418|     /**
  2419|      * @param {Function} pred
  2420|      * @return {Boolean}
  2421|      */
  2422|   }, {
  2423|     key: "isLeftEdgeOf",
  2424|     value: function isLeftEdgeOf(pred) {
  2425|       if (!dom.isLeftEdgePoint(this.getStartPoint())) {
  2426|         return false;
  2427|       }
  2428|       var node = dom.ancestor(this.sc, pred);
  2429|       return node && dom.isLeftEdgeOf(this.sc, node);
  2430|     }
  2431|     /**
  2432|      * returns whether range was collapsed or not
  2433|      */
  2434|   }, {
  2435|     key: "isCollapsed",
  2436|     value: function isCollapsed() {
  2437|       return this.sc === this.ec && this.so === this.eo;
  2438|     }
  2439|     /**
  2440|      * wrap inline nodes which children of body with paragraph
  2441|      *
  2442|      * @return {WrappedRange}
  2443|      */
  2444|   }, {
  2445|     key: "wrapBodyInlineWithPara",
  2446|     value: function wrapBodyInlineWithPara() {
  2447|       if (dom.isBodyContainer(this.sc) && dom.isEmpty(this.sc)) {
  2448|         this.sc.innerHTML = dom.emptyPara;
  2449|         return new WrappedRange(this.sc.firstChild, 0, this.sc.firstChild, 0);
  2450|       }
  2451|       /**
  2452|        * [workaround] firefox often create range on not visible point. so normalize here.
  2453|        *  - firefox: |<p>text</p>|
  2454|        *  - chrome: <p>|text|</p>
  2455|        */
  2456|       var rng = this.normalize();
  2457|       if (dom.isParaInline(this.sc) || dom.isPara(this.sc)) {
  2458|         return rng;
  2459|       } // find inline top ancestor
  2460|       var topAncestor;
  2461|       if (dom.isInline(rng.sc)) {
  2462|         var ancestors = dom.listAncestor(rng.sc, func.not(dom.isInline));
  2463|         topAncestor = lists.last(ancestors);
  2464|         if (!dom.isInline(topAncestor)) {
  2465|           topAncestor = ancestors[ancestors.length - 2] || rng.sc.childNodes[rng.so];
  2466|         }
  2467|       } else {
  2468|         topAncestor = rng.sc.childNodes[rng.so > 0 ? rng.so - 1 : 0];
  2469|       }
  2470|       if (topAncestor) {
  2471|         var inlineSiblings = dom.listPrev(topAncestor, dom.isParaInline).reverse();
  2472|         inlineSiblings = inlineSiblings.concat(dom.listNext(topAncestor.nextSibling, dom.isParaInline)); // wrap with paragraph
  2473|         if (inlineSiblings.length) {
  2474|           var para = dom.wrap(lists.head(inlineSiblings), 'p');
  2475|           dom.appendChildNodes(para, lists.tail(inlineSiblings));
  2476|         }
  2477|       }
  2478|       return this.normalize();
  2479|     }
  2480|     /**
  2481|      * insert node at current cursor
  2482|      *
  2483|      * @param {Node} node
  2484|      * @return {Node}
  2485|      */
  2486|   }, {
  2487|     key: "insertNode",
  2488|     value: function insertNode(node) {
  2489|       var rng = this;
  2490|       if (dom.isText(node) || dom.isInline(node)) {
  2491|         rng = this.wrapBodyInlineWithPara().deleteContents();
  2492|       }
  2493|       var info = dom.splitPoint(rng.getStartPoint(), dom.isInline(node));
  2494|       if (info.rightNode) {
  2495|         info.rightNode.parentNode.insertBefore(node, info.rightNode);
  2496|         if (dom.isEmpty(info.rightNode) && dom.isPara(node)) {
  2497|           info.rightNode.parentNode.removeChild(info.rightNode);
  2498|         }
  2499|       } else {
  2500|         info.container.appendChild(node);
  2501|       }
  2502|       return node;
  2503|     }
  2504|     /**
  2505|      * insert html at current cursor
  2506|      */
  2507|   }, {
  2508|     key: "pasteHTML",
  2509|     value: function pasteHTML(markup) {
  2510|       markup = external_jQuery_default().trim(markup);
  2511|       var contentsContainer = external_jQuery_default()('<div></div>').html(markup)[0];
  2512|       var childNodes = lists.from(contentsContainer.childNodes); // const rng = this.wrapBodyInlineWithPara().deleteContents();
  2513|       var rng = this;
  2514|       var reversed = false;
  2515|       if (rng.so >= 0) {
  2516|         childNodes = childNodes.reverse();
  2517|         reversed = true;
  2518|       }
  2519|       childNodes = childNodes.map(function (childNode) {
  2520|         return rng.insertNode(childNode);
  2521|       });
  2522|       if (reversed) {
  2523|         childNodes = childNodes.reverse();
  2524|       }
  2525|       return childNodes;
  2526|     }
  2527|     /**
  2528|      * returns text in range
  2529|      *
  2530|      * @return {String}
  2531|      */
  2532|   }, {
  2533|     key: "toString",
  2534|     value: function toString() {
  2535|       var nativeRng = this.nativeRange();
  2536|       return env.isW3CRangeSupport ? nativeRng.toString() : nativeRng.text;
  2537|     }
  2538|     /**
  2539|      * returns range for word before cursor
  2540|      *
  2541|      * @param {Boolean} [findAfter] - find after cursor, default: false
  2542|      * @return {WrappedRange}
  2543|      */
  2544|   }, {
  2545|     key: "getWordRange",
  2546|     value: function getWordRange(findAfter) {
  2547|       var endPoint = this.getEndPoint();
  2548|       if (!dom.isCharPoint(endPoint)) {
  2549|         return this;
  2550|       }
  2551|       var startPoint = dom.prevPointUntil(endPoint, function (point) {
  2552|         return !dom.isCharPoint(point);
  2553|       });
  2554|       if (findAfter) {
  2555|         endPoint = dom.nextPointUntil(endPoint, function (point) {
  2556|           return !dom.isCharPoint(point);
  2557|         });
  2558|       }
  2559|       return new WrappedRange(startPoint.node, startPoint.offset, endPoint.node, endPoint.offset);
  2560|     }
  2561|     /**
  2562|      * returns range for words before cursor
  2563|      *
  2564|      * @param {Boolean} [findAfter] - find after cursor, default: false
  2565|      * @return {WrappedRange}
  2566|      */
  2567|   }, {
  2568|     key: "getWordsRange",
  2569|     value: function getWordsRange(findAfter) {
  2570|       var endPoint = this.getEndPoint();
  2571|       var isNotTextPoint = function isNotTextPoint(point) {
  2572|         return !dom.isCharPoint(point) && !dom.isSpacePoint(point);
  2573|       };
  2574|       if (isNotTextPoint(endPoint)) {
  2575|         return this;
  2576|       }
  2577|       var startPoint = dom.prevPointUntil(endPoint, isNotTextPoint);
  2578|       if (findAfter) {
  2579|         endPoint = dom.nextPointUntil(endPoint, isNotTextPoint);
  2580|       }
  2581|       return new WrappedRange(startPoint.node, startPoint.offset, endPoint.node, endPoint.offset);
  2582|     }
  2583|     /**
  2584|      * returns range for words before cursor that match with a Regex
  2585|      *
  2586|      * example:
  2587|      *  range: 'hi @Peter Pan'
  2588|      *  regex: '/@[a-z ]+/i'
  2589|      *  return range: '@Peter Pan'
  2590|      *
  2591|      * @param {RegExp} [regex]
  2592|      * @return {WrappedRange|null}
  2593|      */
  2594|   }, {
  2595|     key: "getWordsMatchRange",
  2596|     value: function getWordsMatchRange(regex) {
  2597|       var endPoint = this.getEndPoint();
  2598|       var startPoint = dom.prevPointUntil(endPoint, function (point) {
  2599|         if (!dom.isCharPoint(point) && !dom.isSpacePoint(point)) {
  2600|           return true;
  2601|         }
  2602|         var rng = new WrappedRange(point.node, point.offset, endPoint.node, endPoint.offset);
  2603|         var result = regex.exec(rng.toString());
  2604|         return result && result.index === 0;
  2605|       });
  2606|       var rng = new WrappedRange(startPoint.node, startPoint.offset, endPoint.node, endPoint.offset);
  2607|       var text = rng.toString();
  2608|       var result = regex.exec(text);
  2609|       if (result && result[0].length === text.length) {
  2610|         return rng;
  2611|       } else {
  2612|         return null;
  2613|       }
  2614|     }
  2615|     /**
  2616|      * create offsetPath bookmark
  2617|      *
  2618|      * @param {Node} editable
  2619|      */
  2620|   }, {
  2621|     key: "bookmark",
  2622|     value: function bookmark(editable) {
  2623|       return {
  2624|         s: {
  2625|           path: dom.makeOffsetPath(editable, this.sc),
  2626|           offset: this.so
  2627|         },
  2628|         e: {
  2629|           path: dom.makeOffsetPath(editable, this.ec),
  2630|           offset: this.eo
  2631|         }
  2632|       };
  2633|     }
  2634|     /**
  2635|      * create offsetPath bookmark base on paragraph
  2636|      *
  2637|      * @param {Node[]} paras
  2638|      */
  2639|   }, {
  2640|     key: "paraBookmark",
  2641|     value: function paraBookmark(paras) {
  2642|       return {
  2643|         s: {
  2644|           path: lists.tail(dom.makeOffsetPath(lists.head(paras), this.sc)),
  2645|           offset: this.so
  2646|         },
  2647|         e: {
  2648|           path: lists.tail(dom.makeOffsetPath(lists.last(paras), this.ec)),
  2649|           offset: this.eo
  2650|         }
  2651|       };
  2652|     }
  2653|     /**
  2654|      * getClientRects
  2655|      * @return {Rect[]}
  2656|      */
  2657|   }, {
  2658|     key: "getClientRects",
  2659|     value: function getClientRects() {
  2660|       var nativeRng = this.nativeRange();
  2661|       return nativeRng.getClientRects();
  2662|     }
  2663|   }]);
  2664|   return WrappedRange;
  2665| }();
  2666| /**
  2667|  * Data structure
  2668|  *  * BoundaryPoint: a point of dom tree
  2669|  *  * BoundaryPoints: two boundaryPoints corresponding to the start and the end of the Range
  2670|  *
  2671|  * See to http://www.w3.org/TR/DOM-Level-2-Traversal-Range/ranges.html#Level-2-Range-Position
  2672|  */
  2673| /* harmony default export */ const range = ({
  2674|   /**
  2675|    * create Range Object From arguments or Browser Selection
  2676|    *
  2677|    * @param {Node} sc - start container
  2678|    * @param {Number} so - start offset
  2679|    * @param {Node} ec - end container
  2680|    * @param {Number} eo - end offset
  2681|    * @return {WrappedRange}
  2682|    */
  2683|   create: function create(sc, so, ec, eo) {
  2684|     if (arguments.length === 4) {
  2685|       return new WrappedRange(sc, so, ec, eo);
  2686|     } else if (arguments.length === 2) {
  2687|       ec = sc;
  2688|       eo = so;
  2689|       return new WrappedRange(sc, so, ec, eo);
  2690|     } else {
  2691|       var wrappedRange = this.createFromSelection();
  2692|       if (!wrappedRange && arguments.length === 1) {
  2693|         var bodyElement = arguments[0];
  2694|         if (dom.isEditable(bodyElement)) {
  2695|           bodyElement = bodyElement.lastChild;
  2696|         }
  2697|         return this.createFromBodyElement(bodyElement, dom.emptyPara === arguments[0].innerHTML);
  2698|       }
  2699|       return wrappedRange;
  2700|     }
  2701|   },
  2702|   createFromBodyElement: function createFromBodyElement(bodyElement) {
  2703|     var isCollapseToStart = arguments.length > 1 && arguments[1] !== undefined ? arguments[1] : false;
  2704|     var wrappedRange = this.createFromNode(bodyElement);
  2705|     return wrappedRange.collapse(isCollapseToStart);
  2706|   },
  2707|   createFromSelection: function createFromSelection() {
  2708|     var sc, so, ec, eo;
  2709|     if (env.isW3CRangeSupport) {
  2710|       var selection = document.getSelection();
  2711|       if (!selection || selection.rangeCount === 0) {
  2712|         return null;
  2713|       } else if (dom.isBody(selection.anchorNode)) {
  2714|         return null;
  2715|       }
  2716|       var nativeRng = selection.getRangeAt(0);
  2717|       sc = nativeRng.startContainer;
  2718|       so = nativeRng.startOffset;
  2719|       ec = nativeRng.endContainer;
  2720|       eo = nativeRng.endOffset;
  2721|     } else {
  2722|       var textRange = document.selection.createRange();
  2723|       var textRangeEnd = textRange.duplicate();
  2724|       textRangeEnd.collapse(false);
  2725|       var textRangeStart = textRange;
  2726|       textRangeStart.collapse(true);
  2727|       var startPoint = textRangeToPoint(textRangeStart, true);
  2728|       var endPoint = textRangeToPoint(textRangeEnd, false); // same visible point case: range was collapsed.
  2729|       if (dom.isText(startPoint.node) && dom.isLeftEdgePoint(startPoint) && dom.isTextNode(endPoint.node) && dom.isRightEdgePoint(endPoint) && endPoint.node.nextSibling === startPoint.node) {
  2730|         startPoint = endPoint;
  2731|       }
  2732|       sc = startPoint.cont;
  2733|       so = startPoint.offset;
  2734|       ec = endPoint.cont;
  2735|       eo = endPoint.offset;
  2736|     }
  2737|     return new WrappedRange(sc, so, ec, eo);
  2738|   },
  2739|   /**
  2740|    * @method
  2741|    *
  2742|    * create WrappedRange from node
  2743|    *
  2744|    * @param {Node} node
  2745|    * @return {WrappedRange}
  2746|    */
  2747|   createFromNode: function createFromNode(node) {
  2748|     var sc = node;
  2749|     var so = 0;
  2750|     var ec = node;
  2751|     var eo = dom.nodeLength(ec); // browsers can't target a picture or void node
  2752|     if (dom.isVoid(sc)) {
  2753|       so = dom.listPrev(sc).length - 1;
  2754|       sc = sc.parentNode;
  2755|     }
  2756|     if (dom.isBR(ec)) {
  2757|       eo = dom.listPrev(ec).length - 1;
  2758|       ec = ec.parentNode;
  2759|     } else if (dom.isVoid(ec)) {
  2760|       eo = dom.listPrev(ec).length;
  2761|       ec = ec.parentNode;
  2762|     }
  2763|     return this.create(sc, so, ec, eo);
  2764|   },
  2765|   /**
  2766|    * create WrappedRange from node after position
  2767|    *
  2768|    * @param {Node} node
  2769|    * @return {WrappedRange}
  2770|    */
  2771|   createFromNodeBefore: function createFromNodeBefore(node) {
  2772|     return this.createFromNode(node).collapse(true);
  2773|   },
  2774|   /**
  2775|    * create WrappedRange from node after position
  2776|    *
  2777|    * @param {Node} node
  2778|    * @return {WrappedRange}
  2779|    */
  2780|   createFromNodeAfter: function createFromNodeAfter(node) {
  2781|     return this.createFromNode(node).collapse();
  2782|   },
  2783|   /**
  2784|    * @method
  2785|    *
  2786|    * create WrappedRange from bookmark
  2787|    *
  2788|    * @param {Node} editable
  2789|    * @param {Object} bookmark
  2790|    * @return {WrappedRange}
  2791|    */
  2792|   createFromBookmark: function createFromBookmark(editable, bookmark) {
  2793|     var sc = dom.fromOffsetPath(editable, bookmark.s.path);
  2794|     var so = bookmark.s.offset;
  2795|     var ec = dom.fromOffsetPath(editable, bookmark.e.path);
  2796|     var eo = bookmark.e.offset;
  2797|     return new WrappedRange(sc, so, ec, eo);
  2798|   },
  2799|   /**
  2800|    * @method
  2801|    *
  2802|    * create WrappedRange from paraBookmark
  2803|    *
  2804|    * @param {Object} bookmark
  2805|    * @param {Node[]} paras
  2806|    * @return {WrappedRange}
  2807|    */
  2808|   createFromParaBookmark: function createFromParaBookmark(bookmark, paras) {
  2809|     var so = bookmark.s.offset;
  2810|     var eo = bookmark.e.offset;
  2811|     var sc = dom.fromOffsetPath(lists.head(paras), bookmark.s.path);
  2812|     var ec = dom.fromOffsetPath(lists.last(paras), bookmark.e.path);
  2813|     return new WrappedRange(sc, so, ec, eo);
  2814|   }
  2815| });

  2901| ;// CONCATENATED MODULE: ./src/js/core/async.js
  2902| /**
  2903|  * @method readFileAsDataURL
  2904|  *
  2905|  * read contents of file as representing URL
  2906|  *
  2907|  * @param {File} file
  2908|  * @return {Promise} - then: dataUrl
  2909|  */
  2910| function readFileAsDataURL(file) {
  2911|   return external_jQuery_default().Deferred(function (deferred) {
  2912|     external_jQuery_default().extend(new FileReader(), {
  2913|       onload: function onload(e) {
  2914|         var dataURL = e.target.result;
  2915|         deferred.resolve(dataURL);
  2916|       },
  2917|       onerror: function onerror(err) {
  2918|         deferred.reject(err);
  2919|       }
  2920|     }).readAsDataURL(file);
  2921|   }).promise();
  2922| }
  2923| /**
  2924|  * @method createImage
  2925|  *
  2926|  * create `<image>` from url string
  2927|  *
  2928|  * @param {String} url
  2929|  * @return {Promise} - then: $image
  2930|  */
  2931| function createImage(url) {
  2932|   return external_jQuery_default().Deferred(function (deferred) {
  2933|     var $img = external_jQuery_default()('<img>');

  2935|       $img.off('error abort');
  2936|       deferred.resolve($img);
  2937|     }).one('error abort', function () {
  2938|       $img.off('load').detach();
  2939|       deferred.reject($img);
  2940|     }).css({
  2941|       display: 'none'
  2942|     }).appendTo(document.body).attr('src', url);
  2943|   }).promise();
  2944| }
  2945| ;// CONCATENATED MODULE: ./src/js/editing/History.js
  2946| function History_classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError("Cannot call a class as a function"); } }
  2947| function History_defineProperties(target, props) { for (var i = 0; i < props.length; i++) { var descriptor = props[i]; descriptor.enumerable = descriptor.enumerable || false; descriptor.configurable = true; if ("value" in descriptor) descriptor.writable = true; Object.defineProperty(target, descriptor.key, descriptor); } }
  2948| function History_createClass(Constructor, protoProps, staticProps) { if (protoProps) History_defineProperties(Constructor.prototype, protoProps); if (staticProps) History_defineProperties(Constructor, staticProps); return Constructor; }
  2949| var History = /*#__PURE__*/function () {
  2950|   function History(context) {
  2951|     History_classCallCheck(this, History);
  2952|     this.stack = [];
  2953|     this.stackOffset = -1;
  2954|     this.context = context;
  2955|     this.$editable = context.layoutInfo.editable;
  2956|     this.editable = this.$editable[0];
  2957|   }
  2958|   History_createClass(History, [{
  2959|     key: "makeSnapshot",
  2960|     value: function makeSnapshot() {
  2961|       var rng = range.create(this.editable);
  2962|       var emptyBookmark = {
  2963|         s: {
  2964|           path: [],
  2965|           offset: 0
  2966|         },
  2967|         e: {
  2968|           path: [],
  2969|           offset: 0
  2970|         }
  2971|       };
  2972|       return {
  2973|         contents: this.$editable.html(),
  2974|         bookmark: rng && rng.isOnEditable() ? rng.bookmark(this.editable) : emptyBookmark
  2975|       };
  2976|     }
  2977|   }, {
  2978|     key: "applySnapshot",
  2979|     value: function applySnapshot(snapshot) {
  2980|       if (snapshot.contents !== null) {
  2981|         this.$editable.html(snapshot.contents);
  2982|       }
  2983|       if (snapshot.bookmark !== null) {
  2984|         range.createFromBookmark(this.editable, snapshot.bookmark).select();
  2985|       }
  2986|     }
  2987|     /**
  2988|     * @method rewind
  2989|     * Rewinds the history stack back to the first snapshot taken.
  2990|     * Leaves the stack intact, so that "Redo" can still be used.
  2991|     */
  2992|   }, {
  2993|     key: "rewind",
  2994|     value: function rewind() {
  2995|       if (this.$editable.html() !== this.stack[this.stackOffset].contents) {
  2996|         this.recordUndo();
  2997|       } // Return to the first available snapshot.
  2998|       this.stackOffset = 0; // Apply that snapshot.
  2999|       this.applySnapshot(this.stack[this.stackOffset]);
  3000|     }
  3001|     /**
  3002|     *  @method commit
  3003|     *  Resets history stack, but keeps current editor's content.
  3004|     */
  3005|   }, {
  3006|     key: "commit",
  3007|     value: function commit() {
  3008|       this.stack = []; // Restore stackOffset to its original value.
  3009|       this.stackOffset = -1; // Record our first snapshot (of nothing).
  3010|       this.recordUndo();
  3011|     }
  3012|     /**
  3013|     * @method reset
  3014|     * Resets the history stack completely; reverting to an empty editor.
  3015|     */
  3016|   }, {
  3017|     key: "reset",
  3018|     value: function reset() {
  3019|       this.stack = []; // Restore stackOffset to its original value.
  3020|       this.stackOffset = -1; // Clear the editable area.
  3021|       this.$editable.html(''); // Record our first snapshot (of nothing).
  3022|       this.recordUndo();
  3023|     }
  3024|     /**
  3025|      * undo
  3026|      */
  3027|   }, {
  3028|     key: "undo",
  3029|     value: function undo() {
  3030|       if (this.$editable.html() !== this.stack[this.stackOffset].contents) {
  3031|         this.recordUndo();
  3032|       }
  3033|       if (this.stackOffset > 0) {
  3034|         this.stackOffset--;
  3035|         this.applySnapshot(this.stack[this.stackOffset]);
  3036|       }
  3037|     }
  3038|     /**
  3039|      * redo
  3040|      */
  3041|   }, {
  3042|     key: "redo",
  3043|     value: function redo() {
  3044|       if (this.stack.length - 1 > this.stackOffset) {
  3045|         this.stackOffset++;
  3046|         this.applySnapshot(this.stack[this.stackOffset]);
  3047|       }
  3048|     }
  3049|     /**
  3050|      * recorded undo
  3051|      */
  3052|   }, {
  3053|     key: "recordUndo",
  3054|     value: function recordUndo() {
  3055|       this.stackOffset++; // Wash out stack after stackOffset
  3056|       if (this.stack.length > this.stackOffset) {
  3057|         this.stack = this.stack.slice(0, this.stackOffset);
  3058|       } // Create new snapshot and push it to the end
  3059|       this.stack.push(this.makeSnapshot()); // If the stack size reachs to the limit, then slice it
  3060|       if (this.stack.length > this.context.options.historyLimit) {
  3061|         this.stack.shift();
  3062|         this.stackOffset -= 1;
  3063|       }
  3064|     }
  3065|   }]);
  3066|   return History;
  3067| }();

  3076|   Style_createClass(Style, [{
  3077|     key: "jQueryCSS",
  3078|     value:
  3079|     /**
  3080|      * @method jQueryCSS
  3081|      *
  3082|      * [workaround] for old jQuery
  3083|      * passing an array of style properties to .css()
  3084|      * will result in an object of property-value pairs.
  3085|      * (compability with version < 1.9)
  3086|      *
  3087|      * @private
  3088|      * @param  {jQuery} $obj
  3089|      * @param  {Array} propertyNames - An array of one or more CSS properties.
  3090|      * @return {Object}
  3091|      */
  3092|     function jQueryCSS($obj, propertyNames) {
  3093|       var result = {};
  3094|       external_jQuery_default().each(propertyNames, function (idx, propertyName) {
  3095|         result[propertyName] = $obj.css(propertyName);
  3096|       });
  3097|       return result;
  3098|     }
  3099|     /**
  3100|      * returns style object from node
  3101|      *
  3102|      * @param {jQuery} $node
  3103|      * @return {Object}
  3104|      */
  3105|   }, {
  3106|     key: "fromNode",
  3107|     value: function fromNode($node) {

  3109|       var styleInfo = this.jQueryCSS($node, properties) || {};

  3112|       styleInfo['font-size-unit'] = fontSize.match(/[a-z%]+$/);

  3114|     }
  3115|     /**

  3121|   }, {
  3122|     key: "stylePara",

  3125|         includeAncestor: true
  3126|       }), function (idx, para) {
  3127|         external_jQuery_default()(para).css(styleInfo);
  3128|       });
  3129|     }
  3130|     /**
  3131|      * insert and returns styleNodes on range.
  3132|      *
  3133|      * @param {WrappedRange} rng
  3134|      * @param {Object} [options] - options for styleNodes
  3135|      * @param {String} [options.nodeName] - default: `SPAN`
  3136|      * @param {Boolean} [options.expandClosestSibling] - default: `false`
  3137|      * @param {Boolean} [options.onlyPartialContains] - default: `false`
  3138|      * @return {Node[]}
  3139|      */
  3140|   }, {
  3141|     key: "styleNodes",
  3142|     value: function styleNodes(rng, options) {
  3143|       rng = rng.splitText();
  3144|       var nodeName = options && options.nodeName || 'SPAN';
  3145|       var expandClosestSibling = !!(options && options.expandClosestSibling);
  3146|       var onlyPartialContains = !!(options && options.onlyPartialContains);
  3147|       if (rng.isCollapsed()) {
  3148|         return [rng.insertNode(dom.create(nodeName))];
  3149|       }
  3150|       var pred = dom.makePredByNodeName(nodeName);
  3151|       var nodes = rng.nodes(dom.isText, {
  3152|         fullyContains: true
  3153|       }).map(function (text) {
  3154|         return dom.singleChildAncestor(text, pred) || dom.wrap(text, nodeName);
  3155|       });
  3156|       if (expandClosestSibling) {
  3157|         if (onlyPartialContains) {
  3158|           var nodesInRange = rng.nodes(); // compose with partial contains predication
  3159|           pred = func.and(pred, function (node) {
  3160|             return lists.contains(nodesInRange, node);
  3161|           });
  3162|         }
  3163|         return nodes.map(function (node) {
  3164|           var siblings = dom.withClosestSiblings(node, pred);
  3165|           var head = lists.head(siblings);
  3166|           var tails = lists.tail(siblings);
  3167|           external_jQuery_default().each(tails, function (idx, elem) {
  3168|             dom.appendChildNodes(head, elem.childNodes);
  3169|             dom.remove(elem);
  3170|           });
  3171|           return lists.head(siblings);
  3172|         });
  3173|       } else {
  3174|         return nodes;
  3175|       }
  3176|     }
  3177|     /**
  3178|      * get current style on cursor
  3179|      *
  3180|      * @param {WrappedRange} rng
  3181|      * @return {Object} - object contains style properties.
  3182|      */
  3183|   }, {
  3184|     key: "current",
  3185|     value: function current(rng) {
  3186|       var $cont = external_jQuery_default()(!dom.isElement(rng.sc) ? rng.sc.parentNode : rng.sc);
  3187|       var styleInfo = this.fromNode($cont); // document.queryCommandState for toggle state
  3188|       try {
  3189|         styleInfo = external_jQuery_default().extend(styleInfo, {
  3190|           'font-bold': document.queryCommandState('bold') ? 'bold' : 'normal',
  3191|           'font-italic': document.queryCommandState('italic') ? 'italic' : 'normal',
  3192|           'font-underline': document.queryCommandState('underline') ? 'underline' : 'normal',
  3193|           'font-subscript': document.queryCommandState('subscript') ? 'subscript' : 'normal',
  3194|           'font-superscript': document.queryCommandState('superscript') ? 'superscript' : 'normal',
  3195|           'font-strikethrough': document.queryCommandState('strikethrough') ? 'strikethrough' : 'normal',
  3196|           'font-family': document.queryCommandValue('fontname') || styleInfo['font-family']
  3197|         });
  3198|       } catch (e) {// eslint-disable-next-line
  3199|       } // list-style-type to list-style(unordered, ordered)
  3200|       if (!rng.isOnList()) {
  3201|         styleInfo['list-style'] = 'none';
  3202|       } else {
  3203|         var orderedTypes = ['circle', 'disc', 'disc-leading-zero', 'square'];
  3204|         var isUnordered = orderedTypes.indexOf(styleInfo['list-style-type']) > -1;
  3205|         styleInfo['list-style'] = isUnordered ? 'unordered' : 'ordered';
  3206|       }
  3207|       var para = dom.ancestor(rng.sc, dom.isPara);
  3208|       if (para && para.style['line-height']) {
  3209|         styleInfo['line-height'] = para.style.lineHeight;
  3210|       } else {
  3211|         var lineHeight = parseInt(styleInfo['line-height'], 10) / parseInt(styleInfo['font-size'], 10);
  3212|         styleInfo['line-height'] = lineHeight.toFixed(1);
  3213|       }
  3214|       styleInfo.anchor = rng.isOnAnchor() && dom.ancestor(rng.sc, dom.isAnchor);
  3215|       styleInfo.ancestors = dom.listAncestor(rng.sc, dom.isEditable);
  3216|       styleInfo.range = rng;
  3217|       return styleInfo;
  3218|     }
  3219|   }]);
  3220|   return Style;
  3221| }();

  3249|      */

  3312|     /**
  3313|      * toggle list
  3314|      *

  3316|      */
  3317|   }, {
  3318|     key: "toggleList",
  3319|     value: function toggleList(listName, editable) {
  3320|       var _this3 = this;
  3321|       var rng = range.create(editable).wrapBodyInlineWithPara();
  3322|       var paras = rng.nodes(dom.isPara, {
  3323|         includeAncestor: true
  3324|       });
  3325|       var bookmark = rng.paraBookmark(paras);
  3326|       var clustereds = lists.clusterBy(paras, func.peq2('parentNode')); // paragraph to list
  3327|       if (lists.find(paras, dom.isPurePara)) {
  3328|         var wrappedParas = [];
  3329|         external_jQuery_default().each(clustereds, function (idx, paras) {
  3330|           wrappedParas = wrappedParas.concat(_this3.wrapList(paras, listName));
  3331|         });
  3332|         paras = wrappedParas; // list to paragraph or change list style
  3333|       } else {
  3334|         var diffLists = rng.nodes(dom.isList, {
  3335|           includeAncestor: true
  3336|         }).filter(function (listNode) {
  3337|           return !external_jQuery_default().nodeName(listNode, listName);
  3338|         });
  3339|         if (diffLists.length) {
  3340|           external_jQuery_default().each(diffLists, function (idx, listNode) {
  3341|             dom.replace(listNode, listName);
  3342|           });
  3343|         } else {
  3344|           paras = this.releaseList(clustereds, true);
  3345|         }
  3346|       }
  3347|       range.createFromParaBookmark(bookmark, paras).select();
  3348|     }
  3349|     /**
  3350|      * @param {Node[]} paras
  3351|      * @param {String} listName
  3352|      * @return {Node[]}
  3353|      */
  3354|   }, {
  3355|     key: "wrapList",
  3356|     value: function wrapList(paras, listName) {
  3357|       var head = lists.head(paras);
  3358|       var last = lists.last(paras);
  3359|       var prevList = dom.isList(head.previousSibling) && head.previousSibling;
  3360|       var nextList = dom.isList(last.nextSibling) && last.nextSibling;
  3361|       var listNode = prevList || dom.insertAfter(dom.create(listName || 'UL'), last); // P to LI
  3362|       paras = paras.map(function (para) {
  3363|         return dom.isPurePara(para) ? dom.replace(para, 'LI') : para;
  3364|       }); // append to list(<ul>, <ol>)
  3365|       dom.appendChildNodes(listNode, paras);
  3366|       if (nextList) {
  3367|         dom.appendChildNodes(listNode, lists.from(nextList.childNodes));
  3368|         dom.remove(nextList);
  3369|       }
  3370|       return paras;
  3371|     }
  3372|     /**
  3373|      * @method releaseList
  3374|      *
  3375|      * @param {Array[]} clustereds
  3376|      * @param {Boolean} isEscapseToBody
  3377|      * @return {Node[]}
  3378|      */
  3379|   }, {
  3380|     key: "releaseList",
  3381|     value: function releaseList(clustereds, isEscapseToBody) {
  3382|       var _this4 = this;
  3383|       var releasedParas = [];
  3384|       external_jQuery_default().each(clustereds, function (idx, paras) {
  3385|         var head = lists.head(paras);
  3386|         var last = lists.last(paras);
  3387|         var headList = isEscapseToBody ? dom.lastAncestor(head, dom.isList) : head.parentNode;
  3388|         var parentItem = headList.parentNode;
  3389|         if (headList.parentNode.nodeName === 'LI') {
  3390|           paras.map(function (para) {
  3391|             var newList = _this4.findNextSiblings(para);
  3392|             if (parentItem.nextSibling) {
  3393|               parentItem.parentNode.insertBefore(para, parentItem.nextSibling);
  3394|             } else {
  3395|               parentItem.parentNode.appendChild(para);
  3396|             }
  3397|             if (newList.length) {
  3398|               _this4.wrapList(newList, headList.nodeName);
  3399|               para.appendChild(newList[0].parentNode);
  3400|             }
  3401|           });
  3402|           if (headList.children.length === 0) {
  3403|             parentItem.removeChild(headList);
  3404|           }
  3405|           if (parentItem.childNodes.length === 0) {
  3406|             parentItem.parentNode.removeChild(parentItem);
  3407|           }
  3408|         } else {
  3409|           var lastList = headList.childNodes.length > 1 ? dom.splitTree(headList, {
  3410|             node: last.parentNode,
  3411|             offset: dom.position(last) + 1
  3412|           }, {
  3413|             isSkipPaddingBlankHTML: true
  3414|           }) : null;
  3415|           var middleList = dom.splitTree(headList, {
  3416|             node: head.parentNode,
  3417|             offset: dom.position(head)
  3418|           }, {
  3419|             isSkipPaddingBlankHTML: true
  3420|           });
  3421|           paras = isEscapseToBody ? dom.listDescendant(middleList, dom.isLi) : lists.from(middleList.childNodes).filter(dom.isLi); // LI to P
  3422|           if (isEscapseToBody || !dom.isList(headList.parentNode)) {
  3423|             paras = paras.map(function (para) {
  3424|               return dom.replace(para, 'P');
  3425|             });
  3426|           }
  3427|           external_jQuery_default().each(lists.from(paras).reverse(), function (idx, para) {
  3428|             dom.insertAfter(para, headList);
  3429|           }); // remove empty lists
  3430|           var rootLists = lists.compact([headList, middleList, lastList]);
  3431|           external_jQuery_default().each(rootLists, function (idx, rootList) {
  3432|             var listNodes = [rootList].concat(dom.listDescendant(rootList, dom.isList));
  3433|             external_jQuery_default().each(listNodes.reverse(), function (idx, listNode) {
  3434|               if (!dom.nodeLength(listNode)) {
  3435|                 dom.remove(listNode, true);
  3436|               }
  3437|             });
  3438|           });
  3439|         }
  3440|         releasedParas = releasedParas.concat(paras);
  3441|       });
  3442|       return releasedParas;
  3443|     }
  3444|     /**
  3445|      * @method appendToPrevious
  3446|      *
  3447|      * Appends list to previous list item, if
  3448|      * none exist it wraps the list in a new list item.
  3449|      *
  3450|      * @param {HTMLNode} ListItem
  3451|      * @return {HTMLNode}
  3452|      */
  3453|   }, {
  3454|     key: "appendToPrevious",
  3455|     value: function appendToPrevious(node) {
  3456|       return node.previousSibling ? dom.appendChildNodes(node.previousSibling, [node]) : this.wrapList([node], 'LI');
  3457|     }
  3458|     /**
  3459|      * @method findList
  3460|      *
  3461|      * Finds an existing list in list item
  3462|      *
  3463|      * @param {HTMLNode} ListItem
  3464|      * @return {Array[]}
  3465|      */
  3466|   }, {
  3467|     key: "findList",
  3468|     value: function findList(node) {
  3469|       return node ? lists.find(node.children, function (child) {
  3470|         return ['OL', 'UL'].indexOf(child.nodeName) > -1;
  3471|       }) : null;
  3472|     }
  3473|     /**
  3474|      * @method findNextSiblings
  3475|      *
  3476|      * Finds all list item siblings that follow it
  3477|      *
  3478|      * @param {HTMLNode} ListItem
  3479|      * @return {HTMLNode}
  3480|      */
  3481|   }, {
  3482|     key: "findNextSiblings",
  3483|     value: function findNextSiblings(node) {
  3484|       var siblings = [];
  3485|       while (node.nextSibling) {
  3486|         siblings.push(node.nextSibling);
  3487|         node = node.nextSibling;
  3488|       }
  3489|       return siblings;
  3490|     }
  3491|   }]);
  3492|   return Bullet;
  3493| }();

  3498| /**
  3499|  * @class editing.Typing
  3500|  *
  3501|  * Typing
  3502|  *
  3503|  */
  3504| var Typing = /*#__PURE__*/function () {
  3505|   function Typing(context) {
  3506|     Typing_classCallCheck(this, Typing);
  3507|     this.bullet = new Bullet();
  3508|     this.options = context.options;
  3509|   }
  3510|   /**
  3511|    * insert tab
  3512|    *
  3513|    * @param {WrappedRange} rng
  3514|    * @param {Number} tabsize
  3515|    */
  3516|   Typing_createClass(Typing, [{
  3517|     key: "insertTab",
  3518|     value: function insertTab(rng, tabsize) {
  3519|       var tab = dom.createText(new Array(tabsize + 1).join(dom.NBSP_CHAR));
  3520|       rng = rng.deleteContents();
  3521|       rng.insertNode(tab, true);
  3522|       rng = range.create(tab, tabsize);
  3523|       rng.select();
  3524|     }
  3525|     /**
  3526|      * insert paragraph
  3527|      *
  3528|      * @param {jQuery} $editable
  3529|      * @param {WrappedRange} rng Can be used in unit tests to "mock" the range
  3530|      *
  3531|      * blockquoteBreakingLevel
  3532|      *   0 - No break, the new paragraph remains inside the quote
  3533|      *   1 - Break the first blockquote in the ancestors list
  3534|      *   2 - Break all blockquotes, so that the new paragraph is not quoted (this is the default)
  3535|      */
  3536|   }, {
  3537|     key: "insertParagraph",
  3538|     value: function insertParagraph(editable, rng) {
  3539|       rng = rng || range.create(editable); // deleteContents on range.
  3540|       rng = rng.deleteContents(); // Wrap range if it needs to be wrapped by paragraph
  3541|       rng = rng.wrapBodyInlineWithPara(); // finding paragraph
  3542|       var splitRoot = dom.ancestor(rng.sc, dom.isPara);
  3543|       var nextPara; // on paragraph: split paragraph
  3544|       if (splitRoot) {
  3545|         if (dom.isLi(splitRoot) && (dom.isEmpty(splitRoot) || dom.deepestChildIsEmpty(splitRoot))) {
  3546|           this.bullet.toggleList(splitRoot.parentNode.nodeName);
  3547|           return;
  3548|         } else {
  3549|           var blockquote = null;
  3550|           if (this.options.blockquoteBreakingLevel === 1) {
  3551|             blockquote = dom.ancestor(splitRoot, dom.isBlockquote);
  3552|           } else if (this.options.blockquoteBreakingLevel === 2) {
  3553|             blockquote = dom.lastAncestor(splitRoot, dom.isBlockquote);
  3554|           }
  3555|           if (blockquote) {
  3556|             nextPara = external_jQuery_default()(dom.emptyPara)[0]; // If the split is right before a <br>, remove it so that there's no "empty line"
  3557|             if (dom.isRightEdgePoint(rng.getStartPoint()) && dom.isBR(rng.sc.nextSibling)) {
  3558|               external_jQuery_default()(rng.sc.nextSibling).remove();
  3559|             }
  3560|             var split = dom.splitTree(blockquote, rng.getStartPoint(), {
  3561|               isDiscardEmptySplits: true
  3562|             });
  3563|             if (split) {
  3564|               split.parentNode.insertBefore(nextPara, split);
  3565|             } else {
  3566|               dom.insertAfter(nextPara, blockquote); // There's no split if we were at the end of the blockquote
  3567|             }
  3568|           } else {
  3569|             nextPara = dom.splitTree(splitRoot, rng.getStartPoint()); // not a blockquote, just insert the paragraph
  3570|             var emptyAnchors = dom.listDescendant(splitRoot, dom.isEmptyAnchor);
  3571|             emptyAnchors = emptyAnchors.concat(dom.listDescendant(nextPara, dom.isEmptyAnchor));
  3572|             external_jQuery_default().each(emptyAnchors, function (idx, anchor) {
  3573|               dom.remove(anchor);
  3574|             }); // replace empty heading, pre or custom-made styleTag with P tag
  3575|             if ((dom.isHeading(nextPara) || dom.isPre(nextPara) || dom.isCustomStyleTag(nextPara)) && dom.isEmpty(nextPara)) {
  3576|               nextPara = dom.replace(nextPara, 'p');
  3577|             }
  3578|           }
  3579|         } // no paragraph: insert empty paragraph
  3580|       } else {
  3581|         var next = rng.sc.childNodes[rng.so];
  3582|         nextPara = external_jQuery_default()(dom.emptyPara)[0];
  3583|         if (next) {
  3584|           rng.sc.insertBefore(nextPara, next);
  3585|         } else {
  3586|           rng.sc.appendChild(nextPara);
  3587|         }
  3588|       }
  3589|       range.create(nextPara, 0).normalize().select().scrollIntoView(editable);
  3590|     }
  3591|   }]);
  3592|   return Typing;
  3593| }();
  3594| ;// CONCATENATED MODULE: ./src/js/editing/Table.js
  3595| function Table_classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError("Cannot call a class as a function"); } }
  3596| function Table_defineProperties(target, props) { for (var i = 0; i < props.length; i++) { var descriptor = props[i]; descriptor.enumerable = descriptor.enumerable || false; descriptor.configurable = true; if ("value" in descriptor) descriptor.writable = true; Object.defineProperty(target, descriptor.key, descriptor); } }
  3597| function Table_createClass(Constructor, protoProps, staticProps) { if (protoProps) Table_defineProperties(Constructor.prototype, protoProps); if (staticProps) Table_defineProperties(Constructor, staticProps); return Constructor; }
  3598| /**
  3599|  * @class Create a virtual table to create what actions to do in change.
  3600|  * @param {object} startPoint Cell selected to apply change.
  3601|  * @param {enum} where  Where change will be applied Row or Col. Use enum: TableResultAction.where
  3602|  * @param {enum} action Action to be applied. Use enum: TableResultAction.requestAction
  3603|  * @param {object} domTable Dom element of table to make changes.
  3604|  */
  3605| var TableResultAction = function TableResultAction(startPoint, where, action, domTable) {
  3606|   var _startPoint = {
  3607|     'colPos': 0,
  3608|     'rowPos': 0
  3609|   };
  3610|   var _virtualTable = [];
  3611|   var _actionCellList = []; /// ///////////////////////////////////////////
  3612|   /**
  3613|    * Set the startPoint of action.
  3614|    */
  3615|   function setStartPoint() {
  3616|     if (!startPoint || !startPoint.tagName || startPoint.tagName.toLowerCase() !== 'td' && startPoint.tagName.toLowerCase() !== 'th') {
  3617|       return;
  3618|     }
  3619|     _startPoint.colPos = startPoint.cellIndex;
  3620|     if (!startPoint.parentElement || !startPoint.parentElement.tagName || startPoint.parentElement.tagName.toLowerCase() !== 'tr') {
  3621|       return;
  3622|     }
  3623|     _startPoint.rowPos = startPoint.parentElement.rowIndex;
  3624|   }
  3625|   /**
  3626|    * Define virtual table position info object.
  3627|    *
  3628|    * @param {int} rowIndex Index position in line of virtual table.
  3629|    * @param {int} cellIndex Index position in column of virtual table.
  3630|    * @param {object} baseRow Row affected by this position.
  3631|    * @param {object} baseCell Cell affected by this position.
  3632|    * @param {bool} isSpan Inform if it is an span cell/row.
  3633|    */
  3634|   function setVirtualTablePosition(rowIndex, cellIndex, baseRow, baseCell, isRowSpan, isColSpan, isVirtualCell) {
  3635|     var objPosition = {
  3636|       'baseRow': baseRow,
  3637|       'baseCell': baseCell,
  3638|       'isRowSpan': isRowSpan,
  3639|       'isColSpan': isColSpan,
  3640|       'isVirtual': isVirtualCell
  3641|     };
  3642|     if (!_virtualTable[rowIndex]) {
  3643|       _virtualTable[rowIndex] = [];
  3644|     }
  3645|     _virtualTable[rowIndex][cellIndex] = objPosition;
  3646|   }
  3647|   /**
  3648|    * Create action cell object.
  3649|    *
  3650|    * @param {object} virtualTableCellObj Object of specific position on virtual table.
  3651|    * @param {enum} resultAction Action to be applied in that item.
  3652|    */
  3653|   function getActionCell(virtualTableCellObj, resultAction, virtualRowPosition, virtualColPosition) {
  3654|     return {
  3655|       'baseCell': virtualTableCellObj.baseCell,
  3656|       'action': resultAction,
  3657|       'virtualTable': {
  3658|         'rowIndex': virtualRowPosition,
  3659|         'cellIndex': virtualColPosition
  3660|       }
  3661|     };
  3662|   }
  3663|   /**
  3664|    * Recover free index of row to append Cell.
  3665|    *
  3666|    * @param {int} rowIndex Index of row to find free space.
  3667|    * @param {int} cellIndex Index of cell to find free space in table.
  3668|    */
  3669|   function recoverCellIndex(rowIndex, cellIndex) {
  3670|     if (!_virtualTable[rowIndex]) {
  3671|       return cellIndex;
  3672|     }
  3673|     if (!_virtualTable[rowIndex][cellIndex]) {
  3674|       return cellIndex;
  3675|     }
  3676|     var newCellIndex = cellIndex;
  3677|     while (_virtualTable[rowIndex][newCellIndex]) {
  3678|       newCellIndex++;
  3679|       if (!_virtualTable[rowIndex][newCellIndex]) {
  3680|         return newCellIndex;
  3681|       }
  3682|     }
  3683|   }
  3684|   /**
  3685|    * Recover info about row and cell and add information to virtual table.
  3686|    *
  3687|    * @param {object} row Row to recover information.
  3688|    * @param {object} cell Cell to recover information.
  3689|    */
  3690|   function addCellInfoToVirtual(row, cell) {
  3691|     var cellIndex = recoverCellIndex(row.rowIndex, cell.cellIndex);
  3692|     var cellHasColspan = cell.colSpan > 1;
  3693|     var cellHasRowspan = cell.rowSpan > 1;
  3694|     var isThisSelectedCell = row.rowIndex === _startPoint.rowPos && cell.cellIndex === _startPoint.colPos;
  3695|     setVirtualTablePosition(row.rowIndex, cellIndex, row, cell, cellHasRowspan, cellHasColspan, false); // Add span rows to virtual Table.
  3696|     var rowspanNumber = cell.attributes.rowSpan ? parseInt(cell.attributes.rowSpan.value, 10) : 0;
  3697|     if (rowspanNumber > 1) {
  3698|       for (var rp = 1; rp < rowspanNumber; rp++) {
  3699|         var rowspanIndex = row.rowIndex + rp;
  3700|         adjustStartPoint(rowspanIndex, cellIndex, cell, isThisSelectedCell);
  3701|         setVirtualTablePosition(rowspanIndex, cellIndex, row, cell, true, cellHasColspan, true);
  3702|       }
  3703|     } // Add span cols to virtual table.
  3704|     var colspanNumber = cell.attributes.colSpan ? parseInt(cell.attributes.colSpan.value, 10) : 0;
  3705|     if (colspanNumber > 1) {
  3706|       for (var cp = 1; cp < colspanNumber; cp++) {
  3707|         var cellspanIndex = recoverCellIndex(row.rowIndex, cellIndex + cp);
  3708|         adjustStartPoint(row.rowIndex, cellspanIndex, cell, isThisSelectedCell);
  3709|         setVirtualTablePosition(row.rowIndex, cellspanIndex, row, cell, cellHasRowspan, true, true);
  3710|       }
  3711|     }
  3712|   }
  3713|   /**
  3714|    * Process validation and adjust of start point if needed
  3715|    *
  3716|    * @param {int} rowIndex
  3717|    * @param {int} cellIndex
  3718|    * @param {object} cell
  3719|    * @param {bool} isSelectedCell
  3720|    */
  3721|   function adjustStartPoint(rowIndex, cellIndex, cell, isSelectedCell) {
  3722|     if (rowIndex === _startPoint.rowPos && _startPoint.colPos >= cell.cellIndex && cell.cellIndex <= cellIndex && !isSelectedCell) {
  3723|       _startPoint.colPos++;
  3724|     }
  3725|   }
  3726|   /**
  3727|    * Create virtual table of cells with all cells, including span cells.
  3728|    */
  3729|   function createVirtualTable() {
  3730|     var rows = domTable.rows;
  3731|     for (var rowIndex = 0; rowIndex < rows.length; rowIndex++) {
  3732|       var cells = rows[rowIndex].cells;
  3733|       for (var cellIndex = 0; cellIndex < cells.length; cellIndex++) {
  3734|         addCellInfoToVirtual(rows[rowIndex], cells[cellIndex]);
  3735|       }
  3736|     }
  3737|   }
  3738|   /**
  3739|    * Get action to be applied on the cell.
  3740|    *
  3741|    * @param {object} cell virtual table cell to apply action
  3742|    */
  3743|   function getDeleteResultActionToCell(cell) {
  3744|     switch (where) {
  3745|       case TableResultAction.where.Column:
  3746|         if (cell.isColSpan) {
  3747|           return TableResultAction.resultAction.SubtractSpanCount;
  3748|         }
  3749|         break;
  3750|       case TableResultAction.where.Row:
  3751|         if (!cell.isVirtual && cell.isRowSpan) {
  3752|           return TableResultAction.resultAction.AddCell;
  3753|         } else if (cell.isRowSpan) {
  3754|           return TableResultAction.resultAction.SubtractSpanCount;
  3755|         }
  3756|         break;
  3757|     }
  3758|     return TableResultAction.resultAction.RemoveCell;
  3759|   }
  3760|   /**
  3761|    * Get action to be applied on the cell.
  3762|    *
  3763|    * @param {object} cell virtual table cell to apply action
  3764|    */
  3765|   function getAddResultActionToCell(cell) {
  3766|     switch (where) {
  3767|       case TableResultAction.where.Column:
  3768|         if (cell.isColSpan) {
  3769|           return TableResultAction.resultAction.SumSpanCount;
  3770|         } else if (cell.isRowSpan && cell.isVirtual) {
  3771|           return TableResultAction.resultAction.Ignore;
  3772|         }
  3773|         break;
  3774|       case TableResultAction.where.Row:
  3775|         if (cell.isRowSpan) {
  3776|           return TableResultAction.resultAction.SumSpanCount;
  3777|         } else if (cell.isColSpan && cell.isVirtual) {
  3778|           return TableResultAction.resultAction.Ignore;
  3779|         }
  3780|         break;
  3781|     }
  3782|     return TableResultAction.resultAction.AddCell;
  3783|   }
  3784|   function init() {
  3785|     setStartPoint();
  3786|     createVirtualTable();
  3787|   } /// ///////////////////////////////////////////
  3788|   /**
  3789|    * Recover array os what to do in table.
  3790|    */
  3791|   this.getActionList = function () {
  3792|     var fixedRow = where === TableResultAction.where.Row ? _startPoint.rowPos : -1;
  3793|     var fixedCol = where === TableResultAction.where.Column ? _startPoint.colPos : -1;
  3794|     var actualPosition = 0;
  3795|     var canContinue = true;
  3796|     while (canContinue) {
  3797|       var rowPosition = fixedRow >= 0 ? fixedRow : actualPosition;
  3798|       var colPosition = fixedCol >= 0 ? fixedCol : actualPosition;
  3799|       var row = _virtualTable[rowPosition];
  3800|       if (!row) {
  3801|         canContinue = false;
  3802|         return _actionCellList;
  3803|       }
  3804|       var cell = row[colPosition];
  3805|       if (!cell) {
  3806|         canContinue = false;
  3807|         return _actionCellList;
  3808|       } // Define action to be applied in this cell
  3809|       var resultAction = TableResultAction.resultAction.Ignore;
  3810|       switch (action) {
  3811|         case TableResultAction.requestAction.Add:
  3812|           resultAction = getAddResultActionToCell(cell);
  3813|           break;
  3814|         case TableResultAction.requestAction.Delete:
  3815|           resultAction = getDeleteResultActionToCell(cell);
  3816|           break;
  3817|       }
  3818|       _actionCellList.push(getActionCell(cell, resultAction, rowPosition, colPosition));
  3819|       actualPosition++;
  3820|     }
  3821|     return _actionCellList;
  3822|   };
  3823|   init();
  3824| };
  3825| /**
  3826| *
  3827| * Where action occours enum.
  3828| */
  3829| TableResultAction.where = {
  3830|   'Row': 0,
  3831|   'Column': 1
  3832| };
  3833| /**
  3834| *
  3835| * Requested action to apply enum.
  3836| */
  3837| TableResultAction.requestAction = {
  3838|   'Add': 0,
  3839|   'Delete': 1
  3840| };
  3841| /**
  3842| *
  3843| * Result action to be executed enum.
  3844| */
  3845| TableResultAction.resultAction = {
  3846|   'Ignore': 0,
  3847|   'SubtractSpanCount': 1,
  3848|   'RemoveCell': 2,
  3849|   'AddCell': 3,
  3850|   'SumSpanCount': 4
  3851| };

  4309|     /**
  4310|      * create link (command)
  4311|      *
  4312|      * @param {Object} linkInfo
  4313|      */
  4314|     this.createLink = this.wrapCommand(function (linkInfo) {
  4315|       var linkUrl = linkInfo.url;
  4316|       var linkText = linkInfo.text;
  4317|       var isNewWindow = linkInfo.isNewWindow;
  4318|       var checkProtocol = linkInfo.checkProtocol;
  4319|       var rng = linkInfo.range || _this.getLastRange();
  4320|       var additionalTextLength = linkText.length - rng.toString().length;
  4321|       if (additionalTextLength > 0 && _this.isLimited(additionalTextLength)) {
  4322|         return;
  4323|       }
  4324|       var isTextChanged = rng.toString() !== linkText; // handle spaced urls from input
  4325|       if (typeof linkUrl === 'string') {
  4326|         linkUrl = linkUrl.trim();
  4327|       }
  4328|       if (_this.options.onCreateLink) {
  4329|         linkUrl = _this.options.onCreateLink(linkUrl);
  4330|       } else if (checkProtocol) {
  4331|         linkUrl = /^([A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9+-.]*\:|#|\/)/.test(linkUrl) ? linkUrl : _this.options.defaultProtocol + linkUrl;
  4332|       }
  4333|       var anchors = [];
  4334|       if (isTextChanged) {
  4335|         rng = rng.deleteContents();
  4336|         var anchor = rng.insertNode(external_jQuery_default()('<A>' + linkText + '</A>')[0]);
  4337|         anchors.push(anchor);
  4338|       } else {
  4339|         anchors = _this.style.styleNodes(rng, {
  4340|           nodeName: 'A',
  4341|           expandClosestSibling: true,
  4342|           onlyPartialContains: true
  4343|         });
  4344|       }
  4345|       external_jQuery_default().each(anchors, function (idx, anchor) {
  4346|         external_jQuery_default()(anchor).attr('href', linkUrl);
  4347|         if (isNewWindow) {
  4348|           external_jQuery_default()(anchor).attr('target', '_blank');
  4349|         } else {
  4350|           external_jQuery_default()(anchor).removeAttr('target');
  4351|         }
  4352|       });
  4353|       _this.setLastRange(_this.createRangeFromList(anchors).select());
  4354|     });
  4355|     /**

  4413|     /**

  4425|           height: ''
  4426|         });
  4427|       }
  4428|     });
  4429|   }
  4430|   Editor_createClass(Editor, [{
  4431|     key: "initialize",
  4432|     value: function initialize() {
  4433|       var _this2 = this;
  4434|       this.$editable.on('keydown', function (event) {
  4435|         if (event.keyCode === key.code.ENTER) {
  4436|           _this2.context.triggerEvent('enter', event);
  4437|         }
  4438|         _this2.context.triggerEvent('keydown', event); // keep a snapshot to limit text on input event
  4439|         _this2.snapshot = _this2.history.makeSnapshot();
  4440|         _this2.hasKeyShortCut = false;
  4441|         if (!event.isDefaultPrevented()) {
  4442|           if (_this2.options.shortcuts) {
  4443|             _this2.hasKeyShortCut = _this2.handleKeyMap(event);
  4444|           } else {
  4445|             _this2.preventDefaultEditableShortCuts(event);
  4446|           }
  4447|         }
  4448|         if (_this2.isLimited(1, event)) {
  4449|           var lastRange = _this2.getLastRange();
  4450|           if (lastRange.eo - lastRange.so === 0) {
  4451|             return false;
  4452|           }
  4453|         }
  4454|         _this2.setLastRange(); // record undo in the key event except keyMap.
  4455|         if (_this2.options.recordEveryKeystroke) {
  4456|           if (_this2.hasKeyShortCut === false) {
  4457|             _this2.history.recordUndo();
  4458|           }
  4459|         }
  4460|       }).on('keyup', function (event) {
  4461|         _this2.setLastRange();
  4462|         _this2.context.triggerEvent('keyup', event);
  4463|       }).on('focus', function (event) {
  4464|         _this2.setLastRange();
  4465|         _this2.context.triggerEvent('focus', event);
  4466|       }).on('blur', function (event) {
  4467|         _this2.context.triggerEvent('blur', event);
  4468|       }).on('mousedown', function (event) {
  4469|         _this2.context.triggerEvent('mousedown', event);
  4470|       }).on('mouseup', function (event) {

  4472|         _this2.history.recordUndo();

  4477|         _this2.setLastRange();

  4481|           _this2.history.applySnapshot(_this2.snapshot);
  4482|         }
  4483|       });

  4494|         _this2.context.triggerEvent('focusin', event);
  4495|       }).on('focusout', function (event) {
  4496|         _this2.context.triggerEvent('focusout', event);
  4497|       });
  4498|       if (this.options.airMode) {

  4500|           this.$editor.on('contextmenu', function (event) {
  4501|             _this2.context.triggerEvent('contextmenu', event);
  4502|             return false;
  4503|           });
  4504|         }

  4506|         if (this.options.width) {
  4507|           this.$editor.outerWidth(this.options.width);
  4508|         }
