  4522|   }, {
  4523|     key: "destroy",
  4524|     value: function destroy() {
  4525|       this.$editable.off();
  4526|     }
  4527|   }, {
  4528|     key: "handleKeyMap",
  4529|     value: function handleKeyMap(event) {
  4530|       var keyMap = this.options.keyMap[env.isMac ? 'mac' : 'pc'];
  4531|       var keys = [];
  4532|       if (event.metaKey) {
  4533|         keys.push('CMD');
  4534|       }
  4535|       if (event.ctrlKey && !event.altKey) {
  4536|         keys.push('CTRL');
  4537|       }
  4538|       if (event.shiftKey) {
  4539|         keys.push('SHIFT');
  4540|       }
  4541|       var keyName = key.nameFromCode[event.keyCode];
  4542|       if (keyName) {
  4543|         keys.push(keyName);
  4544|       }
  4545|       var eventName = keyMap[keys.join('+')];
  4546|       if (keyName === 'TAB' && !this.options.tabDisable) {
  4547|         this.afterCommand();
  4548|       } else if (eventName) {
  4549|         if (this.context.invoke(eventName) !== false) {
  4550|           event.preventDefault(); // if keyMap action was invoked
  4551|           return true;
  4552|         }
  4553|       } else if (key.isEdit(event.keyCode)) {
  4554|         this.afterCommand();
  4555|       }
  4556|       return false;
  4557|     }
  4558|   }, {
  4559|     key: "preventDefaultEditableShortCuts",
  4560|     value: function preventDefaultEditableShortCuts(event) {
  4561|       if ((event.ctrlKey || event.metaKey) && lists.contains([66, 73, 85], event.keyCode)) {
  4562|         event.preventDefault();
  4563|       }
  4564|     }
  4565|   }, {
  4566|     key: "isLimited",
  4567|     value: function isLimited(pad, event) {
  4568|       pad = pad || 0;
  4569|       if (typeof event !== 'undefined') {
  4570|         if (key.isMove(event.keyCode) || key.isNavigation(event.keyCode) || event.ctrlKey || event.metaKey || lists.contains([key.code.BACKSPACE, key.code.DELETE], event.keyCode)) {
  4571|           return false;
  4572|         }
  4573|       }
  4574|       if (this.options.maxTextLength > 0) {
  4575|         if (this.$editable.text().length + pad > this.options.maxTextLength) {
  4576|           return true;
  4577|         }
  4578|       }
  4579|       return false;
  4580|     }
  4581|     /**
  4582|      * create range
  4583|      * @return {WrappedRange}
  4584|      */
  4585|   }, {
  4586|     key: "createRange",
  4587|     value: function createRange() {
  4588|       this.focus();
  4589|       this.setLastRange();
  4590|       return this.getLastRange();
  4591|     }
  4592|     /**
  4593|      * create a new range from the list of elements
  4594|      *
  4595|      * @param {list} dom element list
  4596|      * @return {WrappedRange}
  4597|      */
  4598|   }, {
  4599|     key: "createRangeFromList",
  4600|     value: function createRangeFromList(lst) {
  4601|       var startRange = range.createFromNodeBefore(lists.head(lst));
  4602|       var startPoint = startRange.getStartPoint();
  4603|       var endRange = range.createFromNodeAfter(lists.last(lst));
  4604|       var endPoint = endRange.getEndPoint();
  4605|       return range.create(startPoint.node, startPoint.offset, endPoint.node, endPoint.offset);
  4606|     }
  4607|     /**
  4608|      * set the last range
  4609|      *
  4610|      * if given rng is exist, set rng as the last range
  4611|      * or create a new range at the end of the document
  4612|      *
  4613|      * @param {WrappedRange} rng
  4614|      */
  4615|   }, {
  4616|     key: "setLastRange",
  4617|     value: function setLastRange(rng) {
  4618|       if (rng) {
  4619|         this.lastRange = rng;
  4620|       } else {
  4621|         this.lastRange = range.create(this.editable);
  4622|         if (external_jQuery_default()(this.lastRange.sc).closest('.note-editable').length === 0) {
  4623|           this.lastRange = range.createFromBodyElement(this.editable);
  4624|         }
  4625|       }
  4626|     }
  4627|     /**
  4628|      * get the last range
  4629|      *
  4630|      * if there is a saved last range, return it
  4631|      * or create a new range and return it
  4632|      *
  4633|      * @return {WrappedRange}
  4634|      */
  4635|   }, {
  4636|     key: "getLastRange",
  4637|     value: function getLastRange() {
  4638|       if (!this.lastRange) {
  4639|         this.setLastRange();
  4640|       }
  4641|       return this.lastRange;
  4642|     }
  4643|     /**
  4644|      * saveRange
  4645|      *
  4646|      * save current range
  4647|      *
  4648|      * @param {Boolean} [thenCollapse=false]
  4649|      */
  4650|   }, {
  4651|     key: "saveRange",
  4652|     value: function saveRange(thenCollapse) {
  4653|       if (thenCollapse) {
  4654|         this.getLastRange().collapse().select();
  4655|       }
  4656|     }
  4657|     /**
  4658|      * restoreRange
  4659|      *
  4660|      * restore lately range
  4661|      */
  4662|   }, {
  4663|     key: "restoreRange",
  4664|     value: function restoreRange() {
  4665|       if (this.lastRange) {
  4666|         this.lastRange.select();
  4667|         this.focus();
  4668|       }
  4669|     }
  4670|   }, {
  4671|     key: "saveTarget",
  4672|     value: function saveTarget(node) {
  4673|       this.$editable.data('target', node);
  4674|     }
  4675|   }, {
  4676|     key: "clearTarget",
  4677|     value: function clearTarget() {
  4678|       this.$editable.removeData('target');
  4679|     }
  4680|   }, {
  4681|     key: "restoreTarget",
  4682|     value: function restoreTarget() {
  4683|       return this.$editable.data('target');
  4684|     }
  4685|     /**
  4686|      * currentStyle
  4687|      *
  4688|      * current style
  4689|      * @return {Object|Boolean} unfocus
  4690|      */
  4691|   }, {
  4692|     key: "currentStyle",
  4693|     value: function currentStyle() {
  4694|       var rng = range.create();
  4695|       if (rng) {
  4696|         rng = rng.normalize();
  4697|       }
  4698|       return rng ? this.style.current(rng) : this.style.fromNode(this.$editable);
  4699|     }
  4700|     /**
  4701|      * style from node
  4702|      *
  4703|      * @param {jQuery} $node
  4704|      * @return {Object}
  4705|      */
  4706|   }, {
  4707|     key: "styleFromNode",
  4708|     value: function styleFromNode($node) {
  4709|       return this.style.fromNode($node);
  4710|     }

  4769|     value: function tab() {

  4772|         this.table.tab(rng);
  4773|       } else {
  4774|         if (this.options.tabSize === 0) {
  4775|           return false;
  4776|         }

  4780|           this.afterCommand();
  4781|         }
  4782|       }
  4783|     }

  4793|       } else {
  4794|         if (this.options.tabSize === 0) {
  4795|           return false;
  4796|         }
  4797|       }
  4798|     }

  4808|         this.afterCommand();
  4809|       };

  5037|   }, {
  5038|     key: "resizeTo",
  5039|     value: function resizeTo(pos, $target, bKeepRatio) {
  5040|       var imageSize;
  5041|       if (bKeepRatio) {
  5042|         var newRatio = pos.y / pos.x;
  5043|         var ratio = $target.data('ratio');
  5044|         imageSize = {
  5045|           width: ratio > newRatio ? pos.x : pos.y / ratio,
  5046|           height: ratio > newRatio ? pos.x * ratio : pos.y
  5047|         };
  5048|       } else {
  5049|         imageSize = {
  5050|           width: pos.x,
  5051|           height: pos.y
  5052|         };
  5053|       }
  5054|       $target.css(imageSize);
  5055|     }

  5112|   Clipboard_createClass(Clipboard, [{
  5113|     key: "initialize",
  5114|     value: function initialize() {
  5115|       this.$editable.on('paste', this.pasteByEvent.bind(this));
  5116|     }
  5117|     /**
  5118|      * paste by clipboard event
  5119|      *
  5120|      * @param {Event} event
  5121|      */
  5122|   }, {
  5123|     key: "pasteByEvent",
  5124|     value: function pasteByEvent(event) {
  5125|       var _this = this;
  5126|       var clipboardData = event.originalEvent.clipboardData;
  5127|       if (clipboardData && clipboardData.items && clipboardData.items.length) {
  5128|         var item = clipboardData.items.length > 1 ? clipboardData.items[1] : lists.head(clipboardData.items);
  5129|         if (item.kind === 'file' && item.type.indexOf('image/') !== -1) {
  5130|           this.context.invoke('editor.insertImagesOrCallback', [item.getAsFile()]);
  5131|           event.preventDefault();
  5132|         } else if (item.kind === 'string') {
  5133|           if (this.context.invoke('editor.isLimited', clipboardData.getData('Text').length)) {
  5134|             event.preventDefault();
  5135|           }
  5136|         }
  5137|       } else if (window.clipboardData) {
  5138|         var text = window.clipboardData.getData('text');
  5139|         if (this.context.invoke('editor.isLimited', text.length)) {
  5140|           event.preventDefault();
  5141|         }
  5142|       } // Call editor.afterCommand after proceeding default event handler
  5143|       setTimeout(function () {
  5144|         _this.context.invoke('editor.afterCommand');
  5145|       }, 10);
  5146|     }
  5147|   }]);
  5148|   return Clipboard;

  5678| function AutoLink_classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError("Cannot call a class as a function"); } }
  5679| function AutoLink_defineProperties(target, props) { for (var i = 0; i < props.length; i++) { var descriptor = props[i]; descriptor.enumerable = descriptor.enumerable || false; descriptor.configurable = true; if ("value" in descriptor) descriptor.writable = true; Object.defineProperty(target, descriptor.key, descriptor); } }
  5680| function AutoLink_createClass(Constructor, protoProps, staticProps) { if (protoProps) AutoLink_defineProperties(Constructor.prototype, protoProps); if (staticProps) AutoLink_defineProperties(Constructor, staticProps); return Constructor; }
  5681| var defaultScheme = 'http://';
  5682| var linkPattern = /^([A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9+-.]*\:[\/]{2}|tel:|mailto:[A-Z0-9._%+-]+@|xmpp:[A-Z0-9._%+-]+@)?(www\.)?(.+)$/i;
  5683| var AutoLink = /*#__PURE__*/function () {
  5684|   function AutoLink(context) {
  5685|     var _this = this;
  5686|     AutoLink_classCallCheck(this, AutoLink);
  5687|     this.context = context;
  5688|     this.options = context.options;
  5689|     this.events = {
  5690|       'summernote.keyup': function summernoteKeyup(we, e) {
  5691|         if (!e.isDefaultPrevented()) {
  5692|           _this.handleKeyup(e);
  5693|         }
  5694|       },
  5695|       'summernote.keydown': function summernoteKeydown(we, e) {
  5696|         _this.handleKeydown(e);
  5697|       }
  5698|     };
  5699|   }
  5700|   AutoLink_createClass(AutoLink, [{
  5701|     key: "initialize",
  5702|     value: function initialize() {
  5703|       this.lastWordRange = null;
  5704|     }
  5705|   }, {
  5706|     key: "destroy",
  5707|     value: function destroy() {
  5708|       this.lastWordRange = null;
  5709|     }
  5710|   }, {
  5711|     key: "replace",
  5712|     value: function replace() {
  5713|       if (!this.lastWordRange) {
  5714|         return;
  5715|       }
  5716|       var keyword = this.lastWordRange.toString();
  5717|       var match = keyword.match(linkPattern);
  5718|       if (match && (match[1] || match[2])) {
  5719|         var link = match[1] ? keyword : defaultScheme + keyword;
  5720|         var urlText = this.options.showDomainOnlyForAutolink ? keyword.replace(/^(?:https?:\/\/)?(?:tel?:?)?(?:mailto?:?)?(?:xmpp?:?)?(?:www\.)?/i, '').split('/')[0] : keyword;
  5721|         var node = external_jQuery_default()('<a></a>').html(urlText).attr('href', link)[0];
  5722|         if (this.context.options.linkTargetBlank) {
  5723|           external_jQuery_default()(node).attr('target', '_blank');
  5724|         }
  5725|         this.lastWordRange.insertNode(node);
  5726|         this.lastWordRange = null;
  5727|         this.context.invoke('editor.focus');
  5728|       }
  5729|     }
  5730|   }, {
  5731|     key: "handleKeydown",
  5732|     value: function handleKeydown(e) {
  5733|       if (lists.contains([key.code.ENTER, key.code.SPACE], e.keyCode)) {
  5734|         var wordRange = this.context.invoke('editor.createRange').getWordRange();
  5735|         this.lastWordRange = wordRange;
  5736|       }
  5737|     }
  5738|   }, {
  5739|     key: "handleKeyup",
  5740|     value: function handleKeyup(e) {
  5741|       if (lists.contains([key.code.ENTER, key.code.SPACE], e.keyCode)) {
  5742|         this.replace();
  5743|       }
  5744|     }
  5745|   }]);
  5746|   return AutoLink;
  5747| }();

  5778| var AutoReplace = /*#__PURE__*/function () {
  5779|   function AutoReplace(context) {
  5780|     var _this = this;
  5781|     AutoReplace_classCallCheck(this, AutoReplace);
  5782|     this.context = context;
  5783|     this.options = context.options.replace || {};
  5784|     this.keys = [key.code.ENTER, key.code.SPACE, key.code.PERIOD, key.code.COMMA, key.code.SEMICOLON, key.code.SLASH];
  5785|     this.previousKeydownCode = null;
  5786|     this.events = {
  5787|       'summernote.keyup': function summernoteKeyup(we, e) {
  5788|         if (!e.isDefaultPrevented()) {
  5789|           _this.handleKeyup(e);
  5790|         }
  5791|       },
  5792|       'summernote.keydown': function summernoteKeydown(we, e) {
  5793|         _this.handleKeydown(e);
  5794|       }
  5795|     };
  5796|   }
  5797|   AutoReplace_createClass(AutoReplace, [{
  5798|     key: "shouldInitialize",
  5799|     value: function shouldInitialize() {
  5800|       return !!this.options.match;
  5801|     }
  5802|   }, {
  5803|     key: "initialize",
  5804|     value: function initialize() {
  5805|       this.lastWord = null;
  5806|     }
  5807|   }, {
  5808|     key: "destroy",
  5809|     value: function destroy() {
  5810|       this.lastWord = null;
  5811|     }
  5812|   }, {
  5813|     key: "replace",
  5814|     value: function replace() {
  5815|       if (!this.lastWord) {
  5816|         return;
  5817|       }
  5818|       var self = this;
  5819|       var keyword = this.lastWord.toString();
  5820|       this.options.match(keyword, function (match) {
  5821|         if (match) {
  5822|           var node = '';
  5823|           if (typeof match === 'string') {
  5824|             node = dom.createText(match);
  5825|           } else if (match instanceof jQuery) {
  5826|             node = match[0];
  5827|           } else if (match instanceof Node) {
  5828|             node = match;
  5829|           }
  5830|           if (!node) return;
  5831|           self.lastWord.insertNode(node);
  5832|           self.lastWord = null;
  5833|           self.context.invoke('editor.focus');
  5834|         }
  5835|       });
  5836|     }
  5837|   }, {
  5838|     key: "handleKeydown",
  5839|     value: function handleKeydown(e) {
  5840|       if (this.previousKeydownCode && lists.contains(this.keys, this.previousKeydownCode)) {
  5841|         this.previousKeydownCode = e.keyCode;
  5842|         return;
  5843|       }
  5844|       if (lists.contains(this.keys, e.keyCode)) {
  5845|         var wordRange = this.context.invoke('editor.createRange').getWordRange();
  5846|         this.lastWord = wordRange;
  5847|       }
  5848|       this.previousKeydownCode = e.keyCode;
  5849|     }
  5850|   }, {
  5851|     key: "handleKeyup",
  5852|     value: function handleKeyup(e) {
  5853|       if (lists.contains(this.keys, e.keyCode)) {
  5854|         this.replace();
  5855|       }
  5856|     }
  5857|   }]);
  5858|   return AutoReplace;
  5859| }();

  6104|               item = {
  6105|                 tag: item,
  6106|                 title: Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(_this2.lang.style, item) ? _this2.lang.style[item] : item
  6107|               };
  6108|             }
  6109|             var tag = item.tag;
  6110|             var title = item.title;
  6111|             var style = item.style ? ' style="' + item.style + '" ' : '';
  6112|             var className = item.className ? ' class="' + item.className + '"' : '';
  6113|             return '<' + tag + style + className + '>' + title + '</' + tag + '>';
  6114|           },
  6115|           click: _this2.context.createInvokeHandler('editor.formatBlock')
  6116|         })]).render();
  6117|       });
  6118|       var _loop = function _loop(styleIdx, styleLen) {
  6119|         var item = _this2.options.styleTags[styleIdx];
  6120|         _this2.context.memo('button.style.' + item, function () {
  6121|           return _this2.button({
  6122|             className: 'note-btn-style-' + item,
  6123|             contents: '<div data-value="' + item + '">' + item.toUpperCase() + '</div>',

  6125|             click: _this2.context.createInvokeHandler('editor.formatBlock')
  6126|           }).render();
  6127|         });
  6128|       };
  6129|       for (var styleIdx = 0, styleLen = this.options.styleTags.length; styleIdx < styleLen; styleIdx++) {
  6130|         _loop(styleIdx, styleLen);
  6131|       }

  6676|     key: "tableMoveHandler",
  6677|     value: function tableMoveHandler(event) {
  6678|       var PX_PER_EM = 18;
  6679|       var $picker = external_jQuery_default()(event.target.parentNode); // target is mousecatcher
  6680|       var $dimensionDisplay = $picker.next();
  6681|       var $catcher = $picker.find('.note-dimension-picker-mousecatcher');
  6682|       var $highlighted = $picker.find('.note-dimension-picker-highlighted');
  6683|       var $unhighlighted = $picker.find('.note-dimension-picker-unhighlighted');
  6684|       var posOffset; // HTML5 with jQuery - e.offsetX is undefined in Firefox
  6685|       if (event.offsetX === undefined) {
  6686|         var posCatcher = external_jQuery_default()(event.target).offset();
  6687|         posOffset = {
  6688|           x: event.pageX - posCatcher.left,
  6689|           y: event.pageY - posCatcher.top
  6690|         };
  6691|       } else {
  6692|         posOffset = {
  6693|           x: event.offsetX,
  6694|           y: event.offsetY
  6695|         };
  6696|       }
  6697|       var dim = {
  6698|         c: Math.ceil(posOffset.x / PX_PER_EM) || 1,
  6699|         r: Math.ceil(posOffset.y / PX_PER_EM) || 1
  6700|       };
  6701|       $highlighted.css({
  6702|         width: dim.c + 'em',
  6703|         height: dim.r + 'em'
  6704|       });
  6705|       $catcher.data('value', dim.c + 'x' + dim.r);
  6706|       if (dim.c > 3 && dim.c < this.options.insertTableMaxSize.col) {
  6707|         $unhighlighted.css({
  6708|           width: dim.c + 1 + 'em'
  6709|         });
  6710|       }
  6711|       if (dim.r > 3 && dim.r < this.options.insertTableMaxSize.row) {
  6712|         $unhighlighted.css({
  6713|           height: dim.r + 1 + 'em'
  6714|         });
  6715|       }
  6716|       $dimensionDisplay.html(dim.c + ' x ' + dim.r);
  6717|     }
  6718|   }]);
  6719|   return Buttons;
  6720| }();

  6776|   }, {
  6777|     key: "followScroll",
  6778|     value: function followScroll() {
  6779|       if (this.$editor.hasClass('fullscreen')) {
  6780|         return false;
  6781|       }
  6782|       var editorHeight = this.$editor.outerHeight();
  6783|       var editorWidth = this.$editor.width();
  6784|       var toolbarHeight = this.$toolbar.height();
  6785|       var statusbarHeight = this.$statusbar.height(); // check if the web app is currently using another static bar
  6786|       var otherBarHeight = 0;
  6787|       if (this.options.otherStaticBar) {
  6788|         otherBarHeight = external_jQuery_default()(this.options.otherStaticBar).outerHeight();
  6789|       }
  6790|       var currentOffset = this.$document.scrollTop();
  6791|       var editorOffsetTop = this.$editor.offset().top;
  6792|       var editorOffsetBottom = editorOffsetTop + editorHeight;
  6793|       var activateOffset = editorOffsetTop - otherBarHeight;
  6794|       var deactivateOffsetBottom = editorOffsetBottom - otherBarHeight - toolbarHeight - statusbarHeight;
  6795|       if (!this.isFollowing && currentOffset > activateOffset && currentOffset < deactivateOffsetBottom - toolbarHeight) {
  6796|         this.isFollowing = true;
  6797|         this.$editable.css({
  6798|           marginTop: this.$toolbar.outerHeight()
  6799|         });
  6800|         this.$toolbar.css({
  6801|           position: 'fixed',
  6802|           top: otherBarHeight,
  6803|           width: editorWidth,
  6804|           zIndex: 1000
  6805|         });
  6806|       } else if (this.isFollowing && (currentOffset < activateOffset || currentOffset > deactivateOffsetBottom)) {
  6807|         this.isFollowing = false;
  6808|         this.$toolbar.css({
  6809|           position: 'relative',
  6810|           top: 0,
  6811|           width: '100%',
  6812|           zIndex: 'auto'
  6813|         });
  6814|         this.$editable.css({
  6815|           marginTop: ''
  6816|         });
  6817|       }
  6818|     }
  6819|   }, {
  6820|     key: "changeContainer",
  6821|     value: function changeContainer(isFullscreen) {
  6822|       if (isFullscreen) {
  6823|         this.$toolbar.prependTo(this.$editor);
  6824|       } else {
  6825|         if (this.options.toolbarContainer) {
  6826|           this.$toolbar.appendTo(this.options.toolbarContainer);
  6827|         }
  6828|       }
  6829|       if (this.options.followingToolbar) {
  6830|         this.followScroll();
  6831|       }
  6832|     }
  6833|   }, {
  6834|     key: "updateFullscreen",

  6838|     }
  6839|   }, {
  6840|     key: "updateCodeview",

  6843|       if (isCodeview) {
  6844|         this.deactivate();
  6845|       } else {
  6846|         this.activate();
  6847|       }
  6848|     }
  6849|   }, {
  6850|     key: "activate",

  7436|   }, {
  7437|     key: "createVideoNode",
  7438|     value: function createVideoNode(url) {
  7439|       var ytRegExp = /\/\/(?:(?:www|m)\.)?(?:youtu\.be\/|youtube\.com\/(?:embed\/|v\/|watch\?v=|watch\?.+&v=))([\w|-]{11})(?:(?:[\?&]t=)(\S+))?$/;
  7440|       var ytRegExpForStart = /^(?:(\d+)h)?(?:(\d+)m)?(?:(\d+)s)?$/;
  7441|       var ytMatch = url.match(ytRegExp);
  7442|       var gdRegExp = /(?:\.|\/\/)drive\.google\.com\/file\/d\/(.[a-zA-Z0-9_-]*)\/view/;
  7443|       var gdMatch = url.match(gdRegExp);
  7444|       var igRegExp = /(?:www\.|\/\/)instagram\.com\/p\/(.[a-zA-Z0-9_-]*)/;
  7445|       var igMatch = url.match(igRegExp);
  7446|       var vRegExp = /\/\/vine\.co\/v\/([a-zA-Z0-9]+)/;
  7447|       var vMatch = url.match(vRegExp);
  7448|       var vimRegExp = /\/\/(player\.)?vimeo\.com\/([a-z]*\/)*(\d+)[?]?.*/;

  7861|         this.selectItem($prev);
  7862|       } else {
  7863|         var $prevGroup = $current.parent().prev();
  7864|         if (!$prevGroup.length) {
  7865|           $prevGroup = this.$content.find('.note-hint-group').last();
  7866|         }
  7867|         this.selectItem($prevGroup.find('.note-hint-item').last());
  7868|       }
  7869|     }
  7870|   }, {
  7871|     key: "replace",
  7872|     value: function replace() {
  7873|       var $item = this.$content.find('.note-hint-item.active');
  7874|       if ($item.length) {
  7875|         var node = this.nodeFromItem($item); // If matchingWord length = 0 -> capture OK / open hint / but as mention capture "" (\w*)
  7876|         if (this.matchingWord !== null && this.matchingWord.length === 0) {
  7877|           this.lastWordRange.so = this.lastWordRange.eo; // Else si > 0 and normal case -> adjust range "before" for correct position of insertion
  7878|         } else if (this.matchingWord !== null && this.matchingWord.length > 0 && !this.lastWordRange.isCollapsed()) {
  7879|           var rangeCompute = this.lastWordRange.eo - this.lastWordRange.so - this.matchingWord.length;
  7880|           if (rangeCompute > 0) {
  7881|             this.lastWordRange.so += rangeCompute;
  7882|           }
  7883|         }
  7884|         this.lastWordRange.insertNode(node);
  7885|         if (this.options.hintSelect === 'next') {
  7886|           var blank = document.createTextNode('');
  7887|           external_jQuery_default()(node).after(blank);
  7888|           range.createFromNodeBefore(blank).select();
  7889|         } else {
  7890|           range.createFromNodeAfter(node).select();
  7891|         }
  7892|         this.lastWordRange = null;
  7893|         this.hide();
  7894|         this.context.invoke('editor.focus');
  7895|         this.context.triggerEvent('change', this.$editable.html(), this.$editable);
  7896|       }
  7897|     }
  7898|   }, {
  7899|     key: "nodeFromItem",
  7900|     value: function nodeFromItem($item) {
  7901|       var hint = this.hints[$item.data('index')];
  7902|       var item = $item.data('item');
  7903|       var node = hint.content ? hint.content(item) : item;
  7904|       if (typeof node === 'string') {
  7905|         node = dom.createText(node);
  7906|       }
  7907|       return node;
  7908|     }
  7909|   }, {
  7910|     key: "createItemTemplates",
  7911|     value: function createItemTemplates(hintIdx, items) {
  7912|       var hint = this.hints[hintIdx];
  7913|       return items.map(function (item
  7914|       /*, idx */
  7915|       ) {
  7916|         var $item = external_jQuery_default()('<div class="note-hint-item"></div>');
  7917|         $item.append(hint.template ? hint.template(item) : item + '');
  7918|         $item.data({
  7919|           'index': hintIdx,
  7920|           'item': item
  7921|         });
  7922|         return $item;
  7923|       });
  7924|     }
  7925|   }, {
  7926|     key: "handleKeydown",
  7927|     value: function handleKeydown(e) {
  7928|       if (!this.$popover.is(':visible')) {
  7929|         return;
  7930|       }
  7931|       if (e.keyCode === key.code.ENTER) {
  7932|         e.preventDefault();
  7933|         this.replace();
  7934|       } else if (e.keyCode === key.code.UP) {
  7935|         e.preventDefault();
  7936|         this.moveUp();
  7937|       } else if (e.keyCode === key.code.DOWN) {
  7938|         e.preventDefault();
  7939|         this.moveDown();
  7940|       }
  7941|     }
  7942|   }, {
  7943|     key: "searchKeyword",
  7944|     value: function searchKeyword(index, keyword, callback) {
  7945|       var hint = this.hints[index];
  7946|       if (hint && hint.match.test(keyword) && hint.search) {
  7947|         var matches = hint.match.exec(keyword);
  7948|         this.matchingWord = matches[0];
  7949|         hint.search(matches[1], callback);
  7950|       } else {
  7951|         callback();
  7952|       }
  7953|     }
  7954|   }, {
  7955|     key: "createGroup",
  7956|     value: function createGroup(idx, keyword) {
  7957|       var _this3 = this;
  7958|       var $group = external_jQuery_default()('<div class="note-hint-group note-hint-group-' + idx + '"></div>');
  7959|       this.searchKeyword(idx, keyword, function (items) {
  7960|         items = items || [];
  7961|         if (items.length) {
  7962|           $group.html(_this3.createItemTemplates(idx, items));
  7963|           _this3.show();
  7964|         }
  7965|       });
  7966|       return $group;
  7967|     }
  7968|   }, {
  7969|     key: "handleKeyup",
  7970|     value: function handleKeyup(e) {
  7971|       var _this4 = this;
  7972|       if (!lists.contains([key.code.ENTER, key.code.UP, key.code.DOWN], e.keyCode)) {
  7973|         var _range = this.context.invoke('editor.getLastRange');
  7974|         var wordRange, keyword;
  7975|         if (this.options.hintMode === 'words') {
  7976|           wordRange = _range.getWordsRange(_range);
  7977|           keyword = wordRange.toString();
  7978|           this.hints.forEach(function (hint) {
  7979|             if (hint.match.test(keyword)) {
  7980|               wordRange = _range.getWordsMatchRange(hint.match);
  7981|               return false;
  7982|             }
  7983|           });
  7984|           if (!wordRange) {
  7985|             this.hide();
  7986|             return;
  7987|           }
  7988|           keyword = wordRange.toString();
  7989|         } else {
  7990|           wordRange = _range.getWordRange();
  7991|           keyword = wordRange.toString();
  7992|         }
  7993|         if (this.hints.length && keyword) {
  7994|           this.$content.empty();
  7995|           var bnd = func.rect2bnd(lists.last(wordRange.getClientRects()));
  7996|           var containerOffset = external_jQuery_default()(this.options.container).offset();
  7997|           if (bnd) {
  7998|             bnd.top -= containerOffset.top;
  7999|             bnd.left -= containerOffset.left;
  8000|             this.$popover.hide();
  8001|             this.lastWordRange = wordRange;
  8002|             this.hints.forEach(function (hint, idx) {
  8003|               if (hint.match.test(keyword)) {
  8004|                 _this4.createGroup(idx, keyword).appendTo(_this4.$content);
  8005|               }
  8006|             }); // select first .note-hint-item
  8007|             this.$content.find('.note-hint-item:first').addClass('active'); // set position for popover after group is created
  8008|             if (this.direction === 'top') {
  8009|               this.$popover.css({
  8010|                 left: bnd.left,
  8011|                 top: bnd.top - this.$popover.outerHeight() - POPOVER_DIST
  8012|               });
  8013|             } else {
  8014|               this.$popover.css({
  8015|                 left: bnd.left,
  8016|                 top: bnd.top + bnd.height + POPOVER_DIST
  8017|               });
  8018|             }
  8019|           }
  8020|         } else {
  8021|           this.hide();
  8022|         }
  8023|       }
  8024|     }
  8025|   }, {
  8026|     key: "show",
  8027|     value: function show() {
  8028|       this.$popover.show();
  8029|     }
  8030|   }, {
  8031|     key: "hide",
  8032|     value: function hide() {
  8033|       this.$popover.hide();
  8034|     }
  8035|   }]);
  8036|   return HintPopover;
  8037| }();

  8279| function _typeof(obj) { "@babel/helpers - typeof"; if (typeof Symbol === "function" && typeof Symbol.iterator === "symbol") { _typeof = function _typeof(obj) { return typeof obj; }; } else { _typeof = function _typeof(obj) { return obj && typeof Symbol === "function" && obj.constructor === Symbol && obj !== Symbol.prototype ? "symbol" : typeof obj; }; } return _typeof(obj); }
  8280| function renderer_classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError("Cannot call a class as a function"); } }
  8281| function renderer_defineProperties(target, props) { for (var i = 0; i < props.length; i++) { var descriptor = props[i]; descriptor.enumerable = descriptor.enumerable || false; descriptor.configurable = true; if ("value" in descriptor) descriptor.writable = true; Object.defineProperty(target, descriptor.key, descriptor); } }
  8282| function renderer_createClass(Constructor, protoProps, staticProps) { if (protoProps) renderer_defineProperties(Constructor.prototype, protoProps); if (staticProps) renderer_defineProperties(Constructor, staticProps); return Constructor; }
  8283| var Renderer = /*#__PURE__*/function () {
  8284|   function Renderer(markup, children, options, callback) {
  8285|     renderer_classCallCheck(this, Renderer);
  8286|     this.markup = markup;
  8287|     this.children = children;
  8288|     this.options = options;
  8289|     this.callback = callback;
  8290|   }
  8291|   renderer_createClass(Renderer, [{
  8292|     key: "render",
  8293|     value: function render($parent) {
  8294|       var $node = external_jQuery_default()(this.markup);
  8295|       if (this.options && this.options.contents) {
  8296|         $node.html(this.options.contents);
  8297|       }
  8298|       if (this.options && this.options.className) {
  8299|         $node.addClass(this.options.className);
  8300|       }
  8301|       if (this.options && this.options.data) {
  8302|         external_jQuery_default().each(this.options.data, function (k, v) {
  8303|           $node.attr('data-' + k, v);
  8304|         });
  8305|       }

     1| /*!
     2|  *

     9|  *
    10|  * Date: 2021-10-14T21:15Z
    11|  *
    12|  */
    13| (function webpackUniversalModuleDefinition(root, factory) {
    14| 	if(typeof exports === 'object' && typeof module === 'object')
    15| 		module.exports = factory(require("jQuery"));
    16| 	else if(typeof define === 'function' && define.amd)

   274| /**
   275|  * returns whether font is installed or not.
   276|  *
   277|  * @param {String} fontName
   278|  * @return {Boolean}
   279|  */
   280| var genericFontFamilies = ['sans-serif', 'serif', 'monospace', 'cursive', 'fantasy'];
   281| function validFontName(fontName) {
   282|   return external_jQuery_default().inArray(fontName.toLowerCase(), genericFontFamilies) === -1 ? "'".concat(fontName, "'") : fontName;
   283| }
   284| function isFontInstalled(fontName) {
   285|   var testFontName = fontName === 'Comic Sans MS' ? 'Courier New' : 'Comic Sans MS';
   286|   var testText = 'mmmmmmmmmmwwwww';
   287|   var testSize = '200px';
   288|   var canvas = document.createElement('canvas');
   289|   var context = canvas.getContext('2d');
   290|   context.font = testSize + " '" + testFontName + "'";
   291|   var originalWidth = context.measureText(testText).width;
   292|   context.font = testSize + ' ' + validFontName(fontName) + ', "' + testFontName + '"';
   293|   var width = context.measureText(testText).width;
   294|   return originalWidth !== width;
   295| }
   296| var userAgent = navigator.userAgent;
   297| var isMSIE = /MSIE|Trident/i.test(userAgent);
   298| var browserVersion;
   299| if (isMSIE) {
   300|   var matches = /MSIE (\d+[.]\d+)/.exec(userAgent);
   301|   if (matches) {
   302|     browserVersion = parseFloat(matches[1]);
   303|   }
   304|   matches = /Trident\/.*rv:([0-9]{1,}[.0-9]{0,})/.exec(userAgent);
   305|   if (matches) {
   306|     browserVersion = parseFloat(matches[1]);
   307|   }
   308| }

   310| var isSupportTouch = 'ontouchstart' in window || navigator.MaxTouchPoints > 0 || navigator.msMaxTouchPoints > 0; // [workaround] IE doesn't have input events for contentEditable

   337| ;// CONCATENATED MODULE: ./src/js/core/func.js
   338| /**
   339|  * @class core.func
   340|  *
   341|  * func utils (for high-order func's arg)
   342|  *
   343|  * @singleton
   344|  * @alternateClassName func
   345|  */
   346| function eq(itemA) {
   347|   return function (itemB) {
   348|     return itemA === itemB;
   349|   };
   350| }
   351| function eq2(itemA, itemB) {
   352|   return itemA === itemB;
   353| }
   354| function peq2(propName) {
   355|   return function (itemA, itemB) {
   356|     return itemA[propName] === itemB[propName];
   357|   };
   358| }
   359| function ok() {
   360|   return true;
   361| }
   362| function fail() {
   363|   return false;
   364| }
   365| function not(f) {
   366|   return function () {
   367|     return !f.apply(f, arguments);
   368|   };
   369| }
   370| function and(fA, fB) {
   371|   return function (item) {
   372|     return fA(item) && fB(item);
   373|   };
   374| }
   375| function func_self(a) {
   376|   return a;
   377| }
   378| function invoke(obj, method) {
   379|   return function () {
   380|     return obj[method].apply(obj, arguments);
   381|   };
   382| }
   383| var idCounter = 0;
   384| /**
   385|  * reset globally-unique id
   386|  *
   387|  */
   388| function resetUniqueId() {
   389|   idCounter = 0;
   390| }
   391| /**
   392|  * generate a globally-unique id
   393|  *
   394|  * @param {String} [prefix]
   395|  */
   396| function uniqueId(prefix) {
   397|   var id = ++idCounter + '';
   398|   return prefix ? prefix + id : id;
   399| }
   400| /**
   401|  * returns bnd (bounds) from rect
   402|  *
   403|  * - IE Compatibility Issue: http://goo.gl/sRLOAo
   404|  * - Scroll Issue: http://goo.gl/sNjUc
   405|  *
   406|  * @param {Rect} rect
   407|  * @return {Object} bounds
   408|  * @return {Number} bounds.top
   409|  * @return {Number} bounds.left
   410|  * @return {Number} bounds.width
   411|  * @return {Number} bounds.height
   412|  */
   413| function rect2bnd(rect) {
   414|   var $document = external_jQuery_default()(document);
   415|   return {
   416|     top: rect.top + $document.scrollTop(),
   417|     left: rect.left + $document.scrollLeft(),
   418|     width: rect.right - rect.left,
   419|     height: rect.bottom - rect.top
   420|   };
   421| }
   422| /**
   423|  * returns a copy of the object where the keys have become the values and the values the keys.
   424|  * @param {Object} obj
   425|  * @return {Object}
   426|  */
   427| function invertObject(obj) {
   428|   var inverted = {};
   429|   for (var key in obj) {
   430|     if (Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(obj, key)) {
   431|       inverted[obj[key]] = key;
   432|     }
   433|   }
   434|   return inverted;
   435| }
   436| /**
   437|  * @param {String} namespace
   438|  * @param {String} [prefix]
   439|  * @return {String}
   440|  */
   441| function namespaceToCamel(namespace, prefix) {
   442|   prefix = prefix || '';
   443|   return prefix + namespace.split('.').map(function (name) {
   444|     return name.substring(0, 1).toUpperCase() + name.substring(1);
   445|   }).join('');
   446| }
   447| /**
   448|  * Returns a function, that, as long as it continues to be invoked, will not
   449|  * be triggered. The function will be called after it stops being called for
   450|  * N milliseconds. If `immediate` is passed, trigger the function on the
   451|  * leading edge, instead of the trailing.
   452|  * @param {Function} func
   453|  * @param {Number} wait
   454|  * @param {Boolean} immediate
   455|  * @return {Function}
   456|  */
   457| function debounce(func, wait, immediate) {
   458|   var timeout;
   459|   return function () {
   460|     var context = this;
   461|     var args = arguments;
   462|     var later = function later() {
   463|       timeout = null;
   464|       if (!immediate) {
   465|         func.apply(context, args);
   466|       }
   467|     };
   468|     var callNow = immediate && !timeout;
   469|     clearTimeout(timeout);
   470|     timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
   471|     if (callNow) {
   472|       func.apply(context, args);
   473|     }
   474|   };
   475| }
   476| /**
   477|  *
   478|  * @param {String} url
   479|  * @return {Boolean}
   480|  */
   481| function isValidUrl(url) {
   482|   var expression = /[-a-zA-Z0-9@:%._\+~#=]{2,256}\.[a-z]{2,6}\b([-a-zA-Z0-9@:%_\+.~#?&//=]*)/gi;
   483|   return expression.test(url);
   484| }

   486|   eq: eq,
   487|   eq2: eq2,
   488|   peq2: peq2,
   489|   ok: ok,
   490|   fail: fail,
   491|   self: func_self,
   492|   not: not,
   493|   and: and,
   494|   invoke: invoke,
   495|   resetUniqueId: resetUniqueId,
   496|   uniqueId: uniqueId,
   497|   rect2bnd: rect2bnd,
   498|   invertObject: invertObject,
   499|   namespaceToCamel: namespaceToCamel,
   500|   debounce: debounce,
   501|   isValidUrl: isValidUrl
   502| });
   503| ;// CONCATENATED MODULE: ./src/js/core/lists.js
   504| /**
   505|  * returns the first item of an array.
   506|  *
   507|  * @param {Array} array
   508|  */
   509| function head(array) {
   510|   return array[0];
   511| }
   512| /**
   513|  * returns the last item of an array.
   514|  *
   515|  * @param {Array} array
   516|  */
   517| function last(array) {
   518|   return array[array.length - 1];
   519| }
   520| /**
   521|  * returns everything but the last entry of the array.
   522|  *
   523|  * @param {Array} array
   524|  */
   525| function initial(array) {
   526|   return array.slice(0, array.length - 1);
   527| }
   528| /**
   529|  * returns the rest of the items in an array.
   530|  *
   531|  * @param {Array} array
   532|  */
   533| function tail(array) {
   534|   return array.slice(1);
   535| }
   536| /**
   537|  * returns item of array
   538|  */
   539| function find(array, pred) {
   540|   for (var idx = 0, len = array.length; idx < len; idx++) {
   541|     var item = array[idx];
   542|     if (pred(item)) {
   543|       return item;
   544|     }
   545|   }
   546| }
   547| /**
   548|  * returns true if all of the values in the array pass the predicate truth test.
   549|  */
   550| function lists_all(array, pred) {
   551|   for (var idx = 0, len = array.length; idx < len; idx++) {
   552|     if (!pred(array[idx])) {
   553|       return false;
   554|     }
   555|   }
   556|   return true;
   557| }
   558| /**
   559|  * returns true if the value is present in the list.
   560|  */
   561| function contains(array, item) {
   562|   if (array && array.length && item) {
   563|     if (array.indexOf) {
   564|       return array.indexOf(item) !== -1;
   565|     } else if (array.contains) {
   566|       return array.contains(item);
   567|     }
   568|   }
   569|   return false;
   570| }
   571| /**
   572|  * get sum from a list
   573|  *
   574|  * @param {Array} array - array
   575|  * @param {Function} fn - iterator
   576|  */
   577| function sum(array, fn) {
   578|   fn = fn || func.self;
   579|   return array.reduce(function (memo, v) {
   580|     return memo + fn(v);
   581|   }, 0);
   582| }
   583| /**
   584|  * returns a copy of the collection with array type.
   585|  * @param {Collection} collection - collection eg) node.childNodes, ...
   586|  */
   587| function from(collection) {
   588|   var result = [];
   589|   var length = collection.length;
   590|   var idx = -1;
   591|   while (++idx < length) {
   592|     result[idx] = collection[idx];
   593|   }
   594|   return result;
   595| }
   596| /**
   597|  * returns whether list is empty or not
   598|  */
   599| function isEmpty(array) {
   600|   return !array || !array.length;
   601| }
   602| /**
   603|  * cluster elements by predicate function.
   604|  *
   605|  * @param {Array} array - array
   606|  * @param {Function} fn - predicate function for cluster rule
   607|  * @param {Array[]}
   608|  */
   609| function clusterBy(array, fn) {
   610|   if (!array.length) {
   611|     return [];
   612|   }
   613|   var aTail = tail(array);
   614|   return aTail.reduce(function (memo, v) {
   615|     var aLast = last(memo);
   616|     if (fn(last(aLast), v)) {
   617|       aLast[aLast.length] = v;
   618|     } else {
   619|       memo[memo.length] = [v];
   620|     }
   621|     return memo;
   622|   }, [[head(array)]]);
   623| }
   624| /**
   625|  * returns a copy of the array with all false values removed
   626|  *
   627|  * @param {Array} array - array
   628|  * @param {Function} fn - predicate function for cluster rule
   629|  */
   630| function compact(array) {
   631|   var aResult = [];
   632|   for (var idx = 0, len = array.length; idx < len; idx++) {
   633|     if (array[idx]) {
   634|       aResult.push(array[idx]);
   635|     }
   636|   }
   637|   return aResult;
   638| }
   639| /**
   640|  * produces a duplicate-free version of the array
   641|  *
   642|  * @param {Array} array
   643|  */
   644| function unique(array) {
   645|   var results = [];
   646|   for (var idx = 0, len = array.length; idx < len; idx++) {
   647|     if (!contains(results, array[idx])) {
   648|       results.push(array[idx]);
   649|     }
   650|   }
   651|   return results;
   652| }
   653| /**
   654|  * returns next item.
   655|  * @param {Array} array
   656|  */
   657| function next(array, item) {
   658|   if (array && array.length && item) {
   659|     var idx = array.indexOf(item);
   660|     return idx === -1 ? null : array[idx + 1];
   661|   }
   662|   return null;
   663| }
   664| /**
   665|  * returns prev item.
   666|  * @param {Array} array
   667|  */
   668| function prev(array, item) {
   669|   if (array && array.length && item) {
   670|     var idx = array.indexOf(item);
   671|     return idx === -1 ? null : array[idx - 1];
   672|   }
   673|   return null;
   674| }
   675| /**
   676|  * @class core.list
   677|  *
   678|  * list utils
   679|  *
   680|  * @singleton
   681|  * @alternateClassName list
   682|  */
   683| /* harmony default export */ const lists = ({
   684|   head: head,
   685|   last: last,
   686|   initial: initial,
   687|   tail: tail,
   688|   prev: prev,
   689|   next: next,
   690|   find: find,
   691|   contains: contains,
   692|   all: lists_all,
   693|   sum: sum,
   694|   from: from,
   695|   isEmpty: isEmpty,
   696|   clusterBy: clusterBy,
   697|   compact: compact,
   698|   unique: unique
   699| });
   700| ;// CONCATENATED MODULE: ./src/js/core/dom.js
   701| var NBSP_CHAR = String.fromCharCode(160);
   702| var ZERO_WIDTH_NBSP_CHAR = "\uFEFF";
   703| /**
   704|  * @method isEditable
   705|  *
   706|  * returns whether node is `note-editable` or not.
   707|  *
   708|  * @param {Node} node
   709|  * @return {Boolean}
   710|  */
   711| function isEditable(node) {
   712|   return node && external_jQuery_default()(node).hasClass('note-editable');
   713| }
   714| /**
   715|  * @method isControlSizing
   716|  *
   717|  * returns whether node is `note-control-sizing` or not.
   718|  *
   719|  * @param {Node} node
   720|  * @return {Boolean}
   721|  */
   722| function isControlSizing(node) {
   723|   return node && external_jQuery_default()(node).hasClass('note-control-sizing');
   724| }
   725| /**
   726|  * @method makePredByNodeName
   727|  *
   728|  * returns predicate which judge whether nodeName is same
   729|  *
   730|  * @param {String} nodeName
   731|  * @return {Function}
   732|  */
   733| function makePredByNodeName(nodeName) {
   734|   nodeName = nodeName.toUpperCase();
   735|   return function (node) {
   736|     return node && node.nodeName.toUpperCase() === nodeName;
   737|   };
   738| }
   739| /**
   740|  * @method isText
   741|  *
   742|  *
   743|  *
   744|  * @param {Node} node
   745|  * @return {Boolean} true if node's type is text(3)
   746|  */
   747| function isText(node) {
   748|   return node && node.nodeType === 3;
   749| }
   750| /**
   751|  * @method isElement
   752|  *
   753|  *
   754|  *
   755|  * @param {Node} node
   756|  * @return {Boolean} true if node's type is element(1)
   757|  */
   758| function isElement(node) {
   759|   return node && node.nodeType === 1;
   760| }
   761| /**
   762|  * ex) br, col, embed, hr, img, input, ...
   763|  * @see http://www.w3.org/html/wg/drafts/html/master/syntax.html#void-elements
   764|  */
   765| function isVoid(node) {
   766|   return node && /^BR|^IMG|^HR|^IFRAME|^BUTTON|^INPUT|^AUDIO|^VIDEO|^EMBED/.test(node.nodeName.toUpperCase());
   767| }
   768| function isPara(node) {
   769|   if (isEditable(node)) {
   770|     return false;
   771|   } // Chrome(v31.0), FF(v25.0.1) use DIV for paragraph
   772|   return node && /^DIV|^P|^LI|^H[1-7]/.test(node.nodeName.toUpperCase());
   773| }
   774| function isHeading(node) {
   775|   return node && /^H[1-7]/.test(node.nodeName.toUpperCase());
   776| }
   777| var isPre = makePredByNodeName('PRE');
   778| var isLi = makePredByNodeName('LI');
   779| function isPurePara(node) {
   780|   return isPara(node) && !isLi(node);
   781| }
   782| var isTable = makePredByNodeName('TABLE');
   783| var isData = makePredByNodeName('DATA');
   784| function isInline(node) {
   785|   return !isBodyContainer(node) && !isList(node) && !isHr(node) && !isPara(node) && !isTable(node) && !isBlockquote(node) && !isData(node);
   786| }
   787| function isList(node) {
   788|   return node && /^UL|^OL/.test(node.nodeName.toUpperCase());
   789| }
   790| var isHr = makePredByNodeName('HR');
   791| function isCell(node) {
   792|   return node && /^TD|^TH/.test(node.nodeName.toUpperCase());
   793| }
   794| var isBlockquote = makePredByNodeName('BLOCKQUOTE');
   795| function isBodyContainer(node) {
   796|   return isCell(node) || isBlockquote(node) || isEditable(node);
   797| }
   798| var isAnchor = makePredByNodeName('A');
   799| function isParaInline(node) {
   800|   return isInline(node) && !!ancestor(node, isPara);
   801| }
   802| function isBodyInline(node) {
   803|   return isInline(node) && !ancestor(node, isPara);
   804| }
   805| var isBody = makePredByNodeName('BODY');
   806| /**
   807|  * returns whether nodeB is closest sibling of nodeA
   808|  *
   809|  * @param {Node} nodeA
   810|  * @param {Node} nodeB
   811|  * @return {Boolean}
   812|  */
   813| function isClosestSibling(nodeA, nodeB) {
   814|   return nodeA.nextSibling === nodeB || nodeA.previousSibling === nodeB;
   815| }
   816| /**
   817|  * returns array of closest siblings with node
   818|  *
   819|  * @param {Node} node
   820|  * @param {function} [pred] - predicate function
   821|  * @return {Node[]}
   822|  */
   823| function withClosestSiblings(node, pred) {
   824|   pred = pred || func.ok;
   825|   var siblings = [];
   826|   if (node.previousSibling && pred(node.previousSibling)) {
   827|     siblings.push(node.previousSibling);
   828|   }
   829|   siblings.push(node);
   830|   if (node.nextSibling && pred(node.nextSibling)) {
   831|     siblings.push(node.nextSibling);
   832|   }
   833|   return siblings;
   834| }
   835| /**
   836|  * blank HTML for cursor position
   837|  * - [workaround] old IE only works with &nbsp;
   838|  * - [workaround] IE11 and other browser works with bogus br
   839|  */
   840| var blankHTML = env.isMSIE && env.browserVersion < 11 ? '&nbsp;' : '<br>';
   841| /**
   842|  * @method nodeLength
   843|  *
   844|  * returns #text's text size or element's childNodes size
   845|  *
   846|  * @param {Node} node
   847|  */
   848| function nodeLength(node) {
   849|   if (isText(node)) {
   850|     return node.nodeValue.length;
   851|   }
   852|   if (node) {
   853|     return node.childNodes.length;
   854|   }
   855|   return 0;
   856| }
   857| /**
   858|  * returns whether deepest child node is empty or not.
   859|  *
   860|  * @param {Node} node
   861|  * @return {Boolean}
   862|  */
   863| function deepestChildIsEmpty(node) {
   864|   do {
   865|     if (node.firstElementChild === null || node.firstElementChild.innerHTML === '') break;
   866|   } while (node = node.firstElementChild);
   867|   return dom_isEmpty(node);
   868| }
   869| /**
   870|  * returns whether node is empty or not.
   871|  *
   872|  * @param {Node} node
   873|  * @return {Boolean}
   874|  */
   875| function dom_isEmpty(node) {
   876|   var len = nodeLength(node);
   877|   if (len === 0) {
   878|     return true;
   879|   } else if (!isText(node) && len === 1 && node.innerHTML === blankHTML) {
   880|     return true;
   881|   } else if (lists.all(node.childNodes, isText) && node.innerHTML === '') {
   882|     return true;
   883|   }
   884|   return false;
   885| }
   886| /**
   887|  * padding blankHTML if node is empty (for cursor position)
   888|  */
   889| function paddingBlankHTML(node) {
   890|   if (!isVoid(node) && !nodeLength(node)) {
   891|     node.innerHTML = blankHTML;
   892|   }
   893| }
   894| /**
   895|  * find nearest ancestor predicate hit
   896|  *
   897|  * @param {Node} node
   898|  * @param {Function} pred - predicate function
   899|  */
   900| function ancestor(node, pred) {
   901|   while (node) {
   902|     if (pred(node)) {
   903|       return node;
   904|     }
   905|     if (isEditable(node)) {
   906|       break;
   907|     }
   908|     node = node.parentNode;
   909|   }
   910|   return null;
   911| }
   912| /**
   913|  * find nearest ancestor only single child blood line and predicate hit
   914|  *
   915|  * @param {Node} node
   916|  * @param {Function} pred - predicate function
   917|  */
   918| function singleChildAncestor(node, pred) {
   919|   node = node.parentNode;
   920|   while (node) {
   921|     if (nodeLength(node) !== 1) {
   922|       break;
   923|     }
   924|     if (pred(node)) {
   925|       return node;
   926|     }
   927|     if (isEditable(node)) {
   928|       break;
   929|     }
   930|     node = node.parentNode;
   931|   }
   932|   return null;
   933| }
   934| /**
   935|  * returns new array of ancestor nodes (until predicate hit).
   936|  *
   937|  * @param {Node} node
   938|  * @param {Function} [optional] pred - predicate function
   939|  */
   940| function listAncestor(node, pred) {
   941|   pred = pred || func.fail;
   942|   var ancestors = [];
   943|   ancestor(node, function (el) {
   944|     if (!isEditable(el)) {
   945|       ancestors.push(el);
   946|     }
   947|     return pred(el);
   948|   });
   949|   return ancestors;
   950| }
   951| /**
   952|  * find farthest ancestor predicate hit
   953|  */
   954| function lastAncestor(node, pred) {
   955|   var ancestors = listAncestor(node);
   956|   return lists.last(ancestors.filter(pred));
   957| }
   958| /**
   959|  * returns common ancestor node between two nodes.
   960|  *
   961|  * @param {Node} nodeA
   962|  * @param {Node} nodeB
   963|  */
   964| function commonAncestor(nodeA, nodeB) {
   965|   var ancestors = listAncestor(nodeA);
   966|   for (var n = nodeB; n; n = n.parentNode) {
   967|     if (ancestors.indexOf(n) > -1) return n;
   968|   }
   969|   return null; // difference document area
   970| }
   971| /**
   972|  * listing all previous siblings (until predicate hit).
   973|  *
   974|  * @param {Node} node
   975|  * @param {Function} [optional] pred - predicate function
   976|  */
   977| function listPrev(node, pred) {
   978|   pred = pred || func.fail;
   979|   var nodes = [];
   980|   while (node) {
   981|     if (pred(node)) {
   982|       break;
   983|     }
   984|     nodes.push(node);
   985|     node = node.previousSibling;
   986|   }
   987|   return nodes;
   988| }
   989| /**
   990|  * listing next siblings (until predicate hit).
   991|  *
   992|  * @param {Node} node
   993|  * @param {Function} [pred] - predicate function
   994|  */
   995| function listNext(node, pred) {
   996|   pred = pred || func.fail;
   997|   var nodes = [];
   998|   while (node) {
   999|     if (pred(node)) {
  1000|       break;
  1001|     }
  1002|     nodes.push(node);
  1003|     node = node.nextSibling;
  1004|   }
  1005|   return nodes;
  1006| }
  1007| /**
  1008|  * listing descendant nodes
  1009|  *
  1010|  * @param {Node} node
  1011|  * @param {Function} [pred] - predicate function
  1012|  */
  1013| function listDescendant(node, pred) {
  1014|   var descendants = [];
  1015|   pred = pred || func.ok; // start DFS(depth first search) with node
  1016|   (function fnWalk(current) {
  1017|     if (node !== current && pred(current)) {
  1018|       descendants.push(current);
  1019|     }
  1020|     for (var idx = 0, len = current.childNodes.length; idx < len; idx++) {
  1021|       fnWalk(current.childNodes[idx]);
  1022|     }
  1023|   })(node);
  1024|   return descendants;
  1025| }
  1026| /**
  1027|  * wrap node with new tag.
  1028|  *
  1029|  * @param {Node} node
  1030|  * @param {Node} tagName of wrapper
  1031|  * @return {Node} - wrapper
  1032|  */
  1033| function wrap(node, wrapperName) {
  1034|   var parent = node.parentNode;
  1035|   var wrapper = external_jQuery_default()('<' + wrapperName + '>')[0];
  1036|   parent.insertBefore(wrapper, node);
  1037|   wrapper.appendChild(node);
  1038|   return wrapper;
  1039| }
  1040| /**
  1041|  * insert node after preceding
  1042|  *
  1043|  * @param {Node} node
  1044|  * @param {Node} preceding - predicate function
  1045|  */
  1046| function insertAfter(node, preceding) {
  1047|   var next = preceding.nextSibling;
  1048|   var parent = preceding.parentNode;
  1049|   if (next) {
  1050|     parent.insertBefore(node, next);
  1051|   } else {
  1052|     parent.appendChild(node);
  1053|   }
  1054|   return node;
  1055| }
  1056| /**
  1057|  * append elements.
  1058|  *
  1059|  * @param {Node} node
  1060|  * @param {Collection} aChild
  1061|  */
  1062| function appendChildNodes(node, aChild) {
  1063|   external_jQuery_default().each(aChild, function (idx, child) {
  1064|     node.appendChild(child);
  1065|   });
  1066|   return node;
  1067| }
  1068| /**
  1069|  * returns whether boundaryPoint is left edge or not.
  1070|  *
  1071|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1072|  * @return {Boolean}
  1073|  */
  1074| function isLeftEdgePoint(point) {
  1075|   return point.offset === 0;
  1076| }
  1077| /**
  1078|  * returns whether boundaryPoint is right edge or not.
  1079|  *
  1080|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1081|  * @return {Boolean}
  1082|  */
  1083| function isRightEdgePoint(point) {
  1084|   return point.offset === nodeLength(point.node);
  1085| }
  1086| /**
  1087|  * returns whether boundaryPoint is edge or not.
  1088|  *
  1089|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1090|  * @return {Boolean}
  1091|  */
  1092| function isEdgePoint(point) {
  1093|   return isLeftEdgePoint(point) || isRightEdgePoint(point);
  1094| }
  1095| /**
  1096|  * returns whether node is left edge of ancestor or not.
  1097|  *
  1098|  * @param {Node} node
  1099|  * @param {Node} ancestor
  1100|  * @return {Boolean}
  1101|  */
  1102| function isLeftEdgeOf(node, ancestor) {
  1103|   while (node && node !== ancestor) {
  1104|     if (position(node) !== 0) {
  1105|       return false;
  1106|     }
  1107|     node = node.parentNode;
  1108|   }
  1109|   return true;
  1110| }
  1111| /**
  1112|  * returns whether node is right edge of ancestor or not.
  1113|  *
  1114|  * @param {Node} node
  1115|  * @param {Node} ancestor
  1116|  * @return {Boolean}
  1117|  */
  1118| function isRightEdgeOf(node, ancestor) {
  1119|   if (!ancestor) {
  1120|     return false;
  1121|   }
  1122|   while (node && node !== ancestor) {
  1123|     if (position(node) !== nodeLength(node.parentNode) - 1) {
  1124|       return false;
  1125|     }
  1126|     node = node.parentNode;
  1127|   }
  1128|   return true;
  1129| }
  1130| /**
  1131|  * returns whether point is left edge of ancestor or not.
  1132|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1133|  * @param {Node} ancestor
  1134|  * @return {Boolean}
  1135|  */
  1136| function isLeftEdgePointOf(point, ancestor) {
  1137|   return isLeftEdgePoint(point) && isLeftEdgeOf(point.node, ancestor);
  1138| }
  1139| /**
  1140|  * returns whether point is right edge of ancestor or not.
  1141|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1142|  * @param {Node} ancestor
  1143|  * @return {Boolean}
  1144|  */
  1145| function isRightEdgePointOf(point, ancestor) {
  1146|   return isRightEdgePoint(point) && isRightEdgeOf(point.node, ancestor);
  1147| }
  1148| /**
  1149|  * returns offset from parent.
  1150|  *
  1151|  * @param {Node} node
  1152|  */
  1153| function position(node) {
  1154|   var offset = 0;
  1155|   while (node = node.previousSibling) {
  1156|     offset += 1;
  1157|   }
  1158|   return offset;
  1159| }
  1160| function hasChildren(node) {
  1161|   return !!(node && node.childNodes && node.childNodes.length);
  1162| }
  1163| /**
  1164|  * returns previous boundaryPoint
  1165|  *
  1166|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1167|  * @param {Boolean} isSkipInnerOffset
  1168|  * @return {BoundaryPoint}
  1169|  */
  1170| function prevPoint(point, isSkipInnerOffset) {
  1171|   var node;
  1172|   var offset;
  1173|   if (point.offset === 0) {
  1174|     if (isEditable(point.node)) {
  1175|       return null;
  1176|     }
  1177|     node = point.node.parentNode;
  1178|     offset = position(point.node);
  1179|   } else if (hasChildren(point.node)) {
  1180|     node = point.node.childNodes[point.offset - 1];
  1181|     offset = nodeLength(node);
  1182|   } else {
  1183|     node = point.node;
  1184|     offset = isSkipInnerOffset ? 0 : point.offset - 1;
  1185|   }
  1186|   return {
  1187|     node: node,
  1188|     offset: offset
  1189|   };
  1190| }
  1191| /**
  1192|  * returns next boundaryPoint
  1193|  *
  1194|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1195|  * @param {Boolean} isSkipInnerOffset
  1196|  * @return {BoundaryPoint}
  1197|  */
  1198| function nextPoint(point, isSkipInnerOffset) {
  1199|   var node, offset;
  1200|   if (nodeLength(point.node) === point.offset) {
  1201|     if (isEditable(point.node)) {
  1202|       return null;
  1203|     }
  1204|     var nextTextNode = getNextTextNode(point.node);
  1205|     if (nextTextNode) {
  1206|       node = nextTextNode;
  1207|       offset = 0;
  1208|     } else {
  1209|       node = point.node.parentNode;
  1210|       offset = position(point.node) + 1;
  1211|     }
  1212|   } else if (hasChildren(point.node)) {
  1213|     node = point.node.childNodes[point.offset];
  1214|     offset = 0;
  1215|   } else {
  1216|     node = point.node;
  1217|     offset = isSkipInnerOffset ? nodeLength(point.node) : point.offset + 1;
  1218|   }
  1219|   return {
  1220|     node: node,
  1221|     offset: offset
  1222|   };
  1223| }
  1224| /**
  1225|  * returns next boundaryPoint with empty node
  1226|  *
  1227|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1228|  * @param {Boolean} isSkipInnerOffset
  1229|  * @return {BoundaryPoint}
  1230|  */
  1231| function nextPointWithEmptyNode(point, isSkipInnerOffset) {
  1232|   var node,
  1233|       offset = 0; // if node is empty string node, return current node's sibling.
  1234|   if (dom_isEmpty(point.node)) {
  1235|     if (point.node === null) {
  1236|       return null;
  1237|     }
  1238|     node = point.node.nextSibling;
  1239|     offset = 0;
  1240|     return {
  1241|       node: node,
  1242|       offset: offset
  1243|     };
  1244|   }
  1245|   if (nodeLength(point.node) === point.offset) {
  1246|     if (isEditable(point.node)) {
  1247|       return null;
  1248|     }
  1249|     node = point.node.parentNode;
  1250|     offset = position(point.node) + 1; // if next node is editable ,  return current node's sibling node.
  1251|     if (isEditable(node)) {
  1252|       node = point.node.nextSibling;
  1253|       offset = 0;
  1254|     }
  1255|   } else if (hasChildren(point.node)) {
  1256|     node = point.node.childNodes[point.offset];
  1257|     offset = 0;
  1258|     if (dom_isEmpty(node)) {
  1259|       if (!dom_isEmpty(point.node.nextSibling)) {
  1260|         return {
  1261|           node: point.node.nextSibling,
  1262|           offset: offset
  1263|         };
  1264|       }
  1265|       return null;
  1266|     }
  1267|   } else {
  1268|     node = point.node;
  1269|     offset = isSkipInnerOffset ? nodeLength(point.node) : point.offset + 1;
  1270|     if (dom_isEmpty(node)) {
  1271|       return null;
  1272|     }
  1273|   }
  1274|   return {
  1275|     node: node,
  1276|     offset: offset
  1277|   };
  1278| }
  1279| /*
  1280| * returns the next Text node index or 0 if not found.
  1281| */
  1282| function getNextTextNode(actual) {
  1283|   if (!actual.nextSibling) return undefined;
  1284|   if (actual.parent !== actual.nextSibling.parent) return undefined;
  1285|   if (isText(actual.nextSibling)) return actual.nextSibling;else return getNextTextNode(actual.nextSibling);
  1286| }
  1287| /**
  1288|  * returns whether pointA and pointB is same or not.
  1289|  *
  1290|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} pointA
  1291|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} pointB
  1292|  * @return {Boolean}
  1293|  */
  1294| function isSamePoint(pointA, pointB) {
  1295|   return pointA.node === pointB.node && pointA.offset === pointB.offset;
  1296| }
  1297| /**
  1298|  * returns whether point is visible (can set cursor) or not.
  1299|  *
  1300|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1301|  * @return {Boolean}
  1302|  */
  1303| function isVisiblePoint(point) {
  1304|   if (isText(point.node) || !hasChildren(point.node) || dom_isEmpty(point.node)) {
  1305|     return true;
  1306|   }
  1307|   var leftNode = point.node.childNodes[point.offset - 1];
  1308|   var rightNode = point.node.childNodes[point.offset];
  1309|   if ((!leftNode || isVoid(leftNode)) && (!rightNode || isVoid(rightNode)) || isTable(rightNode)) {
  1310|     return true;
  1311|   }
  1312|   return false;
  1313| }
  1314| /**
  1315|  * @method prevPointUtil
  1316|  *
  1317|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1318|  * @param {Function} pred
  1319|  * @return {BoundaryPoint}
  1320|  */
  1321| function prevPointUntil(point, pred) {
  1322|   while (point) {
  1323|     if (pred(point)) {
  1324|       return point;
  1325|     }
  1326|     point = prevPoint(point);
  1327|   }
  1328|   return null;
  1329| }
  1330| /**
  1331|  * @method nextPointUntil
  1332|  *
  1333|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1334|  * @param {Function} pred
  1335|  * @return {BoundaryPoint}
  1336|  */
  1337| function nextPointUntil(point, pred) {
  1338|   while (point) {
  1339|     if (pred(point)) {
  1340|       return point;
  1341|     }
  1342|     point = nextPoint(point);
  1343|   }
  1344|   return null;
  1345| }
  1346| /**
  1347|  * returns whether point has character or not.
  1348|  *
  1349|  * @param {Point} point
  1350|  * @return {Boolean}
  1351|  */
  1352| function isCharPoint(point) {
  1353|   if (!isText(point.node)) {
  1354|     return false;
  1355|   }
  1356|   var ch = point.node.nodeValue.charAt(point.offset - 1);
  1357|   return ch && ch !== ' ' && ch !== NBSP_CHAR;
  1358| }
  1359| /**
  1360|  * returns whether point has space or not.
  1361|  *
  1362|  * @param {Point} point
  1363|  * @return {Boolean}
  1364|  */
  1365| function isSpacePoint(point) {
  1366|   if (!isText(point.node)) {
  1367|     return false;
  1368|   }
  1369|   var ch = point.node.nodeValue.charAt(point.offset - 1);
  1370|   return ch === ' ' || ch === NBSP_CHAR;
  1371| }
  1372| /**
  1373|  * @method walkPoint
  1374|  *
  1375|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} startPoint
  1376|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} endPoint
  1377|  * @param {Function} handler
  1378|  * @param {Boolean} isSkipInnerOffset
  1379|  */
  1380| function walkPoint(startPoint, endPoint, handler, isSkipInnerOffset) {
  1381|   var point = startPoint;
  1382|   while (point) {
  1383|     handler(point);
  1384|     if (isSamePoint(point, endPoint)) {
  1385|       break;
  1386|     }
  1387|     var isSkipOffset = isSkipInnerOffset && startPoint.node !== point.node && endPoint.node !== point.node;
  1388|     point = nextPointWithEmptyNode(point, isSkipOffset);
  1389|   }
  1390| }
  1391| /**
  1392|  * @method makeOffsetPath
  1393|  *
  1394|  * return offsetPath(array of offset) from ancestor
  1395|  *
  1396|  * @param {Node} ancestor - ancestor node
  1397|  * @param {Node} node
  1398|  */
  1399| function makeOffsetPath(ancestor, node) {
  1400|   var ancestors = listAncestor(node, func.eq(ancestor));
  1401|   return ancestors.map(position).reverse();
  1402| }
  1403| /**
  1404|  * @method fromOffsetPath
  1405|  *
  1406|  * return element from offsetPath(array of offset)
  1407|  *
  1408|  * @param {Node} ancestor - ancestor node
  1409|  * @param {array} offsets - offsetPath
  1410|  */
  1411| function fromOffsetPath(ancestor, offsets) {
  1412|   var current = ancestor;
  1413|   for (var i = 0, len = offsets.length; i < len; i++) {
  1414|     if (current.childNodes.length <= offsets[i]) {
  1415|       current = current.childNodes[current.childNodes.length - 1];
  1416|     } else {
  1417|       current = current.childNodes[offsets[i]];
  1418|     }
  1419|   }
  1420|   return current;
  1421| }
  1422| /**
  1423|  * @method splitNode
  1424|  *
  1425|  * split element or #text
  1426|  *
  1427|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1428|  * @param {Object} [options]
  1429|  * @param {Boolean} [options.isSkipPaddingBlankHTML] - default: false
  1430|  * @param {Boolean} [options.isNotSplitEdgePoint] - default: false
  1431|  * @param {Boolean} [options.isDiscardEmptySplits] - default: false
  1432|  * @return {Node} right node of boundaryPoint
  1433|  */
  1434| function splitNode(point, options) {
  1435|   var isSkipPaddingBlankHTML = options && options.isSkipPaddingBlankHTML;
  1436|   var isNotSplitEdgePoint = options && options.isNotSplitEdgePoint;
  1437|   var isDiscardEmptySplits = options && options.isDiscardEmptySplits;
  1438|   if (isDiscardEmptySplits) {
  1439|     isSkipPaddingBlankHTML = true;
  1440|   } // edge case
  1441|   if (isEdgePoint(point) && (isText(point.node) || isNotSplitEdgePoint)) {
  1442|     if (isLeftEdgePoint(point)) {
  1443|       return point.node;
  1444|     } else if (isRightEdgePoint(point)) {
  1445|       return point.node.nextSibling;
  1446|     }
  1447|   } // split #text
  1448|   if (isText(point.node)) {
  1449|     return point.node.splitText(point.offset);
  1450|   } else {
  1451|     var childNode = point.node.childNodes[point.offset];
  1452|     var clone = insertAfter(point.node.cloneNode(false), point.node);
  1453|     appendChildNodes(clone, listNext(childNode));
  1454|     if (!isSkipPaddingBlankHTML) {
  1455|       paddingBlankHTML(point.node);
  1456|       paddingBlankHTML(clone);
  1457|     }
  1458|     if (isDiscardEmptySplits) {
  1459|       if (dom_isEmpty(point.node)) {
  1460|         remove(point.node);
  1461|       }
  1462|       if (dom_isEmpty(clone)) {
  1463|         remove(clone);
  1464|         return point.node.nextSibling;
  1465|       }
  1466|     }
  1467|     return clone;
  1468|   }
  1469| }
  1470| /**
  1471|  * @method splitTree
  1472|  *
  1473|  * split tree by point
  1474|  *
  1475|  * @param {Node} root - split root
  1476|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1477|  * @param {Object} [options]
  1478|  * @param {Boolean} [options.isSkipPaddingBlankHTML] - default: false
  1479|  * @param {Boolean} [options.isNotSplitEdgePoint] - default: false
  1480|  * @return {Node} right node of boundaryPoint
  1481|  */
  1482| function splitTree(root, point, options) {
  1483|   var ancestors = listAncestor(point.node, func.eq(root));
  1484|   if (!ancestors.length) {
  1485|     return null;
  1486|   } else if (ancestors.length === 1) {
  1487|     return splitNode(point, options);
  1488|   }
  1489|   return ancestors.reduce(function (node, parent) {
  1490|     if (node === point.node) {
  1491|       node = splitNode(point, options);
  1492|     }
  1493|     return splitNode({
  1494|       node: parent,
  1495|       offset: node ? position(node) : nodeLength(parent)
  1496|     }, options);
  1497|   });
  1498| }
  1499| /**
  1500|  * split point
  1501|  *
  1502|  * @param {Point} point
  1503|  * @param {Boolean} isInline
  1504|  * @return {Object}
  1505|  */
  1506| function splitPoint(point, isInline) {
  1507|   var pred = isInline ? isPara : isBodyContainer;
  1508|   var ancestors = listAncestor(point.node, pred);
  1509|   var topAncestor = lists.last(ancestors) || point.node;
  1510|   var splitRoot, container;
  1511|   if (pred(topAncestor)) {
  1512|     splitRoot = ancestors[ancestors.length - 2];
  1513|     container = topAncestor;
  1514|   } else {
  1515|     splitRoot = topAncestor;
  1516|     container = splitRoot.parentNode;
  1517|   } // if splitRoot is exists, split with splitTree
  1518|   var pivot = splitRoot && splitTree(splitRoot, point, {
  1519|     isSkipPaddingBlankHTML: isInline,
  1520|     isNotSplitEdgePoint: isInline
  1521|   }); // if container is point.node, find pivot with point.offset
  1522|   if (!pivot && container === point.node) {
  1523|     pivot = point.node.childNodes[point.offset];
  1524|   }
  1525|   return {
  1526|     rightNode: pivot,
  1527|     container: container
  1528|   };
  1529| }
  1530| function create(nodeName) {
  1531|   return document.createElement(nodeName);
  1532| }
  1533| function createText(text) {
  1534|   return document.createTextNode(text);
  1535| }
  1536| /**
  1537|  * @method remove
  1538|  *
  1539|  * remove node, (isRemoveChild: remove child or not)
  1540|  *
  1541|  * @param {Node} node
  1542|  * @param {Boolean} isRemoveChild
  1543|  */
  1544| function remove(node, isRemoveChild) {
  1545|   if (!node || !node.parentNode) {
  1546|     return;
  1547|   }
  1548|   if (node.removeNode) {
  1549|     return node.removeNode(isRemoveChild);
  1550|   }
  1551|   var parent = node.parentNode;
  1552|   if (!isRemoveChild) {
  1553|     var nodes = [];
  1554|     for (var i = 0, len = node.childNodes.length; i < len; i++) {
  1555|       nodes.push(node.childNodes[i]);
  1556|     }
  1557|     for (var _i = 0, _len = nodes.length; _i < _len; _i++) {
  1558|       parent.insertBefore(nodes[_i], node);
  1559|     }
  1560|   }
  1561|   parent.removeChild(node);
  1562| }
  1563| /**
  1564|  * @method removeWhile
  1565|  *
  1566|  * @param {Node} node
  1567|  * @param {Function} pred
  1568|  */
  1569| function removeWhile(node, pred) {
  1570|   while (node) {
  1571|     if (isEditable(node) || !pred(node)) {
  1572|       break;
  1573|     }
  1574|     var parent = node.parentNode;
  1575|     remove(node);
  1576|     node = parent;
  1577|   }
  1578| }
  1579| /**
  1580|  * @method replace
  1581|  *
  1582|  * replace node with provided nodeName
  1583|  *
  1584|  * @param {Node} node
  1585|  * @param {String} nodeName
  1586|  * @return {Node} - new node
  1587|  */
  1588| function replace(node, nodeName) {
  1589|   if (node.nodeName.toUpperCase() === nodeName.toUpperCase()) {
  1590|     return node;
  1591|   }
  1592|   var newNode = create(nodeName);
  1593|   if (node.style.cssText) {
  1594|     newNode.style.cssText = node.style.cssText;
  1595|   }
  1596|   appendChildNodes(newNode, lists.from(node.childNodes));
  1597|   insertAfter(newNode, node);
  1598|   remove(node);
  1599|   return newNode;
  1600| }
  1601| var isTextarea = makePredByNodeName('TEXTAREA');
  1602| /**
  1603|  * @param {jQuery} $node
  1604|  * @param {Boolean} [stripLinebreaks] - default: false
  1605|  */
  1606| function value($node, stripLinebreaks) {
  1607|   var val = isTextarea($node[0]) ? $node.val() : $node.html();
  1608|   if (stripLinebreaks) {
  1609|     return val.replace(/[\n\r]/g, '');
  1610|   }
  1611|   return val;
  1612| }
  1613| /**
  1614|  * @method html
  1615|  *
  1616|  * get the HTML contents of node
  1617|  *
  1618|  * @param {jQuery} $node
  1619|  * @param {Boolean} [isNewlineOnBlock]
  1620|  */
  1621| function html($node, isNewlineOnBlock) {
  1622|   var markup = value($node);
  1623|   if (isNewlineOnBlock) {
  1624|     var regexTag = /<(\/?)(\b(?!!)[^>\s]*)(.*?)(\s*\/?>)/g;
  1625|     markup = markup.replace(regexTag, function (match, endSlash, name) {
  1626|       name = name.toUpperCase();
  1627|       var isEndOfInlineContainer = /^DIV|^TD|^TH|^P|^LI|^H[1-7]/.test(name) && !!endSlash;
  1628|       var isBlockNode = /^BLOCKQUOTE|^TABLE|^TBODY|^TR|^HR|^UL|^OL/.test(name);
  1629|       return match + (isEndOfInlineContainer || isBlockNode ? '\n' : '');
  1630|     });
  1631|     markup = markup.trim();
  1632|   }
  1633|   return markup;
  1634| }
  1635| function posFromPlaceholder(placeholder) {
  1636|   var $placeholder = external_jQuery_default()(placeholder);
  1637|   var pos = $placeholder.offset();
  1638|   var height = $placeholder.outerHeight(true); // include margin
  1639|   return {
  1640|     left: pos.left,
  1641|     top: pos.top + height
  1642|   };
  1643| }
  1644| function attachEvents($node, events) {
  1645|   Object.keys(events).forEach(function (key) {
  1646|     $node.on(key, events[key]);
  1647|   });
  1648| }
  1649| function detachEvents($node, events) {
  1650|   Object.keys(events).forEach(function (key) {
  1651|     $node.off(key, events[key]);
  1652|   });
  1653| }
  1654| /**
  1655|  * @method isCustomStyleTag
  1656|  *
  1657|  * assert if a node contains a "note-styletag" class,
  1658|  * which implies that's a custom-made style tag node
  1659|  *
  1660|  * @param {Node} an HTML DOM node
  1661|  */
  1662| function isCustomStyleTag(node) {
  1663|   return node && !isText(node) && lists.contains(node.classList, 'note-styletag');
  1664| }

  1759| function _classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError("Cannot call a class as a function"); } }
  1760| function _defineProperties(target, props) { for (var i = 0; i < props.length; i++) { var descriptor = props[i]; descriptor.enumerable = descriptor.enumerable || false; descriptor.configurable = true; if ("value" in descriptor) descriptor.writable = true; Object.defineProperty(target, descriptor.key, descriptor); } }
  1761| function _createClass(Constructor, protoProps, staticProps) { if (protoProps) _defineProperties(Constructor.prototype, protoProps); if (staticProps) _defineProperties(Constructor, staticProps); return Constructor; }

  1815|     value: function _initialize() {

  1821|         _this.memo('button.' + key, buttons[key]);

  1823|       var modules = external_jQuery_default().extend({}, this.options.modules, (external_jQuery_default()).summernote.plugins || {}); // add and initialize modules

  1825|         _this.module(key, modules[key], true);
  1826|       });
  1827|       Object.keys(this.modules).forEach(function (key) {
  1828|         _this.initializeModule(key);
  1829|       });
  1830|     }
  1831|   }, {
  1832|     key: "_destroy",
  1833|     value: function _destroy() {
  1834|       var _this2 = this;
  1835|       Object.keys(this.modules).reverse().forEach(function (key) {
  1836|         _this2.removeModule(key);
  1837|       });
  1838|       Object.keys(this.memos).forEach(function (key) {
  1839|         _this2.removeMemo(key);
  1840|       }); // trigger custom onDestroy callback
  1841|       this.triggerEvent('destroy', this);
  1842|     }
  1843|   }, {
  1844|     key: "code",
  1845|     value: function code(html) {
  1846|       var isActivated = this.invoke('codeview.isActivated');
  1847|       if (html === undefined) {
  1848|         this.invoke('codeview.sync');
  1849|         return isActivated ? this.layoutInfo.codable.val() : this.layoutInfo.editable.html();
  1850|       } else {
  1851|         if (isActivated) {
  1852|           this.invoke('codeview.sync', html);
  1853|         } else {
  1854|           this.layoutInfo.editable.html(html);
  1855|         }

  1857|         this.triggerEvent('change', html, this.layoutInfo.editable);
  1858|       }
  1859|     }
  1860|   }, {
  1861|     key: "isDisabled",
  1862|     value: function isDisabled() {
  1863|       return this.layoutInfo.editable.attr('contenteditable') === 'false';
  1864|     }
  1865|   }, {
  1866|     key: "enable",
  1867|     value: function enable() {
  1868|       this.layoutInfo.editable.attr('contenteditable', true);
  1869|       this.invoke('toolbar.activate', true);
  1870|       this.triggerEvent('disable', false);
  1871|       this.options.editing = true;
  1872|     }
  1873|   }, {
  1874|     key: "disable",
  1875|     value: function disable() {
