  3968|             }
  3969|             break;
  3970|         }
  3971|       }
  3972|     }
  3973|     /*
  3974|     * Copy attributes from element.
  3975|     *
  3976|     * @param {object} Element to recover attributes.
  3977|     * @return {string} Copied string elements.
  3978|     */
  3979|   }, {
  3980|     key: "recoverAttributes",
  3981|     value: function recoverAttributes(el) {
  3982|       var resultStr = '';
  3983|       if (!el) {
  3984|         return resultStr;
  3985|       }
  3986|       var attrList = el.attributes || [];
  3987|       for (var i = 0; i < attrList.length; i++) {
  3988|         if (attrList[i].name.toLowerCase() === 'id') {
  3989|           continue;
  3990|         }
  3991|         if (attrList[i].specified) {
  3992|           resultStr += ' ' + attrList[i].name + '=\'' + attrList[i].value + '\'';
  3993|         }
  3994|       }
  3995|       return resultStr;
  3996|     }
  3997|     /**
  3998|      * Delete current row
  3999|      *
  4000|      * @param {WrappedRange} rng
  4001|      * @return {Node}
  4002|      */
  4003|   }, {
  4004|     key: "deleteRow",
  4005|     value: function deleteRow(rng) {
  4006|       var cell = dom.ancestor(rng.commonAncestor(), dom.isCell);
  4007|       var row = external_jQuery_default()(cell).closest('tr');
  4008|       var cellPos = row.children('td, th').index(external_jQuery_default()(cell));
  4009|       var rowPos = row[0].rowIndex;
  4010|       var vTable = new TableResultAction(cell, TableResultAction.where.Row, TableResultAction.requestAction.Delete, external_jQuery_default()(row).closest('table')[0]);
  4011|       var actions = vTable.getActionList();
  4012|       for (var actionIndex = 0; actionIndex < actions.length; actionIndex++) {
  4013|         if (!actions[actionIndex]) {
  4014|           continue;
  4015|         }
  4016|         var baseCell = actions[actionIndex].baseCell;
  4017|         var virtualPosition = actions[actionIndex].virtualTable;
  4018|         var hasRowspan = baseCell.rowSpan && baseCell.rowSpan > 1;
  4019|         var rowspanNumber = hasRowspan ? parseInt(baseCell.rowSpan, 10) : 0;
  4020|         switch (actions[actionIndex].action) {
  4021|           case TableResultAction.resultAction.Ignore:
  4022|             continue;
  4023|           case TableResultAction.resultAction.AddCell:
  4024|             {
  4025|               var nextRow = row.next('tr')[0];
  4026|               if (!nextRow) {
  4027|                 continue;
  4028|               }
  4029|               var cloneRow = row[0].cells[cellPos];
  4030|               if (hasRowspan) {
  4031|                 if (rowspanNumber > 2) {
  4032|                   rowspanNumber--;
  4033|                   nextRow.insertBefore(cloneRow, nextRow.cells[cellPos]);
  4034|                   nextRow.cells[cellPos].setAttribute('rowSpan', rowspanNumber);
  4035|                   nextRow.cells[cellPos].innerHTML = '';
  4036|                 } else if (rowspanNumber === 2) {
  4037|                   nextRow.insertBefore(cloneRow, nextRow.cells[cellPos]);
  4038|                   nextRow.cells[cellPos].removeAttribute('rowSpan');
  4039|                   nextRow.cells[cellPos].innerHTML = '';
  4040|                 }
  4041|               }
  4042|             }
  4043|             continue;
  4044|           case TableResultAction.resultAction.SubtractSpanCount:
  4045|             if (hasRowspan) {
  4046|               if (rowspanNumber > 2) {
  4047|                 rowspanNumber--;
  4048|                 baseCell.setAttribute('rowSpan', rowspanNumber);
  4049|                 if (virtualPosition.rowIndex !== rowPos && baseCell.cellIndex === cellPos) {
  4050|                   baseCell.innerHTML = '';
  4051|                 }
  4052|               } else if (rowspanNumber === 2) {
  4053|                 baseCell.removeAttribute('rowSpan');
  4054|                 if (virtualPosition.rowIndex !== rowPos && baseCell.cellIndex === cellPos) {
  4055|                   baseCell.innerHTML = '';
  4056|                 }
  4057|               }
  4058|             }
  4059|             continue;
  4060|           case TableResultAction.resultAction.RemoveCell:
  4061|             continue;
  4062|         }
  4063|       }
  4064|       row.remove();
  4065|     }
  4066|     /**
  4067|      * Delete current col
  4068|      *
  4069|      * @param {WrappedRange} rng
  4070|      * @return {Node}
  4071|      */
  4072|   }, {
  4073|     key: "deleteCol",
  4074|     value: function deleteCol(rng) {

  4076|       var row = external_jQuery_default()(cell).closest('tr');
  4077|       var cellPos = row.children('td, th').index(external_jQuery_default()(cell));

  4082|           continue;

  4104|                 }
  4105|               }

  4111|         }
  4112|       }

  4139|       }

  4141|     }

  4411|       $target.css('float', value === 'none' ? '' : value);
  4412|     });
  4413|     /**
  4414|      * resize overlay element
  4415|      * @param {String} value
  4416|      */
  4417|     this.resize = this.wrapCommand(function (value) {
  4418|       var $target = external_jQuery_default()(_this.restoreTarget());
  4419|       value = parseFloat(value);
  4420|       if (value === 0) {
  4421|         $target.css('width', '');
  4422|       } else {
  4423|         $target.css({
  4424|           width: value * 100 + '%',
  4425|           height: ''
  4426|         });
  4427|       }
  4428|     });
  4429|   }
  4430|   Editor_createClass(Editor, [{
  4431|     key: "initialize",
  4432|     value: function initialize() {
  4433|       var _this2 = this;
  4434|       this.$editable.on('keydown', function (event) {
  4435|         if (event.keyCode === key.code.ENTER) {
  4436|           _this2.context.triggerEvent('enter', event);
  4437|         }
  4438|         _this2.context.triggerEvent('keydown', event); // keep a snapshot to limit text on input event
  4439|         _this2.snapshot = _this2.history.makeSnapshot();
  4440|         _this2.hasKeyShortCut = false;
  4441|         if (!event.isDefaultPrevented()) {
  4442|           if (_this2.options.shortcuts) {
  4443|             _this2.hasKeyShortCut = _this2.handleKeyMap(event);
  4444|           } else {
  4445|             _this2.preventDefaultEditableShortCuts(event);
  4446|           }
  4447|         }
  4448|         if (_this2.isLimited(1, event)) {
  4449|           var lastRange = _this2.getLastRange();
  4450|           if (lastRange.eo - lastRange.so === 0) {
  4451|             return false;
  4452|           }
  4453|         }
  4454|         _this2.setLastRange(); // record undo in the key event except keyMap.
  4455|         if (_this2.options.recordEveryKeystroke) {
  4456|           if (_this2.hasKeyShortCut === false) {
  4457|             _this2.history.recordUndo();
  4458|           }
  4459|         }
  4460|       }).on('keyup', function (event) {
  4461|         _this2.setLastRange();
  4462|         _this2.context.triggerEvent('keyup', event);
  4463|       }).on('focus', function (event) {
  4464|         _this2.setLastRange();
  4465|         _this2.context.triggerEvent('focus', event);
  4466|       }).on('blur', function (event) {
  4467|         _this2.context.triggerEvent('blur', event);

  4502|             return false;
  4503|           });

  4522|   }, {
  4523|     key: "destroy",
  4524|     value: function destroy() {
  4525|       this.$editable.off();
  4526|     }
  4527|   }, {
  4528|     key: "handleKeyMap",
  4529|     value: function handleKeyMap(event) {
  4530|       var keyMap = this.options.keyMap[env.isMac ? 'mac' : 'pc'];
  4531|       var keys = [];
  4532|       if (event.metaKey) {
  4533|         keys.push('CMD');
  4534|       }
  4535|       if (event.ctrlKey && !event.altKey) {
  4536|         keys.push('CTRL');
  4537|       }
  4538|       if (event.shiftKey) {
  4539|         keys.push('SHIFT');
  4540|       }
  4541|       var keyName = key.nameFromCode[event.keyCode];
  4542|       if (keyName) {
  4543|         keys.push(keyName);
  4544|       }
  4545|       var eventName = keyMap[keys.join('+')];
  4546|       if (keyName === 'TAB' && !this.options.tabDisable) {
  4547|         this.afterCommand();
  4548|       } else if (eventName) {
  4549|         if (this.context.invoke(eventName) !== false) {
  4550|           event.preventDefault(); // if keyMap action was invoked
  4551|           return true;
  4552|         }
  4553|       } else if (key.isEdit(event.keyCode)) {
  4554|         this.afterCommand();
  4555|       }
  4556|       return false;
  4557|     }
  4558|   }, {
  4559|     key: "preventDefaultEditableShortCuts",
  4560|     value: function preventDefaultEditableShortCuts(event) {
  4561|       if ((event.ctrlKey || event.metaKey) && lists.contains([66, 73, 85], event.keyCode)) {
  4562|         event.preventDefault();
  4563|       }
  4564|     }
  4565|   }, {
  4566|     key: "isLimited",
  4567|     value: function isLimited(pad, event) {
  4568|       pad = pad || 0;
  4569|       if (typeof event !== 'undefined') {
  4570|         if (key.isMove(event.keyCode) || key.isNavigation(event.keyCode) || event.ctrlKey || event.metaKey || lists.contains([key.code.BACKSPACE, key.code.DELETE], event.keyCode)) {
  4571|           return false;
  4572|         }
  4573|       }
  4574|       if (this.options.maxTextLength > 0) {
  4575|         if (this.$editable.text().length + pad > this.options.maxTextLength) {
  4576|           return true;
  4577|         }
  4578|       }
  4579|       return false;
  4580|     }
  4581|     /**

  4592|     /**

  4599|     key: "createRangeFromList",
  4600|     value: function createRangeFromList(lst) {
  4601|       var startRange = range.createFromNodeBefore(lists.head(lst));
  4602|       var startPoint = startRange.getStartPoint();
  4603|       var endRange = range.createFromNodeAfter(lists.last(lst));
  4604|       var endPoint = endRange.getEndPoint();
  4605|       return range.create(startPoint.node, startPoint.offset, endPoint.node, endPoint.offset);
  4606|     }
  4607|     /**

  4764|     /**
  4765|      * handle tab key
  4766|      */
  4767|   }, {
  4768|     key: "tab",
  4769|     value: function tab() {
  4770|       var rng = this.getLastRange();
  4771|       if (rng.isCollapsed() && rng.isOnCell()) {
  4772|         this.table.tab(rng);
  4773|       } else {
  4774|         if (this.options.tabSize === 0) {
  4775|           return false;
  4776|         }

  4778|           this.beforeCommand();
  4779|           this.typing.insertTab(rng, this.options.tabSize);
  4780|           this.afterCommand();
  4781|         }
  4782|       }
  4783|     }
  4784|     /**
  4785|      * handle shift+tab key
  4786|      */
  4787|   }, {

  4793|       } else {

  4795|           return false;
  4796|         }
  4797|       }
  4798|     }
  4799|     /**
  4800|      * run given function between beforeCommand and afterCommand
  4801|      */
  4802|   }, {
  4803|     key: "wrapCommand",
  4804|     value: function wrapCommand(fn) {
  4805|       return function () {
  4806|         this.beforeCommand();
  4807|         fn.apply(this, arguments);
  4808|         this.afterCommand();
  4809|       };
  4810|     }
  4811|     /**

  4817|      */
  4818|   }, {
  4819|     key: "insertImage",
  4820|     value: function insertImage(src, param) {

  4823|         _this3.beforeCommand();

  4825|           param($image);
  4826|         } else {
  4827|           if (typeof param === 'string') {
  4828|             $image.attr('data-filename', param);
  4829|           }
  4830|           $image.css('width', Math.min(_this3.$editable.width(), $image.width()));
  4831|         }
  4832|         $image.show();
  4833|         _this3.getLastRange().insertNode($image[0]);
  4834|         _this3.setLastRange(range.createFromNodeAfter($image[0]).select());
  4835|         _this3.afterCommand();
  4836|       }).fail(function (e) {
  4837|         _this3.context.triggerEvent('image.upload.error', e);
  4838|       });
  4839|     }
  4840|     /**

  4849|         var filename = file.name;

  4851|           _this4.context.triggerEvent('image.upload.error', _this4.lang.image.maximumFileSizeError);
  4852|         } else {

  4854|             return _this4.insertImage(dataURL, filename);
  4855|           }).fail(function () {
  4856|             _this4.context.triggerEvent('image.upload.error');
  4857|           });
  4858|         }
  4859|       });
  4860|     }

  4888|   }, {

  4892|       if ($target && $target.length) {

  4894|           $target = $target.find(tagName);
  4895|         }

  4899|           $parent.removeClass();

  4901|           if (className) {

  4903|           }

  4912|   }, {
  4913|     key: "fontStyling",
  4914|     value: function fontStyling(target, value) {
  4915|       var rng = this.getLastRange();
  4916|       if (rng !== '') {
  4917|         var spans = this.style.styleNodes(rng);
  4918|         this.$editor.find('.note-status-output').html('');
  4919|         external_jQuery_default()(spans).css(target, value); // [workaround] added styled bogus span for style
  4920|         if (rng.isCollapsed()) {
  4921|           var firstSpan = lists.head(spans);
  4922|           if (firstSpan && !dom.nodeLength(firstSpan)) {
  4923|             firstSpan.innerHTML = dom.ZERO_WIDTH_NBSP_CHAR;
  4924|             range.createFromNode(firstSpan.firstChild).select();
  4925|             this.setLastRange();
  4926|             this.$editable.data(KEY_BOGUS, firstSpan);
  4927|           }
  4928|         } else {
  4929|           this.setLastRange(this.createRangeFromList(spans).select());
  4930|         }
  4931|       } else {
  4932|         var noteStatusOutput = external_jQuery_default().now();
  4933|         this.$editor.find('.note-status-output').html('<div id="note-status-output-' + noteStatusOutput + '" class="alert alert-info">' + this.lang.output.noSelection + '</div>');
  4934|         setTimeout(function () {
  4935|           external_jQuery_default()('#note-status-output-' + noteStatusOutput).remove();
  4936|         }, 5000);
  4937|       }
  4938|     }
  4939|     /**
  4940|      * unlink
  4941|      *
  4942|      * @type command
  4943|      */
  4944|   }, {
  4945|     key: "unlink",
  4946|     value: function unlink() {
  4947|       var rng = this.getLastRange();
  4948|       if (rng.isOnAnchor()) {
  4949|         var anchor = dom.ancestor(rng.sc, dom.isAnchor);
  4950|         rng = range.createFromNode(anchor);
  4951|         rng.select();
  4952|         this.setLastRange();
  4953|         this.beforeCommand();
  4954|         document.execCommand('unlink');
  4955|         this.afterCommand();
  4956|       }
  4957|     }
  4958|     /**
  4959|      * returns link info
  4960|      *
  4961|      * @return {Object}
  4962|      * @return {WrappedRange} return.range
  4963|      * @return {String} return.text
  4964|      * @return {Boolean} [return.isNewWindow=true]
  4965|      * @return {String} [return.url=""]
  4966|      */
  4967|   }, {
  4968|     key: "getLinkInfo",
  4969|     value: function getLinkInfo() {
  4970|       var rng = this.getLastRange().expand(dom.isAnchor); // Get the first anchor on range(for edit).
  4971|       var $anchor = external_jQuery_default()(lists.head(rng.nodes(dom.isAnchor)));
  4972|       var linkInfo = {
  4973|         range: rng,
  4974|         text: rng.toString(),
  4975|         url: $anchor.length ? $anchor.attr('href') : ''

  5045|           width: ratio > newRatio ? pos.x : pos.y / ratio,

  5050|           width: pos.x,
  5051|           height: pos.y
  5052|         };
  5053|       }

  5927|     key: "representShortcut",

  5931|         return '';
  5932|       }

  6583|     key: "build",
  6584|     value: function build($container, groups) {
  6585|       for (var groupIdx = 0, groupLen = groups.length; groupIdx < groupLen; groupIdx++) {
  6586|         var group = groups[groupIdx];
  6587|         var groupName = Array.isArray(group) ? group[0] : group;
  6588|         var buttons = Array.isArray(group) ? group.length === 1 ? [group[0]] : group[1] : [group];
  6589|         var $group = this.ui.buttonGroup({
  6590|           className: 'note-' + groupName
  6591|         }).render();

  6593|           var btn = this.context.memo('button.' + buttons[idx]);
  6594|           if (btn) {
  6595|             $group.append(typeof btn === 'function' ? btn(this.context) : btn);
  6596|           }
  6597|         }
  6598|         $group.appendTo($container);
  6599|       }
  6600|     }

  6667|   }, {
  6668|     key: "updateBtnStates",
  6669|     value: function updateBtnStates($container, infos) {
  6670|       var _this6 = this;
  6671|       external_jQuery_default().each(infos, function (selector, pred) {
  6672|         _this6.ui.toggleBtnActive($container.find(selector), pred());
  6673|       });
  6674|     }
  6675|   }, {
  6676|     key: "tableMoveHandler",
  6677|     value: function tableMoveHandler(event) {
  6678|       var PX_PER_EM = 18;
  6679|       var $picker = external_jQuery_default()(event.target.parentNode); // target is mousecatcher
  6680|       var $dimensionDisplay = $picker.next();
  6681|       var $catcher = $picker.find('.note-dimension-picker-mousecatcher');
  6682|       var $highlighted = $picker.find('.note-dimension-picker-highlighted');
  6683|       var $unhighlighted = $picker.find('.note-dimension-picker-unhighlighted');
  6684|       var posOffset; // HTML5 with jQuery - e.offsetX is undefined in Firefox
  6685|       if (event.offsetX === undefined) {
  6686|         var posCatcher = external_jQuery_default()(event.target).offset();
  6687|         posOffset = {
  6688|           x: event.pageX - posCatcher.left,
  6689|           y: event.pageY - posCatcher.top
  6690|         };
  6691|       } else {
  6692|         posOffset = {
  6693|           x: event.offsetX,
  6694|           y: event.offsetY
  6695|         };
  6696|       }
  6697|       var dim = {
  6698|         c: Math.ceil(posOffset.x / PX_PER_EM) || 1,
  6699|         r: Math.ceil(posOffset.y / PX_PER_EM) || 1
  6700|       };
  6701|       $highlighted.css({
  6702|         width: dim.c + 'em',
  6703|         height: dim.r + 'em'
  6704|       });
  6705|       $catcher.data('value', dim.c + 'x' + dim.r);
  6706|       if (dim.c > 3 && dim.c < this.options.insertTableMaxSize.col) {
  6707|         $unhighlighted.css({
  6708|           width: dim.c + 1 + 'em'
  6709|         });
  6710|       }
  6711|       if (dim.r > 3 && dim.r < this.options.insertTableMaxSize.row) {
  6712|         $unhighlighted.css({
  6713|           height: dim.r + 1 + 'em'
  6714|         });
  6715|       }
  6716|       $dimensionDisplay.html(dim.c + ' x ' + dim.r);
  6717|     }
  6718|   }]);
  6719|   return Buttons;
  6720| }();

  6724| function Toolbar_createClass(Constructor, protoProps, staticProps) { if (protoProps) Toolbar_defineProperties(Constructor.prototype, protoProps); if (staticProps) Toolbar_defineProperties(Constructor, staticProps); return Constructor; }

  6750|       this.options.toolbar = this.options.toolbar || [];
  6751|       if (!this.options.toolbar.length) {
  6752|         this.$toolbar.hide();
  6753|       } else {
  6754|         this.context.invoke('buttons.build', this.$toolbar, this.options.toolbar);
  6755|       }
  6756|       if (this.options.toolbarContainer) {
  6757|         this.$toolbar.appendTo(this.options.toolbarContainer);
  6758|       }
  6759|       this.changeContainer(false);
  6760|       this.$note.on('summernote.keyup summernote.mouseup summernote.change', function () {
  6761|         _this.context.invoke('buttons.updateCurrentStyle');
  6762|       });
  6763|       this.context.invoke('buttons.updateCurrentStyle');
  6764|       if (this.options.followingToolbar) {
  6765|         this.$window.on('scroll resize', this.followScroll);
  6766|       }
  6767|     }
  6768|   }, {
  6769|     key: "destroy",
  6770|     value: function destroy() {
  6771|       this.$toolbar.children().remove();
  6772|       if (this.options.followingToolbar) {
  6773|         this.$window.off('scroll resize', this.followScroll);
  6774|       }
  6775|     }
  6776|   }, {
  6777|     key: "followScroll",
  6778|     value: function followScroll() {
  6779|       if (this.$editor.hasClass('fullscreen')) {
  6780|         return false;
  6781|       }
  6782|       var editorHeight = this.$editor.outerHeight();
  6783|       var editorWidth = this.$editor.width();
  6784|       var toolbarHeight = this.$toolbar.height();
  6785|       var statusbarHeight = this.$statusbar.height(); // check if the web app is currently using another static bar
  6786|       var otherBarHeight = 0;
  6787|       if (this.options.otherStaticBar) {
  6788|         otherBarHeight = external_jQuery_default()(this.options.otherStaticBar).outerHeight();
  6789|       }
  6790|       var currentOffset = this.$document.scrollTop();
  6791|       var editorOffsetTop = this.$editor.offset().top;
  6792|       var editorOffsetBottom = editorOffsetTop + editorHeight;
  6793|       var activateOffset = editorOffsetTop - otherBarHeight;
  6794|       var deactivateOffsetBottom = editorOffsetBottom - otherBarHeight - toolbarHeight - statusbarHeight;
  6795|       if (!this.isFollowing && currentOffset > activateOffset && currentOffset < deactivateOffsetBottom - toolbarHeight) {
  6796|         this.isFollowing = true;
  6797|         this.$editable.css({
  6798|           marginTop: this.$toolbar.outerHeight()
  6799|         });
  6800|         this.$toolbar.css({
  6801|           position: 'fixed',
  6802|           top: otherBarHeight,
  6803|           width: editorWidth,
  6804|           zIndex: 1000
  6805|         });
  6806|       } else if (this.isFollowing && (currentOffset < activateOffset || currentOffset > deactivateOffsetBottom)) {
  6807|         this.isFollowing = false;
  6808|         this.$toolbar.css({
  6809|           position: 'relative',
  6810|           top: 0,
  6811|           width: '100%',
  6812|           zIndex: 'auto'
  6813|         });
  6814|         this.$editable.css({
  6815|           marginTop: ''
  6816|         });
  6817|       }
  6818|     }
  6819|   }, {
  6820|     key: "changeContainer",
  6821|     value: function changeContainer(isFullscreen) {
  6822|       if (isFullscreen) {
  6823|         this.$toolbar.prependTo(this.$editor);
  6824|       } else {
  6825|         if (this.options.toolbarContainer) {
  6826|           this.$toolbar.appendTo(this.options.toolbarContainer);
  6827|         }
  6828|       }
  6829|       if (this.options.followingToolbar) {
  6830|         this.followScroll();
  6831|       }
  6832|     }
  6833|   }, {
  6834|     key: "updateFullscreen",
  6835|     value: function updateFullscreen(isFullscreen) {
  6836|       this.ui.toggleBtnActive(this.$toolbar.find('.btn-fullscreen'), isFullscreen);
  6837|       this.changeContainer(isFullscreen);
  6838|     }
  6839|   }, {
  6840|     key: "updateCodeview",
  6841|     value: function updateCodeview(isCodeview) {
  6842|       this.ui.toggleBtnActive(this.$toolbar.find('.btn-codeview'), isCodeview);
  6843|       if (isCodeview) {
  6844|         this.deactivate();
  6845|       } else {
  6846|         this.activate();
  6847|       }
  6848|     }
  6849|   }, {
  6850|     key: "activate",
  6851|     value: function activate(isIncludeCodeview) {
  6852|       var $btn = this.$toolbar.find('button');
  6853|       if (!isIncludeCodeview) {
  6854|         $btn = $btn.not('.note-codeview-keep');
  6855|       }
  6856|       this.ui.toggleBtn($btn, true);
  6857|     }
  6858|   }, {
  6859|     key: "deactivate",
  6860|     value: function deactivate(isIncludeCodeview) {
  6861|       var $btn = this.$toolbar.find('button');
  6862|       if (!isIncludeCodeview) {
  6863|         $btn = $btn.not('.note-codeview-keep');
  6864|       }
  6865|       this.ui.toggleBtn($btn, false);
  6866|     }
  6867|   }]);
  6868|   return Toolbar;
  6869| }();

  7076|       }

  7082|         var pos = dom.posFromPlaceholder(anchor);
  7083|         var containerOffset = external_jQuery_default()(this.options.container).offset();
  7084|         pos.top -= containerOffset.top;
  7085|         pos.left -= containerOffset.left;
  7086|         this.$popover.css({
  7087|           display: 'block',
  7088|           left: pos.left,
  7089|           top: pos.top
  7090|         });
  7091|       } else {
  7092|         this.hide();
  7093|       }
  7094|     }
  7095|   }, {

  7099|     }

  7284|           pos = position;
  7285|         }

  7287|         pos.left -= containerOffset.left;

  7289|           display: 'block',
  7290|           left: pos.left,
  7291|           top: pos.top
  7292|         });
  7293|       } else {
  7294|         this.hide();
  7295|       }
  7296|     }
  7297|   }, {

  7431|           event.preventDefault();

  7433|         }
  7434|       });
  7435|     }
  7436|   }, {
  7437|     key: "createVideoNode",
  7438|     value: function createVideoNode(url) {
  7439|       var ytRegExp = /\/\/(?:(?:www|m)\.)?(?:youtu\.be\/|youtube\.com\/(?:embed\/|v\/|watch\?v=|watch\?.+&v=))([\w|-]{11})(?:(?:[\?&]t=)(\S+))?$/;
  7440|       var ytRegExpForStart = /^(?:(\d+)h)?(?:(\d+)m)?(?:(\d+)s)?$/;
  7441|       var ytMatch = url.match(ytRegExp);
  7442|       var gdRegExp = /(?:\.|\/\/)drive\.google\.com\/file\/d\/(.[a-zA-Z0-9_-]*)\/view/;
  7443|       var gdMatch = url.match(gdRegExp);
  7444|       var igRegExp = /(?:www\.|\/\/)instagram\.com\/p\/(.[a-zA-Z0-9_-]*)/;
  7445|       var igMatch = url.match(igRegExp);
  7446|       var vRegExp = /\/\/vine\.co\/v\/([a-zA-Z0-9]+)/;
  7447|       var vMatch = url.match(vRegExp);
  7448|       var vimRegExp = /\/\/(player\.)?vimeo\.com\/([a-z]*\/)*(\d+)[?]?.*/;
  7449|       var vimMatch = url.match(vimRegExp);
  7450|       var dmRegExp = /.+dailymotion.com\/(video|hub)\/([^_]+)[^#]*(#video=([^_&]+))?/;
  7451|       var dmMatch = url.match(dmRegExp);
  7452|       var youkuRegExp = /\/\/v\.youku\.com\/v_show\/id_(\w+)=*\.html/;
  7453|       var youkuMatch = url.match(youkuRegExp);
  7454|       var peerTubeRegExp = /\/\/(.*)\/videos\/watch\/([^?]*)(?:\?(?:start=(\w*))?(?:&stop=(\w*))?(?:&loop=([10]))?(?:&autoplay=([10]))?(?:&muted=([10]))?)?/;
  7455|       var peerTubeMatch = url.match(peerTubeRegExp);
  7456|       var qqRegExp = /\/\/v\.qq\.com.*?vid=(.+)/;
  7457|       var qqMatch = url.match(qqRegExp);
  7458|       var qqRegExp2 = /\/\/v\.qq\.com\/x?\/?(page|cover).*?\/([^\/]+)\.html\??.*/;
  7459|       var qqMatch2 = url.match(qqRegExp2);
  7460|       var mp4RegExp = /^.+.(mp4|m4v)$/;
  7461|       var mp4Match = url.match(mp4RegExp);
  7462|       var oggRegExp = /^.+.(ogg|ogv)$/;
  7463|       var oggMatch = url.match(oggRegExp);
  7464|       var webmRegExp = /^.+.(webm)$/;
  7465|       var webmMatch = url.match(webmRegExp);
  7466|       var fbRegExp = /(?:www\.|\/\/)facebook\.com\/([^\/]+)\/videos\/([0-9]+)/;
  7467|       var fbMatch = url.match(fbRegExp);
  7468|       var $video;
  7469|       if (ytMatch && ytMatch[1].length === 11) {
  7470|         var youtubeId = ytMatch[1];
  7471|         var start = 0;
  7472|         if (typeof ytMatch[2] !== 'undefined') {
  7473|           var ytMatchForStart = ytMatch[2].match(ytRegExpForStart);
  7474|           if (ytMatchForStart) {
  7475|             for (var n = [3600, 60, 1], i = 0, r = n.length; i < r; i++) {
  7476|               start += typeof ytMatchForStart[i + 1] !== 'undefined' ? n[i] * parseInt(ytMatchForStart[i + 1], 10) : 0;
  7477|             }
  7478|           }
  7479|         }
  7480|         $video = external_jQuery_default()('<iframe>').attr('frameborder', 0).attr('src', '//www.youtube.com/embed/' + youtubeId + (start > 0 ? '?start=' + start : '')).attr('width', '640').attr('height', '360');

  7489|       } else if (dmMatch && dmMatch[2].length) {

  7513|         return false;
  7514|       }
  7515|       $video.addClass('note-video-clip');
  7516|       return $video[0];
  7517|     }
  7518|   }, {
  7519|     key: "show",

  7522|       var text = this.context.invoke('editor.getSelectedText');

  7559|           });

  7566|             deferred.reject();
  7567|           }
  7568|         });

  7570|       });
  7571|     }

  7859|       var $prev = $current.prev();

  7861|         this.selectItem($prev);

  7865|           $prevGroup = this.$content.find('.note-hint-group').last();
  7866|         }

  7870|   }, {
  7871|     key: "replace",

  7873|       var $item = this.$content.find('.note-hint-item.active');
  7874|       if ($item.length) {
  7875|         var node = this.nodeFromItem($item); // If matchingWord length = 0 -> capture OK / open hint / but as mention capture "" (\w*)
  7876|         if (this.matchingWord !== null && this.matchingWord.length === 0) {
  7877|           this.lastWordRange.so = this.lastWordRange.eo; // Else si > 0 and normal case -> adjust range "before" for correct position of insertion
  7878|         } else if (this.matchingWord !== null && this.matchingWord.length > 0 && !this.lastWordRange.isCollapsed()) {
  7879|           var rangeCompute = this.lastWordRange.eo - this.lastWordRange.so - this.matchingWord.length;
  7880|           if (rangeCompute > 0) {
  7881|             this.lastWordRange.so += rangeCompute;
  7882|           }
  7883|         }
  7884|         this.lastWordRange.insertNode(node);

  7886|           var blank = document.createTextNode('');

  7888|           range.createFromNodeBefore(blank).select();
  7889|         } else {
  7890|           range.createFromNodeAfter(node).select();
  7891|         }
  7892|         this.lastWordRange = null;
  7893|         this.hide();

  7899|     key: "nodeFromItem",

  7905|         node = dom.createText(node);
  7906|       }

  7908|     }

  7937|       } else if (e.keyCode === key.code.DOWN) {
  7938|         e.preventDefault();
  7939|         this.moveDown();
  7940|       }
  7941|     }
  7942|   }, {

  7947|         var matches = hint.match.exec(keyword);
  7948|         this.matchingWord = matches[0];
  7949|         hint.search(matches[1], callback);
  7950|       } else {
  7951|         callback();
  7952|       }
  7953|     }
  7954|   }, {
  7955|     key: "createGroup",

  7965|       });
  7966|       return $group;
  7967|     }
  7968|   }, {
  7969|     key: "handleKeyup",
  7970|     value: function handleKeyup(e) {
  7971|       var _this4 = this;
  7972|       if (!lists.contains([key.code.ENTER, key.code.UP, key.code.DOWN], e.keyCode)) {
  7973|         var _range = this.context.invoke('editor.getLastRange');
  7974|         var wordRange, keyword;
  7975|         if (this.options.hintMode === 'words') {
  7976|           wordRange = _range.getWordsRange(_range);
  7977|           keyword = wordRange.toString();
  7978|           this.hints.forEach(function (hint) {
  7979|             if (hint.match.test(keyword)) {
  7980|               wordRange = _range.getWordsMatchRange(hint.match);
  7981|               return false;
  7982|             }
  7983|           });
  7984|           if (!wordRange) {
  7985|             this.hide();

  7987|           }
  7988|           keyword = wordRange.toString();
  7989|         } else {

  7994|           this.$content.empty();

  7996|           var containerOffset = external_jQuery_default()(this.options.container).offset();

  7998|             bnd.top -= containerOffset.top;

  8005|               }

  8012|               });
  8013|             } else {
  8014|               this.$popover.css({
  8015|                 left: bnd.left,
  8016|                 top: bnd.top + bnd.height + POPOVER_DIST
  8017|               });
  8018|             }
  8019|           }
  8020|         } else {
  8021|           this.hide();
  8022|         }
  8023|       }
  8024|     }

  8029|     }
  8030|   }, {

  8034|     }

  8280| function renderer_classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError("Cannot call a class as a function"); } }
  8281| function renderer_defineProperties(target, props) { for (var i = 0; i < props.length; i++) { var descriptor = props[i]; descriptor.enumerable = descriptor.enumerable || false; descriptor.configurable = true; if ("value" in descriptor) descriptor.writable = true; Object.defineProperty(target, descriptor.key, descriptor); } }
  8282| function renderer_createClass(Constructor, protoProps, staticProps) { if (protoProps) renderer_defineProperties(Constructor.prototype, protoProps); if (staticProps) renderer_defineProperties(Constructor, staticProps); return Constructor; }
  8283| var Renderer = /*#__PURE__*/function () {
  8284|   function Renderer(markup, children, options, callback) {
  8285|     renderer_classCallCheck(this, Renderer);
  8286|     this.markup = markup;
  8287|     this.children = children;
  8288|     this.options = options;
  8289|     this.callback = callback;
  8290|   }
  8291|   renderer_createClass(Renderer, [{
  8292|     key: "render",
  8293|     value: function render($parent) {
  8294|       var $node = external_jQuery_default()(this.markup);
  8295|       if (this.options && this.options.contents) {
  8296|         $node.html(this.options.contents);
  8297|       }
  8298|       if (this.options && this.options.className) {
  8299|         $node.addClass(this.options.className);
  8300|       }
  8301|       if (this.options && this.options.data) {
  8302|         external_jQuery_default().each(this.options.data, function (k, v) {
  8303|           $node.attr('data-' + k, v);
  8304|         });
  8305|       }
  8306|       if (this.options && this.options.click) {
  8307|         $node.on('click', this.options.click);
  8308|       }
  8309|       if (this.children) {
  8310|         var $container = $node.find('.note-children-container');
  8311|         this.children.forEach(function (child) {
  8312|           child.render($container.length ? $container : $node);
  8313|         });
  8314|       }
  8315|       if (this.callback) {
  8316|         this.callback($node, this.options);
  8317|       }
  8318|       if (this.options && this.options.callback) {
  8319|         this.options.callback($node);
  8320|       }
  8321|       if ($parent) {
  8322|         $parent.append($node);
  8323|       }
  8324|       return $node;
  8325|     }
  8326|   }]);
  8327|   return Renderer;
  8328| }();

  8410| var ui = function ui(editorOptions) {
  8411|   return {
  8412|     editor: editor,
  8413|     toolbar: toolbar,

  8429|     palette: function palette($node, options) {
  8430|       return renderer.create('<div class="note-color-palette"/>', function ($node, options) {
  8431|         var contents = [];
  8432|         for (var row = 0, rowSize = options.colors.length; row < rowSize; row++) {
  8433|           var eventName = options.eventName;
  8434|           var colors = options.colors[row];
  8435|           var colorsName = options.colorsName[row];
  8436|           var buttons = [];
  8437|           for (var col = 0, colSize = colors.length; col < colSize; col++) {
  8438|             var color = colors[col];
  8439|             var colorName = colorsName[col];
  8440|             buttons.push(['<button type="button" class="note-color-btn"', 'style="background-color:', color, '" ', 'data-event="', eventName, '" ', 'data-value="', color, '" ', 'title="', colorName, '" ', 'aria-label="', colorName, '" ', 'data-toggle="button" tabindex="-1"></button>'].join(''));
  8441|           }
  8442|           contents.push('<div class="note-color-row">' + buttons.join('') + '</div>');
  8443|         }
  8444|         $node.html(contents.join(''));
  8445|         if (options.tooltip) {
  8446|           $node.find('.note-color-btn').tooltip({
  8447|             container: options.container || editorOptions.container,
  8448|             trigger: 'hover',
  8449|             placement: 'bottom'
  8450|           });
  8451|         }
  8452|       })($node, options);
  8453|     },
  8454|     button: function button($node, options) {

  8456|         if (options && options.tooltip) {
  8457|           $node.attr({
  8458|             title: options.tooltip,
  8459|             'aria-label': options.tooltip
  8460|           }).tooltip({
  8461|             container: options.container || editorOptions.container,
  8462|             trigger: 'hover',
  8463|             placement: 'bottom'
  8464|           }).on('click', function (e) {
  8465|             external_jQuery_default()(e.currentTarget).tooltip('hide');
  8466|           });
  8467|         }
  8468|         if (options && options.codeviewButton) {
  8469|           $node.addClass('note-codeview-keep');
  8470|         }
  8471|       })($node, options);
  8472|     },
  8473|     toggleBtn: function toggleBtn($btn, isEnable) {
  8474|       $btn.toggleClass('disabled', !isEnable);
  8475|       $btn.attr('disabled', !isEnable);
  8476|     },
  8477|     toggleBtnActive: function toggleBtnActive($btn, isActive) {
  8478|       $btn.toggleClass('active', isActive);
  8479|     },

  8482|     },
  8483|     onDialogHidden: function onDialogHidden($dialog, handler) {
  8484|       $dialog.one('hidden.bs.modal', handler);
  8485|     },

  8491|     },
  8492|     createLayout: function createLayout($note) {
  8493|       var $editor = (editorOptions.airMode ? airEditor([editingArea([codable(), airEditable()])]) : editorOptions.toolbarPosition === 'bottom' ? editor([editingArea([codable(), editable()]), toolbar(), statusbar()]) : editor([toolbar(), editingArea([codable(), editable()]), statusbar()])).render();
  8494|       $editor.insertAfter($note);
  8495|       return {
  8496|         note: $note,
  8497|         editor: $editor,
  8498|         toolbar: $editor.find('.note-toolbar'),
  8499|         editingArea: $editor.find('.note-editing-area'),
  8500|         editable: $editor.find('.note-editable'),
  8501|         codable: $editor.find('.note-codable'),
  8502|         statusbar: $editor.find('.note-statusbar')
  8503|       };
  8504|     },
  8505|     removeLayout: function removeLayout($note, layoutInfo) {
  8506|       $note.html(layoutInfo.editable.html());
  8507|       layoutInfo.editor.remove();
  8508|       $note.show();
  8509|     }
  8510|   };
  8511| };
  8512| (external_jQuery_default()).summernote = external_jQuery_default().extend((external_jQuery_default()).summernote, {
  8513|   ui_template: ui,
  8514|   "interface": 'bs5'
  8515| });

   274| /**
   275|  * returns whether font is installed or not.
   276|  *
   277|  * @param {String} fontName
   278|  * @return {Boolean}
   279|  */
   280| var genericFontFamilies = ['sans-serif', 'serif', 'monospace', 'cursive', 'fantasy'];
   281| function validFontName(fontName) {
   282|   return external_jQuery_default().inArray(fontName.toLowerCase(), genericFontFamilies) === -1 ? "'".concat(fontName, "'") : fontName;
   283| }
   284| function isFontInstalled(fontName) {
   285|   var testFontName = fontName === 'Comic Sans MS' ? 'Courier New' : 'Comic Sans MS';
   286|   var testText = 'mmmmmmmmmmwwwww';
   287|   var testSize = '200px';
   288|   var canvas = document.createElement('canvas');
   289|   var context = canvas.getContext('2d');
   290|   context.font = testSize + " '" + testFontName + "'";
   291|   var originalWidth = context.measureText(testText).width;
   292|   context.font = testSize + ' ' + validFontName(fontName) + ', "' + testFontName + '"';
   293|   var width = context.measureText(testText).width;
   294|   return originalWidth !== width;
   295| }
   296| var userAgent = navigator.userAgent;
   297| var isMSIE = /MSIE|Trident/i.test(userAgent);
   298| var browserVersion;
   299| if (isMSIE) {
   300|   var matches = /MSIE (\d+[.]\d+)/.exec(userAgent);
   301|   if (matches) {
   302|     browserVersion = parseFloat(matches[1]);
   303|   }
   304|   matches = /Trident\/.*rv:([0-9]{1,}[.0-9]{0,})/.exec(userAgent);
   305|   if (matches) {
   306|     browserVersion = parseFloat(matches[1]);
   307|   }
   308| }
   309| var isEdge = /Edge\/\d+/.test(userAgent);
   310| var isSupportTouch = 'ontouchstart' in window || navigator.MaxTouchPoints > 0 || navigator.msMaxTouchPoints > 0; // [workaround] IE doesn't have input events for contentEditable
   311| var inputEventName = isMSIE ? 'DOMCharacterDataModified DOMSubtreeModified DOMNodeInserted' : 'input';

   328|   isSafari: !isEdge && /safari/i.test(userAgent) && !/chrome/i.test(userAgent),

   337| ;// CONCATENATED MODULE: ./src/js/core/func.js
   338| /**
   339|  * @class core.func
   340|  *
   341|  * func utils (for high-order func's arg)
   342|  *
   343|  * @singleton
   344|  * @alternateClassName func
   345|  */
   346| function eq(itemA) {
   347|   return function (itemB) {
   348|     return itemA === itemB;
   349|   };
   350| }
   351| function eq2(itemA, itemB) {
   352|   return itemA === itemB;
   353| }
   354| function peq2(propName) {
   355|   return function (itemA, itemB) {
   356|     return itemA[propName] === itemB[propName];
   357|   };
   358| }
   359| function ok() {
   360|   return true;
   361| }
   362| function fail() {
   363|   return false;
   364| }
   365| function not(f) {
   366|   return function () {
   367|     return !f.apply(f, arguments);
   368|   };
   369| }
   370| function and(fA, fB) {
   371|   return function (item) {
   372|     return fA(item) && fB(item);
   373|   };
   374| }
   375| function func_self(a) {
   376|   return a;
   377| }
   378| function invoke(obj, method) {
   379|   return function () {
   380|     return obj[method].apply(obj, arguments);
   381|   };
   382| }
   383| var idCounter = 0;
   384| /**
   385|  * reset globally-unique id
   386|  *
   387|  */
   388| function resetUniqueId() {
   389|   idCounter = 0;
   390| }
   391| /**
   392|  * generate a globally-unique id
   393|  *
   394|  * @param {String} [prefix]
   395|  */
   396| function uniqueId(prefix) {
   397|   var id = ++idCounter + '';
   398|   return prefix ? prefix + id : id;
   399| }
   400| /**
   401|  * returns bnd (bounds) from rect
   402|  *
   403|  * - IE Compatibility Issue: http://goo.gl/sRLOAo
   404|  * - Scroll Issue: http://goo.gl/sNjUc
   405|  *
   406|  * @param {Rect} rect
   407|  * @return {Object} bounds
   408|  * @return {Number} bounds.top
   409|  * @return {Number} bounds.left
   410|  * @return {Number} bounds.width
   411|  * @return {Number} bounds.height
   412|  */
   413| function rect2bnd(rect) {
   414|   var $document = external_jQuery_default()(document);
   415|   return {
   416|     top: rect.top + $document.scrollTop(),
   417|     left: rect.left + $document.scrollLeft(),
   418|     width: rect.right - rect.left,
   419|     height: rect.bottom - rect.top
   420|   };
   421| }
   422| /**
   423|  * returns a copy of the object where the keys have become the values and the values the keys.
   424|  * @param {Object} obj
   425|  * @return {Object}
   426|  */
   427| function invertObject(obj) {
   428|   var inverted = {};
   429|   for (var key in obj) {
   430|     if (Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(obj, key)) {
   431|       inverted[obj[key]] = key;
   432|     }
   433|   }
   434|   return inverted;
   435| }
   436| /**
   437|  * @param {String} namespace
   438|  * @param {String} [prefix]
   439|  * @return {String}
   440|  */
   441| function namespaceToCamel(namespace, prefix) {
   442|   prefix = prefix || '';
   443|   return prefix + namespace.split('.').map(function (name) {
   444|     return name.substring(0, 1).toUpperCase() + name.substring(1);
   445|   }).join('');
   446| }
   447| /**
   448|  * Returns a function, that, as long as it continues to be invoked, will not
   449|  * be triggered. The function will be called after it stops being called for
   450|  * N milliseconds. If `immediate` is passed, trigger the function on the
   451|  * leading edge, instead of the trailing.
   452|  * @param {Function} func
   453|  * @param {Number} wait
   454|  * @param {Boolean} immediate
   455|  * @return {Function}
   456|  */
   457| function debounce(func, wait, immediate) {
   458|   var timeout;
   459|   return function () {
   460|     var context = this;
   461|     var args = arguments;
   462|     var later = function later() {
   463|       timeout = null;
   464|       if (!immediate) {
   465|         func.apply(context, args);
   466|       }
   467|     };
   468|     var callNow = immediate && !timeout;
   469|     clearTimeout(timeout);
   470|     timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
   471|     if (callNow) {
   472|       func.apply(context, args);
   473|     }
   474|   };
   475| }
   476| /**
   477|  *
   478|  * @param {String} url
   479|  * @return {Boolean}
   480|  */
   481| function isValidUrl(url) {
   482|   var expression = /[-a-zA-Z0-9@:%._\+~#=]{2,256}\.[a-z]{2,6}\b([-a-zA-Z0-9@:%_\+.~#?&//=]*)/gi;
   483|   return expression.test(url);
   484| }
