   486|   eq: eq,
   487|   eq2: eq2,
   488|   peq2: peq2,
   489|   ok: ok,
   490|   fail: fail,
   491|   self: func_self,
   492|   not: not,
   493|   and: and,
   494|   invoke: invoke,
   495|   resetUniqueId: resetUniqueId,
   496|   uniqueId: uniqueId,
   497|   rect2bnd: rect2bnd,
   498|   invertObject: invertObject,
   499|   namespaceToCamel: namespaceToCamel,
   500|   debounce: debounce,
   501|   isValidUrl: isValidUrl
   502| });
   503| ;// CONCATENATED MODULE: ./src/js/core/lists.js
   504| /**
   505|  * returns the first item of an array.
   506|  *
   507|  * @param {Array} array
   508|  */
   509| function head(array) {
   510|   return array[0];
   511| }
   512| /**
   513|  * returns the last item of an array.
   514|  *
   515|  * @param {Array} array
   516|  */
   517| function last(array) {
   518|   return array[array.length - 1];
   519| }
   520| /**
   521|  * returns everything but the last entry of the array.
   522|  *
   523|  * @param {Array} array
   524|  */
   525| function initial(array) {
   526|   return array.slice(0, array.length - 1);
   527| }
   528| /**
   529|  * returns the rest of the items in an array.
   530|  *
   531|  * @param {Array} array
   532|  */
   533| function tail(array) {
   534|   return array.slice(1);
   535| }
   536| /**
   537|  * returns item of array
   538|  */
   539| function find(array, pred) {
   540|   for (var idx = 0, len = array.length; idx < len; idx++) {
   541|     var item = array[idx];
   542|     if (pred(item)) {
   543|       return item;
   544|     }
   545|   }
   546| }
   547| /**
   548|  * returns true if all of the values in the array pass the predicate truth test.
   549|  */
   550| function lists_all(array, pred) {
   551|   for (var idx = 0, len = array.length; idx < len; idx++) {
   552|     if (!pred(array[idx])) {
   553|       return false;
   554|     }
   555|   }
   556|   return true;
   557| }
   558| /**
   559|  * returns true if the value is present in the list.
   560|  */
   561| function contains(array, item) {
   562|   if (array && array.length && item) {
   563|     if (array.indexOf) {
   564|       return array.indexOf(item) !== -1;
   565|     } else if (array.contains) {
   566|       return array.contains(item);
   567|     }
   568|   }
   569|   return false;
   570| }
   571| /**
   572|  * get sum from a list
   573|  *
   574|  * @param {Array} array - array
   575|  * @param {Function} fn - iterator
   576|  */
   577| function sum(array, fn) {
   578|   fn = fn || func.self;
   579|   return array.reduce(function (memo, v) {
   580|     return memo + fn(v);
   581|   }, 0);
   582| }
   583| /**
   584|  * returns a copy of the collection with array type.
   585|  * @param {Collection} collection - collection eg) node.childNodes, ...
   586|  */
   587| function from(collection) {
   588|   var result = [];
   589|   var length = collection.length;
   590|   var idx = -1;
   591|   while (++idx < length) {
   592|     result[idx] = collection[idx];
   593|   }
   594|   return result;
   595| }
   596| /**
   597|  * returns whether list is empty or not
   598|  */
   599| function isEmpty(array) {
   600|   return !array || !array.length;
   601| }
   602| /**
   603|  * cluster elements by predicate function.
   604|  *
   605|  * @param {Array} array - array
   606|  * @param {Function} fn - predicate function for cluster rule
   607|  * @param {Array[]}
   608|  */
   609| function clusterBy(array, fn) {
   610|   if (!array.length) {
   611|     return [];
   612|   }
   613|   var aTail = tail(array);
   614|   return aTail.reduce(function (memo, v) {
   615|     var aLast = last(memo);
   616|     if (fn(last(aLast), v)) {
   617|       aLast[aLast.length] = v;
   618|     } else {
   619|       memo[memo.length] = [v];
   620|     }
   621|     return memo;
   622|   }, [[head(array)]]);
   623| }
   624| /**
   625|  * returns a copy of the array with all false values removed
   626|  *
   627|  * @param {Array} array - array
   628|  * @param {Function} fn - predicate function for cluster rule
   629|  */
   630| function compact(array) {
   631|   var aResult = [];
   632|   for (var idx = 0, len = array.length; idx < len; idx++) {
   633|     if (array[idx]) {
   634|       aResult.push(array[idx]);
   635|     }
   636|   }
   637|   return aResult;
   638| }
   639| /**
   640|  * produces a duplicate-free version of the array
   641|  *
   642|  * @param {Array} array
   643|  */
   644| function unique(array) {
   645|   var results = [];
   646|   for (var idx = 0, len = array.length; idx < len; idx++) {
   647|     if (!contains(results, array[idx])) {
   648|       results.push(array[idx]);
   649|     }
   650|   }
   651|   return results;
   652| }
   653| /**
   654|  * returns next item.
   655|  * @param {Array} array
   656|  */
   657| function next(array, item) {
   658|   if (array && array.length && item) {
   659|     var idx = array.indexOf(item);
   660|     return idx === -1 ? null : array[idx + 1];
   661|   }
   662|   return null;
   663| }
   664| /**
   665|  * returns prev item.
   666|  * @param {Array} array
   667|  */
   668| function prev(array, item) {
   669|   if (array && array.length && item) {
   670|     var idx = array.indexOf(item);
   671|     return idx === -1 ? null : array[idx - 1];
   672|   }
   673|   return null;
   674| }
   675| /**
   676|  * @class core.list
   677|  *
   678|  * list utils
   679|  *
   680|  * @singleton
   681|  * @alternateClassName list
   682|  */
   683| /* harmony default export */ const lists = ({
   684|   head: head,
   685|   last: last,
   686|   initial: initial,
   687|   tail: tail,
   688|   prev: prev,
   689|   next: next,
   690|   find: find,
   691|   contains: contains,
   692|   all: lists_all,
   693|   sum: sum,
   694|   from: from,
   695|   isEmpty: isEmpty,
   696|   clusterBy: clusterBy,
   697|   compact: compact,
   698|   unique: unique
   699| });
   700| ;// CONCATENATED MODULE: ./src/js/core/dom.js
   701| var NBSP_CHAR = String.fromCharCode(160);
   702| var ZERO_WIDTH_NBSP_CHAR = "\uFEFF";
   703| /**
   704|  * @method isEditable
   705|  *
   706|  * returns whether node is `note-editable` or not.
   707|  *
   708|  * @param {Node} node
   709|  * @return {Boolean}
   710|  */
   711| function isEditable(node) {
   712|   return node && external_jQuery_default()(node).hasClass('note-editable');
   713| }
   714| /**
   715|  * @method isControlSizing
   716|  *
   717|  * returns whether node is `note-control-sizing` or not.
   718|  *
   719|  * @param {Node} node
   720|  * @return {Boolean}
   721|  */
   722| function isControlSizing(node) {
   723|   return node && external_jQuery_default()(node).hasClass('note-control-sizing');
   724| }
   725| /**
   726|  * @method makePredByNodeName
   727|  *
   728|  * returns predicate which judge whether nodeName is same
   729|  *
   730|  * @param {String} nodeName
   731|  * @return {Function}
   732|  */
   733| function makePredByNodeName(nodeName) {
   734|   nodeName = nodeName.toUpperCase();
   735|   return function (node) {
   736|     return node && node.nodeName.toUpperCase() === nodeName;
   737|   };
   738| }
   739| /**
   740|  * @method isText
   741|  *
   742|  *
   743|  *
   744|  * @param {Node} node
   745|  * @return {Boolean} true if node's type is text(3)
   746|  */
   747| function isText(node) {
   748|   return node && node.nodeType === 3;
   749| }
   750| /**
   751|  * @method isElement
   752|  *
   753|  *
   754|  *
   755|  * @param {Node} node
   756|  * @return {Boolean} true if node's type is element(1)
   757|  */
   758| function isElement(node) {
   759|   return node && node.nodeType === 1;
   760| }
   761| /**
   762|  * ex) br, col, embed, hr, img, input, ...
   763|  * @see http://www.w3.org/html/wg/drafts/html/master/syntax.html#void-elements
   764|  */
   765| function isVoid(node) {
   766|   return node && /^BR|^IMG|^HR|^IFRAME|^BUTTON|^INPUT|^AUDIO|^VIDEO|^EMBED/.test(node.nodeName.toUpperCase());
   767| }
   768| function isPara(node) {
   769|   if (isEditable(node)) {
   770|     return false;
   771|   } // Chrome(v31.0), FF(v25.0.1) use DIV for paragraph
   772|   return node && /^DIV|^P|^LI|^H[1-7]/.test(node.nodeName.toUpperCase());
   773| }
   774| function isHeading(node) {
   775|   return node && /^H[1-7]/.test(node.nodeName.toUpperCase());
   776| }
   777| var isPre = makePredByNodeName('PRE');
   778| var isLi = makePredByNodeName('LI');
   779| function isPurePara(node) {
   780|   return isPara(node) && !isLi(node);
   781| }
   782| var isTable = makePredByNodeName('TABLE');
   783| var isData = makePredByNodeName('DATA');
   784| function isInline(node) {
   785|   return !isBodyContainer(node) && !isList(node) && !isHr(node) && !isPara(node) && !isTable(node) && !isBlockquote(node) && !isData(node);
   786| }
   787| function isList(node) {
   788|   return node && /^UL|^OL/.test(node.nodeName.toUpperCase());
   789| }
   790| var isHr = makePredByNodeName('HR');
   791| function isCell(node) {
   792|   return node && /^TD|^TH/.test(node.nodeName.toUpperCase());
   793| }
   794| var isBlockquote = makePredByNodeName('BLOCKQUOTE');
   795| function isBodyContainer(node) {
   796|   return isCell(node) || isBlockquote(node) || isEditable(node);
   797| }
   798| var isAnchor = makePredByNodeName('A');
   799| function isParaInline(node) {
   800|   return isInline(node) && !!ancestor(node, isPara);
   801| }
   802| function isBodyInline(node) {
   803|   return isInline(node) && !ancestor(node, isPara);
   804| }
   805| var isBody = makePredByNodeName('BODY');
   806| /**
   807|  * returns whether nodeB is closest sibling of nodeA
   808|  *
   809|  * @param {Node} nodeA
   810|  * @param {Node} nodeB
   811|  * @return {Boolean}
   812|  */
   813| function isClosestSibling(nodeA, nodeB) {
   814|   return nodeA.nextSibling === nodeB || nodeA.previousSibling === nodeB;
   815| }
   816| /**
   817|  * returns array of closest siblings with node
   818|  *
   819|  * @param {Node} node
   820|  * @param {function} [pred] - predicate function
   821|  * @return {Node[]}
   822|  */
   823| function withClosestSiblings(node, pred) {
   824|   pred = pred || func.ok;
   825|   var siblings = [];
   826|   if (node.previousSibling && pred(node.previousSibling)) {
   827|     siblings.push(node.previousSibling);
   828|   }
   829|   siblings.push(node);
   830|   if (node.nextSibling && pred(node.nextSibling)) {
   831|     siblings.push(node.nextSibling);
   832|   }
   833|   return siblings;
   834| }
   835| /**
   836|  * blank HTML for cursor position
   837|  * - [workaround] old IE only works with &nbsp;
   838|  * - [workaround] IE11 and other browser works with bogus br
   839|  */
   840| var blankHTML = env.isMSIE && env.browserVersion < 11 ? '&nbsp;' : '<br>';
   841| /**
   842|  * @method nodeLength
   843|  *
   844|  * returns #text's text size or element's childNodes size
   845|  *
   846|  * @param {Node} node
   847|  */
   848| function nodeLength(node) {
   849|   if (isText(node)) {
   850|     return node.nodeValue.length;
   851|   }
   852|   if (node) {
   853|     return node.childNodes.length;
   854|   }
   855|   return 0;
   856| }
   857| /**
   858|  * returns whether deepest child node is empty or not.
   859|  *
   860|  * @param {Node} node
   861|  * @return {Boolean}
   862|  */
   863| function deepestChildIsEmpty(node) {
   864|   do {
   865|     if (node.firstElementChild === null || node.firstElementChild.innerHTML === '') break;
   866|   } while (node = node.firstElementChild);
   867|   return dom_isEmpty(node);
   868| }
   869| /**
   870|  * returns whether node is empty or not.
   871|  *
   872|  * @param {Node} node
   873|  * @return {Boolean}
   874|  */
   875| function dom_isEmpty(node) {
   876|   var len = nodeLength(node);
   877|   if (len === 0) {
   878|     return true;
   879|   } else if (!isText(node) && len === 1 && node.innerHTML === blankHTML) {
   880|     return true;
   881|   } else if (lists.all(node.childNodes, isText) && node.innerHTML === '') {
   882|     return true;
   883|   }
   884|   return false;
   885| }
   886| /**
   887|  * padding blankHTML if node is empty (for cursor position)
   888|  */
   889| function paddingBlankHTML(node) {
   890|   if (!isVoid(node) && !nodeLength(node)) {
   891|     node.innerHTML = blankHTML;
   892|   }
   893| }
   894| /**
   895|  * find nearest ancestor predicate hit
   896|  *
   897|  * @param {Node} node
   898|  * @param {Function} pred - predicate function
   899|  */
   900| function ancestor(node, pred) {
   901|   while (node) {
   902|     if (pred(node)) {
   903|       return node;
   904|     }
   905|     if (isEditable(node)) {
   906|       break;
   907|     }
   908|     node = node.parentNode;
   909|   }
   910|   return null;
   911| }
   912| /**
   913|  * find nearest ancestor only single child blood line and predicate hit
   914|  *
   915|  * @param {Node} node
   916|  * @param {Function} pred - predicate function
   917|  */
   918| function singleChildAncestor(node, pred) {
   919|   node = node.parentNode;
   920|   while (node) {
   921|     if (nodeLength(node) !== 1) {
   922|       break;
   923|     }
   924|     if (pred(node)) {
   925|       return node;
   926|     }
   927|     if (isEditable(node)) {
   928|       break;
   929|     }
   930|     node = node.parentNode;
   931|   }
   932|   return null;
   933| }
   934| /**
   935|  * returns new array of ancestor nodes (until predicate hit).
   936|  *
   937|  * @param {Node} node
   938|  * @param {Function} [optional] pred - predicate function
   939|  */
   940| function listAncestor(node, pred) {
   941|   pred = pred || func.fail;
   942|   var ancestors = [];
   943|   ancestor(node, function (el) {
   944|     if (!isEditable(el)) {
   945|       ancestors.push(el);
   946|     }
   947|     return pred(el);
   948|   });
   949|   return ancestors;
   950| }
   951| /**
   952|  * find farthest ancestor predicate hit
   953|  */
   954| function lastAncestor(node, pred) {
   955|   var ancestors = listAncestor(node);
   956|   return lists.last(ancestors.filter(pred));
   957| }
   958| /**
   959|  * returns common ancestor node between two nodes.
   960|  *
   961|  * @param {Node} nodeA
   962|  * @param {Node} nodeB
   963|  */
   964| function commonAncestor(nodeA, nodeB) {
   965|   var ancestors = listAncestor(nodeA);
   966|   for (var n = nodeB; n; n = n.parentNode) {
   967|     if (ancestors.indexOf(n) > -1) return n;
   968|   }
   969|   return null; // difference document area
   970| }
   971| /**
   972|  * listing all previous siblings (until predicate hit).
   973|  *
   974|  * @param {Node} node
   975|  * @param {Function} [optional] pred - predicate function
   976|  */
   977| function listPrev(node, pred) {
   978|   pred = pred || func.fail;
   979|   var nodes = [];
   980|   while (node) {
   981|     if (pred(node)) {
   982|       break;
   983|     }
   984|     nodes.push(node);
   985|     node = node.previousSibling;
   986|   }
   987|   return nodes;
   988| }
   989| /**
   990|  * listing next siblings (until predicate hit).
   991|  *
   992|  * @param {Node} node
   993|  * @param {Function} [pred] - predicate function
   994|  */
   995| function listNext(node, pred) {
   996|   pred = pred || func.fail;
   997|   var nodes = [];
   998|   while (node) {
   999|     if (pred(node)) {
  1000|       break;
  1001|     }
  1002|     nodes.push(node);
  1003|     node = node.nextSibling;
  1004|   }
  1005|   return nodes;
  1006| }
  1007| /**
  1008|  * listing descendant nodes
  1009|  *
  1010|  * @param {Node} node
  1011|  * @param {Function} [pred] - predicate function
  1012|  */
  1013| function listDescendant(node, pred) {
  1014|   var descendants = [];
  1015|   pred = pred || func.ok; // start DFS(depth first search) with node
  1016|   (function fnWalk(current) {
  1017|     if (node !== current && pred(current)) {
  1018|       descendants.push(current);
  1019|     }
  1020|     for (var idx = 0, len = current.childNodes.length; idx < len; idx++) {
  1021|       fnWalk(current.childNodes[idx]);
  1022|     }
  1023|   })(node);
  1024|   return descendants;
  1025| }
  1026| /**
  1027|  * wrap node with new tag.
  1028|  *
  1029|  * @param {Node} node
  1030|  * @param {Node} tagName of wrapper
  1031|  * @return {Node} - wrapper
  1032|  */
  1033| function wrap(node, wrapperName) {
  1034|   var parent = node.parentNode;
  1035|   var wrapper = external_jQuery_default()('<' + wrapperName + '>')[0];
  1036|   parent.insertBefore(wrapper, node);
  1037|   wrapper.appendChild(node);
  1038|   return wrapper;
  1039| }
  1040| /**
  1041|  * insert node after preceding
  1042|  *
  1043|  * @param {Node} node
  1044|  * @param {Node} preceding - predicate function
  1045|  */
  1046| function insertAfter(node, preceding) {
  1047|   var next = preceding.nextSibling;
  1048|   var parent = preceding.parentNode;
  1049|   if (next) {
  1050|     parent.insertBefore(node, next);
  1051|   } else {
  1052|     parent.appendChild(node);
  1053|   }
  1054|   return node;
  1055| }
  1056| /**
  1057|  * append elements.
  1058|  *
  1059|  * @param {Node} node
  1060|  * @param {Collection} aChild
  1061|  */
  1062| function appendChildNodes(node, aChild) {
  1063|   external_jQuery_default().each(aChild, function (idx, child) {
  1064|     node.appendChild(child);
  1065|   });
  1066|   return node;
  1067| }
  1068| /**
  1069|  * returns whether boundaryPoint is left edge or not.
  1070|  *
  1071|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1072|  * @return {Boolean}
  1073|  */
  1074| function isLeftEdgePoint(point) {
  1075|   return point.offset === 0;
  1076| }
  1077| /**
  1078|  * returns whether boundaryPoint is right edge or not.
  1079|  *
  1080|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1081|  * @return {Boolean}
  1082|  */
  1083| function isRightEdgePoint(point) {
  1084|   return point.offset === nodeLength(point.node);
  1085| }
  1086| /**
  1087|  * returns whether boundaryPoint is edge or not.
  1088|  *
  1089|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1090|  * @return {Boolean}
  1091|  */
  1092| function isEdgePoint(point) {
  1093|   return isLeftEdgePoint(point) || isRightEdgePoint(point);
  1094| }
  1095| /**
  1096|  * returns whether node is left edge of ancestor or not.
  1097|  *
  1098|  * @param {Node} node
  1099|  * @param {Node} ancestor
  1100|  * @return {Boolean}
  1101|  */
  1102| function isLeftEdgeOf(node, ancestor) {
  1103|   while (node && node !== ancestor) {
  1104|     if (position(node) !== 0) {
  1105|       return false;
  1106|     }
  1107|     node = node.parentNode;
  1108|   }
  1109|   return true;
  1110| }
  1111| /**
  1112|  * returns whether node is right edge of ancestor or not.
  1113|  *
  1114|  * @param {Node} node
  1115|  * @param {Node} ancestor
  1116|  * @return {Boolean}
  1117|  */
  1118| function isRightEdgeOf(node, ancestor) {
  1119|   if (!ancestor) {
  1120|     return false;
  1121|   }
  1122|   while (node && node !== ancestor) {
  1123|     if (position(node) !== nodeLength(node.parentNode) - 1) {
  1124|       return false;
  1125|     }
  1126|     node = node.parentNode;
  1127|   }
  1128|   return true;
  1129| }
  1130| /**
  1131|  * returns whether point is left edge of ancestor or not.
  1132|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1133|  * @param {Node} ancestor
  1134|  * @return {Boolean}
  1135|  */
  1136| function isLeftEdgePointOf(point, ancestor) {
  1137|   return isLeftEdgePoint(point) && isLeftEdgeOf(point.node, ancestor);
  1138| }
  1139| /**
  1140|  * returns whether point is right edge of ancestor or not.
  1141|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1142|  * @param {Node} ancestor
  1143|  * @return {Boolean}
  1144|  */
  1145| function isRightEdgePointOf(point, ancestor) {
  1146|   return isRightEdgePoint(point) && isRightEdgeOf(point.node, ancestor);
  1147| }
  1148| /**
  1149|  * returns offset from parent.
  1150|  *
  1151|  * @param {Node} node
  1152|  */
  1153| function position(node) {
  1154|   var offset = 0;
  1155|   while (node = node.previousSibling) {
  1156|     offset += 1;
  1157|   }
  1158|   return offset;
  1159| }
  1160| function hasChildren(node) {
  1161|   return !!(node && node.childNodes && node.childNodes.length);
  1162| }
  1163| /**
  1164|  * returns previous boundaryPoint
  1165|  *
  1166|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1167|  * @param {Boolean} isSkipInnerOffset
  1168|  * @return {BoundaryPoint}
  1169|  */
  1170| function prevPoint(point, isSkipInnerOffset) {
  1171|   var node;
  1172|   var offset;
  1173|   if (point.offset === 0) {
  1174|     if (isEditable(point.node)) {
  1175|       return null;
  1176|     }
  1177|     node = point.node.parentNode;
  1178|     offset = position(point.node);
  1179|   } else if (hasChildren(point.node)) {
  1180|     node = point.node.childNodes[point.offset - 1];
  1181|     offset = nodeLength(node);
  1182|   } else {
  1183|     node = point.node;
  1184|     offset = isSkipInnerOffset ? 0 : point.offset - 1;
  1185|   }
  1186|   return {
  1187|     node: node,
  1188|     offset: offset
  1189|   };
  1190| }
  1191| /**
  1192|  * returns next boundaryPoint
  1193|  *
  1194|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1195|  * @param {Boolean} isSkipInnerOffset
  1196|  * @return {BoundaryPoint}
  1197|  */
  1198| function nextPoint(point, isSkipInnerOffset) {
  1199|   var node, offset;
  1200|   if (nodeLength(point.node) === point.offset) {
  1201|     if (isEditable(point.node)) {
  1202|       return null;
  1203|     }
  1204|     var nextTextNode = getNextTextNode(point.node);
  1205|     if (nextTextNode) {
  1206|       node = nextTextNode;
  1207|       offset = 0;
  1208|     } else {
  1209|       node = point.node.parentNode;
  1210|       offset = position(point.node) + 1;
  1211|     }
  1212|   } else if (hasChildren(point.node)) {
  1213|     node = point.node.childNodes[point.offset];
  1214|     offset = 0;
  1215|   } else {
  1216|     node = point.node;
  1217|     offset = isSkipInnerOffset ? nodeLength(point.node) : point.offset + 1;
  1218|   }
  1219|   return {
  1220|     node: node,
  1221|     offset: offset
  1222|   };
  1223| }
  1224| /**
  1225|  * returns next boundaryPoint with empty node
  1226|  *
  1227|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1228|  * @param {Boolean} isSkipInnerOffset
  1229|  * @return {BoundaryPoint}
  1230|  */
  1231| function nextPointWithEmptyNode(point, isSkipInnerOffset) {
  1232|   var node,
  1233|       offset = 0; // if node is empty string node, return current node's sibling.
  1234|   if (dom_isEmpty(point.node)) {
  1235|     if (point.node === null) {
  1236|       return null;
  1237|     }
  1238|     node = point.node.nextSibling;
  1239|     offset = 0;
  1240|     return {
  1241|       node: node,
  1242|       offset: offset
  1243|     };
  1244|   }
  1245|   if (nodeLength(point.node) === point.offset) {
  1246|     if (isEditable(point.node)) {
  1247|       return null;
  1248|     }
  1249|     node = point.node.parentNode;
  1250|     offset = position(point.node) + 1; // if next node is editable ,  return current node's sibling node.
  1251|     if (isEditable(node)) {
  1252|       node = point.node.nextSibling;
  1253|       offset = 0;
  1254|     }
  1255|   } else if (hasChildren(point.node)) {
  1256|     node = point.node.childNodes[point.offset];
  1257|     offset = 0;
  1258|     if (dom_isEmpty(node)) {
  1259|       if (!dom_isEmpty(point.node.nextSibling)) {
  1260|         return {
  1261|           node: point.node.nextSibling,
  1262|           offset: offset
  1263|         };
  1264|       }
  1265|       return null;
  1266|     }
  1267|   } else {
  1268|     node = point.node;
  1269|     offset = isSkipInnerOffset ? nodeLength(point.node) : point.offset + 1;
  1270|     if (dom_isEmpty(node)) {
  1271|       return null;
  1272|     }
  1273|   }
  1274|   return {
  1275|     node: node,
  1276|     offset: offset
  1277|   };
  1278| }
  1279| /*
  1280| * returns the next Text node index or 0 if not found.
  1281| */
  1282| function getNextTextNode(actual) {
  1283|   if (!actual.nextSibling) return undefined;
  1284|   if (actual.parent !== actual.nextSibling.parent) return undefined;
  1285|   if (isText(actual.nextSibling)) return actual.nextSibling;else return getNextTextNode(actual.nextSibling);
  1286| }
  1287| /**
  1288|  * returns whether pointA and pointB is same or not.
  1289|  *
  1290|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} pointA
  1291|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} pointB
  1292|  * @return {Boolean}
  1293|  */
  1294| function isSamePoint(pointA, pointB) {
  1295|   return pointA.node === pointB.node && pointA.offset === pointB.offset;
  1296| }
  1297| /**
  1298|  * returns whether point is visible (can set cursor) or not.
  1299|  *
  1300|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1301|  * @return {Boolean}
  1302|  */
  1303| function isVisiblePoint(point) {
  1304|   if (isText(point.node) || !hasChildren(point.node) || dom_isEmpty(point.node)) {
  1305|     return true;
  1306|   }
  1307|   var leftNode = point.node.childNodes[point.offset - 1];
  1308|   var rightNode = point.node.childNodes[point.offset];
  1309|   if ((!leftNode || isVoid(leftNode)) && (!rightNode || isVoid(rightNode)) || isTable(rightNode)) {
  1310|     return true;
  1311|   }
  1312|   return false;
  1313| }
  1314| /**
  1315|  * @method prevPointUtil
  1316|  *
  1317|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1318|  * @param {Function} pred
  1319|  * @return {BoundaryPoint}
  1320|  */
  1321| function prevPointUntil(point, pred) {
  1322|   while (point) {
  1323|     if (pred(point)) {
  1324|       return point;
  1325|     }
  1326|     point = prevPoint(point);
  1327|   }
  1328|   return null;
  1329| }
  1330| /**
  1331|  * @method nextPointUntil
  1332|  *
  1333|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1334|  * @param {Function} pred
  1335|  * @return {BoundaryPoint}
  1336|  */
  1337| function nextPointUntil(point, pred) {
  1338|   while (point) {
  1339|     if (pred(point)) {
  1340|       return point;
  1341|     }
  1342|     point = nextPoint(point);
  1343|   }
  1344|   return null;
  1345| }
  1346| /**
  1347|  * returns whether point has character or not.
  1348|  *
  1349|  * @param {Point} point
  1350|  * @return {Boolean}
  1351|  */
  1352| function isCharPoint(point) {
  1353|   if (!isText(point.node)) {
  1354|     return false;
  1355|   }
  1356|   var ch = point.node.nodeValue.charAt(point.offset - 1);
  1357|   return ch && ch !== ' ' && ch !== NBSP_CHAR;
  1358| }
  1359| /**
  1360|  * returns whether point has space or not.
  1361|  *
  1362|  * @param {Point} point
  1363|  * @return {Boolean}
  1364|  */
  1365| function isSpacePoint(point) {
  1366|   if (!isText(point.node)) {
  1367|     return false;
  1368|   }
  1369|   var ch = point.node.nodeValue.charAt(point.offset - 1);
  1370|   return ch === ' ' || ch === NBSP_CHAR;
  1371| }
  1372| /**
  1373|  * @method walkPoint
  1374|  *
  1375|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} startPoint
  1376|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} endPoint
  1377|  * @param {Function} handler
  1378|  * @param {Boolean} isSkipInnerOffset
  1379|  */
  1380| function walkPoint(startPoint, endPoint, handler, isSkipInnerOffset) {
  1381|   var point = startPoint;
  1382|   while (point) {
  1383|     handler(point);
  1384|     if (isSamePoint(point, endPoint)) {
  1385|       break;
  1386|     }
  1387|     var isSkipOffset = isSkipInnerOffset && startPoint.node !== point.node && endPoint.node !== point.node;
  1388|     point = nextPointWithEmptyNode(point, isSkipOffset);
  1389|   }
  1390| }
  1391| /**
  1392|  * @method makeOffsetPath
  1393|  *
  1394|  * return offsetPath(array of offset) from ancestor
  1395|  *
  1396|  * @param {Node} ancestor - ancestor node
  1397|  * @param {Node} node
  1398|  */
  1399| function makeOffsetPath(ancestor, node) {
  1400|   var ancestors = listAncestor(node, func.eq(ancestor));
  1401|   return ancestors.map(position).reverse();
  1402| }
  1403| /**
  1404|  * @method fromOffsetPath
  1405|  *
  1406|  * return element from offsetPath(array of offset)
  1407|  *
  1408|  * @param {Node} ancestor - ancestor node
  1409|  * @param {array} offsets - offsetPath
  1410|  */
  1411| function fromOffsetPath(ancestor, offsets) {
  1412|   var current = ancestor;
  1413|   for (var i = 0, len = offsets.length; i < len; i++) {
  1414|     if (current.childNodes.length <= offsets[i]) {
  1415|       current = current.childNodes[current.childNodes.length - 1];
  1416|     } else {
  1417|       current = current.childNodes[offsets[i]];
  1418|     }
  1419|   }
  1420|   return current;
  1421| }
  1422| /**
  1423|  * @method splitNode
  1424|  *
  1425|  * split element or #text
  1426|  *
  1427|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1428|  * @param {Object} [options]
  1429|  * @param {Boolean} [options.isSkipPaddingBlankHTML] - default: false
  1430|  * @param {Boolean} [options.isNotSplitEdgePoint] - default: false
  1431|  * @param {Boolean} [options.isDiscardEmptySplits] - default: false
  1432|  * @return {Node} right node of boundaryPoint
  1433|  */
  1434| function splitNode(point, options) {
  1435|   var isSkipPaddingBlankHTML = options && options.isSkipPaddingBlankHTML;
  1436|   var isNotSplitEdgePoint = options && options.isNotSplitEdgePoint;
  1437|   var isDiscardEmptySplits = options && options.isDiscardEmptySplits;
  1438|   if (isDiscardEmptySplits) {
  1439|     isSkipPaddingBlankHTML = true;
  1440|   } // edge case
  1441|   if (isEdgePoint(point) && (isText(point.node) || isNotSplitEdgePoint)) {
  1442|     if (isLeftEdgePoint(point)) {
  1443|       return point.node;
  1444|     } else if (isRightEdgePoint(point)) {
  1445|       return point.node.nextSibling;
  1446|     }
  1447|   } // split #text
  1448|   if (isText(point.node)) {
  1449|     return point.node.splitText(point.offset);
  1450|   } else {
  1451|     var childNode = point.node.childNodes[point.offset];
  1452|     var clone = insertAfter(point.node.cloneNode(false), point.node);
  1453|     appendChildNodes(clone, listNext(childNode));
  1454|     if (!isSkipPaddingBlankHTML) {
  1455|       paddingBlankHTML(point.node);
  1456|       paddingBlankHTML(clone);
  1457|     }
  1458|     if (isDiscardEmptySplits) {
  1459|       if (dom_isEmpty(point.node)) {
  1460|         remove(point.node);
  1461|       }
  1462|       if (dom_isEmpty(clone)) {
  1463|         remove(clone);
  1464|         return point.node.nextSibling;
  1465|       }
  1466|     }
  1467|     return clone;
  1468|   }
  1469| }
  1470| /**
  1471|  * @method splitTree
  1472|  *
  1473|  * split tree by point
  1474|  *
  1475|  * @param {Node} root - split root
  1476|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  1477|  * @param {Object} [options]
  1478|  * @param {Boolean} [options.isSkipPaddingBlankHTML] - default: false
  1479|  * @param {Boolean} [options.isNotSplitEdgePoint] - default: false
  1480|  * @return {Node} right node of boundaryPoint
  1481|  */
  1482| function splitTree(root, point, options) {
  1483|   var ancestors = listAncestor(point.node, func.eq(root));
  1484|   if (!ancestors.length) {
  1485|     return null;
  1486|   } else if (ancestors.length === 1) {
  1487|     return splitNode(point, options);
  1488|   }
  1489|   return ancestors.reduce(function (node, parent) {
  1490|     if (node === point.node) {
  1491|       node = splitNode(point, options);
  1492|     }
  1493|     return splitNode({
  1494|       node: parent,
  1495|       offset: node ? position(node) : nodeLength(parent)
  1496|     }, options);
  1497|   });
  1498| }
  1499| /**
  1500|  * split point
  1501|  *
  1502|  * @param {Point} point
  1503|  * @param {Boolean} isInline
  1504|  * @return {Object}
  1505|  */
  1506| function splitPoint(point, isInline) {
  1507|   var pred = isInline ? isPara : isBodyContainer;
  1508|   var ancestors = listAncestor(point.node, pred);
  1509|   var topAncestor = lists.last(ancestors) || point.node;
  1510|   var splitRoot, container;
  1511|   if (pred(topAncestor)) {
  1512|     splitRoot = ancestors[ancestors.length - 2];
  1513|     container = topAncestor;
  1514|   } else {
  1515|     splitRoot = topAncestor;
  1516|     container = splitRoot.parentNode;
  1517|   } // if splitRoot is exists, split with splitTree
  1518|   var pivot = splitRoot && splitTree(splitRoot, point, {
  1519|     isSkipPaddingBlankHTML: isInline,
  1520|     isNotSplitEdgePoint: isInline
  1521|   }); // if container is point.node, find pivot with point.offset
  1522|   if (!pivot && container === point.node) {
  1523|     pivot = point.node.childNodes[point.offset];
  1524|   }
  1525|   return {
  1526|     rightNode: pivot,
  1527|     container: container
  1528|   };
  1529| }
  1530| function create(nodeName) {
  1531|   return document.createElement(nodeName);
  1532| }
  1533| function createText(text) {
  1534|   return document.createTextNode(text);
  1535| }
  1536| /**
  1537|  * @method remove
  1538|  *
  1539|  * remove node, (isRemoveChild: remove child or not)
  1540|  *
  1541|  * @param {Node} node
  1542|  * @param {Boolean} isRemoveChild
  1543|  */
  1544| function remove(node, isRemoveChild) {
  1545|   if (!node || !node.parentNode) {
  1546|     return;
  1547|   }
  1548|   if (node.removeNode) {
  1549|     return node.removeNode(isRemoveChild);
  1550|   }
  1551|   var parent = node.parentNode;
  1552|   if (!isRemoveChild) {
  1553|     var nodes = [];
  1554|     for (var i = 0, len = node.childNodes.length; i < len; i++) {
  1555|       nodes.push(node.childNodes[i]);
  1556|     }
  1557|     for (var _i = 0, _len = nodes.length; _i < _len; _i++) {
  1558|       parent.insertBefore(nodes[_i], node);
  1559|     }
  1560|   }
  1561|   parent.removeChild(node);
  1562| }
  1563| /**
  1564|  * @method removeWhile
  1565|  *
  1566|  * @param {Node} node
  1567|  * @param {Function} pred
  1568|  */
  1569| function removeWhile(node, pred) {
  1570|   while (node) {
  1571|     if (isEditable(node) || !pred(node)) {
  1572|       break;
  1573|     }
  1574|     var parent = node.parentNode;
  1575|     remove(node);
  1576|     node = parent;
  1577|   }
  1578| }
  1579| /**
  1580|  * @method replace
  1581|  *
  1582|  * replace node with provided nodeName
  1583|  *
  1584|  * @param {Node} node
  1585|  * @param {String} nodeName
  1586|  * @return {Node} - new node
  1587|  */
  1588| function replace(node, nodeName) {
  1589|   if (node.nodeName.toUpperCase() === nodeName.toUpperCase()) {
  1590|     return node;
  1591|   }
  1592|   var newNode = create(nodeName);
  1593|   if (node.style.cssText) {
  1594|     newNode.style.cssText = node.style.cssText;
  1595|   }
  1596|   appendChildNodes(newNode, lists.from(node.childNodes));
  1597|   insertAfter(newNode, node);
  1598|   remove(node);
  1599|   return newNode;
  1600| }
  1601| var isTextarea = makePredByNodeName('TEXTAREA');
  1602| /**
  1603|  * @param {jQuery} $node
  1604|  * @param {Boolean} [stripLinebreaks] - default: false
  1605|  */
  1606| function value($node, stripLinebreaks) {
  1607|   var val = isTextarea($node[0]) ? $node.val() : $node.html();
  1608|   if (stripLinebreaks) {
  1609|     return val.replace(/[\n\r]/g, '');
  1610|   }
  1611|   return val;
  1612| }
  1613| /**
  1614|  * @method html
  1615|  *
  1616|  * get the HTML contents of node
  1617|  *
  1618|  * @param {jQuery} $node
  1619|  * @param {Boolean} [isNewlineOnBlock]
  1620|  */
  1621| function html($node, isNewlineOnBlock) {
  1622|   var markup = value($node);
  1623|   if (isNewlineOnBlock) {
  1624|     var regexTag = /<(\/?)(\b(?!!)[^>\s]*)(.*?)(\s*\/?>)/g;
  1625|     markup = markup.replace(regexTag, function (match, endSlash, name) {
  1626|       name = name.toUpperCase();
  1627|       var isEndOfInlineContainer = /^DIV|^TD|^TH|^P|^LI|^H[1-7]/.test(name) && !!endSlash;
  1628|       var isBlockNode = /^BLOCKQUOTE|^TABLE|^TBODY|^TR|^HR|^UL|^OL/.test(name);
  1629|       return match + (isEndOfInlineContainer || isBlockNode ? '\n' : '');
  1630|     });
  1631|     markup = markup.trim();
  1632|   }
  1633|   return markup;
  1634| }
  1635| function posFromPlaceholder(placeholder) {
  1636|   var $placeholder = external_jQuery_default()(placeholder);
  1637|   var pos = $placeholder.offset();
  1638|   var height = $placeholder.outerHeight(true); // include margin
  1639|   return {
  1640|     left: pos.left,
  1641|     top: pos.top + height
  1642|   };
  1643| }
  1644| function attachEvents($node, events) {
  1645|   Object.keys(events).forEach(function (key) {
  1646|     $node.on(key, events[key]);
  1647|   });
  1648| }
  1649| function detachEvents($node, events) {
  1650|   Object.keys(events).forEach(function (key) {
  1651|     $node.off(key, events[key]);
  1652|   });
  1653| }
  1654| /**
  1655|  * @method isCustomStyleTag
  1656|  *
  1657|  * assert if a node contains a "note-styletag" class,
  1658|  * which implies that's a custom-made style tag node
  1659|  *
  1660|  * @param {Node} an HTML DOM node
  1661|  */
  1662| function isCustomStyleTag(node) {
  1663|   return node && !isText(node) && lists.contains(node.classList, 'note-styletag');
  1664| }

  1975|     value: function invoke() {
  1976|       var namespace = lists.head(arguments);
  1977|       var args = lists.tail(lists.from(arguments));
  1978|       var splits = namespace.split('.');
  1979|       var hasSeparator = splits.length > 1;
  1980|       var moduleName = hasSeparator && lists.head(splits);
  1981|       var methodName = hasSeparator ? lists.last(splits) : lists.head(splits);
  1982|       var module = this.modules[moduleName || 'editor'];
  1983|       if (!moduleName && this[methodName]) {
  1984|         return this[methodName].apply(this, args);
  1985|       } else if (module && module[methodName] && module.shouldInitialize()) {
  1986|         return module[methodName].apply(module, args);
  1987|       }
  1988|     }

  1992| ;// CONCATENATED MODULE: ./src/js/summernote.js
  1993| external_jQuery_default().fn.extend({
  1994|   /**
  1995|    * Summernote API
  1996|    *
  1997|    * @param {Object|String}
  1998|    * @return {this}
  1999|    */
  2000|   summernote: function summernote() {
  2001|     var type = external_jQuery_default().type(lists.head(arguments));
  2002|     var isExternalAPICalled = type === 'string';
  2003|     var hasInitOptions = type === 'object';
  2004|     var options = external_jQuery_default().extend({}, (external_jQuery_default()).summernote.options, hasInitOptions ? lists.head(arguments) : {}); // Update options
  2005|     options.langInfo = external_jQuery_default().extend(true, {}, (external_jQuery_default()).summernote.lang["en-US"], (external_jQuery_default()).summernote.lang[options.lang]);
  2006|     options.icons = external_jQuery_default().extend(true, {}, (external_jQuery_default()).summernote.options.icons, options.icons);
  2007|     options.tooltip = options.tooltip === 'auto' ? !env.isSupportTouch : options.tooltip;
  2008|     this.each(function (idx, note) {
  2009|       var $note = external_jQuery_default()(note);
  2010|       if (!$note.data('summernote')) {
  2011|         var context = new Context($note, options);
  2012|         $note.data('summernote', context);
  2013|         $note.data('summernote').triggerEvent('init', context.layoutInfo);
  2014|       }
  2015|     });
  2016|     var $note = this.first();
  2017|     if ($note.length) {
  2018|       var context = $note.data('summernote');
  2019|       if (isExternalAPICalled) {
  2020|         return context.invoke.apply(context, lists.from(arguments));
  2021|       } else if (options.focus) {
  2022|         context.invoke('editor.focus');
  2023|       }
  2024|     }
  2025|     return this;
  2026|   }
  2027| });
  2028| ;// CONCATENATED MODULE: ./src/js/core/range.js
  2029| function range_classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError("Cannot call a class as a function"); } }
  2030| function range_defineProperties(target, props) { for (var i = 0; i < props.length; i++) { var descriptor = props[i]; descriptor.enumerable = descriptor.enumerable || false; descriptor.configurable = true; if ("value" in descriptor) descriptor.writable = true; Object.defineProperty(target, descriptor.key, descriptor); } }
  2031| function range_createClass(Constructor, protoProps, staticProps) { if (protoProps) range_defineProperties(Constructor.prototype, protoProps); if (staticProps) range_defineProperties(Constructor, staticProps); return Constructor; }
  2032| /**
  2033|  * return boundaryPoint from TextRange, inspired by Andy Na's HuskyRange.js
  2034|  *
  2035|  * @param {TextRange} textRange
  2036|  * @param {Boolean} isStart
  2037|  * @return {BoundaryPoint}
  2038|  *
  2039|  * @see http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ie/ms535872(v=vs.85).aspx
  2040|  */
  2041| function textRangeToPoint(textRange, isStart) {
  2042|   var container = textRange.parentElement();
  2043|   var offset;
  2044|   var tester = document.body.createTextRange();
  2045|   var prevContainer;
  2046|   var childNodes = lists.from(container.childNodes);
  2047|   for (offset = 0; offset < childNodes.length; offset++) {
  2048|     if (dom.isText(childNodes[offset])) {
  2049|       continue;
  2050|     }
  2051|     tester.moveToElementText(childNodes[offset]);
  2052|     if (tester.compareEndPoints('StartToStart', textRange) >= 0) {
  2053|       break;
  2054|     }
  2055|     prevContainer = childNodes[offset];
  2056|   }
  2057|   if (offset !== 0 && dom.isText(childNodes[offset - 1])) {
  2058|     var textRangeStart = document.body.createTextRange();
  2059|     var curTextNode = null;
  2060|     textRangeStart.moveToElementText(prevContainer || container);
  2061|     textRangeStart.collapse(!prevContainer);
  2062|     curTextNode = prevContainer ? prevContainer.nextSibling : container.firstChild;
  2063|     var pointTester = textRange.duplicate();
  2064|     pointTester.setEndPoint('StartToStart', textRangeStart);
  2065|     var textCount = pointTester.text.replace(/[\r\n]/g, '').length;
  2066|     while (textCount > curTextNode.nodeValue.length && curTextNode.nextSibling) {
  2067|       textCount -= curTextNode.nodeValue.length;
  2068|       curTextNode = curTextNode.nextSibling;
  2069|     } // [workaround] enforce IE to re-reference curTextNode, hack
  2070|     var dummy = curTextNode.nodeValue; // eslint-disable-line
  2071|     if (isStart && curTextNode.nextSibling && dom.isText(curTextNode.nextSibling) && textCount === curTextNode.nodeValue.length) {
  2072|       textCount -= curTextNode.nodeValue.length;
  2073|       curTextNode = curTextNode.nextSibling;
  2074|     }
  2075|     container = curTextNode;
  2076|     offset = textCount;
  2077|   }
  2078|   return {
  2079|     cont: container,
  2080|     offset: offset
  2081|   };
  2082| }
  2083| /**
  2084|  * return TextRange from boundary point (inspired by google closure-library)
  2085|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  2086|  * @return {TextRange}
  2087|  */
  2088| function pointToTextRange(point) {
  2089|   var textRangeInfo = function textRangeInfo(container, offset) {
  2090|     var node, isCollapseToStart;
  2091|     if (dom.isText(container)) {
  2092|       var prevTextNodes = dom.listPrev(container, func.not(dom.isText));
  2093|       var prevContainer = lists.last(prevTextNodes).previousSibling;
  2094|       node = prevContainer || container.parentNode;
  2095|       offset += lists.sum(lists.tail(prevTextNodes), dom.nodeLength);
  2096|       isCollapseToStart = !prevContainer;
  2097|     } else {
  2098|       node = container.childNodes[offset] || container;
  2099|       if (dom.isText(node)) {
  2100|         return textRangeInfo(node, 0);
  2101|       }
  2102|       offset = 0;
  2103|       isCollapseToStart = false;
  2104|     }
  2105|     return {
  2106|       node: node,
  2107|       collapseToStart: isCollapseToStart,
  2108|       offset: offset
  2109|     };
  2110|   };
  2111|   var textRange = document.body.createTextRange();
  2112|   var info = textRangeInfo(point.node, point.offset);
  2113|   textRange.moveToElementText(info.node);
  2114|   textRange.collapse(info.collapseToStart);
  2115|   textRange.moveStart('character', info.offset);
  2116|   return textRange;
  2117| }
  2118| /**
  2119|    * Wrapped Range
  2120|    *
  2121|    * @constructor
  2122|    * @param {Node} sc - start container
  2123|    * @param {Number} so - start offset
  2124|    * @param {Node} ec - end container
  2125|    * @param {Number} eo - end offset
  2126|    */
  2127| var WrappedRange = /*#__PURE__*/function () {
  2128|   function WrappedRange(sc, so, ec, eo) {
  2129|     range_classCallCheck(this, WrappedRange);
  2130|     this.sc = sc;
  2131|     this.so = so;
  2132|     this.ec = ec;
  2133|     this.eo = eo; // isOnEditable: judge whether range is on editable or not
  2134|     this.isOnEditable = this.makeIsOn(dom.isEditable); // isOnList: judge whether range is on list node or not
  2135|     this.isOnList = this.makeIsOn(dom.isList); // isOnAnchor: judge whether range is on anchor node or not
  2136|     this.isOnAnchor = this.makeIsOn(dom.isAnchor); // isOnCell: judge whether range is on cell node or not
  2137|     this.isOnCell = this.makeIsOn(dom.isCell); // isOnData: judge whether range is on data node or not
  2138|     this.isOnData = this.makeIsOn(dom.isData);
  2139|   } // nativeRange: get nativeRange from sc, so, ec, eo
  2140|   range_createClass(WrappedRange, [{
  2141|     key: "nativeRange",
  2142|     value: function nativeRange() {
  2143|       if (env.isW3CRangeSupport) {
  2144|         var w3cRange = document.createRange();
  2145|         w3cRange.setStart(this.sc, this.so);
  2146|         w3cRange.setEnd(this.ec, this.eo);
  2147|         return w3cRange;
  2148|       } else {
  2149|         var textRange = pointToTextRange({
  2150|           node: this.sc,
  2151|           offset: this.so
  2152|         });
  2153|         textRange.setEndPoint('EndToEnd', pointToTextRange({
  2154|           node: this.ec,
  2155|           offset: this.eo
  2156|         }));
  2157|         return textRange;
  2158|       }
  2159|     }
  2160|   }, {
  2161|     key: "getPoints",
  2162|     value: function getPoints() {
  2163|       return {
  2164|         sc: this.sc,
  2165|         so: this.so,
  2166|         ec: this.ec,
  2167|         eo: this.eo
  2168|       };
  2169|     }
  2170|   }, {
  2171|     key: "getStartPoint",
  2172|     value: function getStartPoint() {
  2173|       return {
  2174|         node: this.sc,
  2175|         offset: this.so
  2176|       };
  2177|     }
  2178|   }, {
  2179|     key: "getEndPoint",
  2180|     value: function getEndPoint() {
  2181|       return {
  2182|         node: this.ec,
  2183|         offset: this.eo
  2184|       };
  2185|     }
  2186|     /**
  2187|      * select update visible range
  2188|      */
  2189|   }, {
  2190|     key: "select",
  2191|     value: function select() {
  2192|       var nativeRng = this.nativeRange();
  2193|       if (env.isW3CRangeSupport) {
  2194|         var selection = document.getSelection();
  2195|         if (selection.rangeCount > 0) {
  2196|           selection.removeAllRanges();
  2197|         }
  2198|         selection.addRange(nativeRng);
  2199|       } else {
  2200|         nativeRng.select();
  2201|       }
  2202|       return this;
  2203|     }
  2204|     /**
  2205|      * Moves the scrollbar to start container(sc) of current range
  2206|      *
  2207|      * @return {WrappedRange}
  2208|      */
  2209|   }, {
  2210|     key: "scrollIntoView",
  2211|     value: function scrollIntoView(container) {
  2212|       var height = external_jQuery_default()(container).height();
  2213|       if (container.scrollTop + height < this.sc.offsetTop) {
  2214|         container.scrollTop += Math.abs(container.scrollTop + height - this.sc.offsetTop);
  2215|       }
  2216|       return this;
  2217|     }
  2218|     /**
  2219|      * @return {WrappedRange}
  2220|      */
  2221|   }, {
  2222|     key: "normalize",
  2223|     value: function normalize() {
  2224|       /**
  2225|        * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
  2226|        * @param {Boolean} isLeftToRight - true: prefer to choose right node
  2227|        *                                - false: prefer to choose left node
  2228|        * @return {BoundaryPoint}
  2229|        */
  2230|       var getVisiblePoint = function getVisiblePoint(point, isLeftToRight) {
  2231|         if (!point) {
  2232|           return point;
  2233|         } // Just use the given point [XXX:Adhoc]
  2234|         if (dom.isVisiblePoint(point)) {
  2235|           if (!dom.isEdgePoint(point) || dom.isRightEdgePoint(point) && !isLeftToRight || dom.isLeftEdgePoint(point) && isLeftToRight || dom.isRightEdgePoint(point) && isLeftToRight && dom.isVoid(point.node.nextSibling) || dom.isLeftEdgePoint(point) && !isLeftToRight && dom.isVoid(point.node.previousSibling) || dom.isBlock(point.node) && dom.isEmpty(point.node)) {
  2236|             return point;
  2237|           }
  2238|         } // point on block's edge
  2239|         var block = dom.ancestor(point.node, dom.isBlock);
  2240|         var hasRightNode = false;
  2241|         if (!hasRightNode) {
  2242|           var prevPoint = dom.prevPoint(point) || {
  2243|             node: null
  2244|           };
  2245|           hasRightNode = (dom.isLeftEdgePointOf(point, block) || dom.isVoid(prevPoint.node)) && !isLeftToRight;
  2246|         }
  2247|         var hasLeftNode = false;
  2248|         if (!hasLeftNode) {
  2249|           var _nextPoint = dom.nextPoint(point) || {
  2250|             node: null
  2251|           };
  2252|           hasLeftNode = (dom.isRightEdgePointOf(point, block) || dom.isVoid(_nextPoint.node)) && isLeftToRight;
  2253|         }
  2254|         if (hasRightNode || hasLeftNode) {
  2255|           if (dom.isVisiblePoint(point)) {
  2256|             return point;
  2257|           } // reverse direction
  2258|           isLeftToRight = !isLeftToRight;
  2259|         }
  2260|         var nextPoint = isLeftToRight ? dom.nextPointUntil(dom.nextPoint(point), dom.isVisiblePoint) : dom.prevPointUntil(dom.prevPoint(point), dom.isVisiblePoint);
  2261|         return nextPoint || point;
  2262|       };
  2263|       var endPoint = getVisiblePoint(this.getEndPoint(), false);
  2264|       var startPoint = this.isCollapsed() ? endPoint : getVisiblePoint(this.getStartPoint(), true);
  2265|       return new WrappedRange(startPoint.node, startPoint.offset, endPoint.node, endPoint.offset);
  2266|     }
  2267|     /**
  2268|      * returns matched nodes on range
  2269|      *
  2270|      * @param {Function} [pred] - predicate function
  2271|      * @param {Object} [options]
  2272|      * @param {Boolean} [options.includeAncestor]
  2273|      * @param {Boolean} [options.fullyContains]
  2274|      * @return {Node[]}
  2275|      */
  2276|   }, {
  2277|     key: "nodes",
  2278|     value: function nodes(pred, options) {
  2279|       pred = pred || func.ok;
  2280|       var includeAncestor = options && options.includeAncestor;
  2281|       var fullyContains = options && options.fullyContains; // TODO compare points and sort
  2282|       var startPoint = this.getStartPoint();
  2283|       var endPoint = this.getEndPoint();
  2284|       var nodes = [];
  2285|       var leftEdgeNodes = [];
  2286|       dom.walkPoint(startPoint, endPoint, function (point) {
  2287|         if (dom.isEditable(point.node)) {
  2288|           return;
  2289|         }
  2290|         var node;
  2291|         if (fullyContains) {
  2292|           if (dom.isLeftEdgePoint(point)) {
  2293|             leftEdgeNodes.push(point.node);
  2294|           }
  2295|           if (dom.isRightEdgePoint(point) && lists.contains(leftEdgeNodes, point.node)) {
  2296|             node = point.node;
  2297|           }
  2298|         } else if (includeAncestor) {
  2299|           node = dom.ancestor(point.node, pred);
  2300|         } else {
  2301|           node = point.node;
  2302|         }
  2303|         if (node && pred(node)) {
  2304|           nodes.push(node);
  2305|         }
  2306|       }, true);
  2307|       return lists.unique(nodes);
  2308|     }
  2309|     /**
  2310|      * returns commonAncestor of range
  2311|      * @return {Element} - commonAncestor
  2312|      */
  2313|   }, {
  2314|     key: "commonAncestor",
  2315|     value: function commonAncestor() {
  2316|       return dom.commonAncestor(this.sc, this.ec);
  2317|     }
  2318|     /**
  2319|      * returns expanded range by pred
  2320|      *
  2321|      * @param {Function} pred - predicate function
  2322|      * @return {WrappedRange}
  2323|      */
  2324|   }, {
  2325|     key: "expand",
  2326|     value: function expand(pred) {
  2327|       var startAncestor = dom.ancestor(this.sc, pred);
  2328|       var endAncestor = dom.ancestor(this.ec, pred);
  2329|       if (!startAncestor && !endAncestor) {
  2330|         return new WrappedRange(this.sc, this.so, this.ec, this.eo);
  2331|       }
  2332|       var boundaryPoints = this.getPoints();
  2333|       if (startAncestor) {
  2334|         boundaryPoints.sc = startAncestor;
  2335|         boundaryPoints.so = 0;
  2336|       }
  2337|       if (endAncestor) {
  2338|         boundaryPoints.ec = endAncestor;
  2339|         boundaryPoints.eo = dom.nodeLength(endAncestor);
  2340|       }
  2341|       return new WrappedRange(boundaryPoints.sc, boundaryPoints.so, boundaryPoints.ec, boundaryPoints.eo);
  2342|     }
  2343|     /**
  2344|      * @param {Boolean} isCollapseToStart
  2345|      * @return {WrappedRange}
  2346|      */
  2347|   }, {
  2348|     key: "collapse",
  2349|     value: function collapse(isCollapseToStart) {
  2350|       if (isCollapseToStart) {
  2351|         return new WrappedRange(this.sc, this.so, this.sc, this.so);
  2352|       } else {
  2353|         return new WrappedRange(this.ec, this.eo, this.ec, this.eo);
  2354|       }
  2355|     }
  2356|     /**
  2357|      * splitText on range
  2358|      */
  2359|   }, {
  2360|     key: "splitText",
  2361|     value: function splitText() {
  2362|       var isSameContainer = this.sc === this.ec;
  2363|       var boundaryPoints = this.getPoints();
  2364|       if (dom.isText(this.ec) && !dom.isEdgePoint(this.getEndPoint())) {
  2365|         this.ec.splitText(this.eo);
  2366|       }
  2367|       if (dom.isText(this.sc) && !dom.isEdgePoint(this.getStartPoint())) {
  2368|         boundaryPoints.sc = this.sc.splitText(this.so);
  2369|         boundaryPoints.so = 0;
  2370|         if (isSameContainer) {
  2371|           boundaryPoints.ec = boundaryPoints.sc;
  2372|           boundaryPoints.eo = this.eo - this.so;
  2373|         }
  2374|       }
  2375|       return new WrappedRange(boundaryPoints.sc, boundaryPoints.so, boundaryPoints.ec, boundaryPoints.eo);
  2376|     }
  2377|     /**
  2378|      * delete contents on range
  2379|      * @return {WrappedRange}
  2380|      */
  2381|   }, {
  2382|     key: "deleteContents",
  2383|     value: function deleteContents() {
  2384|       if (this.isCollapsed()) {
  2385|         return this;
  2386|       }
  2387|       var rng = this.splitText();
  2388|       var nodes = rng.nodes(null, {
  2389|         fullyContains: true
  2390|       }); // find new cursor point
  2391|       var point = dom.prevPointUntil(rng.getStartPoint(), function (point) {
  2392|         return !lists.contains(nodes, point.node);
  2393|       });
  2394|       var emptyParents = [];
  2395|       external_jQuery_default().each(nodes, function (idx, node) {
  2396|         var parent = node.parentNode;
  2397|         if (point.node !== parent && dom.nodeLength(parent) === 1) {
  2398|           emptyParents.push(parent);
  2399|         }
  2400|         dom.remove(node, false);
  2401|       }); // remove empty parents
  2402|       external_jQuery_default().each(emptyParents, function (idx, node) {
  2403|         dom.remove(node, false);
  2404|       });
  2405|       return new WrappedRange(point.node, point.offset, point.node, point.offset).normalize();
  2406|     }
  2407|     /**
  2408|      * makeIsOn: return isOn(pred) function
  2409|      */
  2410|   }, {
  2411|     key: "makeIsOn",
  2412|     value: function makeIsOn(pred) {
  2413|       return function () {
  2414|         var ancestor = dom.ancestor(this.sc, pred);
  2415|         return !!ancestor && ancestor === dom.ancestor(this.ec, pred);
  2416|       };
  2417|     }
  2418|     /**
  2419|      * @param {Function} pred
  2420|      * @return {Boolean}
  2421|      */
  2422|   }, {
  2423|     key: "isLeftEdgeOf",
  2424|     value: function isLeftEdgeOf(pred) {
  2425|       if (!dom.isLeftEdgePoint(this.getStartPoint())) {
  2426|         return false;
  2427|       }
  2428|       var node = dom.ancestor(this.sc, pred);
  2429|       return node && dom.isLeftEdgeOf(this.sc, node);
  2430|     }
  2431|     /**
  2432|      * returns whether range was collapsed or not
  2433|      */
  2434|   }, {
  2435|     key: "isCollapsed",
  2436|     value: function isCollapsed() {
  2437|       return this.sc === this.ec && this.so === this.eo;
  2438|     }
  2439|     /**
  2440|      * wrap inline nodes which children of body with paragraph
  2441|      *
  2442|      * @return {WrappedRange}
  2443|      */
  2444|   }, {
  2445|     key: "wrapBodyInlineWithPara",
  2446|     value: function wrapBodyInlineWithPara() {
  2447|       if (dom.isBodyContainer(this.sc) && dom.isEmpty(this.sc)) {
  2448|         this.sc.innerHTML = dom.emptyPara;
  2449|         return new WrappedRange(this.sc.firstChild, 0, this.sc.firstChild, 0);
  2450|       }
  2451|       /**
  2452|        * [workaround] firefox often create range on not visible point. so normalize here.
  2453|        *  - firefox: |<p>text</p>|
  2454|        *  - chrome: <p>|text|</p>
  2455|        */
  2456|       var rng = this.normalize();
  2457|       if (dom.isParaInline(this.sc) || dom.isPara(this.sc)) {
  2458|         return rng;
  2459|       } // find inline top ancestor
  2460|       var topAncestor;
  2461|       if (dom.isInline(rng.sc)) {
  2462|         var ancestors = dom.listAncestor(rng.sc, func.not(dom.isInline));
  2463|         topAncestor = lists.last(ancestors);
  2464|         if (!dom.isInline(topAncestor)) {
  2465|           topAncestor = ancestors[ancestors.length - 2] || rng.sc.childNodes[rng.so];
  2466|         }
  2467|       } else {
  2468|         topAncestor = rng.sc.childNodes[rng.so > 0 ? rng.so - 1 : 0];
  2469|       }
  2470|       if (topAncestor) {
  2471|         var inlineSiblings = dom.listPrev(topAncestor, dom.isParaInline).reverse();
  2472|         inlineSiblings = inlineSiblings.concat(dom.listNext(topAncestor.nextSibling, dom.isParaInline)); // wrap with paragraph
  2473|         if (inlineSiblings.length) {
  2474|           var para = dom.wrap(lists.head(inlineSiblings), 'p');
  2475|           dom.appendChildNodes(para, lists.tail(inlineSiblings));
  2476|         }
  2477|       }
  2478|       return this.normalize();
  2479|     }
  2480|     /**
  2481|      * insert node at current cursor
  2482|      *
  2483|      * @param {Node} node
  2484|      * @return {Node}
  2485|      */
  2486|   }, {
  2487|     key: "insertNode",
  2488|     value: function insertNode(node) {
  2489|       var rng = this;
  2490|       if (dom.isText(node) || dom.isInline(node)) {
  2491|         rng = this.wrapBodyInlineWithPara().deleteContents();
  2492|       }
  2493|       var info = dom.splitPoint(rng.getStartPoint(), dom.isInline(node));
  2494|       if (info.rightNode) {
  2495|         info.rightNode.parentNode.insertBefore(node, info.rightNode);
  2496|         if (dom.isEmpty(info.rightNode) && dom.isPara(node)) {
  2497|           info.rightNode.parentNode.removeChild(info.rightNode);
  2498|         }
  2499|       } else {
  2500|         info.container.appendChild(node);
  2501|       }
  2502|       return node;
  2503|     }
  2504|     /**
  2505|      * insert html at current cursor
  2506|      */
  2507|   }, {
  2508|     key: "pasteHTML",
  2509|     value: function pasteHTML(markup) {
  2510|       markup = external_jQuery_default().trim(markup);
  2511|       var contentsContainer = external_jQuery_default()('<div></div>').html(markup)[0];
  2512|       var childNodes = lists.from(contentsContainer.childNodes); // const rng = this.wrapBodyInlineWithPara().deleteContents();
  2513|       var rng = this;
  2514|       var reversed = false;
  2515|       if (rng.so >= 0) {
  2516|         childNodes = childNodes.reverse();
  2517|         reversed = true;
  2518|       }
  2519|       childNodes = childNodes.map(function (childNode) {
  2520|         return rng.insertNode(childNode);
  2521|       });
  2522|       if (reversed) {
  2523|         childNodes = childNodes.reverse();
  2524|       }
  2525|       return childNodes;
  2526|     }
  2527|     /**
  2528|      * returns text in range
  2529|      *
  2530|      * @return {String}
  2531|      */
  2532|   }, {
  2533|     key: "toString",
  2534|     value: function toString() {
  2535|       var nativeRng = this.nativeRange();
  2536|       return env.isW3CRangeSupport ? nativeRng.toString() : nativeRng.text;
  2537|     }
  2538|     /**
  2539|      * returns range for word before cursor
  2540|      *
  2541|      * @param {Boolean} [findAfter] - find after cursor, default: false
  2542|      * @return {WrappedRange}
  2543|      */
  2544|   }, {
  2545|     key: "getWordRange",
  2546|     value: function getWordRange(findAfter) {
  2547|       var endPoint = this.getEndPoint();
  2548|       if (!dom.isCharPoint(endPoint)) {
  2549|         return this;
  2550|       }
  2551|       var startPoint = dom.prevPointUntil(endPoint, function (point) {
  2552|         return !dom.isCharPoint(point);
  2553|       });
  2554|       if (findAfter) {
  2555|         endPoint = dom.nextPointUntil(endPoint, function (point) {
  2556|           return !dom.isCharPoint(point);
  2557|         });
  2558|       }
  2559|       return new WrappedRange(startPoint.node, startPoint.offset, endPoint.node, endPoint.offset);
  2560|     }
  2561|     /**
  2562|      * returns range for words before cursor
  2563|      *
  2564|      * @param {Boolean} [findAfter] - find after cursor, default: false
  2565|      * @return {WrappedRange}
  2566|      */
  2567|   }, {
  2568|     key: "getWordsRange",
  2569|     value: function getWordsRange(findAfter) {
  2570|       var endPoint = this.getEndPoint();
  2571|       var isNotTextPoint = function isNotTextPoint(point) {
  2572|         return !dom.isCharPoint(point) && !dom.isSpacePoint(point);
  2573|       };
  2574|       if (isNotTextPoint(endPoint)) {
  2575|         return this;
  2576|       }
  2577|       var startPoint = dom.prevPointUntil(endPoint, isNotTextPoint);
  2578|       if (findAfter) {
  2579|         endPoint = dom.nextPointUntil(endPoint, isNotTextPoint);
  2580|       }
  2581|       return new WrappedRange(startPoint.node, startPoint.offset, endPoint.node, endPoint.offset);
  2582|     }
  2583|     /**
  2584|      * returns range for words before cursor that match with a Regex
  2585|      *
  2586|      * example:
  2587|      *  range: 'hi @Peter Pan'
  2588|      *  regex: '/@[a-z ]+/i'
  2589|      *  return range: '@Peter Pan'
  2590|      *
  2591|      * @param {RegExp} [regex]
  2592|      * @return {WrappedRange|null}
  2593|      */
  2594|   }, {
  2595|     key: "getWordsMatchRange",
  2596|     value: function getWordsMatchRange(regex) {
  2597|       var endPoint = this.getEndPoint();
  2598|       var startPoint = dom.prevPointUntil(endPoint, function (point) {
  2599|         if (!dom.isCharPoint(point) && !dom.isSpacePoint(point)) {
  2600|           return true;
  2601|         }
  2602|         var rng = new WrappedRange(point.node, point.offset, endPoint.node, endPoint.offset);
  2603|         var result = regex.exec(rng.toString());
  2604|         return result && result.index === 0;
  2605|       });
  2606|       var rng = new WrappedRange(startPoint.node, startPoint.offset, endPoint.node, endPoint.offset);
  2607|       var text = rng.toString();
  2608|       var result = regex.exec(text);
  2609|       if (result && result[0].length === text.length) {
  2610|         return rng;
  2611|       } else {
  2612|         return null;
  2613|       }
  2614|     }
  2615|     /**
  2616|      * create offsetPath bookmark
  2617|      *
  2618|      * @param {Node} editable
  2619|      */
  2620|   }, {
  2621|     key: "bookmark",
  2622|     value: function bookmark(editable) {
  2623|       return {
  2624|         s: {
  2625|           path: dom.makeOffsetPath(editable, this.sc),
  2626|           offset: this.so
  2627|         },
  2628|         e: {
  2629|           path: dom.makeOffsetPath(editable, this.ec),
  2630|           offset: this.eo
  2631|         }
  2632|       };
  2633|     }
  2634|     /**
  2635|      * create offsetPath bookmark base on paragraph
  2636|      *
  2637|      * @param {Node[]} paras
  2638|      */
  2639|   }, {
  2640|     key: "paraBookmark",
  2641|     value: function paraBookmark(paras) {
  2642|       return {
  2643|         s: {
  2644|           path: lists.tail(dom.makeOffsetPath(lists.head(paras), this.sc)),
  2645|           offset: this.so
  2646|         },
  2647|         e: {
  2648|           path: lists.tail(dom.makeOffsetPath(lists.last(paras), this.ec)),
  2649|           offset: this.eo
  2650|         }
  2651|       };
  2652|     }
  2653|     /**
  2654|      * getClientRects
  2655|      * @return {Rect[]}
  2656|      */
  2657|   }, {
  2658|     key: "getClientRects",
  2659|     value: function getClientRects() {
  2660|       var nativeRng = this.nativeRange();
  2661|       return nativeRng.getClientRects();
  2662|     }
  2663|   }]);
  2664|   return WrappedRange;
  2665| }();
  2666| /**
  2667|  * Data structure
  2668|  *  * BoundaryPoint: a point of dom tree
  2669|  *  * BoundaryPoints: two boundaryPoints corresponding to the start and the end of the Range
  2670|  *
  2671|  * See to http://www.w3.org/TR/DOM-Level-2-Traversal-Range/ranges.html#Level-2-Range-Position
  2672|  */
  2673| /* harmony default export */ const range = ({
  2674|   /**
  2675|    * create Range Object From arguments or Browser Selection
  2676|    *
  2677|    * @param {Node} sc - start container
  2678|    * @param {Number} so - start offset
  2679|    * @param {Node} ec - end container
  2680|    * @param {Number} eo - end offset
  2681|    * @return {WrappedRange}
  2682|    */
  2683|   create: function create(sc, so, ec, eo) {
  2684|     if (arguments.length === 4) {
  2685|       return new WrappedRange(sc, so, ec, eo);
  2686|     } else if (arguments.length === 2) {
  2687|       ec = sc;
  2688|       eo = so;
  2689|       return new WrappedRange(sc, so, ec, eo);
  2690|     } else {
  2691|       var wrappedRange = this.createFromSelection();
  2692|       if (!wrappedRange && arguments.length === 1) {
  2693|         var bodyElement = arguments[0];
  2694|         if (dom.isEditable(bodyElement)) {
  2695|           bodyElement = bodyElement.lastChild;
  2696|         }
  2697|         return this.createFromBodyElement(bodyElement, dom.emptyPara === arguments[0].innerHTML);
  2698|       }
  2699|       return wrappedRange;
  2700|     }
  2701|   },
  2702|   createFromBodyElement: function createFromBodyElement(bodyElement) {
  2703|     var isCollapseToStart = arguments.length > 1 && arguments[1] !== undefined ? arguments[1] : false;
  2704|     var wrappedRange = this.createFromNode(bodyElement);
  2705|     return wrappedRange.collapse(isCollapseToStart);
  2706|   },
  2707|   createFromSelection: function createFromSelection() {
  2708|     var sc, so, ec, eo;
  2709|     if (env.isW3CRangeSupport) {
  2710|       var selection = document.getSelection();
  2711|       if (!selection || selection.rangeCount === 0) {
  2712|         return null;
  2713|       } else if (dom.isBody(selection.anchorNode)) {
  2714|         return null;
  2715|       }
  2716|       var nativeRng = selection.getRangeAt(0);
  2717|       sc = nativeRng.startContainer;
  2718|       so = nativeRng.startOffset;
  2719|       ec = nativeRng.endContainer;
  2720|       eo = nativeRng.endOffset;
  2721|     } else {
  2722|       var textRange = document.selection.createRange();
  2723|       var textRangeEnd = textRange.duplicate();
  2724|       textRangeEnd.collapse(false);
  2725|       var textRangeStart = textRange;
  2726|       textRangeStart.collapse(true);
  2727|       var startPoint = textRangeToPoint(textRangeStart, true);
  2728|       var endPoint = textRangeToPoint(textRangeEnd, false); // same visible point case: range was collapsed.
  2729|       if (dom.isText(startPoint.node) && dom.isLeftEdgePoint(startPoint) && dom.isTextNode(endPoint.node) && dom.isRightEdgePoint(endPoint) && endPoint.node.nextSibling === startPoint.node) {
  2730|         startPoint = endPoint;
  2731|       }
  2732|       sc = startPoint.cont;
  2733|       so = startPoint.offset;
  2734|       ec = endPoint.cont;
  2735|       eo = endPoint.offset;
  2736|     }
  2737|     return new WrappedRange(sc, so, ec, eo);
  2738|   },
  2739|   /**
  2740|    * @method
  2741|    *
  2742|    * create WrappedRange from node
  2743|    *
  2744|    * @param {Node} node
  2745|    * @return {WrappedRange}
  2746|    */
  2747|   createFromNode: function createFromNode(node) {
  2748|     var sc = node;
  2749|     var so = 0;
  2750|     var ec = node;
  2751|     var eo = dom.nodeLength(ec); // browsers can't target a picture or void node
  2752|     if (dom.isVoid(sc)) {
  2753|       so = dom.listPrev(sc).length - 1;
  2754|       sc = sc.parentNode;
  2755|     }
  2756|     if (dom.isBR(ec)) {
  2757|       eo = dom.listPrev(ec).length - 1;
  2758|       ec = ec.parentNode;
  2759|     } else if (dom.isVoid(ec)) {
  2760|       eo = dom.listPrev(ec).length;
  2761|       ec = ec.parentNode;
  2762|     }
  2763|     return this.create(sc, so, ec, eo);
  2764|   },
  2765|   /**
  2766|    * create WrappedRange from node after position
  2767|    *
  2768|    * @param {Node} node
  2769|    * @return {WrappedRange}
  2770|    */
  2771|   createFromNodeBefore: function createFromNodeBefore(node) {
  2772|     return this.createFromNode(node).collapse(true);
  2773|   },
  2774|   /**
  2775|    * create WrappedRange from node after position
  2776|    *
  2777|    * @param {Node} node
  2778|    * @return {WrappedRange}
  2779|    */
  2780|   createFromNodeAfter: function createFromNodeAfter(node) {
  2781|     return this.createFromNode(node).collapse();
  2782|   },
  2783|   /**
  2784|    * @method
  2785|    *
  2786|    * create WrappedRange from bookmark
  2787|    *
  2788|    * @param {Node} editable
  2789|    * @param {Object} bookmark
  2790|    * @return {WrappedRange}
  2791|    */
  2792|   createFromBookmark: function createFromBookmark(editable, bookmark) {
  2793|     var sc = dom.fromOffsetPath(editable, bookmark.s.path);
  2794|     var so = bookmark.s.offset;
  2795|     var ec = dom.fromOffsetPath(editable, bookmark.e.path);
  2796|     var eo = bookmark.e.offset;
  2797|     return new WrappedRange(sc, so, ec, eo);
  2798|   },
  2799|   /**
  2800|    * @method
  2801|    *
  2802|    * create WrappedRange from paraBookmark
  2803|    *
  2804|    * @param {Object} bookmark
  2805|    * @param {Node[]} paras
  2806|    * @return {WrappedRange}
  2807|    */
  2808|   createFromParaBookmark: function createFromParaBookmark(bookmark, paras) {
  2809|     var so = bookmark.s.offset;
  2810|     var eo = bookmark.e.offset;
  2811|     var sc = dom.fromOffsetPath(lists.head(paras), bookmark.s.path);
  2812|     var ec = dom.fromOffsetPath(lists.last(paras), bookmark.e.path);
  2813|     return new WrappedRange(sc, so, ec, eo);
  2814|   }
  2815| });

  2901| ;// CONCATENATED MODULE: ./src/js/core/async.js
  2902| /**
  2903|  * @method readFileAsDataURL
  2904|  *
  2905|  * read contents of file as representing URL
  2906|  *
  2907|  * @param {File} file
  2908|  * @return {Promise} - then: dataUrl
  2909|  */
  2910| function readFileAsDataURL(file) {
  2911|   return external_jQuery_default().Deferred(function (deferred) {
  2912|     external_jQuery_default().extend(new FileReader(), {
  2913|       onload: function onload(e) {
  2914|         var dataURL = e.target.result;
  2915|         deferred.resolve(dataURL);
  2916|       },
  2917|       onerror: function onerror(err) {
  2918|         deferred.reject(err);
  2919|       }
  2920|     }).readAsDataURL(file);
  2921|   }).promise();
  2922| }
  2923| /**
  2924|  * @method createImage
  2925|  *
  2926|  * create `<image>` from url string
  2927|  *
  2928|  * @param {String} url
  2929|  * @return {Promise} - then: $image
  2930|  */
  2931| function createImage(url) {
  2932|   return external_jQuery_default().Deferred(function (deferred) {
  2933|     var $img = external_jQuery_default()('<img>');
  2934|     $img.one('load', function () {
  2935|       $img.off('error abort');
  2936|       deferred.resolve($img);
  2937|     }).one('error abort', function () {
  2938|       $img.off('load').detach();
  2939|       deferred.reject($img);
  2940|     }).css({
  2941|       display: 'none'
  2942|     }).appendTo(document.body).attr('src', url);
  2943|   }).promise();
  2944| }
  2945| ;// CONCATENATED MODULE: ./src/js/editing/History.js
  2946| function History_classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError("Cannot call a class as a function"); } }
  2947| function History_defineProperties(target, props) { for (var i = 0; i < props.length; i++) { var descriptor = props[i]; descriptor.enumerable = descriptor.enumerable || false; descriptor.configurable = true; if ("value" in descriptor) descriptor.writable = true; Object.defineProperty(target, descriptor.key, descriptor); } }
  2948| function History_createClass(Constructor, protoProps, staticProps) { if (protoProps) History_defineProperties(Constructor.prototype, protoProps); if (staticProps) History_defineProperties(Constructor, staticProps); return Constructor; }
  2949| var History = /*#__PURE__*/function () {
  2950|   function History(context) {
  2951|     History_classCallCheck(this, History);
  2952|     this.stack = [];
  2953|     this.stackOffset = -1;
  2954|     this.context = context;
  2955|     this.$editable = context.layoutInfo.editable;
  2956|     this.editable = this.$editable[0];
  2957|   }
  2958|   History_createClass(History, [{
  2959|     key: "makeSnapshot",
  2960|     value: function makeSnapshot() {
  2961|       var rng = range.create(this.editable);
  2962|       var emptyBookmark = {
  2963|         s: {
  2964|           path: [],
  2965|           offset: 0
  2966|         },
  2967|         e: {
  2968|           path: [],
  2969|           offset: 0
  2970|         }
  2971|       };
  2972|       return {
  2973|         contents: this.$editable.html(),
  2974|         bookmark: rng && rng.isOnEditable() ? rng.bookmark(this.editable) : emptyBookmark
  2975|       };
  2976|     }
  2977|   }, {
  2978|     key: "applySnapshot",
  2979|     value: function applySnapshot(snapshot) {
  2980|       if (snapshot.contents !== null) {
  2981|         this.$editable.html(snapshot.contents);
  2982|       }
  2983|       if (snapshot.bookmark !== null) {
  2984|         range.createFromBookmark(this.editable, snapshot.bookmark).select();
  2985|       }
  2986|     }
  2987|     /**
  2988|     * @method rewind
  2989|     * Rewinds the history stack back to the first snapshot taken.
  2990|     * Leaves the stack intact, so that "Redo" can still be used.
  2991|     */
  2992|   }, {
  2993|     key: "rewind",
  2994|     value: function rewind() {
  2995|       if (this.$editable.html() !== this.stack[this.stackOffset].contents) {
  2996|         this.recordUndo();
  2997|       } // Return to the first available snapshot.
  2998|       this.stackOffset = 0; // Apply that snapshot.
  2999|       this.applySnapshot(this.stack[this.stackOffset]);
  3000|     }
  3001|     /**
  3002|     *  @method commit
  3003|     *  Resets history stack, but keeps current editor's content.
  3004|     */
  3005|   }, {
  3006|     key: "commit",
  3007|     value: function commit() {
  3008|       this.stack = []; // Restore stackOffset to its original value.
  3009|       this.stackOffset = -1; // Record our first snapshot (of nothing).
  3010|       this.recordUndo();
  3011|     }
  3012|     /**
  3013|     * @method reset
  3014|     * Resets the history stack completely; reverting to an empty editor.
  3015|     */
  3016|   }, {
  3017|     key: "reset",
  3018|     value: function reset() {
  3019|       this.stack = []; // Restore stackOffset to its original value.
  3020|       this.stackOffset = -1; // Clear the editable area.
  3021|       this.$editable.html(''); // Record our first snapshot (of nothing).
  3022|       this.recordUndo();
  3023|     }
  3024|     /**
  3025|      * undo
  3026|      */
  3027|   }, {
  3028|     key: "undo",
  3029|     value: function undo() {
  3030|       if (this.$editable.html() !== this.stack[this.stackOffset].contents) {
  3031|         this.recordUndo();
  3032|       }
  3033|       if (this.stackOffset > 0) {
  3034|         this.stackOffset--;
  3035|         this.applySnapshot(this.stack[this.stackOffset]);
  3036|       }
  3037|     }
  3038|     /**
  3039|      * redo
  3040|      */
  3041|   }, {
  3042|     key: "redo",
  3043|     value: function redo() {
  3044|       if (this.stack.length - 1 > this.stackOffset) {
  3045|         this.stackOffset++;
  3046|         this.applySnapshot(this.stack[this.stackOffset]);
  3047|       }
  3048|     }
  3049|     /**
  3050|      * recorded undo
  3051|      */
  3052|   }, {
  3053|     key: "recordUndo",
  3054|     value: function recordUndo() {
  3055|       this.stackOffset++; // Wash out stack after stackOffset
  3056|       if (this.stack.length > this.stackOffset) {
  3057|         this.stack = this.stack.slice(0, this.stackOffset);
  3058|       } // Create new snapshot and push it to the end
  3059|       this.stack.push(this.makeSnapshot()); // If the stack size reachs to the limit, then slice it
  3060|       if (this.stack.length > this.context.options.historyLimit) {
  3061|         this.stack.shift();
  3062|         this.stackOffset -= 1;
  3063|       }
  3064|     }
  3065|   }]);
  3066|   return History;
  3067| }();
