  3077|     key: "jQueryCSS",
  3078|     value:
  3079|     /**
  3080|      * @method jQueryCSS
  3081|      *
  3082|      * [workaround] for old jQuery
  3083|      * passing an array of style properties to .css()
  3084|      * will result in an object of property-value pairs.
  3085|      * (compability with version < 1.9)
  3086|      *
  3087|      * @private
  3088|      * @param  {jQuery} $obj
  3089|      * @param  {Array} propertyNames - An array of one or more CSS properties.
  3090|      * @return {Object}
  3091|      */
  3092|     function jQueryCSS($obj, propertyNames) {
  3093|       var result = {};
  3094|       external_jQuery_default().each(propertyNames, function (idx, propertyName) {
  3095|         result[propertyName] = $obj.css(propertyName);
  3096|       });
  3097|       return result;
  3098|     }
  3099|     /**
  3100|      * returns style object from node
  3101|      *
  3102|      * @param {jQuery} $node
  3103|      * @return {Object}
  3104|      */
  3105|   }, {
  3106|     key: "fromNode",
  3107|     value: function fromNode($node) {
  3108|       var properties = ['font-family', 'font-size', 'text-align', 'list-style-type', 'line-height'];
  3109|       var styleInfo = this.jQueryCSS($node, properties) || {};
  3110|       var fontSize = $node[0].style.fontSize || styleInfo['font-size'];
  3111|       styleInfo['font-size'] = parseInt(fontSize, 10);
  3112|       styleInfo['font-size-unit'] = fontSize.match(/[a-z%]+$/);
  3113|       return styleInfo;
  3114|     }
  3115|     /**

  3117|      *
  3118|      * @param {WrappedRange} rng

  3125|         includeAncestor: true

  3127|         external_jQuery_default()(para).css(styleInfo);
  3128|       });
  3129|     }
  3130|     /**
  3131|      * insert and returns styleNodes on range.
  3132|      *
  3133|      * @param {WrappedRange} rng
  3134|      * @param {Object} [options] - options for styleNodes
  3135|      * @param {String} [options.nodeName] - default: `SPAN`
  3136|      * @param {Boolean} [options.expandClosestSibling] - default: `false`
  3137|      * @param {Boolean} [options.onlyPartialContains] - default: `false`
  3138|      * @return {Node[]}
  3139|      */
  3140|   }, {
  3141|     key: "styleNodes",
  3142|     value: function styleNodes(rng, options) {
  3143|       rng = rng.splitText();
  3144|       var nodeName = options && options.nodeName || 'SPAN';
  3145|       var expandClosestSibling = !!(options && options.expandClosestSibling);
  3146|       var onlyPartialContains = !!(options && options.onlyPartialContains);
  3147|       if (rng.isCollapsed()) {
  3148|         return [rng.insertNode(dom.create(nodeName))];
  3149|       }
  3150|       var pred = dom.makePredByNodeName(nodeName);
  3151|       var nodes = rng.nodes(dom.isText, {
  3152|         fullyContains: true
  3153|       }).map(function (text) {
  3154|         return dom.singleChildAncestor(text, pred) || dom.wrap(text, nodeName);
  3155|       });
  3156|       if (expandClosestSibling) {
  3157|         if (onlyPartialContains) {
  3158|           var nodesInRange = rng.nodes(); // compose with partial contains predication
  3159|           pred = func.and(pred, function (node) {
  3160|             return lists.contains(nodesInRange, node);
  3161|           });
  3162|         }
  3163|         return nodes.map(function (node) {
  3164|           var siblings = dom.withClosestSiblings(node, pred);
  3165|           var head = lists.head(siblings);
  3166|           var tails = lists.tail(siblings);
  3167|           external_jQuery_default().each(tails, function (idx, elem) {
  3168|             dom.appendChildNodes(head, elem.childNodes);
  3169|             dom.remove(elem);
  3170|           });
  3171|           return lists.head(siblings);
  3172|         });
  3173|       } else {
  3174|         return nodes;
  3175|       }
  3176|     }
  3177|     /**
  3178|      * get current style on cursor
  3179|      *
  3180|      * @param {WrappedRange} rng
  3181|      * @return {Object} - object contains style properties.
  3182|      */
  3183|   }, {
  3184|     key: "current",
  3185|     value: function current(rng) {
  3186|       var $cont = external_jQuery_default()(!dom.isElement(rng.sc) ? rng.sc.parentNode : rng.sc);
  3187|       var styleInfo = this.fromNode($cont); // document.queryCommandState for toggle state
  3188|       try {
  3189|         styleInfo = external_jQuery_default().extend(styleInfo, {
  3190|           'font-bold': document.queryCommandState('bold') ? 'bold' : 'normal',
  3191|           'font-italic': document.queryCommandState('italic') ? 'italic' : 'normal',
  3192|           'font-underline': document.queryCommandState('underline') ? 'underline' : 'normal',
  3193|           'font-subscript': document.queryCommandState('subscript') ? 'subscript' : 'normal',
  3194|           'font-superscript': document.queryCommandState('superscript') ? 'superscript' : 'normal',
  3195|           'font-strikethrough': document.queryCommandState('strikethrough') ? 'strikethrough' : 'normal',
  3196|           'font-family': document.queryCommandValue('fontname') || styleInfo['font-family']
  3197|         });

  3199|       } // list-style-type to list-style(unordered, ordered)
  3200|       if (!rng.isOnList()) {
  3201|         styleInfo['list-style'] = 'none';
  3202|       } else {
  3203|         var orderedTypes = ['circle', 'disc', 'disc-leading-zero', 'square'];
  3204|         var isUnordered = orderedTypes.indexOf(styleInfo['list-style-type']) > -1;
  3205|         styleInfo['list-style'] = isUnordered ? 'unordered' : 'ordered';
  3206|       }
  3207|       var para = dom.ancestor(rng.sc, dom.isPara);
  3208|       if (para && para.style['line-height']) {
  3209|         styleInfo['line-height'] = para.style.lineHeight;
  3210|       } else {
  3211|         var lineHeight = parseInt(styleInfo['line-height'], 10) / parseInt(styleInfo['font-size'], 10);
  3212|         styleInfo['line-height'] = lineHeight.toFixed(1);
  3213|       }

  3216|       styleInfo.range = rng;
  3217|       return styleInfo;
  3218|     }

  3316|      */
  3317|   }, {
  3318|     key: "toggleList",
  3319|     value: function toggleList(listName, editable) {
  3320|       var _this3 = this;
  3321|       var rng = range.create(editable).wrapBodyInlineWithPara();
  3322|       var paras = rng.nodes(dom.isPara, {
  3323|         includeAncestor: true
  3324|       });

  3326|       var clustereds = lists.clusterBy(paras, func.peq2('parentNode')); // paragraph to list
  3327|       if (lists.find(paras, dom.isPurePara)) {
  3328|         var wrappedParas = [];
  3329|         external_jQuery_default().each(clustereds, function (idx, paras) {
  3330|           wrappedParas = wrappedParas.concat(_this3.wrapList(paras, listName));
  3331|         });
  3332|         paras = wrappedParas; // list to paragraph or change list style
  3333|       } else {
  3334|         var diffLists = rng.nodes(dom.isList, {
  3335|           includeAncestor: true
  3336|         }).filter(function (listNode) {
  3337|           return !external_jQuery_default().nodeName(listNode, listName);
  3338|         });
  3339|         if (diffLists.length) {
  3340|           external_jQuery_default().each(diffLists, function (idx, listNode) {
  3341|             dom.replace(listNode, listName);
  3342|           });
  3343|         } else {
  3344|           paras = this.releaseList(clustereds, true);
  3345|         }
  3346|       }
  3347|       range.createFromParaBookmark(bookmark, paras).select();
  3348|     }
  3349|     /**
  3350|      * @param {Node[]} paras
  3351|      * @param {String} listName
  3352|      * @return {Node[]}
  3353|      */
  3354|   }, {
  3355|     key: "wrapList",
  3356|     value: function wrapList(paras, listName) {
  3357|       var head = lists.head(paras);
  3358|       var last = lists.last(paras);
  3359|       var prevList = dom.isList(head.previousSibling) && head.previousSibling;
  3360|       var nextList = dom.isList(last.nextSibling) && last.nextSibling;
  3361|       var listNode = prevList || dom.insertAfter(dom.create(listName || 'UL'), last); // P to LI
  3362|       paras = paras.map(function (para) {
  3363|         return dom.isPurePara(para) ? dom.replace(para, 'LI') : para;
  3364|       }); // append to list(<ul>, <ol>)
  3365|       dom.appendChildNodes(listNode, paras);
  3366|       if (nextList) {
  3367|         dom.appendChildNodes(listNode, lists.from(nextList.childNodes));
  3368|         dom.remove(nextList);
  3369|       }
  3370|       return paras;
  3371|     }
  3372|     /**
  3373|      * @method releaseList
  3374|      *
  3375|      * @param {Array[]} clustereds
  3376|      * @param {Boolean} isEscapseToBody
  3377|      * @return {Node[]}
  3378|      */
  3379|   }, {
  3380|     key: "releaseList",
  3381|     value: function releaseList(clustereds, isEscapseToBody) {
  3382|       var _this4 = this;
  3383|       var releasedParas = [];
  3384|       external_jQuery_default().each(clustereds, function (idx, paras) {
  3385|         var head = lists.head(paras);
  3386|         var last = lists.last(paras);
  3387|         var headList = isEscapseToBody ? dom.lastAncestor(head, dom.isList) : head.parentNode;
  3388|         var parentItem = headList.parentNode;
  3389|         if (headList.parentNode.nodeName === 'LI') {
  3390|           paras.map(function (para) {
  3391|             var newList = _this4.findNextSiblings(para);
  3392|             if (parentItem.nextSibling) {
  3393|               parentItem.parentNode.insertBefore(para, parentItem.nextSibling);
  3394|             } else {
  3395|               parentItem.parentNode.appendChild(para);
  3396|             }
  3397|             if (newList.length) {
  3398|               _this4.wrapList(newList, headList.nodeName);
  3399|               para.appendChild(newList[0].parentNode);
  3400|             }
  3401|           });
  3402|           if (headList.children.length === 0) {
  3403|             parentItem.removeChild(headList);
  3404|           }
  3405|           if (parentItem.childNodes.length === 0) {
  3406|             parentItem.parentNode.removeChild(parentItem);
  3407|           }
  3408|         } else {
  3409|           var lastList = headList.childNodes.length > 1 ? dom.splitTree(headList, {
  3410|             node: last.parentNode,
  3411|             offset: dom.position(last) + 1
  3412|           }, {
  3413|             isSkipPaddingBlankHTML: true
  3414|           }) : null;
  3415|           var middleList = dom.splitTree(headList, {
  3416|             node: head.parentNode,
  3417|             offset: dom.position(head)
  3418|           }, {
  3419|             isSkipPaddingBlankHTML: true
  3420|           });
  3421|           paras = isEscapseToBody ? dom.listDescendant(middleList, dom.isLi) : lists.from(middleList.childNodes).filter(dom.isLi); // LI to P
  3422|           if (isEscapseToBody || !dom.isList(headList.parentNode)) {
  3423|             paras = paras.map(function (para) {
  3424|               return dom.replace(para, 'P');
  3425|             });
  3426|           }
  3427|           external_jQuery_default().each(lists.from(paras).reverse(), function (idx, para) {
  3428|             dom.insertAfter(para, headList);
  3429|           }); // remove empty lists
  3430|           var rootLists = lists.compact([headList, middleList, lastList]);
  3431|           external_jQuery_default().each(rootLists, function (idx, rootList) {
  3432|             var listNodes = [rootList].concat(dom.listDescendant(rootList, dom.isList));
  3433|             external_jQuery_default().each(listNodes.reverse(), function (idx, listNode) {
  3434|               if (!dom.nodeLength(listNode)) {
  3435|                 dom.remove(listNode, true);
  3436|               }
  3437|             });
  3438|           });
  3439|         }
  3440|         releasedParas = releasedParas.concat(paras);
  3441|       });
  3442|       return releasedParas;
  3443|     }
  3444|     /**
  3445|      * @method appendToPrevious
  3446|      *
  3447|      * Appends list to previous list item, if
  3448|      * none exist it wraps the list in a new list item.
  3449|      *
  3450|      * @param {HTMLNode} ListItem
  3451|      * @return {HTMLNode}
  3452|      */
  3453|   }, {
  3454|     key: "appendToPrevious",
  3455|     value: function appendToPrevious(node) {
  3456|       return node.previousSibling ? dom.appendChildNodes(node.previousSibling, [node]) : this.wrapList([node], 'LI');
  3457|     }
  3458|     /**
  3459|      * @method findList
  3460|      *
  3461|      * Finds an existing list in list item
  3462|      *
  3463|      * @param {HTMLNode} ListItem
  3464|      * @return {Array[]}
  3465|      */
  3466|   }, {
  3467|     key: "findList",
  3468|     value: function findList(node) {
  3469|       return node ? lists.find(node.children, function (child) {
  3470|         return ['OL', 'UL'].indexOf(child.nodeName) > -1;
  3471|       }) : null;
  3472|     }
  3473|     /**
  3474|      * @method findNextSiblings
  3475|      *
  3476|      * Finds all list item siblings that follow it
  3477|      *
  3478|      * @param {HTMLNode} ListItem
  3479|      * @return {HTMLNode}
  3480|      */
  3481|   }, {
  3482|     key: "findNextSiblings",
  3483|     value: function findNextSiblings(node) {
  3484|       var siblings = [];
  3485|       while (node.nextSibling) {
  3486|         siblings.push(node.nextSibling);
  3487|         node = node.nextSibling;
  3488|       }
  3489|       return siblings;
  3490|     }
  3491|   }]);
  3492|   return Bullet;
  3493| }();

  3495| function Typing_classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError("Cannot call a class as a function"); } }
  3496| function Typing_defineProperties(target, props) { for (var i = 0; i < props.length; i++) { var descriptor = props[i]; descriptor.enumerable = descriptor.enumerable || false; descriptor.configurable = true; if ("value" in descriptor) descriptor.writable = true; Object.defineProperty(target, descriptor.key, descriptor); } }
  3497| function Typing_createClass(Constructor, protoProps, staticProps) { if (protoProps) Typing_defineProperties(Constructor.prototype, protoProps); if (staticProps) Typing_defineProperties(Constructor, staticProps); return Constructor; }
  3498| /**
  3499|  * @class editing.Typing
  3500|  *
  3501|  * Typing
  3502|  *
  3503|  */
  3504| var Typing = /*#__PURE__*/function () {
  3505|   function Typing(context) {
  3506|     Typing_classCallCheck(this, Typing);
  3507|     this.bullet = new Bullet();
  3508|     this.options = context.options;
  3509|   }
  3510|   /**
  3511|    * insert tab
  3512|    *
  3513|    * @param {WrappedRange} rng
  3514|    * @param {Number} tabsize
  3515|    */
  3516|   Typing_createClass(Typing, [{
  3517|     key: "insertTab",
  3518|     value: function insertTab(rng, tabsize) {
  3519|       var tab = dom.createText(new Array(tabsize + 1).join(dom.NBSP_CHAR));
  3520|       rng = rng.deleteContents();
  3521|       rng.insertNode(tab, true);
  3522|       rng = range.create(tab, tabsize);
  3523|       rng.select();
  3524|     }
  3525|     /**
  3526|      * insert paragraph
  3527|      *
  3528|      * @param {jQuery} $editable
  3529|      * @param {WrappedRange} rng Can be used in unit tests to "mock" the range
  3530|      *
  3531|      * blockquoteBreakingLevel
  3532|      *   0 - No break, the new paragraph remains inside the quote
  3533|      *   1 - Break the first blockquote in the ancestors list
  3534|      *   2 - Break all blockquotes, so that the new paragraph is not quoted (this is the default)
  3535|      */
  3536|   }, {
  3537|     key: "insertParagraph",
  3538|     value: function insertParagraph(editable, rng) {
  3539|       rng = rng || range.create(editable); // deleteContents on range.
  3540|       rng = rng.deleteContents(); // Wrap range if it needs to be wrapped by paragraph
  3541|       rng = rng.wrapBodyInlineWithPara(); // finding paragraph
  3542|       var splitRoot = dom.ancestor(rng.sc, dom.isPara);
  3543|       var nextPara; // on paragraph: split paragraph
  3544|       if (splitRoot) {
  3545|         if (dom.isLi(splitRoot) && (dom.isEmpty(splitRoot) || dom.deepestChildIsEmpty(splitRoot))) {
  3546|           this.bullet.toggleList(splitRoot.parentNode.nodeName);
  3547|           return;
  3548|         } else {
  3549|           var blockquote = null;
  3550|           if (this.options.blockquoteBreakingLevel === 1) {
  3551|             blockquote = dom.ancestor(splitRoot, dom.isBlockquote);
  3552|           } else if (this.options.blockquoteBreakingLevel === 2) {
  3553|             blockquote = dom.lastAncestor(splitRoot, dom.isBlockquote);
  3554|           }
  3555|           if (blockquote) {
  3556|             nextPara = external_jQuery_default()(dom.emptyPara)[0]; // If the split is right before a <br>, remove it so that there's no "empty line"
  3557|             if (dom.isRightEdgePoint(rng.getStartPoint()) && dom.isBR(rng.sc.nextSibling)) {
  3558|               external_jQuery_default()(rng.sc.nextSibling).remove();
  3559|             }
  3560|             var split = dom.splitTree(blockquote, rng.getStartPoint(), {
  3561|               isDiscardEmptySplits: true
  3562|             });
  3563|             if (split) {
  3564|               split.parentNode.insertBefore(nextPara, split);
  3565|             } else {
  3566|               dom.insertAfter(nextPara, blockquote); // There's no split if we were at the end of the blockquote
  3567|             }
  3568|           } else {
  3569|             nextPara = dom.splitTree(splitRoot, rng.getStartPoint()); // not a blockquote, just insert the paragraph
  3570|             var emptyAnchors = dom.listDescendant(splitRoot, dom.isEmptyAnchor);
  3571|             emptyAnchors = emptyAnchors.concat(dom.listDescendant(nextPara, dom.isEmptyAnchor));
  3572|             external_jQuery_default().each(emptyAnchors, function (idx, anchor) {
  3573|               dom.remove(anchor);
  3574|             }); // replace empty heading, pre or custom-made styleTag with P tag
  3575|             if ((dom.isHeading(nextPara) || dom.isPre(nextPara) || dom.isCustomStyleTag(nextPara)) && dom.isEmpty(nextPara)) {
  3576|               nextPara = dom.replace(nextPara, 'p');
  3577|             }
  3578|           }
  3579|         } // no paragraph: insert empty paragraph
  3580|       } else {
  3581|         var next = rng.sc.childNodes[rng.so];
  3582|         nextPara = external_jQuery_default()(dom.emptyPara)[0];
  3583|         if (next) {
  3584|           rng.sc.insertBefore(nextPara, next);
  3585|         } else {
  3586|           rng.sc.appendChild(nextPara);
  3587|         }
  3588|       }
  3589|       range.create(nextPara, 0).normalize().select().scrollIntoView(editable);
  3590|     }
  3591|   }]);
  3592|   return Typing;
  3593| }();
  3594| ;// CONCATENATED MODULE: ./src/js/editing/Table.js
  3595| function Table_classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError("Cannot call a class as a function"); } }
  3596| function Table_defineProperties(target, props) { for (var i = 0; i < props.length; i++) { var descriptor = props[i]; descriptor.enumerable = descriptor.enumerable || false; descriptor.configurable = true; if ("value" in descriptor) descriptor.writable = true; Object.defineProperty(target, descriptor.key, descriptor); } }
  3597| function Table_createClass(Constructor, protoProps, staticProps) { if (protoProps) Table_defineProperties(Constructor.prototype, protoProps); if (staticProps) Table_defineProperties(Constructor, staticProps); return Constructor; }
  3598| /**
  3599|  * @class Create a virtual table to create what actions to do in change.
  3600|  * @param {object} startPoint Cell selected to apply change.
  3601|  * @param {enum} where  Where change will be applied Row or Col. Use enum: TableResultAction.where
  3602|  * @param {enum} action Action to be applied. Use enum: TableResultAction.requestAction
  3603|  * @param {object} domTable Dom element of table to make changes.
  3604|  */
  3605| var TableResultAction = function TableResultAction(startPoint, where, action, domTable) {
  3606|   var _startPoint = {
  3607|     'colPos': 0,
  3608|     'rowPos': 0
  3609|   };
  3610|   var _virtualTable = [];
  3611|   var _actionCellList = []; /// ///////////////////////////////////////////
  3612|   /**
  3613|    * Set the startPoint of action.
  3614|    */
  3615|   function setStartPoint() {
  3616|     if (!startPoint || !startPoint.tagName || startPoint.tagName.toLowerCase() !== 'td' && startPoint.tagName.toLowerCase() !== 'th') {
  3617|       return;
  3618|     }
  3619|     _startPoint.colPos = startPoint.cellIndex;
  3620|     if (!startPoint.parentElement || !startPoint.parentElement.tagName || startPoint.parentElement.tagName.toLowerCase() !== 'tr') {
  3621|       return;
  3622|     }
  3623|     _startPoint.rowPos = startPoint.parentElement.rowIndex;
  3624|   }
  3625|   /**
  3626|    * Define virtual table position info object.
  3627|    *
  3628|    * @param {int} rowIndex Index position in line of virtual table.
  3629|    * @param {int} cellIndex Index position in column of virtual table.
  3630|    * @param {object} baseRow Row affected by this position.
  3631|    * @param {object} baseCell Cell affected by this position.
  3632|    * @param {bool} isSpan Inform if it is an span cell/row.
  3633|    */
  3634|   function setVirtualTablePosition(rowIndex, cellIndex, baseRow, baseCell, isRowSpan, isColSpan, isVirtualCell) {
  3635|     var objPosition = {
  3636|       'baseRow': baseRow,
  3637|       'baseCell': baseCell,
  3638|       'isRowSpan': isRowSpan,
  3639|       'isColSpan': isColSpan,
  3640|       'isVirtual': isVirtualCell
  3641|     };
  3642|     if (!_virtualTable[rowIndex]) {
  3643|       _virtualTable[rowIndex] = [];
  3644|     }
  3645|     _virtualTable[rowIndex][cellIndex] = objPosition;
  3646|   }
  3647|   /**
  3648|    * Create action cell object.
  3649|    *
  3650|    * @param {object} virtualTableCellObj Object of specific position on virtual table.
  3651|    * @param {enum} resultAction Action to be applied in that item.
  3652|    */
  3653|   function getActionCell(virtualTableCellObj, resultAction, virtualRowPosition, virtualColPosition) {
  3654|     return {
  3655|       'baseCell': virtualTableCellObj.baseCell,
  3656|       'action': resultAction,
  3657|       'virtualTable': {
  3658|         'rowIndex': virtualRowPosition,
  3659|         'cellIndex': virtualColPosition
  3660|       }
  3661|     };
  3662|   }
  3663|   /**
  3664|    * Recover free index of row to append Cell.
  3665|    *
  3666|    * @param {int} rowIndex Index of row to find free space.
  3667|    * @param {int} cellIndex Index of cell to find free space in table.
  3668|    */
  3669|   function recoverCellIndex(rowIndex, cellIndex) {
  3670|     if (!_virtualTable[rowIndex]) {
  3671|       return cellIndex;
  3672|     }
  3673|     if (!_virtualTable[rowIndex][cellIndex]) {
  3674|       return cellIndex;
  3675|     }
  3676|     var newCellIndex = cellIndex;
  3677|     while (_virtualTable[rowIndex][newCellIndex]) {
  3678|       newCellIndex++;
  3679|       if (!_virtualTable[rowIndex][newCellIndex]) {
  3680|         return newCellIndex;
  3681|       }
  3682|     }
  3683|   }
  3684|   /**
  3685|    * Recover info about row and cell and add information to virtual table.
  3686|    *
  3687|    * @param {object} row Row to recover information.
  3688|    * @param {object} cell Cell to recover information.
  3689|    */
  3690|   function addCellInfoToVirtual(row, cell) {
  3691|     var cellIndex = recoverCellIndex(row.rowIndex, cell.cellIndex);
  3692|     var cellHasColspan = cell.colSpan > 1;
  3693|     var cellHasRowspan = cell.rowSpan > 1;
  3694|     var isThisSelectedCell = row.rowIndex === _startPoint.rowPos && cell.cellIndex === _startPoint.colPos;
  3695|     setVirtualTablePosition(row.rowIndex, cellIndex, row, cell, cellHasRowspan, cellHasColspan, false); // Add span rows to virtual Table.
  3696|     var rowspanNumber = cell.attributes.rowSpan ? parseInt(cell.attributes.rowSpan.value, 10) : 0;
  3697|     if (rowspanNumber > 1) {
  3698|       for (var rp = 1; rp < rowspanNumber; rp++) {
  3699|         var rowspanIndex = row.rowIndex + rp;
  3700|         adjustStartPoint(rowspanIndex, cellIndex, cell, isThisSelectedCell);
  3701|         setVirtualTablePosition(rowspanIndex, cellIndex, row, cell, true, cellHasColspan, true);
  3702|       }
  3703|     } // Add span cols to virtual table.
  3704|     var colspanNumber = cell.attributes.colSpan ? parseInt(cell.attributes.colSpan.value, 10) : 0;
  3705|     if (colspanNumber > 1) {
  3706|       for (var cp = 1; cp < colspanNumber; cp++) {
  3707|         var cellspanIndex = recoverCellIndex(row.rowIndex, cellIndex + cp);
  3708|         adjustStartPoint(row.rowIndex, cellspanIndex, cell, isThisSelectedCell);
  3709|         setVirtualTablePosition(row.rowIndex, cellspanIndex, row, cell, cellHasRowspan, true, true);
  3710|       }
  3711|     }
  3712|   }
  3713|   /**
  3714|    * Process validation and adjust of start point if needed
  3715|    *
  3716|    * @param {int} rowIndex
  3717|    * @param {int} cellIndex
  3718|    * @param {object} cell
  3719|    * @param {bool} isSelectedCell
  3720|    */
  3721|   function adjustStartPoint(rowIndex, cellIndex, cell, isSelectedCell) {
  3722|     if (rowIndex === _startPoint.rowPos && _startPoint.colPos >= cell.cellIndex && cell.cellIndex <= cellIndex && !isSelectedCell) {
  3723|       _startPoint.colPos++;
  3724|     }
  3725|   }
  3726|   /**
  3727|    * Create virtual table of cells with all cells, including span cells.
  3728|    */
  3729|   function createVirtualTable() {
  3730|     var rows = domTable.rows;
  3731|     for (var rowIndex = 0; rowIndex < rows.length; rowIndex++) {
  3732|       var cells = rows[rowIndex].cells;
  3733|       for (var cellIndex = 0; cellIndex < cells.length; cellIndex++) {
  3734|         addCellInfoToVirtual(rows[rowIndex], cells[cellIndex]);
  3735|       }
  3736|     }
  3737|   }
  3738|   /**
  3739|    * Get action to be applied on the cell.
  3740|    *
  3741|    * @param {object} cell virtual table cell to apply action
  3742|    */
  3743|   function getDeleteResultActionToCell(cell) {
  3744|     switch (where) {
  3745|       case TableResultAction.where.Column:
  3746|         if (cell.isColSpan) {
  3747|           return TableResultAction.resultAction.SubtractSpanCount;
  3748|         }
  3749|         break;
  3750|       case TableResultAction.where.Row:
  3751|         if (!cell.isVirtual && cell.isRowSpan) {
  3752|           return TableResultAction.resultAction.AddCell;
  3753|         } else if (cell.isRowSpan) {
  3754|           return TableResultAction.resultAction.SubtractSpanCount;
  3755|         }
  3756|         break;
  3757|     }
  3758|     return TableResultAction.resultAction.RemoveCell;
  3759|   }
  3760|   /**
  3761|    * Get action to be applied on the cell.
  3762|    *
  3763|    * @param {object} cell virtual table cell to apply action
  3764|    */
  3765|   function getAddResultActionToCell(cell) {
  3766|     switch (where) {
  3767|       case TableResultAction.where.Column:
  3768|         if (cell.isColSpan) {
  3769|           return TableResultAction.resultAction.SumSpanCount;
  3770|         } else if (cell.isRowSpan && cell.isVirtual) {
  3771|           return TableResultAction.resultAction.Ignore;
  3772|         }
  3773|         break;
  3774|       case TableResultAction.where.Row:
  3775|         if (cell.isRowSpan) {
  3776|           return TableResultAction.resultAction.SumSpanCount;
  3777|         } else if (cell.isColSpan && cell.isVirtual) {
  3778|           return TableResultAction.resultAction.Ignore;
  3779|         }
  3780|         break;
  3781|     }
  3782|     return TableResultAction.resultAction.AddCell;
  3783|   }
  3784|   function init() {
  3785|     setStartPoint();
  3786|     createVirtualTable();
  3787|   } /// ///////////////////////////////////////////
  3788|   /**
  3789|    * Recover array os what to do in table.
  3790|    */
  3791|   this.getActionList = function () {
  3792|     var fixedRow = where === TableResultAction.where.Row ? _startPoint.rowPos : -1;
  3793|     var fixedCol = where === TableResultAction.where.Column ? _startPoint.colPos : -1;
  3794|     var actualPosition = 0;
  3795|     var canContinue = true;
  3796|     while (canContinue) {
  3797|       var rowPosition = fixedRow >= 0 ? fixedRow : actualPosition;
  3798|       var colPosition = fixedCol >= 0 ? fixedCol : actualPosition;
  3799|       var row = _virtualTable[rowPosition];
  3800|       if (!row) {
  3801|         canContinue = false;
  3802|         return _actionCellList;
  3803|       }
  3804|       var cell = row[colPosition];
  3805|       if (!cell) {
  3806|         canContinue = false;
  3807|         return _actionCellList;
  3808|       } // Define action to be applied in this cell
  3809|       var resultAction = TableResultAction.resultAction.Ignore;
  3810|       switch (action) {
  3811|         case TableResultAction.requestAction.Add:
  3812|           resultAction = getAddResultActionToCell(cell);
  3813|           break;
  3814|         case TableResultAction.requestAction.Delete:
  3815|           resultAction = getDeleteResultActionToCell(cell);
  3816|           break;
  3817|       }
  3818|       _actionCellList.push(getActionCell(cell, resultAction, rowPosition, colPosition));
  3819|       actualPosition++;
  3820|     }
  3821|     return _actionCellList;
  3822|   };
  3823|   init();
  3824| };
  3825| /**
  3826| *
  3827| * Where action occours enum.
  3828| */
  3829| TableResultAction.where = {
  3830|   'Row': 0,
  3831|   'Column': 1
  3832| };
  3833| /**
  3834| *
  3835| * Requested action to apply enum.
  3836| */
  3837| TableResultAction.requestAction = {
  3838|   'Add': 0,
  3839|   'Delete': 1
  3840| };
  3841| /**
  3842| *
  3843| * Result action to be executed enum.
  3844| */
  3845| TableResultAction.resultAction = {
  3846|   'Ignore': 0,
  3847|   'SubtractSpanCount': 1,
  3848|   'RemoveCell': 2,
  3849|   'AddCell': 3,
  3850|   'SumSpanCount': 4
  3851| };
  3852| /**
  3853|  *
  3854|  * @class editing.Table
  3855|  *
  3856|  * Table
  3857|  *
  3858|  */
  3859| var Table = /*#__PURE__*/function () {
  3860|   function Table() {
  3861|     Table_classCallCheck(this, Table);
  3862|   }
  3863|   Table_createClass(Table, [{
  3864|     key: "tab",
  3865|     value:
  3866|     /**
  3867|      * handle tab key
  3868|      *
  3869|      * @param {WrappedRange} rng
  3870|      * @param {Boolean} isShift
  3871|      */
  3872|     function tab(rng, isShift) {
  3873|       var cell = dom.ancestor(rng.commonAncestor(), dom.isCell);
  3874|       var table = dom.ancestor(cell, dom.isTable);
  3875|       var cells = dom.listDescendant(table, dom.isCell);
  3876|       var nextCell = lists[isShift ? 'prev' : 'next'](cells, cell);
  3877|       if (nextCell) {
  3878|         range.create(nextCell, 0).select();
  3879|       }
  3880|     }
  3881|     /**
  3882|      * Add a new row
  3883|      *
  3884|      * @param {WrappedRange} rng
  3885|      * @param {String} position (top/bottom)
  3886|      * @return {Node}
  3887|      */
  3888|   }, {
  3889|     key: "addRow",
  3890|     value: function addRow(rng, position) {
  3891|       var cell = dom.ancestor(rng.commonAncestor(), dom.isCell);
  3892|       var currentTr = external_jQuery_default()(cell).closest('tr');
  3893|       var trAttributes = this.recoverAttributes(currentTr);
  3894|       var html = external_jQuery_default()('<tr' + trAttributes + '></tr>');
  3895|       var vTable = new TableResultAction(cell, TableResultAction.where.Row, TableResultAction.requestAction.Add, external_jQuery_default()(currentTr).closest('table')[0]);
  3896|       var actions = vTable.getActionList();
  3897|       for (var idCell = 0; idCell < actions.length; idCell++) {
  3898|         var currentCell = actions[idCell];
  3899|         var tdAttributes = this.recoverAttributes(currentCell.baseCell);
  3900|         switch (currentCell.action) {
  3901|           case TableResultAction.resultAction.AddCell:
  3902|             html.append('<td' + tdAttributes + '>' + dom.blank + '</td>');
  3903|             break;
  3904|           case TableResultAction.resultAction.SumSpanCount:
  3905|             {
  3906|               if (position === 'top') {
  3907|                 var baseCellTr = currentCell.baseCell.parent;
  3908|                 var isTopFromRowSpan = (!baseCellTr ? 0 : currentCell.baseCell.closest('tr').rowIndex) <= currentTr[0].rowIndex;
  3909|                 if (isTopFromRowSpan) {
  3910|                   var newTd = external_jQuery_default()('<div></div>').append(external_jQuery_default()('<td' + tdAttributes + '>' + dom.blank + '</td>').removeAttr('rowspan')).html();
  3911|                   html.append(newTd);
  3912|                   break;
  3913|                 }
  3914|               }
  3915|               var rowspanNumber = parseInt(currentCell.baseCell.rowSpan, 10);
  3916|               rowspanNumber++;
  3917|               currentCell.baseCell.setAttribute('rowSpan', rowspanNumber);
  3918|             }
  3919|             break;
  3920|         }
  3921|       }
  3922|       if (position === 'top') {
  3923|         currentTr.before(html);
  3924|       } else {
  3925|         var cellHasRowspan = cell.rowSpan > 1;
  3926|         if (cellHasRowspan) {
  3927|           var lastTrIndex = currentTr[0].rowIndex + (cell.rowSpan - 2);
  3928|           external_jQuery_default()(external_jQuery_default()(currentTr).parent().find('tr')[lastTrIndex]).after(external_jQuery_default()(html));
  3929|           return;
  3930|         }
  3931|         currentTr.after(html);
  3932|       }
  3933|     }
  3934|     /**
  3935|      * Add a new col
  3936|      *
  3937|      * @param {WrappedRange} rng
  3938|      * @param {String} position (left/right)
  3939|      * @return {Node}
  3940|      */
  3941|   }, {
  3942|     key: "addCol",
  3943|     value: function addCol(rng, position) {
  3944|       var cell = dom.ancestor(rng.commonAncestor(), dom.isCell);
  3945|       var row = external_jQuery_default()(cell).closest('tr');
  3946|       var rowsGroup = external_jQuery_default()(row).siblings();
  3947|       rowsGroup.push(row);
  3948|       var vTable = new TableResultAction(cell, TableResultAction.where.Column, TableResultAction.requestAction.Add, external_jQuery_default()(row).closest('table')[0]);
  3949|       var actions = vTable.getActionList();
  3950|       for (var actionIndex = 0; actionIndex < actions.length; actionIndex++) {
  3951|         var currentCell = actions[actionIndex];
  3952|         var tdAttributes = this.recoverAttributes(currentCell.baseCell);
  3953|         switch (currentCell.action) {
  3954|           case TableResultAction.resultAction.AddCell:
  3955|             if (position === 'right') {
  3956|               external_jQuery_default()(currentCell.baseCell).after('<td' + tdAttributes + '>' + dom.blank + '</td>');
  3957|             } else {
  3958|               external_jQuery_default()(currentCell.baseCell).before('<td' + tdAttributes + '>' + dom.blank + '</td>');
  3959|             }
  3960|             break;
  3961|           case TableResultAction.resultAction.SumSpanCount:
  3962|             if (position === 'right') {
  3963|               var colspanNumber = parseInt(currentCell.baseCell.colSpan, 10);
  3964|               colspanNumber++;
  3965|               currentCell.baseCell.setAttribute('colSpan', colspanNumber);
  3966|             } else {
  3967|               external_jQuery_default()(currentCell.baseCell).before('<td' + tdAttributes + '>' + dom.blank + '</td>');
  3968|             }
  3969|             break;
  3970|         }
  3971|       }
  3972|     }
  3973|     /*
  3974|     * Copy attributes from element.
  3975|     *
  3976|     * @param {object} Element to recover attributes.
  3977|     * @return {string} Copied string elements.
  3978|     */
  3979|   }, {
  3980|     key: "recoverAttributes",
  3981|     value: function recoverAttributes(el) {
  3982|       var resultStr = '';
  3983|       if (!el) {
  3984|         return resultStr;
  3985|       }
  3986|       var attrList = el.attributes || [];
  3987|       for (var i = 0; i < attrList.length; i++) {
  3988|         if (attrList[i].name.toLowerCase() === 'id') {
  3989|           continue;
  3990|         }
  3991|         if (attrList[i].specified) {
  3992|           resultStr += ' ' + attrList[i].name + '=\'' + attrList[i].value + '\'';
  3993|         }
  3994|       }
  3995|       return resultStr;
  3996|     }
  3997|     /**
  3998|      * Delete current row
  3999|      *
  4000|      * @param {WrappedRange} rng
  4001|      * @return {Node}
  4002|      */
  4003|   }, {
  4004|     key: "deleteRow",
  4005|     value: function deleteRow(rng) {
  4006|       var cell = dom.ancestor(rng.commonAncestor(), dom.isCell);
  4007|       var row = external_jQuery_default()(cell).closest('tr');
  4008|       var cellPos = row.children('td, th').index(external_jQuery_default()(cell));
  4009|       var rowPos = row[0].rowIndex;
  4010|       var vTable = new TableResultAction(cell, TableResultAction.where.Row, TableResultAction.requestAction.Delete, external_jQuery_default()(row).closest('table')[0]);
  4011|       var actions = vTable.getActionList();
  4012|       for (var actionIndex = 0; actionIndex < actions.length; actionIndex++) {
  4013|         if (!actions[actionIndex]) {
  4014|           continue;
  4015|         }
  4016|         var baseCell = actions[actionIndex].baseCell;
  4017|         var virtualPosition = actions[actionIndex].virtualTable;
  4018|         var hasRowspan = baseCell.rowSpan && baseCell.rowSpan > 1;
  4019|         var rowspanNumber = hasRowspan ? parseInt(baseCell.rowSpan, 10) : 0;
  4020|         switch (actions[actionIndex].action) {
  4021|           case TableResultAction.resultAction.Ignore:
  4022|             continue;
  4023|           case TableResultAction.resultAction.AddCell:
  4024|             {
  4025|               var nextRow = row.next('tr')[0];
  4026|               if (!nextRow) {
  4027|                 continue;
  4028|               }
  4029|               var cloneRow = row[0].cells[cellPos];
  4030|               if (hasRowspan) {
  4031|                 if (rowspanNumber > 2) {
  4032|                   rowspanNumber--;
  4033|                   nextRow.insertBefore(cloneRow, nextRow.cells[cellPos]);
  4034|                   nextRow.cells[cellPos].setAttribute('rowSpan', rowspanNumber);
  4035|                   nextRow.cells[cellPos].innerHTML = '';
  4036|                 } else if (rowspanNumber === 2) {
  4037|                   nextRow.insertBefore(cloneRow, nextRow.cells[cellPos]);
  4038|                   nextRow.cells[cellPos].removeAttribute('rowSpan');
  4039|                   nextRow.cells[cellPos].innerHTML = '';
  4040|                 }
  4041|               }
  4042|             }
  4043|             continue;
  4044|           case TableResultAction.resultAction.SubtractSpanCount:
  4045|             if (hasRowspan) {
  4046|               if (rowspanNumber > 2) {
  4047|                 rowspanNumber--;
  4048|                 baseCell.setAttribute('rowSpan', rowspanNumber);
  4049|                 if (virtualPosition.rowIndex !== rowPos && baseCell.cellIndex === cellPos) {
  4050|                   baseCell.innerHTML = '';
  4051|                 }
  4052|               } else if (rowspanNumber === 2) {
  4053|                 baseCell.removeAttribute('rowSpan');
  4054|                 if (virtualPosition.rowIndex !== rowPos && baseCell.cellIndex === cellPos) {
  4055|                   baseCell.innerHTML = '';
  4056|                 }
  4057|               }
  4058|             }
  4059|             continue;
  4060|           case TableResultAction.resultAction.RemoveCell:
  4061|             continue;
  4062|         }
  4063|       }
  4064|       row.remove();
  4065|     }
  4066|     /**
  4067|      * Delete current col
  4068|      *
  4069|      * @param {WrappedRange} rng
  4070|      * @return {Node}
  4071|      */
  4072|   }, {
  4073|     key: "deleteCol",
  4074|     value: function deleteCol(rng) {
  4075|       var cell = dom.ancestor(rng.commonAncestor(), dom.isCell);
  4076|       var row = external_jQuery_default()(cell).closest('tr');
  4077|       var cellPos = row.children('td, th').index(external_jQuery_default()(cell));
  4078|       var vTable = new TableResultAction(cell, TableResultAction.where.Column, TableResultAction.requestAction.Delete, external_jQuery_default()(row).closest('table')[0]);
  4079|       var actions = vTable.getActionList();
  4080|       for (var actionIndex = 0; actionIndex < actions.length; actionIndex++) {
  4081|         if (!actions[actionIndex]) {
  4082|           continue;
  4083|         }
  4084|         switch (actions[actionIndex].action) {
  4085|           case TableResultAction.resultAction.Ignore:
  4086|             continue;
  4087|           case TableResultAction.resultAction.SubtractSpanCount:
  4088|             {
  4089|               var baseCell = actions[actionIndex].baseCell;
  4090|               var hasColspan = baseCell.colSpan && baseCell.colSpan > 1;
  4091|               if (hasColspan) {
  4092|                 var colspanNumber = baseCell.colSpan ? parseInt(baseCell.colSpan, 10) : 0;
  4093|                 if (colspanNumber > 2) {
  4094|                   colspanNumber--;
  4095|                   baseCell.setAttribute('colSpan', colspanNumber);
  4096|                   if (baseCell.cellIndex === cellPos) {
  4097|                     baseCell.innerHTML = '';
  4098|                   }
  4099|                 } else if (colspanNumber === 2) {
  4100|                   baseCell.removeAttribute('colSpan');
  4101|                   if (baseCell.cellIndex === cellPos) {
  4102|                     baseCell.innerHTML = '';
  4103|                   }
  4104|                 }
  4105|               }
  4106|             }
  4107|             continue;
  4108|           case TableResultAction.resultAction.RemoveCell:
  4109|             dom.remove(actions[actionIndex].baseCell, true);
  4110|             continue;
  4111|         }
  4112|       }
  4113|     }
  4114|     /**
  4115|      * create empty table element
  4116|      *
  4117|      * @param {Number} rowCount
  4118|      * @param {Number} colCount
  4119|      * @return {Node}
  4120|      */
  4121|   }, {
  4122|     key: "createTable",
  4123|     value: function createTable(colCount, rowCount, options) {
  4124|       var tds = [];
  4125|       var tdHTML;
  4126|       for (var idxCol = 0; idxCol < colCount; idxCol++) {
  4127|         tds.push('<td>' + dom.blank + '</td>');
  4128|       }
  4129|       tdHTML = tds.join('');
  4130|       var trs = [];
  4131|       var trHTML;
  4132|       for (var idxRow = 0; idxRow < rowCount; idxRow++) {
  4133|         trs.push('<tr>' + tdHTML + '</tr>');
  4134|       }
  4135|       trHTML = trs.join('');
  4136|       var $table = external_jQuery_default()('<table>' + trHTML + '</table>');
  4137|       if (options && options.tableClassName) {
  4138|         $table.addClass(options.tableClassName);
  4139|       }
  4140|       return $table[0];
  4141|     }
  4142|     /**

  4146|      * @return {Node}
  4147|      */
  4148|   }, {

  4151|       var cell = dom.ancestor(rng.commonAncestor(), dom.isCell);
  4152|       external_jQuery_default()(cell).closest('table').remove();
  4153|     }
  4154|   }]);
  4155|   return Table;

  4527|   }, {
  4528|     key: "handleKeyMap",
  4529|     value: function handleKeyMap(event) {
  4530|       var keyMap = this.options.keyMap[env.isMac ? 'mac' : 'pc'];
  4531|       var keys = [];
  4532|       if (event.metaKey) {
  4533|         keys.push('CMD');
  4534|       }
  4535|       if (event.ctrlKey && !event.altKey) {
  4536|         keys.push('CTRL');
  4537|       }
  4538|       if (event.shiftKey) {
  4539|         keys.push('SHIFT');
  4540|       }
  4541|       var keyName = key.nameFromCode[event.keyCode];
  4542|       if (keyName) {
  4543|         keys.push(keyName);
  4544|       }
  4545|       var eventName = keyMap[keys.join('+')];
  4546|       if (keyName === 'TAB' && !this.options.tabDisable) {
  4547|         this.afterCommand();
  4548|       } else if (eventName) {
  4549|         if (this.context.invoke(eventName) !== false) {
  4550|           event.preventDefault(); // if keyMap action was invoked
  4551|           return true;
  4552|         }
  4553|       } else if (key.isEdit(event.keyCode)) {
  4554|         this.afterCommand();
  4555|       }
  4556|       return false;
  4557|     }
  4558|   }, {
  4559|     key: "preventDefaultEditableShortCuts",
  4560|     value: function preventDefaultEditableShortCuts(event) {
  4561|       if ((event.ctrlKey || event.metaKey) && lists.contains([66, 73, 85], event.keyCode)) {
  4562|         event.preventDefault();
  4563|       }
  4564|     }
  4565|   }, {
  4566|     key: "isLimited",
  4567|     value: function isLimited(pad, event) {
  4568|       pad = pad || 0;
  4569|       if (typeof event !== 'undefined') {
  4570|         if (key.isMove(event.keyCode) || key.isNavigation(event.keyCode) || event.ctrlKey || event.metaKey || lists.contains([key.code.BACKSPACE, key.code.DELETE], event.keyCode)) {
  4571|           return false;
  4572|         }
  4573|       }
  4574|       if (this.options.maxTextLength > 0) {
  4575|         if (this.$editable.text().length + pad > this.options.maxTextLength) {
  4576|           return true;
  4577|         }
  4578|       }
  4579|       return false;
  4580|     }
  4581|     /**
  4582|      * create range
  4583|      * @return {WrappedRange}
  4584|      */
  4585|   }, {

  4587|     value: function createRange() {
  4588|       this.focus();
  4589|       this.setLastRange();
  4590|       return this.getLastRange();
  4591|     }
  4592|     /**

  4601|       var startRange = range.createFromNodeBefore(lists.head(lst));
  4602|       var startPoint = startRange.getStartPoint();
  4603|       var endRange = range.createFromNodeAfter(lists.last(lst));
  4604|       var endPoint = endRange.getEndPoint();
  4605|       return range.create(startPoint.node, startPoint.offset, endPoint.node, endPoint.offset);
  4606|     }
  4607|     /**

  4624|         }
  4625|       }
  4626|     }

  5036|      */
  5037|   }, {
  5038|     key: "resizeTo",
  5039|     value: function resizeTo(pos, $target, bKeepRatio) {
  5040|       var imageSize;
  5041|       if (bKeepRatio) {
  5042|         var newRatio = pos.y / pos.x;
  5043|         var ratio = $target.data('ratio');
  5044|         imageSize = {
  5045|           width: ratio > newRatio ? pos.x : pos.y / ratio,
  5046|           height: ratio > newRatio ? pos.x * ratio : pos.y
  5047|         };
  5048|       } else {
  5049|         imageSize = {
  5050|           width: pos.x,
  5051|           height: pos.y
  5052|         };
  5053|       }
  5054|       $target.css(imageSize);
  5055|     }

  5112|   Clipboard_createClass(Clipboard, [{
  5113|     key: "initialize",
  5114|     value: function initialize() {
  5115|       this.$editable.on('paste', this.pasteByEvent.bind(this));
  5116|     }
  5117|     /**
  5118|      * paste by clipboard event
  5119|      *
  5120|      * @param {Event} event
  5121|      */
  5122|   }, {
  5123|     key: "pasteByEvent",
  5124|     value: function pasteByEvent(event) {
  5125|       var _this = this;
  5126|       var clipboardData = event.originalEvent.clipboardData;
  5127|       if (clipboardData && clipboardData.items && clipboardData.items.length) {
  5128|         var item = clipboardData.items.length > 1 ? clipboardData.items[1] : lists.head(clipboardData.items);
  5129|         if (item.kind === 'file' && item.type.indexOf('image/') !== -1) {
  5130|           this.context.invoke('editor.insertImagesOrCallback', [item.getAsFile()]);
  5131|           event.preventDefault();
  5132|         } else if (item.kind === 'string') {
  5133|           if (this.context.invoke('editor.isLimited', clipboardData.getData('Text').length)) {
  5134|             event.preventDefault();
  5135|           }
  5136|         }
  5137|       } else if (window.clipboardData) {
  5138|         var text = window.clipboardData.getData('text');

  5701|     key: "initialize",
  5702|     value: function initialize() {
  5703|       this.lastWordRange = null;
  5704|     }
  5705|   }, {
  5706|     key: "destroy",
  5707|     value: function destroy() {
  5708|       this.lastWordRange = null;
  5709|     }
  5710|   }, {
  5711|     key: "replace",
  5712|     value: function replace() {
  5713|       if (!this.lastWordRange) {
  5714|         return;
  5715|       }
  5716|       var keyword = this.lastWordRange.toString();
  5717|       var match = keyword.match(linkPattern);
  5718|       if (match && (match[1] || match[2])) {
  5719|         var link = match[1] ? keyword : defaultScheme + keyword;

  5723|           external_jQuery_default()(node).attr('target', '_blank');
  5724|         }

  5728|       }
  5729|     }

  5736|       }
  5737|     }

  5743|       }

  5801|     }
  5802|   }, {

  5806|     }
  5807|   }, {

  5810|       this.lastWord = null;
  5811|     }

  5829|           }

  5834|         }
  5835|       });
  5836|     }
  5837|   }, {

  5847|       }

['<div class="note-palette">', '<div class="note-palette-title">' + this.lang.color.background + '</div>', '<div>', '<button type="button" class="note-color-reset btn btn-light btn-default" data-event="backColor" data-value="transparent">', this.lang.color.transparent, '</button>', '</div>', '<div class="note-holder" data-event="backColor"><!-- back colors --></div>', '<div>', '<button type="button" class="note-color-select btn btn-light btn-default" data-event="openPalette" data-value="backColorPicker-' + this.options.id + '">', this.lang.color.cpSelect, '</button>', '<input type="color" id="backColorPicker-' + this.options.id + '" class="note-btn note-color-select-btn" value="' + this.options.colorButton.backColor + '" data-event="backColorPalette-' + this.options.id + '">', '</div>', '<div class="note-holder-custom" id="backColorPalette-' + this.options.id + '" data-event="backColor"></div>', '</div>'].join('') : '') + (foreColor ?   6025|           '<div class="note-holder-custom" id="foreColorPalette-' + this.options.id + '" data-event="foreColor"></div>', '</div>'].join('') : ''),
  6026|           callback: function callback($dropdown) {
  6027|             $dropdown.find('.note-holder').each(function (idx, item) {
  6028|               var $holder = external_jQuery_default()(item);
  6029|               $holder.append(_this.ui.palette({
  6030|                 colors: _this.options.colors,
  6031|                 colorsName: _this.options.colorsName,
  6032|                 eventName: $holder.data('event'),
  6033|                 container: _this.options.container,
  6034|                 tooltip: _this.options.tooltip
  6035|               }).render());
  6036|             });
  6037|             /* TODO: do we have to record recent custom colors within cookies? */
  6038|             var customColors = [['#FFFFFF', '#FFFFFF', '#FFFFFF', '#FFFFFF', '#FFFFFF', '#FFFFFF', '#FFFFFF', '#FFFFFF']];
  6039|             $dropdown.find('.note-holder-custom').each(function (idx, item) {
  6040|               var $holder = external_jQuery_default()(item);
  6041|               $holder.append(_this.ui.palette({
  6042|                 colors: customColors,
  6043|                 colorsName: customColors,
  6044|                 eventName: $holder.data('event'),
  6045|                 container: _this.options.container,
  6046|                 tooltip: _this.options.tooltip
  6047|               }).render());
  6048|             });
  6049|             $dropdown.find('input[type=color]').each(function (idx, item) {
  6050|               external_jQuery_default()(item).change(function () {
  6051|                 var $chip = $dropdown.find('#' + external_jQuery_default()(this).data('event')).find('.note-color-btn').first();
  6052|                 var color = this.value.toUpperCase();
  6053|                 $chip.css('background-color', color).attr('aria-label', color).attr('data-value', color).attr('data-original-title', color);
  6054|                 $chip.click();
  6055|               });
  6056|             });
  6057|           },
  6058|           click: function click(event) {
  6059|             event.stopPropagation();
  6060|             var $parent = external_jQuery_default()('.' + className).find('.note-dropdown-menu');
  6061|             var $button = external_jQuery_default()(event.target);
  6062|             var eventName = $button.data('event');
  6063|             var value = $button.attr('data-value');
  6064|             if (eventName === 'openPalette') {
  6065|               var $picker = $parent.find('#' + value);
  6066|               var $palette = external_jQuery_default()($parent.find('#' + $picker.data('event')).find('.note-color-row')[0]); // Shift palette chips
  6067|               var $chip = $palette.find('.note-color-btn').last().detach(); // Set chip attributes
  6068|               var color = $picker.val();
  6069|               $chip.css('background-color', color).attr('aria-label', color).attr('data-value', color).attr('data-original-title', color);
  6070|               $palette.prepend($chip);
  6071|               $picker.click();
  6072|             } else {
  6073|               if (lists.contains(['backColor', 'foreColor'], eventName)) {
  6074|                 var key = eventName === 'backColor' ? 'background-color' : 'color';
  6075|                 var $color = $button.closest('.note-color').find('.note-recent-color');
  6076|                 var $currentButton = $button.closest('.note-color').find('.note-current-color-button');
  6077|                 $color.css(key, value);
  6078|                 $currentButton.attr('data-' + eventName, value);
  6079|               }
  6080|               _this.context.invoke('editor.' + eventName, value);
  6081|             }
  6082|           }
  6083|         })]
  6084|       }).render();
  6085|     }
  6086|   }, {
  6087|     key: "addToolbarButtons",
  6088|     value: function addToolbarButtons() {
  6089|       var _this2 = this;
  6090|       this.context.memo('button.style', function () {

  6093|           contents: _this2.ui.dropdownButtonContents(_this2.ui.icon(_this2.options.icons.magic), _this2.options),
  6094|           tooltip: _this2.lang.style.style,
  6095|           data: {
  6096|             toggle: 'dropdown'
  6097|           }
  6098|         }), _this2.ui.dropdown({
  6099|           className: 'dropdown-style',
  6100|           items: _this2.options.styleTags,
  6101|           title: _this2.lang.style.style,
  6102|           template: function template(item) {
  6103|             if (typeof item === 'string') {
  6104|               item = {
  6105|                 tag: item,
  6106|                 title: Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(_this2.lang.style, item) ? _this2.lang.style[item] : item
  6107|               };
  6108|             }
  6109|             var tag = item.tag;
  6110|             var title = item.title;
  6111|             var style = item.style ? ' style="' + item.style + '" ' : '';
  6112|             var className = item.className ? ' class="' + item.className + '"' : '';
  6113|             return '<' + tag + style + className + '>' + title + '</' + tag + '>';
  6114|           },
  6115|           click: _this2.context.createInvokeHandler('editor.formatBlock')
  6116|         })]).render();
  6117|       });
  6118|       var _loop = function _loop(styleIdx, styleLen) {

  6126|           }).render();
  6127|         });
  6128|       };
  6129|       for (var styleIdx = 0, styleLen = this.options.styleTags.length; styleIdx < styleLen; styleIdx++) {
  6130|         _loop(styleIdx, styleLen);
  6131|       }

  6583|     key: "build",
  6584|     value: function build($container, groups) {

  6586|         var group = groups[groupIdx];

  6590|           className: 'note-' + groupName
  6591|         }).render();

  6593|           var btn = this.context.memo('button.' + buttons[idx]);
  6594|           if (btn) {
  6595|             $group.append(typeof btn === 'function' ? btn(this.context) : btn);
  6596|           }
  6597|         }
  6598|         $group.appendTo($container);
  6599|       }
  6600|     }

  6675|   }, {
  6676|     key: "tableMoveHandler",
  6677|     value: function tableMoveHandler(event) {
  6678|       var PX_PER_EM = 18;
  6679|       var $picker = external_jQuery_default()(event.target.parentNode); // target is mousecatcher
  6680|       var $dimensionDisplay = $picker.next();
  6681|       var $catcher = $picker.find('.note-dimension-picker-mousecatcher');
  6682|       var $highlighted = $picker.find('.note-dimension-picker-highlighted');
  6683|       var $unhighlighted = $picker.find('.note-dimension-picker-unhighlighted');
  6684|       var posOffset; // HTML5 with jQuery - e.offsetX is undefined in Firefox
  6685|       if (event.offsetX === undefined) {
  6686|         var posCatcher = external_jQuery_default()(event.target).offset();
  6687|         posOffset = {
  6688|           x: event.pageX - posCatcher.left,
  6689|           y: event.pageY - posCatcher.top
  6690|         };
  6691|       } else {
  6692|         posOffset = {
  6693|           x: event.offsetX,
  6694|           y: event.offsetY
  6695|         };
  6696|       }
  6697|       var dim = {
  6698|         c: Math.ceil(posOffset.x / PX_PER_EM) || 1,
  6699|         r: Math.ceil(posOffset.y / PX_PER_EM) || 1
  6700|       };
  6701|       $highlighted.css({
  6702|         width: dim.c + 'em',
  6703|         height: dim.r + 'em'
  6704|       });
  6705|       $catcher.data('value', dim.c + 'x' + dim.r);
  6706|       if (dim.c > 3 && dim.c < this.options.insertTableMaxSize.col) {
  6707|         $unhighlighted.css({
  6708|           width: dim.c + 1 + 'em'
  6709|         });
  6710|       }
  6711|       if (dim.r > 3 && dim.r < this.options.insertTableMaxSize.row) {
  6712|         $unhighlighted.css({
  6713|           height: dim.r + 1 + 'em'
  6714|         });
  6715|       }
  6716|       $dimensionDisplay.html(dim.c + ' x ' + dim.r);
  6717|     }
  6718|   }]);
  6719|   return Buttons;
  6720| }();

  6745|     }
  6746|   }, {
  6747|     key: "initialize",

  6774|       }

  6776|   }, {
  6777|     key: "followScroll",
  6778|     value: function followScroll() {
  6779|       if (this.$editor.hasClass('fullscreen')) {
  6780|         return false;
  6781|       }
  6782|       var editorHeight = this.$editor.outerHeight();
  6783|       var editorWidth = this.$editor.width();
  6784|       var toolbarHeight = this.$toolbar.height();
  6785|       var statusbarHeight = this.$statusbar.height(); // check if the web app is currently using another static bar
  6786|       var otherBarHeight = 0;
  6787|       if (this.options.otherStaticBar) {
  6788|         otherBarHeight = external_jQuery_default()(this.options.otherStaticBar).outerHeight();
  6789|       }
  6790|       var currentOffset = this.$document.scrollTop();
  6791|       var editorOffsetTop = this.$editor.offset().top;
  6792|       var editorOffsetBottom = editorOffsetTop + editorHeight;
  6793|       var activateOffset = editorOffsetTop - otherBarHeight;
  6794|       var deactivateOffsetBottom = editorOffsetBottom - otherBarHeight - toolbarHeight - statusbarHeight;
  6795|       if (!this.isFollowing && currentOffset > activateOffset && currentOffset < deactivateOffsetBottom - toolbarHeight) {
  6796|         this.isFollowing = true;
  6797|         this.$editable.css({
  6798|           marginTop: this.$toolbar.outerHeight()
  6799|         });
  6800|         this.$toolbar.css({
  6801|           position: 'fixed',
  6802|           top: otherBarHeight,
  6803|           width: editorWidth,
  6804|           zIndex: 1000
  6805|         });
  6806|       } else if (this.isFollowing && (currentOffset < activateOffset || currentOffset > deactivateOffsetBottom)) {
  6807|         this.isFollowing = false;
  6808|         this.$toolbar.css({
  6809|           position: 'relative',
  6810|           top: 0,
  6811|           width: '100%',
  6812|           zIndex: 'auto'
  6813|         });
  6814|         this.$editable.css({
  6815|           marginTop: ''
  6816|         });
  6817|       }
  6818|     }
  6819|   }, {
  6820|     key: "changeContainer",
  6821|     value: function changeContainer(isFullscreen) {
  6822|       if (isFullscreen) {
  6823|         this.$toolbar.prependTo(this.$editor);
  6824|       } else {
  6825|         if (this.options.toolbarContainer) {
  6826|           this.$toolbar.appendTo(this.options.toolbarContainer);
  6827|         }
  6828|       }
  6829|       if (this.options.followingToolbar) {
  6830|         this.followScroll();
  6831|       }
  6832|     }
  6833|   }, {
  6834|     key: "updateFullscreen",
  6835|     value: function updateFullscreen(isFullscreen) {

  6837|       this.changeContainer(isFullscreen);
  6838|     }
  6839|   }, {
  6840|     key: "updateCodeview",
  6841|     value: function updateCodeview(isCodeview) {
  6842|       this.ui.toggleBtnActive(this.$toolbar.find('.btn-codeview'), isCodeview);
  6843|       if (isCodeview) {
  6844|         this.deactivate();
  6845|       } else {
  6846|         this.activate();
  6847|       }
  6848|     }
  6849|   }, {
  6850|     key: "activate",

  6852|       var $btn = this.$toolbar.find('button');
  6853|       if (!isIncludeCodeview) {
  6854|         $btn = $btn.not('.note-codeview-keep');
  6855|       }
  6856|       this.ui.toggleBtn($btn, true);
  6857|     }
  6858|   }, {
  6859|     key: "deactivate",
  6860|     value: function deactivate(isIncludeCodeview) {

  6862|       if (!isIncludeCodeview) {

  6864|       }

  6866|     }

  6936|      * @return {Promise}
  6937|      */

  6939|     key: "showLinkDialog",

  6942|       return external_jQuery_default().Deferred(function (deferred) {

  6944|         var $linkUrl = _this.$dialog.find('.note-link-url');
  6945|         var $linkBtn = _this.$dialog.find('.note-link-btn');

  6951|             linkInfo.url = linkInfo.text;
  6952|           }

  6959|               $linkText.val($linkUrl.val());
  6960|             }
  6961|             _this.toggleLinkBtn($linkBtn, $linkText, $linkUrl);

  6965|           }

  6967|           _this.bindEnterKey($linkUrl, $linkBtn);

  6983|           });

  6990|             deferred.reject();
  6991|           }
  6992|         });
  6993|         _this.ui.showDialog(_this.$dialog);

  6998|      */

  7009|         _this2.context.invoke('editor.restoreRange');
  7010|       });
  7011|     }

  7074|         this.hide();
  7075|         return;
  7076|       }
  7077|       var rng = this.context.invoke('editor.getLastRange');
  7078|       if (rng.isCollapsed() && rng.isOnAnchor()) {

  7083|         var containerOffset = external_jQuery_default()(this.options.container).offset();
  7084|         pos.top -= containerOffset.top;
  7085|         pos.left -= containerOffset.left;
  7086|         this.$popover.css({
  7087|           display: 'block',
  7088|           left: pos.left,
  7089|           top: pos.top
  7090|         });
  7091|       } else {
  7092|         this.hide();
  7093|       }
  7094|     }
  7095|   }, {
  7096|     key: "hide",

  7098|       this.$popover.hide();
  7099|     }

  7367|       }

  7375|           display: 'block',

  7377|           top: pos.top
  7378|         });

  7380|         this.hide();
  7381|       }

  7383|     }

  8283| var Renderer = /*#__PURE__*/function () {
  8284|   function Renderer(markup, children, options, callback) {
  8285|     renderer_classCallCheck(this, Renderer);

  8288|     this.options = options;
  8289|     this.callback = callback;
  8290|   }
  8291|   renderer_createClass(Renderer, [{
  8292|     key: "render",
  8293|     value: function render($parent) {
  8294|       var $node = external_jQuery_default()(this.markup);
  8295|       if (this.options && this.options.contents) {
  8296|         $node.html(this.options.contents);
  8297|       }
  8298|       if (this.options && this.options.className) {
  8299|         $node.addClass(this.options.className);
  8300|       }
  8301|       if (this.options && this.options.data) {
  8302|         external_jQuery_default().each(this.options.data, function (k, v) {
  8303|           $node.attr('data-' + k, v);
  8304|         });
  8305|       }
  8306|       if (this.options && this.options.click) {
  8307|         $node.on('click', this.options.click);
  8308|       }

  8312|           child.render($container.length ? $container : $node);
  8313|         });
  8314|       }

  8316|         this.callback($node, this.options);
  8317|       }

  8319|         this.options.callback($node);
  8320|       }

  8322|         $parent.append($node);
  8323|       }
  8324|       return $node;
  8325|     }
  8326|   }]);
  8327|   return Renderer;

  8341| ;// CONCATENATED MODULE: ./src/styles/lite/js/TooltipUI.js
  8342| function TooltipUI_classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError("Cannot call a class as a function"); } }
  8343| function TooltipUI_defineProperties(target, props) { for (var i = 0; i < props.length; i++) { var descriptor = props[i]; descriptor.enumerable = descriptor.enumerable || false; descriptor.configurable = true; if ("value" in descriptor) descriptor.writable = true; Object.defineProperty(target, descriptor.key, descriptor); } }

  8345| var TooltipUI = /*#__PURE__*/function () {
  8346|   function TooltipUI($node, options) {
  8347|     TooltipUI_classCallCheck(this, TooltipUI);
  8348|     this.$node = $node;
  8349|     this.options = external_jQuery_default().extend({}, {
  8350|       title: '',
  8351|       target: options.container,
  8352|       trigger: 'hover focus',
  8353|       placement: 'bottom'
  8354|     }, options); // create tooltip node
  8355|     this.$tooltip = external_jQuery_default()(['<div class="note-tooltip">', '<div class="note-tooltip-arrow"></div>', '<div class="note-tooltip-content"></div>', '</div>'].join('')); // define event
  8356|     if (this.options.trigger !== 'manual') {
  8357|       var showCallback = this.show.bind(this);
  8358|       var hideCallback = this.hide.bind(this);
  8359|       var toggleCallback = this.toggle.bind(this);
  8360|       this.options.trigger.split(' ').forEach(function (eventName) {
  8361|         if (eventName === 'hover') {
  8362|           $node.off('mouseenter mouseleave');
  8363|           $node.on('mouseenter', showCallback).on('mouseleave', hideCallback);
  8364|         } else if (eventName === 'click') {
  8365|           $node.on('click', toggleCallback);
  8366|         } else if (eventName === 'focus') {
  8367|           $node.on('focus', showCallback).on('blur', hideCallback);
  8368|         }
  8369|       });
  8370|     }
  8371|   }
  8372|   TooltipUI_createClass(TooltipUI, [{
  8373|     key: "show",
  8374|     value: function show() {
  8375|       var $node = this.$node;
  8376|       var offset = $node.offset();
  8377|       var targetOffset = external_jQuery_default()(this.options.target).offset();
  8378|       offset.top -= targetOffset.top;
  8379|       offset.left -= targetOffset.left;
  8380|       var $tooltip = this.$tooltip;
  8381|       var title = this.options.title || $node.attr('title') || $node.data('title');
  8382|       var placement = this.options.placement || $node.data('placement');
  8383|       $tooltip.addClass(placement);
  8384|       $tooltip.find('.note-tooltip-content').text(title);
  8385|       $tooltip.appendTo(this.options.target);
  8386|       var nodeWidth = $node.outerWidth();
  8387|       var nodeHeight = $node.outerHeight();
  8388|       var tooltipWidth = $tooltip.outerWidth();
  8389|       var tooltipHeight = $tooltip.outerHeight();
  8390|       if (placement === 'bottom') {
  8391|         $tooltip.css({
  8392|           top: offset.top + nodeHeight,
  8393|           left: offset.left + (nodeWidth / 2 - tooltipWidth / 2)
  8394|         });
  8395|       } else if (placement === 'top') {
  8396|         $tooltip.css({
  8397|           top: offset.top - tooltipHeight,
  8398|           left: offset.left + (nodeWidth / 2 - tooltipWidth / 2)
  8399|         });
  8400|       } else if (placement === 'left') {
  8401|         $tooltip.css({
  8402|           top: offset.top + (nodeHeight / 2 - tooltipHeight / 2),
  8403|           left: offset.left - tooltipWidth
  8404|         });
  8405|       } else if (placement === 'right') {
  8406|         $tooltip.css({
  8407|           top: offset.top + (nodeHeight / 2 - tooltipHeight / 2),
  8408|           left: offset.left + nodeWidth
  8409|         });
  8410|       }
  8411|       $tooltip.addClass('in');
  8412|     }
  8413|   }, {
  8414|     key: "hide",
  8415|     value: function hide() {
  8416|       var _this = this;
  8417|       this.$tooltip.removeClass('in');
  8418|       setTimeout(function () {
  8419|         _this.$tooltip.remove();
  8420|       }, 200);
  8421|     }
  8422|   }, {
  8423|     key: "toggle",
  8424|     value: function toggle() {
  8425|       if (this.$tooltip.hasClass('in')) {
  8426|         this.hide();
  8427|       } else {
  8428|         this.show();
  8429|       }
  8430|     }
  8431|   }]);
  8432|   return TooltipUI;
  8433| }();

  8455|       });
  8456|     }
  8457|   }, {
  8458|     key: "clear",

  8461|       $parent.find('.note-btn.active').removeClass('active');
  8462|       $parent.removeClass('open');
  8463|     }
  8464|   }, {
  8465|     key: "show",

  8469|       var $dropdown = this.$button.next();

  8474|       if (offset.left + width > windowWidth - targetMarginRight) {

  8480|   }, {

  8485|     }
  8486|   }, {

  8490|       this.clear();
  8491|       if (isOpened) {
  8492|         this.hide();
  8493|       } else {
  8494|         this.show();
  8495|       }
  8496|     }
  8497|   }]);
  8498|   return DropdownUI;

  8637| var dropdownButton = function dropdownButton(opt, callback) {

  8648|     template: opt.template,
  8649|     itemClick: opt.itemClick
  8650|   })], {
  8651|     callback: callback
  8652|   }).render();
  8653| };

  8672| var paragraphDropdownButton = function paragraphDropdownButton(opt) {
