  5831|           self.lastWord.insertNode(node);
  5832|           self.lastWord = null;
  5833|           self.context.invoke('editor.focus');
  5834|         }
  5835|       });

  5839|     value: function handleKeydown(e) {
  5840|       if (this.previousKeydownCode && lists.contains(this.keys, this.previousKeydownCode)) {
  5841|         this.previousKeydownCode = e.keyCode;
  5842|         return;
  5843|       }
  5844|       if (lists.contains(this.keys, e.keyCode)) {
  5845|         var wordRange = this.context.invoke('editor.createRange').getWordRange();
  5846|         this.lastWord = wordRange;
  5847|       }
  5848|       this.previousKeydownCode = e.keyCode;
  5849|     }
  5850|   }, {
  5851|     key: "handleKeyup",
  5852|     value: function handleKeyup(e) {
  5853|       if (lists.contains(this.keys, e.keyCode)) {
  5854|         this.replace();
  5855|       }
  5856|     }
  5857|   }]);
  5858|   return AutoReplace;
  5859| }();

  5926|   Buttons_createClass(Buttons, [{
  5927|     key: "representShortcut",
  5928|     value: function representShortcut(editorMethod) {
  5929|       var shortcut = this.invertedKeyMap[editorMethod];
  5930|       if (!this.options.shortcuts || !shortcut) {
  5931|         return '';
  5932|       }
  5933|       if (env.isMac) {
  5934|         shortcut = shortcut.replace('CMD', '⌘').replace('SHIFT', '⇧');
  5935|       }
  5936|       shortcut = shortcut.replace('BACKSLASH', '\\').replace('SLASH', '/').replace('LEFTBRACKET', '[').replace('RIGHTBRACKET', ']');
  5937|       return ' (' + shortcut + ')';
  5938|     }
  5939|   }, {

  6582|   }, {
  6583|     key: "build",
  6584|     value: function build($container, groups) {
  6585|       for (var groupIdx = 0, groupLen = groups.length; groupIdx < groupLen; groupIdx++) {
  6586|         var group = groups[groupIdx];
  6587|         var groupName = Array.isArray(group) ? group[0] : group;
  6588|         var buttons = Array.isArray(group) ? group.length === 1 ? [group[0]] : group[1] : [group];
  6589|         var $group = this.ui.buttonGroup({
  6590|           className: 'note-' + groupName
  6591|         }).render();
  6592|         for (var idx = 0, len = buttons.length; idx < len; idx++) {
  6593|           var btn = this.context.memo('button.' + buttons[idx]);
  6594|           if (btn) {
  6595|             $group.append(typeof btn === 'function' ? btn(this.context) : btn);
  6596|           }
  6597|         }
  6598|         $group.appendTo($container);
  6599|       }
  6600|     }
  6601|     /**
  6602|      * @param {jQuery} [$container]
  6603|      */
  6604|   }, {
  6605|     key: "updateCurrentStyle",
  6606|     value: function updateCurrentStyle($container) {
  6607|       var $cont = $container || this.$toolbar;
  6608|       var styleInfo = this.context.invoke('editor.currentStyle');
  6609|       this.updateBtnStates($cont, {
  6610|         '.note-btn-bold': function noteBtnBold() {
  6611|           return styleInfo['font-bold'] === 'bold';
  6612|         },
  6613|         '.note-btn-italic': function noteBtnItalic() {
  6614|           return styleInfo['font-italic'] === 'italic';
  6615|         },
  6616|         '.note-btn-underline': function noteBtnUnderline() {
  6617|           return styleInfo['font-underline'] === 'underline';
  6618|         },
  6619|         '.note-btn-subscript': function noteBtnSubscript() {
  6620|           return styleInfo['font-subscript'] === 'subscript';
  6621|         },
  6622|         '.note-btn-superscript': function noteBtnSuperscript() {
  6623|           return styleInfo['font-superscript'] === 'superscript';
  6624|         },
  6625|         '.note-btn-strikethrough': function noteBtnStrikethrough() {
  6626|           return styleInfo['font-strikethrough'] === 'strikethrough';
  6627|         }
  6628|       });
  6629|       if (styleInfo['font-family']) {
  6630|         var fontNames = styleInfo['font-family'].split(',').map(function (name) {
  6631|           return name.replace(/[\'\"]/g, '').replace(/\s+$/, '').replace(/^\s+/, '');
  6632|         });
  6633|         var fontName = lists.find(fontNames, this.isFontInstalled.bind(this));
  6634|         $cont.find('.dropdown-fontname a').each(function (idx, item) {
  6635|           var $item = external_jQuery_default()(item); // always compare string to avoid creating another func.
  6636|           var isChecked = $item.data('value') + '' === fontName + '';
  6637|           $item.toggleClass('checked', isChecked);
  6638|         });
  6639|         $cont.find('.note-current-fontname').text(fontName).css('font-family', fontName);
  6640|       }
  6641|       if (styleInfo['font-size']) {
  6642|         var fontSize = styleInfo['font-size'];
  6643|         $cont.find('.dropdown-fontsize a').each(function (idx, item) {
  6644|           var $item = external_jQuery_default()(item); // always compare with string to avoid creating another func.
  6645|           var isChecked = $item.data('value') + '' === fontSize + '';
  6646|           $item.toggleClass('checked', isChecked);
  6647|         });
  6648|         $cont.find('.note-current-fontsize').text(fontSize);
  6649|         var fontSizeUnit = styleInfo['font-size-unit'];
  6650|         $cont.find('.dropdown-fontsizeunit a').each(function (idx, item) {
  6651|           var $item = external_jQuery_default()(item);
  6652|           var isChecked = $item.data('value') + '' === fontSizeUnit + '';
  6653|           $item.toggleClass('checked', isChecked);
  6654|         });
  6655|         $cont.find('.note-current-fontsizeunit').text(fontSizeUnit);
  6656|       }
  6657|       if (styleInfo['line-height']) {
  6658|         var lineHeight = styleInfo['line-height'];
  6659|         $cont.find('.dropdown-line-height a').each(function (idx, item) {
  6660|           var $item = external_jQuery_default()(item); // always compare with string to avoid creating another func.
  6661|           var isChecked = external_jQuery_default()(item).data('value') + '' === lineHeight + '';
  6662|           $item.toggleClass('checked', isChecked);
  6663|         });
  6664|         $cont.find('.note-current-line-height').text(lineHeight);
  6665|       }
  6666|     }
  6667|   }, {
  6668|     key: "updateBtnStates",
  6669|     value: function updateBtnStates($container, infos) {
  6670|       var _this6 = this;
  6671|       external_jQuery_default().each(infos, function (selector, pred) {
  6672|         _this6.ui.toggleBtnActive($container.find(selector), pred());
  6673|       });
  6674|     }
  6675|   }, {
  6676|     key: "tableMoveHandler",
  6677|     value: function tableMoveHandler(event) {
  6678|       var PX_PER_EM = 18;
  6679|       var $picker = external_jQuery_default()(event.target.parentNode); // target is mousecatcher
  6680|       var $dimensionDisplay = $picker.next();
  6681|       var $catcher = $picker.find('.note-dimension-picker-mousecatcher');
  6682|       var $highlighted = $picker.find('.note-dimension-picker-highlighted');
  6683|       var $unhighlighted = $picker.find('.note-dimension-picker-unhighlighted');
  6684|       var posOffset; // HTML5 with jQuery - e.offsetX is undefined in Firefox
  6685|       if (event.offsetX === undefined) {
  6686|         var posCatcher = external_jQuery_default()(event.target).offset();
  6687|         posOffset = {
  6688|           x: event.pageX - posCatcher.left,
  6689|           y: event.pageY - posCatcher.top
  6690|         };
  6691|       } else {
  6692|         posOffset = {
  6693|           x: event.offsetX,
  6694|           y: event.offsetY
  6695|         };
  6696|       }
  6697|       var dim = {
  6698|         c: Math.ceil(posOffset.x / PX_PER_EM) || 1,
  6699|         r: Math.ceil(posOffset.y / PX_PER_EM) || 1
  6700|       };
  6701|       $highlighted.css({
  6702|         width: dim.c + 'em',
  6703|         height: dim.r + 'em'
  6704|       });
  6705|       $catcher.data('value', dim.c + 'x' + dim.r);

  6714|         });
  6715|       }

  6776|   }, {
  6777|     key: "followScroll",
  6778|     value: function followScroll() {
  6779|       if (this.$editor.hasClass('fullscreen')) {
  6780|         return false;
  6781|       }
  6782|       var editorHeight = this.$editor.outerHeight();
  6783|       var editorWidth = this.$editor.width();
  6784|       var toolbarHeight = this.$toolbar.height();
  6785|       var statusbarHeight = this.$statusbar.height(); // check if the web app is currently using another static bar
  6786|       var otherBarHeight = 0;
  6787|       if (this.options.otherStaticBar) {
  6788|         otherBarHeight = external_jQuery_default()(this.options.otherStaticBar).outerHeight();
  6789|       }
  6790|       var currentOffset = this.$document.scrollTop();
  6791|       var editorOffsetTop = this.$editor.offset().top;
  6792|       var editorOffsetBottom = editorOffsetTop + editorHeight;
  6793|       var activateOffset = editorOffsetTop - otherBarHeight;
  6794|       var deactivateOffsetBottom = editorOffsetBottom - otherBarHeight - toolbarHeight - statusbarHeight;
  6795|       if (!this.isFollowing && currentOffset > activateOffset && currentOffset < deactivateOffsetBottom - toolbarHeight) {
  6796|         this.isFollowing = true;
  6797|         this.$editable.css({
  6798|           marginTop: this.$toolbar.outerHeight()
  6799|         });
  6800|         this.$toolbar.css({
  6801|           position: 'fixed',
  6802|           top: otherBarHeight,
  6803|           width: editorWidth,
  6804|           zIndex: 1000
  6805|         });
  6806|       } else if (this.isFollowing && (currentOffset < activateOffset || currentOffset > deactivateOffsetBottom)) {
  6807|         this.isFollowing = false;
  6808|         this.$toolbar.css({
  6809|           position: 'relative',
  6810|           top: 0,
  6811|           width: '100%',
  6812|           zIndex: 'auto'
  6813|         });
  6814|         this.$editable.css({
  6815|           marginTop: ''
  6816|         });
  6817|       }
  6818|     }
  6819|   }, {
  6820|     key: "changeContainer",
  6821|     value: function changeContainer(isFullscreen) {
  6822|       if (isFullscreen) {
  6823|         this.$toolbar.prependTo(this.$editor);
  6824|       } else {
  6825|         if (this.options.toolbarContainer) {
  6826|           this.$toolbar.appendTo(this.options.toolbarContainer);
  6827|         }
  6828|       }
  6829|       if (this.options.followingToolbar) {
  6830|         this.followScroll();
  6831|       }
  6832|     }
  6833|   }, {
  6834|     key: "updateFullscreen",
  6835|     value: function updateFullscreen(isFullscreen) {

  6838|     }
  6839|   }, {
  6840|     key: "updateCodeview",

  6843|       if (isCodeview) {
  6844|         this.deactivate();
  6845|       } else {
  6846|         this.activate();
  6847|       }
  6848|     }
  6849|   }, {
  6850|     key: "activate",

  6854|         $btn = $btn.not('.note-codeview-keep');

  6857|     }

  7152|     }
  7153|   }, {
  7154|     key: "show",
  7155|     value: function show() {
  7156|       var _this = this;
  7157|       this.context.invoke('editor.saveRange');
  7158|       this.showImageDialog().then(function (data) {
  7159|         _this.ui.hideDialog(_this.$dialog);
  7160|         _this.context.invoke('editor.restoreRange');
  7161|         if (typeof data === 'string') {
  7162|           if (_this.options.callbacks.onImageLinkInsert) {
  7163|             _this.context.triggerEvent('image.link.insert', data);
  7164|           } else {
  7165|             _this.context.invoke('editor.insertImage', data);
  7166|           }
  7167|         } else {
  7168|           _this.context.invoke('editor.insertImagesOrCallback', data);
  7169|         }
  7170|       }).fail(function () {
  7171|         _this.context.invoke('editor.restoreRange');
  7172|       });
  7173|     }
  7174|     /**
  7175|      * show image dialog
  7176|      *
  7177|      * @param {jQuery} $dialog
  7178|      * @return {Promise}
  7179|      */
  7180|   }, {
  7181|     key: "showImageDialog",
  7182|     value: function showImageDialog() {
  7183|       var _this2 = this;
  7184|       return external_jQuery_default().Deferred(function (deferred) {
  7185|         var $imageInput = _this2.$dialog.find('.note-image-input');
  7186|         var $imageUrl = _this2.$dialog.find('.note-image-url');
  7187|         var $imageBtn = _this2.$dialog.find('.note-image-btn');
  7188|         _this2.ui.onDialogShown(_this2.$dialog, function () {
  7189|           _this2.context.triggerEvent('dialog.shown'); // Cloning imageInput to clear element.
  7190|           $imageInput.replaceWith($imageInput.clone().on('change', function (event) {
  7191|             deferred.resolve(event.target.files || event.target.value);
  7192|           }).val(''));
  7193|           $imageUrl.on('input paste propertychange', function () {
  7194|             _this2.ui.toggleBtn($imageBtn, $imageUrl.val());
  7195|           }).val('');
  7196|           if (!env.isSupportTouch) {
  7197|             $imageUrl.trigger('focus');
  7198|           }
  7199|           $imageBtn.click(function (event) {
  7200|             event.preventDefault();
  7201|             deferred.resolve($imageUrl.val());
  7202|           });
  7203|           _this2.bindEnterKey($imageUrl, $imageBtn);
  7204|         });
  7205|         _this2.ui.onDialogHidden(_this2.$dialog, function () {
  7206|           $imageInput.off();
  7207|           $imageUrl.off();
  7208|           $imageBtn.off();
  7209|           if (deferred.state() === 'pending') {
  7210|             deferred.reject();
  7211|           }
  7212|         });
  7213|         _this2.ui.showDialog(_this2.$dialog);
  7214|       });
  7215|     }
  7216|   }]);
  7217|   return ImageDialog;
  7218| }();

  7239|       },

  7244|           }

  7266|       });
  7267|     }
  7268|   }, {

  7272|     }
  7273|   }, {
  7274|     key: "update",
  7275|     value: function update(target, event) {
  7276|       if (dom.isImg(target)) {

  7279|         var pos = {};
  7280|         if (this.options.popatmouse) {
  7281|           pos.left = event.pageX - 20;
  7282|           pos.top = event.pageY;
  7283|         } else {
  7284|           pos = position;
  7285|         }
  7286|         pos.top -= containerOffset.top;
  7287|         pos.left -= containerOffset.left;
  7288|         this.$popover.css({
  7289|           display: 'block',
  7290|           left: pos.left,
  7291|           top: pos.top
  7292|         });
  7293|       } else {
  7294|         this.hide();
  7295|       }
  7296|     }
  7297|   }, {
  7298|     key: "hide",

  7300|       this.$popover.hide();
  7301|     }
  7302|   }]);

  7427|     key: "bindEnterKey",
  7428|     value: function bindEnterKey($input, $btn) {
  7429|       $input.on('keypress', function (event) {
  7430|         if (event.keyCode === key.code.ENTER) {
  7431|           event.preventDefault();
  7432|           $btn.trigger('click');
  7433|         }
  7434|       });
  7435|     }
  7436|   }, {
  7437|     key: "createVideoNode",
  7438|     value: function createVideoNode(url) {
  7439|       var ytRegExp = /\/\/(?:(?:www|m)\.)?(?:youtu\.be\/|youtube\.com\/(?:embed\/|v\/|watch\?v=|watch\?.+&v=))([\w|-]{11})(?:(?:[\?&]t=)(\S+))?$/;
  7440|       var ytRegExpForStart = /^(?:(\d+)h)?(?:(\d+)m)?(?:(\d+)s)?$/;
  7441|       var ytMatch = url.match(ytRegExp);
  7442|       var gdRegExp = /(?:\.|\/\/)drive\.google\.com\/file\/d\/(.[a-zA-Z0-9_-]*)\/view/;
  7443|       var gdMatch = url.match(gdRegExp);
  7444|       var igRegExp = /(?:www\.|\/\/)instagram\.com\/p\/(.[a-zA-Z0-9_-]*)/;
  7445|       var igMatch = url.match(igRegExp);
  7446|       var vRegExp = /\/\/vine\.co\/v\/([a-zA-Z0-9]+)/;
  7447|       var vMatch = url.match(vRegExp);
  7448|       var vimRegExp = /\/\/(player\.)?vimeo\.com\/([a-z]*\/)*(\d+)[?]?.*/;
  7449|       var vimMatch = url.match(vimRegExp);
  7450|       var dmRegExp = /.+dailymotion.com\/(video|hub)\/([^_]+)[^#]*(#video=([^_&]+))?/;
  7451|       var dmMatch = url.match(dmRegExp);
  7452|       var youkuRegExp = /\/\/v\.youku\.com\/v_show\/id_(\w+)=*\.html/;
  7453|       var youkuMatch = url.match(youkuRegExp);
  7454|       var peerTubeRegExp = /\/\/(.*)\/videos\/watch\/([^?]*)(?:\?(?:start=(\w*))?(?:&stop=(\w*))?(?:&loop=([10]))?(?:&autoplay=([10]))?(?:&muted=([10]))?)?/;
  7455|       var peerTubeMatch = url.match(peerTubeRegExp);
  7456|       var qqRegExp = /\/\/v\.qq\.com.*?vid=(.+)/;
  7457|       var qqMatch = url.match(qqRegExp);
  7458|       var qqRegExp2 = /\/\/v\.qq\.com\/x?\/?(page|cover).*?\/([^\/]+)\.html\??.*/;
  7459|       var qqMatch2 = url.match(qqRegExp2);
  7460|       var mp4RegExp = /^.+.(mp4|m4v)$/;
  7461|       var mp4Match = url.match(mp4RegExp);
  7462|       var oggRegExp = /^.+.(ogg|ogv)$/;
  7463|       var oggMatch = url.match(oggRegExp);
  7464|       var webmRegExp = /^.+.(webm)$/;
  7465|       var webmMatch = url.match(webmRegExp);
  7466|       var fbRegExp = /(?:www\.|\/\/)facebook\.com\/([^\/]+)\/videos\/([0-9]+)/;
  7467|       var fbMatch = url.match(fbRegExp);
  7468|       var $video;
  7469|       if (ytMatch && ytMatch[1].length === 11) {
  7470|         var youtubeId = ytMatch[1];
  7471|         var start = 0;
  7472|         if (typeof ytMatch[2] !== 'undefined') {
  7473|           var ytMatchForStart = ytMatch[2].match(ytRegExpForStart);
  7474|           if (ytMatchForStart) {
  7475|             for (var n = [3600, 60, 1], i = 0, r = n.length; i < r; i++) {
  7476|               start += typeof ytMatchForStart[i + 1] !== 'undefined' ? n[i] * parseInt(ytMatchForStart[i + 1], 10) : 0;
  7477|             }
  7478|           }
  7479|         }
  7480|         $video = external_jQuery_default()('<iframe>').attr('frameborder', 0).attr('src', '//www.youtube.com/embed/' + youtubeId + (start > 0 ? '?start=' + start : '')).attr('width', '640').attr('height', '360');
  7481|       } else if (gdMatch && gdMatch[0].length) {
  7482|         $video = external_jQuery_default()('<iframe>').attr('frameborder', 0).attr('src', 'https://drive.google.com/file/d/' + gdMatch[1] + '/preview').attr('width', '640').attr('height', '480');
  7483|       } else if (igMatch && igMatch[0].length) {
  7484|         $video = external_jQuery_default()('<iframe>').attr('frameborder', 0).attr('src', 'https://instagram.com/p/' + igMatch[1] + '/embed/').attr('width', '612').attr('height', '710').attr('scrolling', 'no').attr('allowtransparency', 'true');
  7485|       } else if (vMatch && vMatch[0].length) {
  7486|         $video = external_jQuery_default()('<iframe>').attr('frameborder', 0).attr('src', vMatch[0] + '/embed/simple').attr('width', '600').attr('height', '600').attr('class', 'vine-embed');
  7487|       } else if (vimMatch && vimMatch[3].length) {
  7488|         $video = external_jQuery_default()('<iframe webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen allowfullscreen>').attr('frameborder', 0).attr('src', '//player.vimeo.com/video/' + vimMatch[3]).attr('width', '640').attr('height', '360');
  7489|       } else if (dmMatch && dmMatch[2].length) {
  7490|         $video = external_jQuery_default()('<iframe>').attr('frameborder', 0).attr('src', '//www.dailymotion.com/embed/video/' + dmMatch[2]).attr('width', '640').attr('height', '360');

  7493|       } else if (peerTubeMatch && peerTubeMatch[0].length) {
  7494|         var begin = 0;
  7495|         if (peerTubeMatch[2] !== 'undefined') begin = peerTubeMatch[2];
  7496|         var end = 0;
  7497|         if (peerTubeMatch[3] !== 'undefined') end = peerTubeMatch[3];
  7498|         var loop = 0;
  7499|         if (peerTubeMatch[4] !== 'undefined') loop = peerTubeMatch[4];

  7505|       } else if (qqMatch && qqMatch[1].length || qqMatch2 && qqMatch2[2].length) {

  7507|         $video = external_jQuery_default()('<iframe webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen allowfullscreen>').attr('frameborder', 0).attr('height', '310').attr('width', '500').attr('src', 'https://v.qq.com/txp/iframe/player.html?vid=' + vid + '&amp;auto=0');
  7508|       } else if (mp4Match || oggMatch || webmMatch) {
  7509|         $video = external_jQuery_default()('<video controls>').attr('src', url).attr('width', '640').attr('height', '360');
  7510|       } else if (fbMatch && fbMatch[0].length) {
  7511|         $video = external_jQuery_default()('<iframe>').attr('frameborder', 0).attr('src', 'https://www.facebook.com/plugins/video.php?href=' + encodeURIComponent(fbMatch[0]) + '&show_text=0&width=560').attr('width', '560').attr('height', '301').attr('scrolling', 'no').attr('allowtransparency', 'true');
  7512|       } else {
  7513|         return false;
  7514|       }
  7515|       $video.addClass('note-video-clip');
  7516|       return $video[0];
  7517|     }
  7518|   }, {

  7524|       this.showVideoDialog(text).then(function (url) {

  7530|         }
  7531|       }).fail(function () {
  7532|         _this.context.invoke('editor.restoreRange');
  7533|       });
  7534|     }
  7535|     /**

  7541|   }, {

  7870|   }, {
  7871|     key: "replace",

  7873|       var $item = this.$content.find('.note-hint-item.active');
  7874|       if ($item.length) {
  7875|         var node = this.nodeFromItem($item); // If matchingWord length = 0 -> capture OK / open hint / but as mention capture "" (\w*)
  7876|         if (this.matchingWord !== null && this.matchingWord.length === 0) {
  7877|           this.lastWordRange.so = this.lastWordRange.eo; // Else si > 0 and normal case -> adjust range "before" for correct position of insertion
  7878|         } else if (this.matchingWord !== null && this.matchingWord.length > 0 && !this.lastWordRange.isCollapsed()) {
  7879|           var rangeCompute = this.lastWordRange.eo - this.lastWordRange.so - this.matchingWord.length;
  7880|           if (rangeCompute > 0) {
  7881|             this.lastWordRange.so += rangeCompute;
  7882|           }
  7883|         }
  7884|         this.lastWordRange.insertNode(node);
  7885|         if (this.options.hintSelect === 'next') {
  7886|           var blank = document.createTextNode('');
  7887|           external_jQuery_default()(node).after(blank);
  7888|           range.createFromNodeBefore(blank).select();
  7889|         } else {
  7890|           range.createFromNodeAfter(node).select();
  7891|         }
  7892|         this.lastWordRange = null;
  7893|         this.hide();

  7895|         this.context.triggerEvent('change', this.$editable.html(), this.$editable);
  7896|       }

  7898|   }, {
  7899|     key: "nodeFromItem",
  7900|     value: function nodeFromItem($item) {
  7901|       var hint = this.hints[$item.data('index')];
  7902|       var item = $item.data('item');
  7903|       var node = hint.content ? hint.content(item) : item;
  7904|       if (typeof node === 'string') {
  7905|         node = dom.createText(node);
  7906|       }

  7908|     }
  7909|   }, {

  7920|           'item': item
  7921|         });
  7922|         return $item;
  7923|       });
  7924|     }

  7935|         e.preventDefault();
  7936|         this.moveUp();
  7937|       } else if (e.keyCode === key.code.DOWN) {
  7938|         e.preventDefault();
  7939|         this.moveDown();
  7940|       }
  7941|     }
  7942|   }, {
  7943|     key: "searchKeyword",

  7945|       var hint = this.hints[index];
  7946|       if (hint && hint.match.test(keyword) && hint.search) {
  7947|         var matches = hint.match.exec(keyword);
  7948|         this.matchingWord = matches[0];
  7949|         hint.search(matches[1], callback);
  7950|       } else {
  7951|         callback();
  7952|       }
  7953|     }
  7954|   }, {
  7955|     key: "createGroup",
  7956|     value: function createGroup(idx, keyword) {
  7957|       var _this3 = this;
  7958|       var $group = external_jQuery_default()('<div class="note-hint-group note-hint-group-' + idx + '"></div>');

  7962|           $group.html(_this3.createItemTemplates(idx, items));
  7963|           _this3.show();
  7964|         }
  7965|       });
  7966|       return $group;
  7967|     }
  7968|   }, {
  7969|     key: "handleKeyup",
  7970|     value: function handleKeyup(e) {
  7971|       var _this4 = this;
  7972|       if (!lists.contains([key.code.ENTER, key.code.UP, key.code.DOWN], e.keyCode)) {
  7973|         var _range = this.context.invoke('editor.getLastRange');
  7974|         var wordRange, keyword;
  7975|         if (this.options.hintMode === 'words') {
  7976|           wordRange = _range.getWordsRange(_range);
  7977|           keyword = wordRange.toString();
  7978|           this.hints.forEach(function (hint) {
  7979|             if (hint.match.test(keyword)) {
  7980|               wordRange = _range.getWordsMatchRange(hint.match);
  7981|               return false;
  7982|             }
  7983|           });
  7984|           if (!wordRange) {
  7985|             this.hide();
  7986|             return;
  7987|           }
  7988|           keyword = wordRange.toString();
  7989|         } else {
  7990|           wordRange = _range.getWordRange();
  7991|           keyword = wordRange.toString();
  7992|         }
  7993|         if (this.hints.length && keyword) {
  7994|           this.$content.empty();

  7996|           var containerOffset = external_jQuery_default()(this.options.container).offset();

  7998|             bnd.top -= containerOffset.top;
  7999|             bnd.left -= containerOffset.left;

  8002|             this.hints.forEach(function (hint, idx) {
  8003|               if (hint.match.test(keyword)) {
  8004|                 _this4.createGroup(idx, keyword).appendTo(_this4.$content);
  8005|               }

  8007|             this.$content.find('.note-hint-item:first').addClass('active'); // set position for popover after group is created

  8009|               this.$popover.css({
  8010|                 left: bnd.left,
  8011|                 top: bnd.top - this.$popover.outerHeight() - POPOVER_DIST
  8012|               });
  8013|             } else {
  8014|               this.$popover.css({
  8015|                 left: bnd.left,
  8016|                 top: bnd.top + bnd.height + POPOVER_DIST
  8017|               });
  8018|             }
  8019|           }
  8020|         } else {
  8021|           this.hide();
  8022|         }
  8023|       }
  8024|     }
  8025|   }, {

  8028|       this.$popover.show();
  8029|     }
  8030|   }, {
  8031|     key: "hide",

  8033|       this.$popover.hide();
  8034|     }
  8035|   }]);

  8280| function renderer_classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError("Cannot call a class as a function"); } }
  8281| function renderer_defineProperties(target, props) { for (var i = 0; i < props.length; i++) { var descriptor = props[i]; descriptor.enumerable = descriptor.enumerable || false; descriptor.configurable = true; if ("value" in descriptor) descriptor.writable = true; Object.defineProperty(target, descriptor.key, descriptor); } }
  8282| function renderer_createClass(Constructor, protoProps, staticProps) { if (protoProps) renderer_defineProperties(Constructor.prototype, protoProps); if (staticProps) renderer_defineProperties(Constructor, staticProps); return Constructor; }
  8283| var Renderer = /*#__PURE__*/function () {
  8284|   function Renderer(markup, children, options, callback) {
  8285|     renderer_classCallCheck(this, Renderer);
  8286|     this.markup = markup;
  8287|     this.children = children;
  8288|     this.options = options;
  8289|     this.callback = callback;
  8290|   }
  8291|   renderer_createClass(Renderer, [{
  8292|     key: "render",
  8293|     value: function render($parent) {
  8294|       var $node = external_jQuery_default()(this.markup);
  8295|       if (this.options && this.options.contents) {
  8296|         $node.html(this.options.contents);
  8297|       }
  8298|       if (this.options && this.options.className) {
  8299|         $node.addClass(this.options.className);
  8300|       }
  8301|       if (this.options && this.options.data) {
  8302|         external_jQuery_default().each(this.options.data, function (k, v) {
  8303|           $node.attr('data-' + k, v);
  8304|         });
  8305|       }
  8306|       if (this.options && this.options.click) {
  8307|         $node.on('click', this.options.click);
  8308|       }
  8309|       if (this.children) {
  8310|         var $container = $node.find('.note-children-container');
  8311|         this.children.forEach(function (child) {
  8312|           child.render($container.length ? $container : $node);
  8313|         });
  8314|       }
  8315|       if (this.callback) {
  8316|         this.callback($node, this.options);
  8317|       }
  8318|       if (this.options && this.options.callback) {
  8319|         this.options.callback($node);
  8320|       }
  8321|       if ($parent) {
  8322|         $parent.append($node);
  8323|       }
  8324|       return $node;
  8325|     }
  8326|   }]);
  8327|   return Renderer;
  8328| }();

  8410| var ui = function ui(editorOptions) {
  8411|   return {
  8412|     editor: editor,

  8427|     icon: icon,
  8428|     options: editorOptions,
  8429|     palette: function palette($node, options) {
  8430|       return renderer.create('<div class="note-color-palette"></div>', function ($node, options) {
  8431|         var contents = [];
  8432|         for (var row = 0, rowSize = options.colors.length; row < rowSize; row++) {
  8433|           var eventName = options.eventName;
  8434|           var colors = options.colors[row];
  8435|           var colorsName = options.colorsName[row];
  8436|           var buttons = [];
  8437|           for (var col = 0, colSize = colors.length; col < colSize; col++) {

  8501|         codable: $editor.find('.note-codable'),
  8502|         statusbar: $editor.find('.note-statusbar')
  8503|       };
  8504|     },

  8507|       layoutInfo.editor.remove();
  8508|       $note.show();
  8509|     }
  8510|   };

   163|     self.openDialog = function(info) {
   164|       return $.Deferred(function(deferred) {
   165|         var $inpTest = self.$dialog.find('.ext-databasic-test');
   166|         var $saveBtn = self.$dialog.find('.ext-databasic-save');
   167|         var onKeyup = function(event) {
   168|           if (event.keyCode === 13) {
   169|             $saveBtn.trigger('click');
   170|           }
   171|         };
   172|         ui.onDialogShown(self.$dialog, function() {
   173|           context.triggerEvent('dialog.shown');
   174|           $inpTest.val(info.test).on('input', function() {
   175|             ui.toggleBtn($saveBtn, $inpTest.val());
   176|           }).trigger('focus').on('keyup', onKeyup);
   177|           $saveBtn
   178|             .text(info.node ? lang.databasic.edit : lang.databasic.insert)
   179|             .click(function(event) {
   180|               event.preventDefault();
   181|               deferred.resolve({ test: $inpTest.val() });
   182|             });
   183|           ui.toggleBtn($saveBtn, $inpTest.val());
   184|         });
   185|         ui.onDialogHidden(self.$dialog, function() {
   186|           $inpTest.off('input keyup');
   187|           $saveBtn.off('click');
   188|           if (deferred.state() === 'pending') {
   189|             deferred.reject();
   190|           }
   191|         });
   192|         ui.showDialog(self.$dialog);
   193|       });
   194|     };
   195|   };

   197|     plugins: {

    70|     });

    76|       this.invoke('codeview.sync');

    80|         this.invoke('codeview.sync', html);

    82|         this.layoutInfo.editable.html(html);
    83|       }

     1| import $ from 'jquery';
     2| /**
     3|  * @method readFileAsDataURL
     4|  *
     5|  * read contents of file as representing URL
     6|  *
     7|  * @param {File} file
     8|  * @return {Promise} - then: dataUrl
     9|  */
    10| export function readFileAsDataURL(file) {
    11|   return $.Deferred((deferred) => {
    12|     $.extend(new FileReader(), {
    13|       onload: (e) => {
    14|         const dataURL = e.target.result;
    15|         deferred.resolve(dataURL);
    16|       },
    17|       onerror: (err) => {
    18|         deferred.reject(err);
    19|       },
    20|     }).readAsDataURL(file);
    21|   }).promise();
    22| }

   339|  *
   340|  * @param {Node} node
   341|  * @param {Node} preceding - predicate function
   342|  */
   343| function insertAfter(node, preceding) {
   344|   const next = preceding.nextSibling;
   345|   let parent = preceding.parentNode;
   346|   if (next) {
   347|     parent.insertBefore(node, next);
   348|   } else {
   349|     parent.appendChild(node);
   350|   }
   351|   return node;
   352| }
   353| /**
   354|  * append elements.
   355|  *
   356|  * @param {Node} node
   357|  * @param {Collection} aChild
   358|  */
   359| function appendChildNodes(node, aChild) {
   360|   $.each(aChild, function(idx, child) {
   361|     node.appendChild(child);
   362|   });
   363|   return node;
   364| }
   365| /**
   366|  * returns whether boundaryPoint is left edge or not.
   367|  *
   368|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
   369|  * @return {Boolean}
   370|  */
   371| function isLeftEdgePoint(point) {
   372|   return point.offset === 0;
   373| }
   374| /**
   375|  * returns whether boundaryPoint is right edge or not.
   376|  *
   377|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
   378|  * @return {Boolean}
   379|  */
   380| function isRightEdgePoint(point) {

   502|     if (nextTextNode) {
   503|       node = nextTextNode;
   504|       offset = 0;
   505|     } else {
   506|       node = point.node.parentNode;
   507|       offset = position(point.node) + 1;
   508|     }
   509|   } else if (hasChildren(point.node)) {
   510|     node = point.node.childNodes[point.offset];
   511|     offset = 0;
   512|   } else {
   513|     node = point.node;
   514|     offset = isSkipInnerOffset ? nodeLength(point.node) : point.offset + 1;
   515|   }
   516|   return {
   517|     node: node,
   518|     offset: offset,
   519|   };
   520| }
   521| /**
   522|  * returns next boundaryPoint with empty node
   523|  *
   524|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
   525|  * @param {Boolean} isSkipInnerOffset
   526|  * @return {BoundaryPoint}
   527|  */
   528| function nextPointWithEmptyNode(point, isSkipInnerOffset) {
   529|   let node, offset = 0;
   530|   if (isEmpty(point.node)) {
   531|     if(point.node === null){
   532|       return null;
   533|     }
   534|     node = point.node.nextSibling;
   535|     offset = 0;
   536|     return {
   537|       node: node,
   538|       offset: offset,
   539|     };
   540|   }
   541|   if (nodeLength(point.node) === point.offset) {
   542|     if (isEditable(point.node)) {
   543|       return null;
   544|     }
   545|     node = point.node.parentNode;
   546|     offset = position(point.node) + 1;
   547|     if (isEditable(node)) {
   548|       node = point.node.nextSibling;
   549|       offset = 0;
   550|     }
   551|   } else if (hasChildren(point.node)) {
   552|     node = point.node.childNodes[point.offset];
   553|     offset = 0;
   554|     if (isEmpty(node)) {
   555|       if (!isEmpty(point.node.nextSibling)) {
   556|         return {
   557|           node: point.node.nextSibling,
   558|           offset: offset,
   559|         };
   560|       }
   561|       return null;
   562|     }
   563|   } else {
   564|     node = point.node;
   565|     offset = isSkipInnerOffset ? nodeLength(point.node) : point.offset + 1;
   566|     if (isEmpty(node)) {
   567|       return null;
   568|     }
   569|   }
   570|   return {
   571|     node: node,
   572|     offset: offset,
   573|   };
   574| }
   575| /*
   576| * returns the next Text node index or 0 if not found.
   577| */
   578| function getNextTextNode(actual) {
   579|   if(!actual.nextSibling) return undefined;
   580|   if(actual.parent !== actual.nextSibling.parent) return undefined;
   581|   if(isText(actual.nextSibling) ) return actual.nextSibling;
   582|   else return getNextTextNode(actual.nextSibling);
   583| }
   584| /**
   585|  * returns whether pointA and pointB is same or not.
   586|  *
   587|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} pointA
   588|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} pointB

# --- HUNK 3: Lines 650-699 ---
   650|   if (!isText(point.node)) {
   651|     return false;
   652|   }
   653|   const ch = point.node.nodeValue.charAt(point.offset - 1);
   654|   return ch && (ch !== ' ' && ch !== NBSP_CHAR);
   655| }
   656| /**
   657|  * returns whether point has space or not.
   658|  *
   659|  * @param {Point} point
   660|  * @return {Boolean}
   661|  */
   662| function isSpacePoint(point) {
   663|   if (!isText(point.node)) {
   664|     return false;
   665|   }
   666|   const ch = point.node.nodeValue.charAt(point.offset - 1);
   667|   return ch === ' ' || ch === NBSP_CHAR;
   668| }
   669| /**
   670|  * @method walkPoint
   671|  *
   672|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} startPoint
   673|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} endPoint
   674|  * @param {Function} handler
   675|  * @param {Boolean} isSkipInnerOffset
   676|  */
   677| function walkPoint(startPoint, endPoint, handler, isSkipInnerOffset) {
   678|   let point = startPoint;
   679|   while (point) {
   680|     handler(point);
   681|     if (isSamePoint(point, endPoint)) {
   682|       break;
   683|     }
   684|     const isSkipOffset = isSkipInnerOffset &&
   685|                        startPoint.node !== point.node &&
   686|                        endPoint.node !== point.node;
   687|     point = nextPointWithEmptyNode(point, isSkipOffset);
   688|   }
   689| }
   690| /**
   691|  * @method makeOffsetPath
   692|  *
   693|  * return offsetPath(array of offset) from ancestor
   694|  *
   695|  * @param {Node} ancestor - ancestor node
   696|  * @param {Node} node
   697|  */
   698| function makeOffsetPath(ancestor, node) {
   699|   const ancestors = listAncestor(node, func.eq(ancestor));

# --- HUNK 4: Lines 731-806 ---
   731|  * @return {Node} right node of boundaryPoint
   732|  */
   733| function splitNode(point, options) {
   734|   let isSkipPaddingBlankHTML = options && options.isSkipPaddingBlankHTML;
   735|   const isNotSplitEdgePoint = options && options.isNotSplitEdgePoint;
   736|   const isDiscardEmptySplits = options && options.isDiscardEmptySplits;
   737|   if (isDiscardEmptySplits) {
   738|     isSkipPaddingBlankHTML = true;
   739|   }
   740|   if (isEdgePoint(point) && (isText(point.node) || isNotSplitEdgePoint)) {
   741|     if (isLeftEdgePoint(point)) {
   742|       return point.node;
   743|     } else if (isRightEdgePoint(point)) {
   744|       return point.node.nextSibling;
   745|     }
   746|   }
   747|   if (isText(point.node)) {
   748|     return point.node.splitText(point.offset);
   749|   } else {
   750|     const childNode = point.node.childNodes[point.offset];
   751|     const clone = insertAfter(point.node.cloneNode(false), point.node);
   752|     appendChildNodes(clone, listNext(childNode));
   753|     if (!isSkipPaddingBlankHTML) {
   754|       paddingBlankHTML(point.node);
   755|       paddingBlankHTML(clone);
   756|     }
   757|     if (isDiscardEmptySplits) {
   758|       if (isEmpty(point.node)) {
   759|         remove(point.node);
   760|       }
   761|       if (isEmpty(clone)) {
   762|         remove(clone);
   763|         return point.node.nextSibling;
   764|       }
   765|     }
   766|     return clone;
   767|   }
   768| }
   769| /**
   770|  * @method splitTree
   771|  *
   772|  * split tree by point
   773|  *
   774|  * @param {Node} root - split root
   775|  * @param {BoundaryPoint} point
   776|  * @param {Object} [options]
   777|  * @param {Boolean} [options.isSkipPaddingBlankHTML] - default: false
   778|  * @param {Boolean} [options.isNotSplitEdgePoint] - default: false
   779|  * @return {Node} right node of boundaryPoint
   780|  */
   781| function splitTree(root, point, options) {
   782|   const ancestors = listAncestor(point.node, func.eq(root));
   783|   if (!ancestors.length) {
   784|     return null;
   785|   } else if (ancestors.length === 1) {
   786|     return splitNode(point, options);
   787|   }
   788|   return ancestors.reduce(function(node, parent) {
   789|     if (node === point.node) {
   790|       node = splitNode(point, options);
   791|     }
   792|     return splitNode({
   793|       node: parent,
   794|       offset: node ? position(node) : nodeLength(parent),
   795|     }, options);
   796|   });
   797| }
   798| /**
   799|  * split point
   800|  *
   801|  * @param {Point} point
   802|  * @param {Boolean} isInline
   803|  * @return {Object}
   804|  */
   805| function splitPoint(point, isInline) {
   806|   const pred = isInline ? isPara : isBodyContainer;

     1| import $ from 'jquery';
     2| /**
     3|  * returns whether font is installed or not.
     4|  *
     5|  * @param {String} fontName
     6|  * @return {Boolean}
     7|  */
     8| const genericFontFamilies = ['sans-serif', 'serif', 'monospace', 'cursive', 'fantasy'];
     9| function validFontName(fontName) {
    10|   return ($.inArray(fontName.toLowerCase(), genericFontFamilies) === -1) ? `'${fontName}'` : fontName;
    11| }
    12| function isFontInstalled(fontName) {
    13|   const testFontName = fontName === 'Comic Sans MS' ? 'Courier New' : 'Comic Sans MS';
    14|   const testText = 'mmmmmmmmmmwwwww';
    15|   const testSize = '200px';
    16|   var canvas = document.createElement('canvas');
    17|   var context = canvas.getContext('2d');
    18|   context.font = testSize + " '" + testFontName + "'";
    19|   const originalWidth = context.measureText(testText).width;
    20|   context.font = testSize + ' ' + validFontName(fontName) + ', "' + testFontName + '"';
    21|   const width = context.measureText(testText).width;
    22|   return originalWidth !== width;
    23| }
    24| const userAgent = navigator.userAgent;
    25| const isMSIE = /MSIE|Trident/i.test(userAgent);
    26| let browserVersion;
    27| if (isMSIE) {
    28|   let matches = /MSIE (\d+[.]\d+)/.exec(userAgent);
    29|   if (matches) {
    30|     browserVersion = parseFloat(matches[1]);
    31|   }
    32|   matches = /Trident\/.*rv:([0-9]{1,}[.0-9]{0,})/.exec(userAgent);
    33|   if (matches) {
    34|     browserVersion = parseFloat(matches[1]);
    35|   }
    36| }
    37| const isEdge = /Edge\/\d+/.test(userAgent);
    38| const isSupportTouch =
    39|   (('ontouchstart' in window) ||
    40|    (navigator.MaxTouchPoints > 0) ||
    41|    (navigator.msMaxTouchPoints > 0));
    42| const inputEventName = (isMSIE) ? 'DOMCharacterDataModified DOMSubtreeModified DOMNodeInserted' : 'input';
    43| /**
    44|  * @class core.env
    45|  *
    46|  * Object which check platform and agent
    47|  *
    48|  * @singleton
    49|  * @alternateClassName env
    50|  */
    51| export default {
    52|   isMac: navigator.appVersion.indexOf('Mac') > -1,
    53|   isMSIE,
    54|   isEdge,
    55|   isFF: !isEdge && /firefox/i.test(userAgent),
    56|   isPhantom: /PhantomJS/i.test(userAgent),
    57|   isWebkit: !isEdge && /webkit/i.test(userAgent),
    58|   isChrome: !isEdge && /chrome/i.test(userAgent),
    59|   isSafari: !isEdge && /safari/i.test(userAgent) && (!/chrome/i.test(userAgent)),
    60|   browserVersion,
    61|   isSupportTouch,
    62|   isFontInstalled,
    63|   isW3CRangeSupport: !!document.createRange,
    64|   inputEventName,
    65|   genericFontFamilies,
    66|   validFontName,
    67| };

# --- HUNK 1: Lines 426-498 ---
   426|       if (!dom.isInline(topAncestor)) {
   427|         topAncestor = ancestors[ancestors.length - 2] || rng.sc.childNodes[rng.so];
   428|       }
   429|     } else {
   430|       topAncestor = rng.sc.childNodes[rng.so > 0 ? rng.so - 1 : 0];
   431|     }
   432|     if (topAncestor) {
   433|       let inlineSiblings = dom.listPrev(topAncestor, dom.isParaInline).reverse();
   434|       inlineSiblings = inlineSiblings.concat(dom.listNext(topAncestor.nextSibling, dom.isParaInline));
   435|       if (inlineSiblings.length) {
   436|         const para = dom.wrap(lists.head(inlineSiblings), 'p');
   437|         dom.appendChildNodes(para, lists.tail(inlineSiblings));
   438|       }
   439|     }
   440|     return this.normalize();
   441|   }
   442|   /**
   443|    * insert node at current cursor
   444|    *
   445|    * @param {Node} node
   446|    * @return {Node}
   447|    */
   448|   insertNode(node) {
   449|     let rng = this;
   450|     if (dom.isText(node) || dom.isInline(node)) {
   451|       rng = this.wrapBodyInlineWithPara().deleteContents();
   452|     }
   453|     const info = dom.splitPoint(rng.getStartPoint(), dom.isInline(node));
   454|     if (info.rightNode) {
   455|       info.rightNode.parentNode.insertBefore(node, info.rightNode);
   456|       if (dom.isEmpty(info.rightNode) && dom.isPara(node)) {
   457|         info.rightNode.parentNode.removeChild(info.rightNode);
   458|       }
   459|     } else {
   460|       info.container.appendChild(node);
   461|     }
   462|     return node;
   463|   }
   464|   /**
   465|    * insert html at current cursor
   466|    */
   467|   pasteHTML(markup) {
   468|     markup = $.trim(markup);
   469|     const contentsContainer = $('<div></div>').html(markup)[0];
   470|     let childNodes = lists.from(contentsContainer.childNodes);
   471|     const rng = this;
   472|     let reversed = false;
   473|     if (rng.so >= 0) {
   474|       childNodes = childNodes.reverse();
   475|       reversed = true;
   476|     }
   477|     childNodes = childNodes.map(function(childNode) {
   478|       return rng.insertNode(childNode);
   479|     });
   480|     if (reversed) {
   481|       childNodes = childNodes.reverse();
   482|     }
   483|     return childNodes;
   484|   }
   485|   /**
   486|    * returns text in range
   487|    *
   488|    * @return {String}
   489|    */
   490|   toString() {
   491|     const nativeRng = this.nativeRange();
   492|     return env.isW3CRangeSupport ? nativeRng.toString() : nativeRng.text;
   493|   }

# --- HUNK 1: Lines 11-240 ---
    11|     this.toggleList('OL', editable);
    12|   }
    13|   /**
    14|    * toggle unordered list
    15|    */
    16|   insertUnorderedList(editable) {
    17|     this.toggleList('UL', editable);
    18|   }
    19|   /**
    20|    * indent
    21|    */
    22|   indent(editable) {
    23|     const rng = range.create(editable).wrapBodyInlineWithPara();
    24|     const paras = rng.nodes(dom.isPara, { includeAncestor: true });
    25|     const clustereds = lists.clusterBy(paras, func.peq2('parentNode'));
    26|     $.each(clustereds, (idx, paras) => {
    27|       const head = lists.head(paras);
    28|       if (dom.isLi(head)) {
    29|         const previousList = this.findList(head.previousSibling);
    30|         if (previousList) {
    31|           paras
    32|             .map(para => previousList.appendChild(para));
    33|         } else {
    34|           this.wrapList(paras, head.parentNode.nodeName);
    35|           paras
    36|             .map((para) => para.parentNode)
    37|             .map((para) => this.appendToPrevious(para));
    38|         }
    39|       } else {
    40|         $.each(paras, (idx, para) => {
    41|           $(para).css('marginLeft', (idx, val) => {
    42|             return (parseInt(val, 10) || 0) + 25;
    43|           });
    44|         });
    45|       }
    46|     });
    47|     rng.select();
    48|   }
    49|   /**
    50|    * outdent
    51|    */
    52|   outdent(editable) {
    53|     const rng = range.create(editable).wrapBodyInlineWithPara();
    54|     const paras = rng.nodes(dom.isPara, { includeAncestor: true });
    55|     const clustereds = lists.clusterBy(paras, func.peq2('parentNode'));
    56|     $.each(clustereds, (idx, paras) => {
    57|       const head = lists.head(paras);
    58|       if (dom.isLi(head)) {
    59|         this.releaseList([paras]);
    60|       } else {
    61|         $.each(paras, (idx, para) => {
    62|           $(para).css('marginLeft', (idx, val) => {
    63|             val = (parseInt(val, 10) || 0);
    64|             return val > 25 ? val - 25 : '';
    65|           });
    66|         });
    67|       }
    68|     });
    69|     rng.select();
    70|   }
    71|   /**
    72|    * toggle list
    73|    *
    74|    * @param {String} listName - OL or UL
    75|    */
    76|   toggleList(listName, editable) {
    77|     const rng = range.create(editable).wrapBodyInlineWithPara();
    78|     let paras = rng.nodes(dom.isPara, { includeAncestor: true });
    79|     const bookmark = rng.paraBookmark(paras);
    80|     const clustereds = lists.clusterBy(paras, func.peq2('parentNode'));
    81|     if (lists.find(paras, dom.isPurePara)) {
    82|       let wrappedParas = [];
    83|       $.each(clustereds, (idx, paras) => {
    84|         wrappedParas = wrappedParas.concat(this.wrapList(paras, listName));
    85|       });
    86|       paras = wrappedParas;
    87|     } else {
    88|       const diffLists = rng.nodes(dom.isList, {
    89|         includeAncestor: true,
    90|       }).filter((listNode) => {
    91|         return !$.nodeName(listNode, listName);
    92|       });
    93|       if (diffLists.length) {
    94|         $.each(diffLists, (idx, listNode) => {
    95|           dom.replace(listNode, listName);
    96|         });
    97|       } else {
    98|         paras = this.releaseList(clustereds, true);
    99|       }
   100|     }
   101|     range.createFromParaBookmark(bookmark, paras).select();
   102|   }
   103|   /**
   104|    * @param {Node[]} paras
   105|    * @param {String} listName
   106|    * @return {Node[]}
   107|    */
   108|   wrapList(paras, listName) {
   109|     const head = lists.head(paras);
   110|     const last = lists.last(paras);
   111|     const prevList = dom.isList(head.previousSibling) && head.previousSibling;
   112|     const nextList = dom.isList(last.nextSibling) && last.nextSibling;
   113|     const listNode = prevList || dom.insertAfter(dom.create(listName || 'UL'), last);
   114|     paras = paras.map((para) => {
   115|       return dom.isPurePara(para) ? dom.replace(para, 'LI') : para;
   116|     });
   117|     dom.appendChildNodes(listNode, paras);
   118|     if (nextList) {
   119|       dom.appendChildNodes(listNode, lists.from(nextList.childNodes));
   120|       dom.remove(nextList);
   121|     }
   122|     return paras;
   123|   }
   124|   /**
   125|    * @method releaseList
   126|    *
   127|    * @param {Array[]} clustereds
   128|    * @param {Boolean} isEscapseToBody
   129|    * @return {Node[]}
   130|    */
   131|   releaseList(clustereds, isEscapseToBody) {
   132|     let releasedParas = [];
   133|     $.each(clustereds, (idx, paras) => {
   134|       const head = lists.head(paras);
   135|       const last = lists.last(paras);
   136|       const headList = isEscapseToBody ? dom.lastAncestor(head, dom.isList) : head.parentNode;
   137|       const parentItem = headList.parentNode;
   138|       if (headList.parentNode.nodeName === 'LI') {
   139|         paras.map(para => {
   140|           const newList = this.findNextSiblings(para);
   141|           if (parentItem.nextSibling) {
   142|             parentItem.parentNode.insertBefore(
   143|               para,
   144|               parentItem.nextSibling
   145|             );
   146|           } else {
   147|             parentItem.parentNode.appendChild(para);
   148|           }
   149|           if (newList.length) {
   150|             this.wrapList(newList, headList.nodeName);
   151|             para.appendChild(newList[0].parentNode);
   152|           }
   153|         });
   154|         if (headList.children.length === 0) {
   155|           parentItem.removeChild(headList);
   156|         }
   157|         if (parentItem.childNodes.length === 0) {
   158|           parentItem.parentNode.removeChild(parentItem);
   159|         }
   160|       } else {
   161|         const lastList = headList.childNodes.length > 1 ? dom.splitTree(headList, {
   162|           node: last.parentNode,
   163|           offset: dom.position(last) + 1,
   164|         }, {
   165|           isSkipPaddingBlankHTML: true,
   166|         }) : null;
   167|         const middleList = dom.splitTree(headList, {
   168|           node: head.parentNode,
   169|           offset: dom.position(head),
   170|         }, {
   171|           isSkipPaddingBlankHTML: true,
   172|         });
   173|         paras = isEscapseToBody ? dom.listDescendant(middleList, dom.isLi)
   174|           : lists.from(middleList.childNodes).filter(dom.isLi);
   175|         if (isEscapseToBody || !dom.isList(headList.parentNode)) {
   176|           paras = paras.map((para) => {
   177|             return dom.replace(para, 'P');
   178|           });
   179|         }
   180|         $.each(lists.from(paras).reverse(), (idx, para) => {
   181|           dom.insertAfter(para, headList);
   182|         });
   183|         const rootLists = lists.compact([headList, middleList, lastList]);
   184|         $.each(rootLists, (idx, rootList) => {
   185|           const listNodes = [rootList].concat(dom.listDescendant(rootList, dom.isList));
   186|           $.each(listNodes.reverse(), (idx, listNode) => {
   187|             if (!dom.nodeLength(listNode)) {
   188|               dom.remove(listNode, true);
   189|             }
   190|           });
   191|         });
   192|       }
   193|       releasedParas = releasedParas.concat(paras);
   194|     });
   195|     return releasedParas;
   196|   }
   197|   /**
   198|    * @method appendToPrevious
   199|    *
   200|    * Appends list to previous list item, if
   201|    * none exist it wraps the list in a new list item.
   202|    *
   203|    * @param {HTMLNode} ListItem
   204|    * @return {HTMLNode}
   205|    */
   206|   appendToPrevious(node) {
   207|     return node.previousSibling
   208|       ? dom.appendChildNodes(node.previousSibling, [node])
   209|       : this.wrapList([node], 'LI');
   210|   }
   211|   /**
   212|    * @method findList
   213|    *
   214|    * Finds an existing list in list item
   215|    *
   216|    * @param {HTMLNode} ListItem
   217|    * @return {Array[]}
   218|    */
   219|   findList(node) {
   220|     return node
   221|       ? lists.find(node.children, child => ['OL', 'UL'].indexOf(child.nodeName) > -1)
   222|       : null;
   223|   }
   224|   /**
   225|    * @method findNextSiblings
   226|    *
   227|    * Finds all list item siblings that follow it
   228|    *
   229|    * @param {HTMLNode} ListItem
   230|    * @return {HTMLNode}
   231|    */
   232|   findNextSiblings(node) {
   233|     const siblings = [];
   234|     while (node.nextSibling) {
   235|       siblings.push(node.nextSibling);
   236|       node = node.nextSibling;
   237|     }
   238|     return siblings;
   239|   }
   240| }

     5| export default class AirPopover {
     6|   constructor(context) {
     7|     this.context = context;
     8|     this.ui = $.summernote.ui;
     9|     this.options = context.options;

    41|         }
    42|       },
    43|     };

# ====================================================================
# FILE: src/js/module/AutoLink.js
# Total hunks: 2
# ====================================================================
# --- HUNK 1: Lines 1-58 ---
     1| import $ from 'jquery';
     2| import lists from '../core/lists';
     3| import key from '../core/key';
     4| const defaultScheme = 'http://';
     5| const linkPattern = /^([A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9+-.]*\:[\/]{2}|tel:|mailto:[A-Z0-9._%+-]+@|xmpp:[A-Z0-9._%+-]+@)?(www\.)?(.+)$/i;
     6| export default class AutoLink {
     7|   constructor(context) {
     8|     this.context = context;
     9|     this.options = context.options;
    10|     this.events = {
    11|       'summernote.keyup': (we, e) => {
    12|         if (!e.isDefaultPrevented()) {
    13|           this.handleKeyup(e);
    14|         }
    15|       },
    16|       'summernote.keydown': (we, e) => {
    17|         this.handleKeydown(e);
    18|       },
    19|     };
    20|   }
    21|   initialize() {
    22|     this.lastWordRange = null;
    23|   }
    24|   destroy() {
    25|     this.lastWordRange = null;
    26|   }
    27|   replace() {
    28|     if (!this.lastWordRange) {
    29|       return;
    30|     }
    31|     const keyword = this.lastWordRange.toString();
    32|     const match = keyword.match(linkPattern);
    33|     if (match && (match[1] || match[2])) {
    34|       const link = match[1] ? keyword : defaultScheme + keyword;
    35|       const urlText = this.options.showDomainOnlyForAutolink ?
    36|         keyword.replace(/^(?:https?:\/\/)?(?:tel?:?)?(?:mailto?:?)?(?:xmpp?:?)?(?:www\.)?/i, '').split('/')[0]
    37|         : keyword;
    38|       const node = $('<a></a>').html(urlText).attr('href', link)[0];
    39|       if (this.context.options.linkTargetBlank) {
    40|         $(node).attr('target', '_blank');
    41|       }
    42|       this.lastWordRange.insertNode(node);
    43|       this.lastWordRange = null;
    44|       this.context.invoke('editor.focus');
    45|     }
    46|   }
    47|   handleKeydown(e) {
    48|     if (lists.contains([key.code.ENTER, key.code.SPACE], e.keyCode)) {
    49|       const wordRange = this.context.invoke('editor.createRange').getWordRange();
    50|       this.lastWordRange = wordRange;
    51|     }
    52|   }
    53|   handleKeyup(e) {
    54|     if (lists.contains([key.code.ENTER, key.code.SPACE], e.keyCode)) {
    55|       this.replace();
    56|     }
    57|   }
    58| }


# ====================================================================
# FILE: src/js/module/AutoReplace.js
# Total hunks: 2
# ====================================================================
# --- HUNK 1: Lines 1-69 ---
     1| import lists from '../core/lists';
     2| import dom from '../core/dom';
     3| import key from '../core/key';
     4| export default class AutoReplace {
     5|   constructor(context) {
     6|     this.context = context;
     7|     this.options = context.options.replace || {};
     8|     this.keys = [key.code.ENTER, key.code.SPACE, key.code.PERIOD, key.code.COMMA, key.code.SEMICOLON, key.code.SLASH];
     9|     this.previousKeydownCode = null;
    10|     this.events = {
    11|       'summernote.keyup': (we, e) => {
    12|         if (!e.isDefaultPrevented()) {
    13|           this.handleKeyup(e);
    14|         }
    15|       },
    16|       'summernote.keydown': (we, e) => {
    17|         this.handleKeydown(e);
    18|       },
    19|     };
    20|   }
    21|   shouldInitialize() {
    22|     return !!this.options.match;
    23|   }
    24|   initialize() {
    25|     this.lastWord = null;
    26|   }
    27|   destroy() {
    28|     this.lastWord = null;
    29|   }
    30|   replace() {
    31|     if (!this.lastWord) {
    32|       return;
    33|     }
    34|     const self = this;
    35|     const keyword = this.lastWord.toString();
    36|     this.options.match(keyword, function(match) {
    37|       if (match) {
    38|         let node = '';
    39|         if (typeof match === 'string') {
    40|           node = dom.createText(match);
    41|         } else if (match instanceof jQuery) {
    42|           node = match[0];
    43|         } else if (match instanceof Node) {
    44|           node = match;
    45|         }
    46|         if (!node) return;
    47|         self.lastWord.insertNode(node);
    48|         self.lastWord = null;
    49|         self.context.invoke('editor.focus');
    50|       }
    51|     });
    52|   }
    53|   handleKeydown(e) {
    54|     if (this.previousKeydownCode && lists.contains(this.keys, this.previousKeydownCode)) {
    55|       this.previousKeydownCode = e.keyCode;
    56|       return;
    57|     }
    58|     if (lists.contains(this.keys, e.keyCode)) {
    59|       const wordRange = this.context.invoke('editor.createRange').getWordRange();
    60|       this.lastWord = wordRange;
    61|     }
    62|     this.previousKeydownCode = e.keyCode;
    63|   }
    64|   handleKeyup(e) {
    65|     if (lists.contains(this.keys, e.keyCode)) {
    66|       this.replace();
    67|     }
    68|   }
    69| }

# --- HUNK 1: Lines 1-37 ---
     1| import lists from '../core/lists';
     2| export default class Clipboard {
     3|   constructor(context) {
     4|     this.context = context;
     5|     this.$editable = context.layoutInfo.editable;
     6|   }
     7|   initialize() {
     8|     this.$editable.on('paste', this.pasteByEvent.bind(this));
     9|   }
    10|   /**
    11|    * paste by clipboard event
    12|    *
    13|    * @param {Event} event
    14|    */
    15|   pasteByEvent(event) {
    16|     const clipboardData = event.originalEvent.clipboardData;
    17|     if (clipboardData && clipboardData.items && clipboardData.items.length) {
    18|       const item = clipboardData.items.length > 1 ? clipboardData.items[1] : lists.head(clipboardData.items);
    19|       if (item.kind === 'file' && item.type.indexOf('image/') !== -1) {
    20|         this.context.invoke('editor.insertImagesOrCallback', [item.getAsFile()]);
    21|         event.preventDefault();
    22|       } else if (item.kind === 'string') {
    23|         if (this.context.invoke('editor.isLimited', clipboardData.getData('Text').length)) {
    24|           event.preventDefault();
    25|         }
    26|       }
    27|     } else if (window.clipboardData) {
    28|       let text = window.clipboardData.getData('text');
    29|       if (this.context.invoke('editor.isLimited', text.length)) {
    30|         event.preventDefault();
    31|       }
    32|     }
    33|     setTimeout(() => {
    34|       this.context.invoke('editor.afterCommand');
    35|     }, 10);
    36|   }
    37| }

   128|       this.$codable.val(cmEditor.getValue());

   132|     const isChange = this.$editable.html() !== value;
   133|     this.$editable.html(value);
   134|     this.$editable.height(this.options.height ? this.$codable.height() : 'auto');
   135|     this.$editor.removeClass('codeview');
   136|     if (isChange) {
   137|       this.context.triggerEvent('change', this.$editable.html(), this.$editable);
   138|     }

   141|     this.context.invoke('airPopover.updateCodeview', false);
   142|   }

   144|     if (this.isActivated()) {

# --- HUNK 1: Lines 53-98 ---
    53|       }
    54|     };
    55|     this.documentEventHandlers.onDrop = () => {
    56|       collection = $();
    57|       this.$editor.removeClass('dragover');
    58|     };
    59|     this.$eventListener.on('dragenter', this.documentEventHandlers.onDragenter)
    60|       .on('dragleave', this.documentEventHandlers.onDragleave)
    61|       .on('drop', this.documentEventHandlers.onDrop);
    62|     this.$dropzone.on('dragenter', () => {
    63|       this.$dropzone.addClass('hover');
    64|       $dropzoneMessage.text(this.lang.image.dropImage);
    65|     }).on('dragleave', () => {
    66|       this.$dropzone.removeClass('hover');
    67|       $dropzoneMessage.text(this.lang.image.dragImageHere);
    68|     });
    69|     this.$dropzone.on('drop', (event) => {
    70|       const dataTransfer = event.originalEvent.dataTransfer;
    71|       event.preventDefault();
    72|       if (dataTransfer && dataTransfer.files && dataTransfer.files.length) {
    73|         this.$editable.focus();
    74|         this.context.invoke('editor.insertImagesOrCallback', dataTransfer.files);
    75|       } else {
    76|         $.each(dataTransfer.types, (idx, type) => {
    77|           if (type.toLowerCase().indexOf('_moz_') > -1) {
    78|             return;
    79|           }
    80|           const content = dataTransfer.getData(type);
    81|           if (type.toLowerCase().indexOf('text') > -1) {
    82|             this.context.invoke('editor.pasteHTML', content);
    83|           } else {
    84|             $(content).each((idx, item) => {
    85|               this.context.invoke('editor.insertNode', item);
    86|             });
    87|           }
    88|         });
    89|       }
    90|     }).on('dragover', false); // prevent default dragover event
    91|   }
    92|   destroy() {
    93|     Object.keys(this.documentEventHandlers).forEach((key) => {
    94|       this.$eventListener.off(key.substr(2).toLowerCase(), this.documentEventHandlers[key]);
    95|     });
    96|     this.documentEventHandlers = {};
    97|   }
    98| }

     1| import $ from 'jquery';
     2| import env from '../core/env';
     3| import key from '../core/key';
     4| import func from '../core/func';
     5| import lists from '../core/lists';
     6| import dom from '../core/dom';
     7| import range from '../core/range';
     8| import { readFileAsDataURL, createImage } from '../core/async';
     9| import History from '../editing/History';

    15| /**
    16|  * @class Editor
    17|  */
    18| export default class Editor {

   164|     /**
   165|      * create link (command)
   166|      *
   167|      * @param {Object} linkInfo
   168|      */
   169|     this.createLink = this.wrapCommand((linkInfo) => {
   170|       let linkUrl = linkInfo.url;
   171|       const linkText = linkInfo.text;
   172|       const isNewWindow = linkInfo.isNewWindow;
   173|       const checkProtocol = linkInfo.checkProtocol;
   174|       let rng = linkInfo.range || this.getLastRange();
   175|       const additionalTextLength = linkText.length - rng.toString().length;
   176|       if (additionalTextLength > 0 && this.isLimited(additionalTextLength)) {
   177|         return;
   178|       }
   179|       const isTextChanged = rng.toString() !== linkText;
   180|       if (typeof linkUrl === 'string') {
   181|         linkUrl = linkUrl.trim();
   182|       }
   183|       if (this.options.onCreateLink) {
   184|         linkUrl = this.options.onCreateLink(linkUrl);
   185|       } else if (checkProtocol) {
   186|         linkUrl = /^([A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9+-.]*\:|#|\/)/.test(linkUrl)
   187|           ? linkUrl : this.options.defaultProtocol + linkUrl;
   188|       }
   189|       let anchors = [];
   190|       if (isTextChanged) {
   191|         rng = rng.deleteContents();
   192|         const anchor = rng.insertNode($('<A>' + linkText + '</A>')[0]);
   193|         anchors.push(anchor);
   194|       } else {
   195|         anchors = this.style.styleNodes(rng, {
   196|           nodeName: 'A',
   197|           expandClosestSibling: true,
   198|           onlyPartialContains: true,
   199|         });
   200|       }
   201|       $.each(anchors, (idx, anchor) => {
   202|         $(anchor).attr('href', linkUrl);
   203|         if (isNewWindow) {
   204|           $(anchor).attr('target', '_blank');
   205|         } else {
   206|           $(anchor).removeAttr('target');
   207|         }
   208|       });
   209|       this.setLastRange(
   210|         this.createRangeFromList(anchors).select()
   211|       );
   212|     });

   375|   }
   376|   handleKeyMap(event) {
   377|     const keyMap = this.options.keyMap[env.isMac ? 'mac' : 'pc'];
   378|     const keys = [];
   379|     if (event.metaKey) { keys.push('CMD'); }
   380|     if (event.ctrlKey && !event.altKey) { keys.push('CTRL'); }
   381|     if (event.shiftKey) { keys.push('SHIFT'); }
   382|     const keyName = key.nameFromCode[event.keyCode];
   383|     if (keyName) {
   384|       keys.push(keyName);
   385|     }
   386|     const eventName = keyMap[keys.join('+')];
   387|     if (keyName === 'TAB' && !this.options.tabDisable) {
   388|       this.afterCommand();
   389|     } else if (eventName) {
   390|       if (this.context.invoke(eventName) !== false) {
   391|         event.preventDefault();
   392|         return true;
   393|       }
   394|     } else if (key.isEdit(event.keyCode)) {
   395|       this.afterCommand();
   396|     }
   397|     return false;
   398|   }
   399|   preventDefaultEditableShortCuts(event) {
   400|     if ((event.ctrlKey || event.metaKey) &&
   401|       lists.contains([66, 73, 85], event.keyCode)) {
   402|       event.preventDefault();
   403|     }
   404|   }
   405|   isLimited(pad, event) {
   406|     pad = pad || 0;
   407|     if (typeof event !== 'undefined') {
   408|       if (key.isMove(event.keyCode) ||
   409|           key.isNavigation(event.keyCode) ||
   410|           (event.ctrlKey || event.metaKey) ||
   411|           lists.contains([key.code.BACKSPACE, key.code.DELETE], event.keyCode)) {
   412|         return false;
   413|       }
   414|     }
   415|     if (this.options.maxTextLength > 0) {
   416|       if ((this.$editable.text().length + pad) > this.options.maxTextLength) {
   417|         return true;
   418|       }
   419|     }
   420|     return false;
   421|   }
   422|   /**
   423|    * create range
   424|    * @return {WrappedRange}

   426|   createRange() {
   427|     this.focus();

   598|    */
   599|   untab() {
   600|     const rng = this.getLastRange();

   606|       }
   607|     }
   608|   }
   609|   /**
   610|    * run given function between beforeCommand and afterCommand
   611|    */
   612|   wrapCommand(fn) {
   613|     return function() {
   614|       this.beforeCommand();
   615|       fn.apply(this, arguments);
   616|       this.afterCommand();
   617|     };
   618|   }

    48|         const scrollTop = this.$document.scrollTop();
    49|         const onMouseMove = (event) => {
    50|           this.context.invoke('editor.resizeTo', {
    51|             x: event.clientX - posStart.left,

    61|             this.context.invoke('editor.afterCommand');

    71|     });

    73|   destroy() {
    74|     this.$handle.remove();

    76|   update(target, event) {
    77|     if (this.context.isDisabled()) {
    78|       return false;
    79|     }
    80|     const isImage = dom.isImg(target);
    81|     const $selection = this.$handle.find('.note-control-selection');
    82|     this.context.invoke('imagePopover.update', target, event);
    83|     if (isImage) {
    84|       const $image = $(target);
    85|       const position = $image.position();
    86|       const pos = {
    87|         left: position.left + parseInt($image.css('marginLeft'), 10),
    88|         top: position.top + parseInt($image.css('marginTop'), 10),
    89|       };
    90|       const imageSize = {
    91|         w: $image.outerWidth(false),
    92|         h: $image.outerHeight(false),
    93|       };
    94|       $selection.css({
    95|         display: 'block',
    96|         left: pos.left,
    97|         top: pos.top,
    98|         width: imageSize.w,
    99|         height: imageSize.h,
   100|       }).data('target', $image); // save current image element.
   101|       const origImageObj = new Image();
   102|       origImageObj.src = $image.attr('src');
   103|       const sizingText = imageSize.w + 'x' + imageSize.h + ' (' + this.lang.image.original + ': ' + origImageObj.width + 'x' + origImageObj.height + ')';
   104|       $selection.find('.note-control-selection-info').text(sizingText);
   105|       this.context.invoke('editor.saveTarget', target);
   106|     } else {
   107|       this.hide();
   108|     }
   109|     return isImage;
   110|   }
   111|   /**
   112|    * hide
   113|    *
   114|    * @param {jQuery} $handle
   115|    */
   116|   hide() {
   117|     this.context.invoke('editor.clearTarget');

   119|   }

     1| import $ from 'jquery';

     7| const POPOVER_DIST = 5;
     8| export default class HintPopover {
     9|   constructor(context) {
    10|     this.context = context;
    11|     this.ui = $.summernote.ui;
    12|     this.$editable = context.layoutInfo.editable;
    13|     this.options = context.options;
    14|     this.hint = this.options.hint || [];
    15|     this.direction = this.options.hintDirection || 'bottom';
    16|     this.hints = Array.isArray(this.hint) ? this.hint : [this.hint];
    17|     this.events = {
    18|       'summernote.keyup': (we, e) => {
    19|         if (!e.isDefaultPrevented()) {
    20|           this.handleKeyup(e);
    21|         }
    22|       },
    23|       'summernote.keydown': (we, e) => {
    24|         this.handleKeydown(e);
    25|       },
    26|       'summernote.disable summernote.dialog.shown summernote.blur': () => {
    27|         this.hide();
    28|       },
    29|     };
    30|   }
    31|   shouldInitialize() {
    32|     return this.hints.length > 0;
    33|   }
    34|   initialize() {
    35|     this.lastWordRange = null;
    36|     this.matchingWord = null;
    37|     this.$popover = this.ui.popover({
    38|       className: 'note-hint-popover',
    39|       hideArrow: true,
    40|       direction: '',
    41|     }).render().appendTo(this.options.container);
    42|     this.$popover.hide();
    43|     this.$content = this.$popover.find('.popover-content,.note-popover-content');
    44|     this.$content.on('click', '.note-hint-item', (e) => {
    45|       this.$content.find('.active').removeClass('active');
    46|       $(e.currentTarget).addClass('active');
    47|       this.replace();
    48|     });
    49|     this.$popover.on('mousedown', (e) => { e.preventDefault(); });
    50|   }
    51|   destroy() {
    52|     this.$popover.remove();
    53|   }
    54|   selectItem($item) {
    55|     this.$content.find('.active').removeClass('active');
    56|     $item.addClass('active');
    57|     this.$content[0].scrollTop = $item[0].offsetTop - (this.$content.innerHeight() / 2);
    58|   }
    59|   moveDown() {
    60|     const $current = this.$content.find('.note-hint-item.active');
    61|     const $next = $current.next();
    62|     if ($next.length) {
    63|       this.selectItem($next);
    64|     } else {
    65|       let $nextGroup = $current.parent().next();
    66|       if (!$nextGroup.length) {
    67|         $nextGroup = this.$content.find('.note-hint-group').first();
    68|       }
    69|       this.selectItem($nextGroup.find('.note-hint-item').first());

# --- HUNK 2: Lines 102-224 ---
   102|       } else {
   103|         range.createFromNodeAfter(node).select();
   104|       }
   105|       this.lastWordRange = null;
   106|       this.hide();
   107|       this.context.invoke('editor.focus');
   108|       this.context.triggerEvent('change', this.$editable.html(), this.$editable);
   109|     }
   110|   }
   111|   nodeFromItem($item) {
   112|     const hint = this.hints[$item.data('index')];
   113|     const item = $item.data('item');
   114|     let node = hint.content ? hint.content(item) : item;
   115|     if (typeof node === 'string') {
   116|       node = dom.createText(node);
   117|     }
   118|     return node;
   119|   }
   120|   createItemTemplates(hintIdx, items) {
   121|     const hint = this.hints[hintIdx];
   122|     return items.map((item /*, idx */) => {
   123|       const $item = $('<div class="note-hint-item"></div>');
   124|       $item.append(hint.template ? hint.template(item) : item + '');
   125|       $item.data({
   126|         'index': hintIdx,
   127|         'item': item,
   128|       });
   129|       return $item;
   130|     });
   131|   }
   132|   handleKeydown(e) {
   133|     if (!this.$popover.is(':visible')) {
   134|       return;
   135|     }
   136|     if (e.keyCode === key.code.ENTER) {
   137|       e.preventDefault();
   138|       this.replace();
   139|     } else if (e.keyCode === key.code.UP) {
   140|       e.preventDefault();
   141|       this.moveUp();
   142|     } else if (e.keyCode === key.code.DOWN) {
   143|       e.preventDefault();
   144|       this.moveDown();
   145|     }
   146|   }
   147|   searchKeyword(index, keyword, callback) {
   148|     const hint = this.hints[index];
   149|     if (hint && hint.match.test(keyword) && hint.search) {
   150|       const matches = hint.match.exec(keyword);
   151|       this.matchingWord = matches[0];
   152|       hint.search(matches[1], callback);
   153|     } else {
   154|       callback();
   155|     }
   156|   }
   157|   createGroup(idx, keyword) {
   158|     const $group = $('<div class="note-hint-group note-hint-group-' + idx + '"></div>');
   159|     this.searchKeyword(idx, keyword, (items) => {
   160|       items = items || [];
   161|       if (items.length) {
   162|         $group.html(this.createItemTemplates(idx, items));
   163|         this.show();
   164|       }
   165|     });
   166|     return $group;
   167|   }
   168|   handleKeyup(e) {
   169|     if (!lists.contains([key.code.ENTER, key.code.UP, key.code.DOWN], e.keyCode)) {
   170|       let range = this.context.invoke('editor.getLastRange');
   171|       let wordRange, keyword;
   172|       if (this.options.hintMode === 'words') {
   173|         wordRange = range.getWordsRange(range);
   174|         keyword = wordRange.toString();
   175|         this.hints.forEach((hint) => {
   176|           if (hint.match.test(keyword)) {
   177|             wordRange = range.getWordsMatchRange(hint.match);
   178|             return false;
   179|           }
   180|         });
   181|         if (!wordRange) {
   182|           this.hide();
   183|           return;
   184|         }
   185|         keyword = wordRange.toString();
   186|       } else {
   187|         wordRange = range.getWordRange();
   188|         keyword = wordRange.toString();
   189|       }
   190|       if (this.hints.length && keyword) {
   191|         this.$content.empty();
   192|         const bnd = func.rect2bnd(lists.last(wordRange.getClientRects()));
   193|         const containerOffset = $(this.options.container).offset();
   194|         if (bnd) {
   195|           bnd.top -= containerOffset.top;
   196|           bnd.left -= containerOffset.left;
   197|           this.$popover.hide();
   198|           this.lastWordRange = wordRange;
   199|           this.hints.forEach((hint, idx) => {
   200|             if (hint.match.test(keyword)) {
   201|               this.createGroup(idx, keyword).appendTo(this.$content);
   202|             }
   203|           });
   204|           this.$content.find('.note-hint-item:first').addClass('active');
   205|           if (this.direction === 'top') {
   206|             this.$popover.css({
   207|               left: bnd.left,
   208|               top: bnd.top - this.$popover.outerHeight() - POPOVER_DIST,
   209|             });
   210|           } else {
   211|             this.$popover.css({
   212|               left: bnd.left,
   213|               top: bnd.top + bnd.height + POPOVER_DIST,
   214|             });
   215|           }
   216|         }
   217|       } else {
   218|         this.hide();
   219|       }
   220|     }
   221|   }
   222|   show() {
   223|     this.$popover.show();
   224|   }
