    75|    *
    76|    * @param {jQuery} $dialog
    77|    * @return {Promise}
    78|    */
    79|   showImageDialog() {
    80|     return $.Deferred((deferred) => {
    81|       const $imageInput = this.$dialog.find('.note-image-input');
    82|       const $imageUrl = this.$dialog.find('.note-image-url');
    83|       const $imageBtn = this.$dialog.find('.note-image-btn');
    84|       this.ui.onDialogShown(this.$dialog, () => {
    85|         this.context.triggerEvent('dialog.shown');
    86|         $imageInput.replaceWith($imageInput.clone().on('change', (event) => {
    87|           deferred.resolve(event.target.files || event.target.value);
    88|         }).val(''));
    89|         $imageUrl.on('input paste propertychange', () => {
    90|           this.ui.toggleBtn($imageBtn, $imageUrl.val());
    91|         }).val('');
    92|         if (!env.isSupportTouch) {
    93|           $imageUrl.trigger('focus');
    94|         }
    95|         $imageBtn.click((event) => {
    96|           event.preventDefault();
    97|           deferred.resolve($imageUrl.val());
    98|         });
    99|         this.bindEnterKey($imageUrl, $imageBtn);
   100|       });
   101|       this.ui.onDialogHidden(this.$dialog, () => {
   102|         $imageInput.off();
   103|         $imageUrl.off();
   104|         $imageBtn.off();
   105|         if (deferred.state() === 'pending') {
   106|           deferred.reject();
   107|         }
   108|       });
   109|       this.ui.showDialog(this.$dialog);
   110|     });
   111|   }
   112| }

     1| import $ from 'jquery';
     2| import lists from '../core/lists';
     3| import dom from '../core/dom';
     4| /**
     5|  * Image popover module
     6|  *  mouse events that show/hide popover will be handled by Handle.js.
     7|  *  Handle.js will receive the events and invoke 'imagePopover.update'.
     8|  */
     9| export default class ImagePopover {
    10|   constructor(context) {
    11|     this.context = context;
    12|     this.ui = $.summernote.ui;
    13|     this.editable = context.layoutInfo.editable[0];
    14|     this.options = context.options;
    15|     this.events = {
    16|       'summernote.disable summernote.dialog.shown': () => {
    17|         this.hide();
    18|       },
    19|       'summernote.blur': (we, e) => {
    20|         if (e.originalEvent && e.originalEvent.relatedTarget) {
    21|           if (!this.$popover[0].contains(e.originalEvent.relatedTarget)) {
    22|             this.hide();
    23|           }
    24|         } else {
    25|           this.hide();
    26|         }
    27|       },
    28|     };
    29|   }
    30|   shouldInitialize() {
    31|     return !lists.isEmpty(this.options.popover.image);
    32|   }
    33|   initialize() {
    34|     this.$popover = this.ui.popover({
    35|       className: 'note-image-popover',
    36|     }).render().appendTo(this.options.container);
    37|     const $content = this.$popover.find('.popover-content,.note-popover-content');
    38|     this.context.invoke('buttons.build', $content, this.options.popover.image);
    39|     this.$popover.on('mousedown', (e) => { e.preventDefault(); });
    40|   }
    41|   destroy() {
    42|     this.$popover.remove();
    43|   }
    44|   update(target, event) {
    45|     if (dom.isImg(target)) {
    46|       const position = $(target).offset();
    47|       const containerOffset = $(this.options.container).offset();
    48|       let pos = {};
    49|       if (this.options.popatmouse) {
    50|         pos.left = event.pageX - 20;
    51|         pos.top = event.pageY;
    52|       } else {
    53|         pos = position;
    54|       }
    55|       pos.top -= containerOffset.top;
    56|       pos.left -= containerOffset.left;
    57|       this.$popover.css({
    58|         display: 'block',
    59|         left: pos.left,

     8|     this.ui = $.summernote.ui;

    34|         className: 'sn-checkbox-use-protocol',

    36|         checked: true,
    37|       }).render()).html(),
    38|     ].join('');
    39|     const buttonClass = 'btn btn-primary note-btn note-btn-primary note-link-btn';

    41|     this.$dialog = this.ui.dialog({
    42|       className: 'link-dialog',
    43|       title: this.lang.link.insert,
    44|       fade: this.options.dialogsFade,
    45|       body: body,
    46|       footer: footer,
    47|     }).render().appendTo($container);
    48|   }
    49|   destroy() {
    50|     this.ui.hideDialog(this.$dialog);
    51|     this.$dialog.remove();
    52|   }
    53|   bindEnterKey($input, $btn) {
    54|     $input.on('keypress', (event) => {
    55|       if (event.keyCode === key.code.ENTER) {
    56|         event.preventDefault();
    57|         $btn.trigger('click');
    58|       }
    59|     });
    60|   }
    61|   /**
    62|    * toggle update button
    63|    */
    64|   toggleLinkBtn($linkBtn, $linkText, $linkUrl) {
    65|     this.ui.toggleBtn($linkBtn, $linkText.val() && $linkUrl.val());
    66|   }
    67|   /**
    68|    * Show link dialog and set event handlers on dialog controls.
    69|    *
    70|    * @param {Object} linkInfo
    71|    * @return {Promise}
    72|    */
    73|   showLinkDialog(linkInfo) {
    74|     return $.Deferred((deferred) => {
    75|       const $linkText = this.$dialog.find('.note-link-text');
    76|       const $linkUrl = this.$dialog.find('.note-link-url');
    77|       const $linkBtn = this.$dialog.find('.note-link-btn');
    78|       const $openInNewWindow = this.$dialog
    79|         .find('.sn-checkbox-open-in-new-window input[type=checkbox]');
    80|       const $useProtocol = this.$dialog
    81|         .find('.sn-checkbox-use-protocol input[type=checkbox]');
    82|       this.ui.onDialogShown(this.$dialog, () => {
    83|         this.context.triggerEvent('dialog.shown');
    84|         if (!linkInfo.url && func.isValidUrl(linkInfo.text)) {
    85|           linkInfo.url = linkInfo.text;
    86|         }
    87|         $linkText.on('input paste propertychange', () => {
    88|           linkInfo.text = $linkText.val();
    89|           this.toggleLinkBtn($linkBtn, $linkText, $linkUrl);
    90|         }).val(linkInfo.text);
    91|         $linkUrl.on('input paste propertychange', () => {
    92|           if (!linkInfo.text) {
    93|             $linkText.val($linkUrl.val());
    94|           }
    95|           this.toggleLinkBtn($linkBtn, $linkText, $linkUrl);
    96|         }).val(linkInfo.url);
    97|         if (!env.isSupportTouch) {
    98|           $linkUrl.trigger('focus');
    99|         }
   100|         this.toggleLinkBtn($linkBtn, $linkText, $linkUrl);
   101|         this.bindEnterKey($linkUrl, $linkBtn);
   102|         this.bindEnterKey($linkText, $linkBtn);
   103|         const isNewWindowChecked = linkInfo.isNewWindow !== undefined
   104|           ? linkInfo.isNewWindow : this.context.options.linkTargetBlank;
   105|         $openInNewWindow.prop('checked', isNewWindowChecked);
   106|         const useProtocolChecked = linkInfo.url
   107|           ? false : this.context.options.useProtocol;
   108|         $useProtocol.prop('checked', useProtocolChecked);
   109|         $linkBtn.one('click', (event) => {
   110|           event.preventDefault();
   111|           deferred.resolve({
   112|             range: linkInfo.range,
   113|             url: $linkUrl.val(),
   114|             text: $linkText.val(),
   115|             isNewWindow: $openInNewWindow.is(':checked'),
   116|             checkProtocol: $useProtocol.is(':checked'),
   117|           });
   118|           this.ui.hideDialog(this.$dialog);
   119|         });
   120|       });
   121|       this.ui.onDialogHidden(this.$dialog, () => {
   122|         $linkText.off();
   123|         $linkUrl.off();
   124|         $linkBtn.off();
   125|         if (deferred.state() === 'pending') {
   126|           deferred.reject();
   127|         }
   128|       });
   129|       this.ui.showDialog(this.$dialog);
   130|     }).promise();
   131|   }
   132|   /**
   133|    * @param {Object} layoutInfo
   134|    */
   135|   show() {
   136|     const linkInfo = this.context.invoke('editor.getLinkInfo');

     1| import $ from 'jquery';
     2| const EDITABLE_PADDING = 24;
     3| export default class Statusbar {
     4|   constructor(context) {
     5|     this.$document = $(document);
     6|     this.$statusbar = context.layoutInfo.statusbar;
     7|     this.$editable = context.layoutInfo.editable;
     8|     this.$codable = context.layoutInfo.codable;
     9|     this.options = context.options;
    10|   }
    11|   initialize() {
    12|     if (this.options.airMode || this.options.disableResizeEditor) {
    13|       this.destroy();
    14|       return;
    15|     }
    16|     this.$statusbar.on('mousedown', (event) => {
    17|       event.preventDefault();
    18|       event.stopPropagation();
    19|       const editableTop = this.$editable.offset().top - this.$document.scrollTop();
    20|       const editableCodeTop = this.$codable.offset().top - this.$document.scrollTop();
    21|       const onMouseMove = (event) => {
    22|         let height = event.clientY - (editableTop + EDITABLE_PADDING);
    23|         let heightCode = event.clientY - (editableCodeTop + EDITABLE_PADDING);
    24|         height = (this.options.minheight > 0) ? Math.max(height, this.options.minheight) : height;
    25|         height = (this.options.maxHeight > 0) ? Math.min(height, this.options.maxHeight) : height;
    26|         heightCode = (this.options.minheight > 0) ? Math.max(heightCode, this.options.minheight) : heightCode;
    27|         heightCode = (this.options.maxHeight > 0) ? Math.min(heightCode, this.options.maxHeight) : heightCode;
    28|         this.$editable.height(height);
    29|         this.$codable.height(heightCode);
    30|       };
    31|       this.$document.on('mousemove', onMouseMove).one('mouseup', () => {
    32|         this.$document.off('mousemove', onMouseMove);
    33|       });
    34|     });
    35|   }
    36|   destroy() {
    37|     this.$statusbar.off();
    38|     this.$statusbar.addClass('locked');
    39|   }
    40| }

    23|     this.$dialog = this.ui.dialog({
    24|       title: this.lang.video.insert,
    25|       fade: this.options.dialogsFade,
    26|       body: body,
    27|       footer: footer,
    28|     }).render().appendTo($container);
    29|   }
    30|   destroy() {
    31|     this.ui.hideDialog(this.$dialog);
    32|     this.$dialog.remove();
    33|   }
    34|   bindEnterKey($input, $btn) {
    35|     $input.on('keypress', (event) => {
    36|       if (event.keyCode === key.code.ENTER) {
    37|         event.preventDefault();
    38|         $btn.trigger('click');
    39|       }
    40|     });
    41|   }
    42|   createVideoNode(url) {
    43|     const ytRegExp = /\/\/(?:(?:www|m)\.)?(?:youtu\.be\/|youtube\.com\/(?:embed\/|v\/|watch\?v=|watch\?.+&v=))([\w|-]{11})(?:(?:[\?&]t=)(\S+))?$/;
    44|     const ytRegExpForStart = /^(?:(\d+)h)?(?:(\d+)m)?(?:(\d+)s)?$/;
    45|     const ytMatch = url.match(ytRegExp);
    46|     const gdRegExp = /(?:\.|\/\/)drive\.google\.com\/file\/d\/(.[a-zA-Z0-9_-]*)\/view/;
    47|     const gdMatch = url.match(gdRegExp);
    48|     const igRegExp = /(?:www\.|\/\/)instagram\.com\/p\/(.[a-zA-Z0-9_-]*)/;
    49|     const igMatch = url.match(igRegExp);
    50|     const vRegExp = /\/\/vine\.co\/v\/([a-zA-Z0-9]+)/;
    51|     const vMatch = url.match(vRegExp);
    52|     const vimRegExp = /\/\/(player\.)?vimeo\.com\/([a-z]*\/)*(\d+)[?]?.*/;
    53|     const vimMatch = url.match(vimRegExp);
    54|     const dmRegExp = /.+dailymotion.com\/(video|hub)\/([^_]+)[^#]*(#video=([^_&]+))?/;
    55|     const dmMatch = url.match(dmRegExp);
    56|     const youkuRegExp = /\/\/v\.youku\.com\/v_show\/id_(\w+)=*\.html/;
    57|     const youkuMatch = url.match(youkuRegExp);
    58|     const peerTubeRegExp =/\/\/(.*)\/videos\/watch\/([^?]*)(?:\?(?:start=(\w*))?(?:&stop=(\w*))?(?:&loop=([10]))?(?:&autoplay=([10]))?(?:&muted=([10]))?)?/; 
    59|     const peerTubeMatch = url.match(peerTubeRegExp);
    60|     const qqRegExp = /\/\/v\.qq\.com.*?vid=(.+)/;
    61|     const qqMatch = url.match(qqRegExp);
    62|     const qqRegExp2 = /\/\/v\.qq\.com\/x?\/?(page|cover).*?\/([^\/]+)\.html\??.*/;
    63|     const qqMatch2 = url.match(qqRegExp2);
    64|     const mp4RegExp = /^.+.(mp4|m4v)$/;
    65|     const mp4Match = url.match(mp4RegExp);
    66|     const oggRegExp = /^.+.(ogg|ogv)$/;
    67|     const oggMatch = url.match(oggRegExp);
    68|     const webmRegExp = /^.+.(webm)$/;
    69|     const webmMatch = url.match(webmRegExp);
    70|     const fbRegExp = /(?:www\.|\/\/)facebook\.com\/([^\/]+)\/videos\/([0-9]+)/;
    71|     const fbMatch = url.match(fbRegExp);
    72|     let $video;
    73|     if (ytMatch && ytMatch[1].length === 11) {

    76|       if (typeof ytMatch[2] !== 'undefined') {
    77|         const ytMatchForStart = ytMatch[2].match(ytRegExpForStart);
    78|         if (ytMatchForStart) {
    79|           for (var n = [3600, 60, 1], i = 0, r = n.length; i < r; i++) {
    80|             start += (typeof ytMatchForStart[i + 1] !== 'undefined' ? n[i] * parseInt(ytMatchForStart[i + 1], 10) : 0);
    81|           }
    82|         }
    83|       }
    84|       $video = $('<iframe>')
    85|         .attr('frameborder', 0)
    86|         .attr('src', '//www.youtube.com/embed/' + youtubeId + (start > 0 ? '?start=' + start : ''))
    87|         .attr('width', '640').attr('height', '360');
    88|     } else if (gdMatch && gdMatch[0].length) {
    89|       $video = $('<iframe>')
    90|         .attr('frameborder', 0)
    91|         .attr('src', 'https://drive.google.com/file/d/' + gdMatch[1] + '/preview')
    92|         .attr('width', '640').attr('height', '480');
    93|     } else if (igMatch && igMatch[0].length) {

    97|         .attr('width', '612').attr('height', '710')
    98|         .attr('scrolling', 'no')
    99|         .attr('allowtransparency', 'true');

   101|       $video = $('<iframe>')
   102|         .attr('frameborder', 0)
   103|         .attr('src', vMatch[0] + '/embed/simple')
   104|         .attr('width', '600').attr('height', '600')
   105|         .attr('class', 'vine-embed');

   107|       $video = $('<iframe webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen allowfullscreen>')

# --- HUNK 2: Lines 175-211 ---
   175|     });
   176|   }
   177|   /**
   178|    * show video dialog
   179|    *
   180|    * @param {jQuery} $dialog
   181|    * @return {Promise}
   182|    */
   183|   showVideoDialog(/* text */) {
   184|     return $.Deferred((deferred) => {
   185|       const $videoUrl = this.$dialog.find('.note-video-url');
   186|       const $videoBtn = this.$dialog.find('.note-video-btn');
   187|       this.ui.onDialogShown(this.$dialog, () => {
   188|         this.context.triggerEvent('dialog.shown');
   189|         $videoUrl.on('input paste propertychange', () => {
   190|           this.ui.toggleBtn($videoBtn, $videoUrl.val());
   191|         });
   192|         if (!env.isSupportTouch) {
   193|           $videoUrl.trigger('focus');
   194|         }
   195|         $videoBtn.click((event) => {
   196|           event.preventDefault();
   197|           deferred.resolve($videoUrl.val());
   198|         });
   199|         this.bindEnterKey($videoUrl, $videoBtn);
   200|       });
   201|       this.ui.onDialogHidden(this.$dialog, () => {
   202|         $videoUrl.off();
   203|         $videoBtn.off();
   204|         if (deferred.state() === 'pending') {
   205|           deferred.reject();
   206|         }
   207|       });
   208|       this.ui.showDialog(this.$dialog);
   209|     });
   210|   }
   211| }

     1| import $ from 'jquery';
     2| import env from './core/env';
     3| import lists from './core/lists';
     4| import Context from './Context';
     5| $.fn.extend({
     6|   /**
     7|    * Summernote API
     8|    *
     9|    * @param {Object|String}
    10|    * @return {this}
    11|    */
    12|   summernote: function() {
    13|     const type = $.type(lists.head(arguments));
    14|     const isExternalAPICalled = type === 'string';
    15|     const hasInitOptions = type === 'object';
    16|     const options = $.extend({}, $.summernote.options, hasInitOptions ? lists.head(arguments) : {});
    17|     options.langInfo = $.extend(true, {}, $.summernote.lang['en-US'], $.summernote.lang[options.lang]);
    18|     options.icons = $.extend(true, {}, $.summernote.options.icons, options.icons);
    19|     options.tooltip = options.tooltip === 'auto' ? !env.isSupportTouch : options.tooltip;
    20|     this.each((idx, note) => {
    21|       const $note = $(note);
    22|       if (!$note.data('summernote')) {
    23|         const context = new Context($note, options);
    24|         $note.data('summernote', context);
    25|         $note.data('summernote').triggerEvent('init', context.layoutInfo);
    26|       }
    27|     });
    28|     const $note = this.first();
    29|     if ($note.length) {
    30|       const context = $note.data('summernote');
    31|       if (isExternalAPICalled) {
    32|         return context.invoke.apply(context, lists.from(arguments));
    33|       } else if (options.focus) {

# --- HUNK 1: Lines 1-244 ---
     1| import $ from 'jquery';
     2| import '/js/settings.js';
     3| import renderer from '/js/renderer';
     4| import './summernote-bs4.scss';
     5| const editor = renderer.create('<div class="note-editor note-frame card"></div>');
     6| const toolbar = renderer.create('<div class="note-toolbar card-header" role="toolbar"></div>');
     7| const editingArea = renderer.create('<div class="note-editing-area"></div>');
     8| const codable = renderer.create('<textarea class="note-codable" aria-multiline="true"></textarea>');
     9| const editable = renderer.create('<div class="note-editable card-block" contentEditable="true" role="textbox" aria-multiline="true"></div>');
    10| const statusbar = renderer.create([
    11|   '<output class="note-status-output" role="status" aria-live="polite"></output>',
    12|   '<div class="note-statusbar" role="status">',
    13|     '<div class="note-resizebar" aria-label="Resize">',
    14|       '<div class="note-icon-bar"></div>',
    15|       '<div class="note-icon-bar"></div>',
    16|       '<div class="note-icon-bar"></div>',
    17|     '</div>',
    18|   '</div>',
    19| ].join(''));
    20| const airEditor = renderer.create('<div class="note-editor note-airframe"></div>');
    21| const airEditable = renderer.create([
    22|   '<div class="note-editable" contentEditable="true" role="textbox" aria-multiline="true"></div>',
    23|   '<output class="note-status-output" role="status" aria-live="polite"></output>',
    24| ].join(''));
    25| const buttonGroup = renderer.create('<div class="note-btn-group btn-group"></div>');
    26| const dropdown = renderer.create('<div class="note-dropdown-menu dropdown-menu" role="list"></div>', function($node, options) {
    27|   const markup = Array.isArray(options.items) ? options.items.map(function(item) {
    28|     const value = (typeof item === 'string') ? item : (item.value || '');
    29|     const content = options.template ? options.template(item) : item;
    30|     const option = (typeof item === 'object') ? item.option : undefined;
    31|     const dataValue = 'data-value="' + value + '"';
    32|     const dataOption = (option !== undefined) ? ' data-option="' + option + '"' : '';
    33|     return '<a class="dropdown-item" href="#" ' + (dataValue + dataOption) + ' role="listitem" aria-label="' + value + '">' + content + '</a>';
    34|   }).join('') : options.items;
    35|   $node.html(markup).attr({ 'aria-label': options.title });
    36|   if (options && options.codeviewKeepButton) {
    37|     $node.addClass('note-codeview-keep');
    38|   }
    39| });
    40| const dropdownButtonContents = function(contents) {
    41|   return contents;
    42| };
    43| const dropdownCheck = renderer.create('<div class="note-dropdown-menu dropdown-menu note-check" role="list"></div>', function($node, options) {
    44|   const markup = Array.isArray(options.items) ? options.items.map(function(item) {
    45|     const value = (typeof item === 'string') ? item : (item.value || '');
    46|     const content = options.template ? options.template(item) : item;
    47|     return '<a class="dropdown-item" href="#" data-value="' + value + '" role="listitem" aria-label="' + item + '">' + icon(options.checkClassName) + ' ' + content + '</a>';
    48|   }).join('') : options.items;
    49|   $node.html(markup).attr({ 'aria-label': options.title });
    50|   if (options && options.codeviewKeepButton) {
    51|     $node.addClass('note-codeview-keep');
    52|   }
    53| });
    54| const dialog = renderer.create('<div class="modal note-modal" aria-hidden="false" tabindex="-1" role="dialog"></div>', function($node, options) {
    55|   if (options.fade) {
    56|     $node.addClass('fade');
    57|   }
    58|   $node.attr({
    59|     'aria-label': options.title,
    60|   });
    61|   $node.html([
    62|     '<div class="modal-dialog">',
    63|       '<div class="modal-content">',
    64|         (options.title ? '<div class="modal-header">' +
    65|           '<h4 class="modal-title">' + options.title + '</h4>' +
    66|           '<button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close" aria-hidden="true">&times;</button>' +
    67|         '</div>' : ''),
    68|         '<div class="modal-body">' + options.body + '</div>',
    69|         (options.footer ? '<div class="modal-footer">' + options.footer + '</div>' : ''),
    70|       '</div>',
    71|     '</div>',
    72|   ].join(''));
    73| });
    74| const popover = renderer.create([
    75|   '<div class="note-popover popover in">',
    76|     '<div class="arrow"></div>',
    77|     '<div class="popover-content note-children-container"></div>',
    78|   '</div>',
    79| ].join(''), function($node, options) {
    80|   const direction = typeof options.direction !== 'undefined' ? options.direction : 'bottom';
    81|   $node.addClass(direction);
    82|   if (options.hideArrow) {
    83|     $node.find('.arrow').hide();
    84|   }
    85| });
    86| const checkbox = renderer.create('<div class="form-check"></div>', function($node, options) {
    87|   $node.html([
    88|     '<label class="form-check-label"' + (options.id ? ' for="note-' + options.id + '"' : '') + '>',
    89|       '<input type="checkbox" class="form-check-input"' + (options.id ? ' id="note-' + options.id + '"' : ''),
    90|         (options.checked ? ' checked' : ''),
    91|         ' aria-label="' + (options.text ? options.text : '') + '"',
    92|         ' aria-checked="' + (options.checked ? 'true' : 'false') + '"/>',
    93|       ' ' + (options.text ? options.text : '') +
    94|     '</label>',
    95|   ].join(''));
    96| });
    97| const icon = function(iconClassName, tagName) {
    98|   if (iconClassName.match(/^</)) {
    99|     return iconClassName;
   100|   }
   101|   tagName = tagName || 'i';
   102|   return '<' + tagName + ' class="' + iconClassName + '"></' + tagName+'>';
   103| };
   104| const ui = function(editorOptions) {
   105|   return {
   106|     editor: editor,
   107|     toolbar: toolbar,
   108|     editingArea: editingArea,
   109|     codable: codable,
   110|     editable: editable,
   111|     statusbar: statusbar,
   112|     airEditor: airEditor,
   113|     airEditable: airEditable,
   114|     buttonGroup: buttonGroup,
   115|     dropdown: dropdown,
   116|     dropdownButtonContents: dropdownButtonContents,
   117|     dropdownCheck: dropdownCheck,
   118|     dialog: dialog,
   119|     popover: popover,
   120|     icon: icon,
   121|     checkbox: checkbox,
   122|     options: editorOptions,
   123|     palette: function($node, options) {
   124|       return renderer.create('<div class="note-color-palette"></div>', function($node, options) {
   125|         const contents = [];
   126|         for (let row = 0, rowSize = options.colors.length; row < rowSize; row++) {
   127|           const eventName = options.eventName;
   128|           const colors = options.colors[row];
   129|           const colorsName = options.colorsName[row];
   130|           const buttons = [];
   131|           for (let col = 0, colSize = colors.length; col < colSize; col++) {
   132|             const color = colors[col];
   133|             const colorName = colorsName[col];
   134|             buttons.push([
   135|               '<button type="button" class="note-color-btn"',
   136|               'style="background-color:', color, '" ',
   137|               'data-event="', eventName, '" ',
   138|               'data-value="', color, '" ',
   139|               'title="', colorName, '" ',
   140|               'aria-label="', colorName, '" ',
   141|               'data-toggle="button" tabindex="-1"></button>',
   142|             ].join(''));
   143|           }
   144|           contents.push('<div class="note-color-row">' + buttons.join('') + '</div>');
   145|         }
   146|         $node.html(contents.join(''));
   147|         if (options.tooltip) {
   148|           $node.find('.note-color-btn').tooltip({
   149|             container: options.container || editorOptions.container,
   150|             trigger: 'hover',
   151|             placement: 'bottom',
   152|           });
   153|         }
   154|       })($node, options);
   155|     },
   156|     button: function($node, options) {
   157|       return renderer.create('<button type="button" class="note-btn btn btn-light btn-sm" tabindex="-1"></button>', function($node, options) {
   158|         if (options && options.tooltip) {
   159|           $node.attr({
   160|             title: options.tooltip,
   161|             'aria-label': options.tooltip,
   162|           }).tooltip({
   163|             container: options.container || editorOptions.container,
   164|             trigger: 'hover',
   165|             placement: 'bottom',
   166|           }).on('click', (e) => {
   167|             $(e.currentTarget).tooltip('hide');
   168|           });
   169|         }
   170|         if (options && options.codeviewButton) {
   171|           $node.addClass('note-codeview-keep');
   172|         }
   173|       })($node, options);
   174|     },
   175|     toggleBtn: function($btn, isEnable) {
   176|       $btn.toggleClass('disabled', !isEnable);
   177|       $btn.attr('disabled', !isEnable);
   178|     },
   179|     toggleBtnActive: function($btn, isActive) {
   180|       $btn.toggleClass('active', isActive);
   181|     },
   182|     onDialogShown: function($dialog, handler) {
   183|       $dialog.one('shown.bs.modal', handler);
   184|     },
   185|     onDialogHidden: function($dialog, handler) {
   186|       $dialog.one('hidden.bs.modal', handler);
   187|     },
   188|     showDialog: function($dialog) {
   189|       $dialog.modal('show');
   190|     },
   191|     hideDialog: function($dialog) {
   192|       $dialog.modal('hide');
   193|     },
   194|     createLayout: function($note) {
   195|       const $editor = (editorOptions.airMode ? airEditor([
   196|         editingArea([
   197|           codable(),
   198|           airEditable(),
   199|         ]),
   200|       ]) : (editorOptions.toolbarPosition === 'bottom'
   201|         ? editor([
   202|           editingArea([
   203|             codable(),
   204|             editable(),
   205|           ]),
   206|           toolbar(),
   207|           statusbar(),
   208|         ])
   209|         : editor([
   210|           toolbar(),
   211|           editingArea([
   212|             codable(),
   213|             editable(),
   214|           ]),
   215|           statusbar(),
   216|         ])
   217|       )).render();
   218|       $editor.insertAfter($note);
   219|       return {
   220|         note: $note,
   221|         editor: $editor,
   222|         toolbar: $editor.find('.note-toolbar'),
   223|         editingArea: $editor.find('.note-editing-area'),
   224|         editable: $editor.find('.note-editable'),
   225|         codable: $editor.find('.note-codable'),
   226|         statusbar: $editor.find('.note-statusbar'),
   227|       };
   228|     },
   229|     removeLayout: function($note, layoutInfo) {
   230|       $note.html(layoutInfo.editable.html());
   231|       layoutInfo.editor.remove();
   232|       $note.show();
   233|     },
   234|   };
   235| };
   236| $.summernote = $.extend($.summernote, {
   237|   ui_template: ui,
   238|   interface: 'bs4',
   239| });
   240| $.summernote.options.styleTags = [
   241|   'p',
   242|   { title: 'Blockquote', tag: 'blockquote', className: 'blockquote', value: 'blockquote' },
   243|   'pre', 'h1', 'h2', 'h3', 'h4', 'h5', 'h6',
   244| ];

    27|   const markup = Array.isArray(options.items) ? options.items.map(function(item) {
    28|     const value = (typeof item === 'string') ? item : (item.value || '');
    29|     const content = options.template ? options.template(item) : item;
    30|     const option = (typeof item === 'object') ? item.option : undefined;
    31|     const dataValue = 'data-value="' + value + '"';
    32|     const dataOption = (option !== undefined) ? ' data-option="' + option + '"' : '';
    33|     return '<a class="dropdown-item" href="#" ' + (dataValue + dataOption) + ' role="listitem" aria-label="' + value + '">' + content + '</a>';
    34|   }).join('') : options.items;
    35|   $node.html(markup).attr({ 'aria-label': options.title });
    36|   if (options && options.codeviewKeepButton) {
    37|     $node.addClass('note-codeview-keep');
    38|   }
    39| });
    40| const dropdownButtonContents = function(contents) {
    41|   return contents;
    42| };
    43| const dropdownCheck = renderer.create('<div class="note-dropdown-menu dropdown-menu note-check" role="list">', function($node, options) {
    44|   const markup = Array.isArray(options.items) ? options.items.map(function(item) {
    45|     const value = (typeof item === 'string') ? item : (item.value || '');

    49|   $node.html(markup).attr({ 'aria-label': options.title });

    53| });

    29|     if (offset.left + width > windowWidth - targetMarginRight) {
    30|       $dropdown.css('margin-left', windowWidth - targetMarginRight - (offset.left + width));
    31|     } else {
    32|       $dropdown.css('margin-left', '');
    33|     }
    34|   }
    35|   hide() {
    36|     this.$button.removeClass('active');
    37|     this.$button.parent().removeClass('open');
    38|   }
    39|   toggle() {
    40|     var isOpened = this.$button.parent().hasClass('open');
    41|     this.clear();
    42|     if (isOpened) {
    43|       this.hide();
    44|     } else {
    45|       this.show();
    46|     }
    47|   }
    48| }
    49| $(document).on('click', function(e) {
    50|   if (!$(e.target).closest('.note-btn-group').length) {
    51|     $('.note-btn-group.open').removeClass('open');
    52|     $('.note-btn-group .note-btn.active').removeClass('active');
    53|   }
    54| });

    57|   $(e.target).closest('.note-dropdown-menu').parent().find('.note-btn.active').removeClass('active');
    58| });

     1| import $ from 'jquery';
     2| import '/js/settings';
     3| import renderer from '/js/renderer';
     4| import './summernote-lite.scss';
     5| import TooltipUI from './js/TooltipUI';
     6| import DropdownUI from './js/DropdownUI';
     7| import ModalUI from './js/ModalUI';
     8| const editor = renderer.create('<div class="note-editor note-frame"></div>');
     9| const toolbar = renderer.create('<div class="note-toolbar" role="toolbar"></div>');
    10| const editingArea = renderer.create('<div class="note-editing-area"></div>');
    11| const codable = renderer.create('<textarea class="note-codable" aria-multiline="true"></textarea>');
    12| const editable = renderer.create('<div class="note-editable" contentEditable="true" role="textbox" aria-multiline="true"></div>');
    13| const statusbar = renderer.create([
    14|   '<output class="note-status-output" role="status" aria-live="polite"></output>',
    15|   '<div class="note-statusbar" role="status">',
    16|     '<div class="note-resizebar" aria-label="resize">',
    17|       '<div class="note-icon-bar"></div>',
    18|       '<div class="note-icon-bar"></div>',
    19|       '<div class="note-icon-bar"></div>',
    20|     '</div>',
    21|   '</div>',
    22| ].join(''));
    23| const airEditor = renderer.create('<div class="note-editor note-airframe"></div>');

    25|   '<div class="note-editable" contentEditable="true" role="textbox" aria-multiline="true"></div>',
    26|   '<output class="note-status-output" role="status" aria-live="polite"></output>',
    27| ].join(''));
    28| const buttonGroup = renderer.create('<div class="note-btn-group"></div>');
    29| const button = renderer.create('<button type="button" class="note-btn" tabindex="-1"></button>', function($node, options) {
    30|   if (options && options.tooltip) {
    31|     $node.attr({
    32|       'aria-label': options.tooltip,
    33|     });
    34|     $node.data('_lite_tooltip', new TooltipUI($node, {
    35|       title: options.tooltip,
    36|       container: options.container,
    37|     })).on('click', (e) => {
    38|       $(e.currentTarget).data('_lite_tooltip').hide();
    39|     });
    40|   }
    41|   if (options.contents) {
    42|     $node.html(options.contents);
    43|   }
    44|   if (options && options.data && options.data.toggle === 'dropdown') {
    45|     $node.data('_lite_dropdown', new DropdownUI($node, {
    46|       container: options.container,
    47|     }));
    48|   }
    49|   if (options && options.codeviewKeepButton) {
    50|     $node.addClass('note-codeview-keep');
    51|   }
    52| });
    53| const dropdown = renderer.create('<div class="note-dropdown-menu" role="list"></div>', function($node, options) {
    54|   const markup = Array.isArray(options.items) ? options.items.map(function(item) {
    55|     const value = (typeof item === 'string') ? item : (item.value || '');
    56|     const content = options.template ? options.template(item) : item;
    57|     const $temp = $('<a class="note-dropdown-item" href="#" data-value="' + value + '" role="listitem" aria-label="' + value + '"></a>');
    58|     $temp.html(content).data('item', item);
    59|     return $temp;
    60|   }) : options.items;
    61|   $node.html(markup).attr({ 'aria-label': options.title });
    62|   $node.on('click', '> .note-dropdown-item', function(e) {
    63|     const $a = $(this);
    64|     const item = $a.data('item');
    65|     const value = $a.data('value');
    66|     if (item.click) {
    67|       item.click($a);
    68|     } else if (options.itemClick) {
    69|       options.itemClick(e, item, value);
    70|     }
    71|   });
    72|   if (options && options.codeviewKeepButton) {
    73|     $node.addClass('note-codeview-keep');
    74|   }
    75| });
    76| const dropdownCheck = renderer.create('<div class="note-dropdown-menu note-check" role="list"></div>', function($node, options) {
    77|   const markup = Array.isArray(options.items) ? options.items.map(function(item) {
    78|     const value = (typeof item === 'string') ? item : (item.value || '');
    79|     const content = options.template ? options.template(item) : item;
    80|     const $temp = $('<a class="note-dropdown-item" href="#" data-value="' + value + '" role="listitem" aria-label="' + item + '"></a>');
    81|     $temp.html([icon(options.checkClassName), ' ', content]).data('item', item);
    82|     return $temp;
    83|   }) : options.items;

    87|     const item = $a.data('item');

    89|     if (item.click) {
    90|       item.click($a);
    91|     } else if (options.itemClick) {

    93|     }

    95|   if (options && options.codeviewKeepButton) {
    96|     $node.addClass('note-codeview-keep');

    98| });
    99| const dropdownButtonContents = function(contents, options) {
   100|   return contents + ' ' + icon(options.icons.caret, 'span');
   101| };
   102| const dropdownButton = function(opt, callback) {

   176|     posOffset = {

   188|     $unhighlighted.css({ width: dim.c + 1 + 'em' });
   189|   }

   191|     $unhighlighted.css({ height: dim.r + 1 + 'em' });
   192|   }
   193|   $dimensionDisplay.html(dim.c + ' x ' + dim.r);

   230| const palette = renderer.create('<div class="note-color-palette"></div>', function($node, options) {
   231|   const contents = [];
   232|   for (let row = 0, rowSize = options.colors.length; row < rowSize; row++) {
   233|     const eventName = options.eventName;
   234|     const colors = options.colors[row];
   235|     const colorsName = options.colorsName[row];
   236|     const buttons = [];
   237|     for (let col = 0, colSize = colors.length; col < colSize; col++) {
   238|       const color = colors[col];
   239|       const colorName = colorsName[col];
   240|       buttons.push([
   241|         '<button type="button" class="note-btn note-color-btn"',
   242|         'style="background-color:', color, '" ',
   243|         'data-event="', eventName, '" ',
   244|         'data-value="', color, '" ',
   245|         'data-title="', colorName, '" ',
   246|         'aria-label="', colorName, '" ',
   247|         'data-toggle="button" tabindex="-1"></button>',
   248|       ].join(''));
   249|     }
   250|     contents.push('<div class="note-color-row">' + buttons.join('') + '</div>');
   251|   }
   252|   $node.html(contents.join(''));
   253|   $node.find('.note-color-btn').each(function() {
   254|     $(this).data('_lite_tooltip', new TooltipUI($(this), {
   255|       container: options.container,
   256|     }));
   257|   });
   258| });

   307|               '</button>',
   308|             '</div>',
   309|             '<div class="note-holder" data-event="foreColor"></div>',
   310|               '<div class="btn-sm">',
   311|                 '<input type="color" id="html5fcp" class="note-btn btn-default" value="#21104A" style="width:100%;" data-value="cp">',

   328|             $dropdown.find('.btn-background-color').hide();
   329|             $dropdown.css({ 'min-width': '210px' });
   330|           } else if (type === 'back') {
   331|             $dropdown.find('.btn-foreground-color').hide();
   332|             $dropdown.css({ 'min-width': '210px' });
   333|           }
   334|         },
   335|         click: function(event) {
   336|           const $button = $(event.target);
   337|           const eventName = $button.data('event');
   338|           let value = $button.data('value');
   339|           const foreinput = document.getElementById('html5fcp').value;
   340|           const backinput = document.getElementById('html5bcp').value;
   341|           if (value === 'cp') {
   342|             event.stopPropagation();
   343|           } else if (value === 'cpbackColor') {
   344|             value = backinput;
   345|           } else if (value === 'cpforeColor') {

   347|           }

   367| const dialog = renderer.create('<div class="note-modal" aria-hidden="false" tabindex="-1" role="dialog"></div>', function($node, options) {

   378|       (options.footer ? '<div class="note-modal-footer">' + options.footer + '</div>' : ''),
   379|     '</div>',

   458| const checkbox = renderer.create('<div class="checkbox"></div>', function($node, options) {
   459|   $node.html([
   460|     '<label' + (options.id ? ' for="note-' + options.id + '"' : '') + '>',
   461|       '<input role="checkbox" type="checkbox"' + (options.id ? ' id="note-' + options.id + '"' : ''),

   465|     '</label>',
   466|   ].join(''));
   467| });
   468| const icon = function(iconClassName, tagName) {
   469|   if (iconClassName.match(/^</)) {
   470|     return iconClassName;
   471|   }
   472|   tagName = tagName || 'i';
   473|   return '<' + tagName + ' class="' + iconClassName + '"></' + tagName + '>';
   474| };

# --- HUNK 4: Lines 526-588 ---
   526|     },
   527|     /**
   528|      * get popover content area
   529|      *
   530|      * @param $popover
   531|      * @returns {*}
   532|      */
   533|     getPopoverContent: function($popover) {
   534|       return $popover.find('.note-popover-content');
   535|     },
   536|     /**
   537|      * get dialog's body area
   538|      *
   539|      * @param $dialog
   540|      * @returns {*}
   541|      */
   542|     getDialogBody: function($dialog) {
   543|       return $dialog.find('.note-modal-body');
   544|     },
   545|     createLayout: function($note) {
   546|       const $editor = (editorOptions.airMode ? airEditor([
   547|         editingArea([
   548|           codable(),
   549|           airEditable(),
   550|         ]),
   551|       ]) : (editorOptions.toolbarPosition === 'bottom'
   552|         ? editor([
   553|           editingArea([
   554|             codable(),
   555|             editable(),
   556|           ]),
   557|           toolbar(),
   558|           statusbar(),
   559|         ])
   560|         : editor([
   561|           toolbar(),
   562|           editingArea([
   563|             codable(),
   564|             editable(),
   565|           ]),
   566|           statusbar(),
   567|         ])
   568|       )).render();
   569|       $editor.insertAfter($note);
   570|       return {
   571|         note: $note,
   572|         editor: $editor,
   573|         toolbar: $editor.find('.note-toolbar'),
   574|         editingArea: $editor.find('.note-editing-area'),
   575|         editable: $editor.find('.note-editable'),
   576|         codable: $editor.find('.note-codable'),
   577|         statusbar: $editor.find('.note-statusbar'),
   578|       };
   579|     },
   580|     removeLayout: function($note, layoutInfo) {
   581|       $note.html(layoutInfo.editable.html());
   582|       layoutInfo.editor.remove();
   583|       $note.off('summernote'); // remove summernote custom event
   584|       $note.show();
   585|     },
   586|   };
   587| };
   588| $.summernote = $.extend($.summernote, {
